Company description: Enovos is Luxembourg’s leading energy supplier and producer of renewable energy providing today electricity and natural gas to a wide range of customers, including industrial companies, SMEs, and private households. Enovos is also active on the markets in the Greater Region including Germany, France, Belgium and the Netherlands. As a positive energy leader, Enovos contributes in a fully committed and responsible way to the sustainable energy transition by establishing innovative projects in collaboration with key partners to produce energy from renewable sources, and by enabling customers to proactively harness the opportunities of the transition through better managing their consumption and producing their own energy. With its long-established team of experts and a strong network of professionals, Enovos stays abreast of the latest developments, including digitalisation & AI, smart applications, decentralised power production and mobility solutions.

Name: PSI Software SE
Company description: Since 1969 PSI develops and integrates software solutions and control systems for the network infrastructures and complex production and logistics processes. Control, monitoring and optimization As the European market leader for energy control systems for electricity, gas, oil, heat and water, PSI’s customers include almost all the major energy suppliers. Beyond that, PSI provides control system solutions for operational management, network utilization, pipeline management, leak detection and location, portfolio management, energy trading and sales. Company-wide process optimization Solutions for mobility and safety Innovations and international partnerships

Name: Electric Ireland
HQ Location: Ireland, County Dublin, Northwood Santry, 2 Swift Square, 9
Company description: Electric Ireland is Ireland's leading energy provider.  We are proud to be innovators and collaborators with Irish businesses, supporting them with scaleable, sustainable  and responsive energy solutions. Our LinkedIn page will be bringing you simple ideas for your business through insights and industry research from some of the country’s most influential leaders and thinkers as part of our Smarter Living for Business series.

Name: LEW Verteilnetz GmbH
Company description: LEW Verteilnetz GmbH is a leading provider of intelligent metering solutions in Germany, specializing in the deployment and management of modern metering systems (iMSys) that enhance the efficiency and transparency of electricity consumption. The company is committed to facilitating the digital transformation of energy networks, ensuring that all consumers can easily monitor their energy usage and optimize their consumption patterns through advanced technology. With a focus on compliance with legal regulations, LEW Verteilnetz GmbH ensures that all installations meet the highest standards of data protection and security. Its target market includes residential and commercial electricity consumers, as well as energy suppliers who rely on accurate and secure metering solutions. By partnering with various stakeholders in the energy sector, LEW Verteilnetz GmbH aims to contribute to a sustainable energy future while providing exceptional service to its clients.

Name: Stadtwerke Tübingen GmbH
Company description: Stadtwerke Tübingen GmbH is a forward-thinking energy provider specializing in tailored electricity and gas procurement solutions for medium to large enterprises. The company is committed to ensuring supply security, fair pricing, and facilitating the transition to sustainable energy sources. With a diverse range of products, including TüStrom and TüGas offerings, Stadtwerke Tübingen supports clients in optimizing their energy consumption and managing costs effectively. The company collaborates with various partners in the energy market, including producers, network operators, and traders, to deliver innovative energy solutions. Its target market encompasses businesses and industries that require reliable energy supply and are looking to implement sustainable practices. Through intelligent measurement systems and modern facilities, Stadtwerke Tübingen aims to enhance energy efficiency and promote environmentally friendly energy usage.

Name: FGSZ Földgázszállító Zrt.
Company description: FGSZ is the owner and operator of the Hungarian high-pressure natural gas pipeline system servicing gas distribution companies, power plants and large industrial consumers. The technical standard of the Hungarian transmission system is among the best in the world based on international comparison. We provide our services with a team of professionals, focusing on the satisfaction of our partners. FGSZ has a key role in ensuring the safety of the natural gas supply of Hungary and the entire Central and Eastern Europe Region. Our services have been synonymous with quality and continuous improvement for decades and this is also what we offer to our employees: a long-term career at a reliable company with a long history and a secure future.  Az FGSZ Zrt. a tulajdonosa és üzemeltetője a Magyarország területét behálózó nagynyomású földgázszállító vezetékrendszernek, amely a gázszolgáltató társaságokat, erőműveket és a nagyipari fogyasztókat látja el. A magyarországi szállítórendszer műszaki színvonala – nemzetközi összehasonlítások alapján – a világ élvonalába tartozik. Szolgáltatásainkat professzionális csapattal, partnereink elégedettségére fókuszálva biztosítjuk. Az FGSZ kulcsszerepet tölt be Magyarország és az egész közép-európai régió földgázellátás biztonságában. Szolgáltatásaink évtizedek óta a minőségről és a folyamatos fejlődésről szólnak, ugyanezt kínáljuk munkatársainknak is – hosszú távú karriert egy nagy múltú és nagy jövő előtt álló, megbízható vállalatnál.

Name: Energieversorgung Oberhausen AG
Company description: Energieversorgung Oberhausen AG (evo) is a local energy provider committed to ecological, social, and economic responsibility in Oberhausen. The company emphasizes sustainability as a holistic concept, integrating efficient energy generation, biomass utilization, and the use of industrial waste heat in its operations. Evo is also preparing its gas power plants for future hydrogen use, reflecting its role as a pioneer in the local energy and climate transition. Beyond energy supply, evo actively contributes to enhancing the quality of life in Oberhausen by investing in cultural and recreational initiatives and supporting community events. The company prioritizes the secure energy supply for its customers while maintaining a long-term and responsible approach in the energy markets. Through its sustainability report, evo transparently shares its projects and goals, reinforcing its commitment to a greener future for the community.

Name: Eurowind Energy
Company description: Eurowind Energy A/S is a prominent renewable energy company based in Denmark, dedicated to the development, construction, and operation of wind and solar energy projects across Europe and North America. Established in 2006, the company has positioned itself as a key player in the renewable energy sector, with a mission to contribute to a sustainable future by providing clean energy solutions that significantly reduce carbon emissions. Eurowind Energy operates a diverse portfolio that includes wind, solar, hydrogen, biogas, and battery storage solutions, reflecting its commitment to innovative technologies and sustainable practices. With a robust project pipeline of approximately 54 GW and over 2 GW under asset management, Eurowind Energy serves a wide range of clients, including local governments, energy suppliers, industrial partners, and private investors. The company prioritizes collaboration with various stakeholders, including local communities and conservation experts, to ensure that its projects align with environmental and social needs. Eurowind Energy's commitment to sustainability is evident in its operational practices, which emphasize biodiversity and responsible resource management. The company aims to become a Power Major by 2030, focusing on expanding its capacity in onshore wind and solar energy while integrating innovative solutions such as Power-to-X (PtX) for sustainable fuel production. In the 2023/24 fiscal year, Eurowind Energy produced 1,883 GWh of green electricity, helping to avoid 457,671 tonnes of CO2 emissions, showcasing its impact on the environment. With operations in 16 countries, including Denmark, Poland, Germany, and the United States, Eurowind Energy is well-positioned for continued growth and innovation in the renewable energy landscape. Through its strategic initiatives and partnerships, Eurowind Energy envisions a future where renewable energy is accessible and affordable for all, contributing to energy security and sustainability for communities and industries alike. The company is committed to achieving carbon neutrality by 2030, reinforcing its role as a leader in the transition to a greener economy.

Name: SOWITEC GROUP
Company description: SOWITEC GROUP is a leading company in the renewable energy sector, specializing in the development and construction of wind energy projects. With a strong commitment to sustainability, SOWITEC aims to contribute to climate protection by facilitating local energy generation, as exemplified by their recent project, the Windpark Hohfleck, which is set to provide green electricity to over 15,000 households. The company collaborates with various stakeholders, including local municipalities and energy providers, to ensure the successful implementation of its projects. SOWITEC's mission is to accelerate the transition to renewable energy sources, while its vision encompasses a future where clean energy is accessible and prevalent. The company targets markets that prioritize sustainable energy solutions, reflecting the growing demand for renewable energy in response to climate change challenges.

Name: Syneco Trading GmbH
Company description: Syneco was founded in 1999 as the energy service provider of the Thüga Group. Today, Syneco is one of the most important energy trading companies in Germany. Under the umbrella brand Thüga Solutions, we cover, in cooperation with the other Thüga Plus companies, the increasingly complex energy industry almost completely. We support municipal and medium-sized energy suppliers in energy procurement and marketing. We deal with efficient and sustainable ways of energy trading to support our partners with innovative software solutions, services and broad know-how and provide a significant contribution to the energy transition. Our software solutions offer the possibility to digitalize and automate processes of energy procurement and marketing. Our broad product portfolio enables the cost-efficient and transparent handling of trading in electricity, gas and CO2, as well as the associated energy logistics processes and risk management. Renewable energy products are also part of our portfolio. Together with our partners, we are constantly developing our products for automating procurement and marketing, thus adapting to market changes at an early stage. A trusting exchange with our partners is our top priority.  We are always on the lookout for creative minds who want to be part of the energy world. Our employees are involved in exciting fields of activity, benefit from flexible working time models and many other benefits. We provide all information on our job postings on our homepage: https://www.syneco.net/karriere/

Name: Gestamp Wind
Company description: Elawan Energy S.L., formerly known as Gestamp Wind, is a global leader in the renewable energy sector, specializing in the development, construction, and management of wind farms, solar plants, and hydroelectric power stations. As a subsidiary of the ORIX Group, Elawan is dedicated to driving the energy transition through innovative and sustainable solutions, with a mission to contribute to global sustainability and environmental goals. The company has established a diverse portfolio, boasting over 10 GW of projects promoted and more than 2.1 GW operational worldwide. Elawan serves a wide range of clients, including major corporations like Google and Cellnex, as well as governments and energy providers, delivering high-quality energy solutions tailored to their specific needs. Elawan's vision emphasizes respect for diversity and excellence in management, fostering a culture of efficiency and collaboration. The company is committed to ethical governance and positive community impact, ensuring that people are at the center of its strategy. With a strong focus on adaptability and innovation, Elawan Energy aims to expand its footprint in the renewable energy market, particularly in regions with high potential for wind energy generation. Through strategic partnerships and a commitment to reducing carbon emissions, Elawan is poised to play a significant role in the global energy transition, contributing to a cleaner and more sustainable future for all.

Name: Bosch Industrial
Company description: Bosch Industrial specializes in the development and manufacturing of advanced electric heating solutions, particularly through its innovative ELHB electric boiler system, which generates hot water and heating energy with outputs of up to 5.5 MW. The company's mission is to provide sustainable and efficient heating solutions that significantly reduce CO₂ emissions by utilizing renewable energy sources such as solar, wind, and hydroelectric power. Bosch Industrial serves a diverse clientele, including commercial and industrial sectors that require reliable heating and process heat solutions, and partners with various energy providers to enhance system integration and efficiency. With a commitment to quality and safety, all products are manufactured in Germany, adhering to stringent standards and regulations. The company aims to lead the transition towards climate-friendly heating technologies, offering tailored solutions and expert services to meet the unique needs of its customers.

Name: OMICRON Electronics
Company description: OMICRON Electronics, headquartered in Klaus, is a leading provider of testing technology for energy infrastructures, specializing in the development of innovative testing devices for electrical protection systems. With a mission to enhance safety and efficiency in the energy sector, OMICRON has recently launched the CMC 500, a state-of-the-art device designed to meet the growing demands for cybersecurity and personnel safety in electrical testing. The company has experienced significant growth, achieving a revenue increase of over six percent in 2024, driven by rising investments in energy network modernization and the energy transition. OMICRON serves a diverse clientele, including energy providers, service companies in the energy sector, and industrial enterprises, and is committed to expanding its global presence with a workforce of 1,300 employees across 23 locations. The company is focused on continuous innovation and infrastructure development to support its long-term growth and the evolving needs of its customers.

Name: Eraneos Strategy
Company description: We, Eraneos Strategy (formerly SMP Strategy Consulting), are the strategy consulting arm of the Eraneos Group - we combine strategic excellence with genuine commitment. Our team develops sustainable strategies and outstanding customer experiences with a focus on financial services providers, energy suppliers, and telecommunications companies. Thanks to our strong customer focus, excellent performance, and exceptional boutique culture, we have achieved double-digit growth rates for years. In addition to the Eraneos Strategy headquarters in Düsseldorf, we have Eraneos locations in Hamburg, Munich, and eleven other countries. As part of the Eraneos Group, we are jointly setting the course for further growth: our service portfolio has expanded to include capabilities such as customer & commercial excellence, organizational & transformation excellence, data & AI, sourcing & IT advisory, and cybersecurity. We work closely with our experts to develop tailor-made consulting services for our clients – from strategy to successful implementation, end-to-end. Together with Eraneos, we are tapping into new industries and expanding our international environment. Our ambition: as a European challenger, to redefine the successful transformation of our clients while maintaining our proven boutique culture! Contact Jessica Neumann Head of Talent Acquistion Tel: +49-2 11 130 669 0  Mail: karriere.strategy.de@eraneos.com Eraneos Strategy GmbH Josephinenstraße 17 40212 Düsseldorf https://careers.eraneos.com/de/en/strategy/ https://www.eraneos.com/imprint/

Name: Haugaland Kraft
Company description: Haugaland Kraft is a leading energy and telecommunications company based in Haugesund, Norway, specializing in the production, transmission, and sale of electrical power, as well as the development and operation of fiber networks. Established in 1909 through the merger of local energy companies, Haugaland Kraft has evolved into a key player in the Haugalandet, Sunnhordland, inner Ryfylke, and parts of Hardanger regions. The company's mission is to empower strong and sustainable local communities by providing innovative and reliable energy solutions, including hydropower, solar energy, and fiber services. Haugaland Kraft is committed to facilitating the green transition and ensuring a stable supply of electricity and connectivity for its diverse clientele, which includes residential customers, businesses, and municipalities. The company actively engages in sustainability initiatives, aligning its operations with the UN's 17 Sustainable Development Goals, and has made significant investments in renewable energy projects, including offshore wind through its partnership with Deep Wind Offshore. Haugaland Kraft prioritizes health, safety, and environmental considerations in all its operations, aiming to minimize its ecological footprint while contributing positively to the local community's development. With a workforce of approximately 500 employees, the company fosters a safe and inclusive corporate culture, emphasizing continuous improvement and innovation in its services. Haugaland Kraft collaborates with various stakeholders, including local governments and other energy providers, to enhance its service offerings and promote economic growth in the region. The company's vision reflects its commitment to community engagement and responsible business practices, ensuring that it remains a trusted partner in the areas it serves. By investing in technology and customer-centric solutions, such as the "Mitt hjem" app for energy management, Haugaland Kraft aims to simplify and secure the daily lives of its customers while driving the transition to a sustainable energy future.

Name: EWR
Company description: EWR AG is a forward-thinking company dedicated to sustainability and climate protection, positioning itself as a key player in the development of future-proof energy systems. With a mission to create value for the region and its people, EWR AG emphasizes its commitment to economic, ecological, and social responsibilities, which are deeply embedded in its corporate strategy. The company aims to achieve net-zero emissions by 2045, aligning with the German government's climate goals and the UN's scientifically validated 1.5-degree target. EWR AG collaborates with local municipalities, energy providers, and environmental organizations to implement ambitious climate protection initiatives and enhance biodiversity in the region. Its target market includes local communities and businesses that prioritize sustainable energy solutions and responsible resource management. Through transparency and accountability, EWR AG strives to foster long-term partnerships and contribute positively to the environment and society.

Name: Insta Digital
Company description: Insta Digital is a diversified technology company based in Tampere, Finland, dedicated to empowering a secure and sustainable future through innovative solutions across various sectors, including industry, defense, software development, and cyber security. With over 60 years of experience, the company has established itself as a frontrunner in the technology landscape, recognized for its commitment to enhancing security, performance, and sustainability in an increasingly digital world. Insta Digital's mission is to support a wide range of clients—from corporations to public sector organizations—by providing comprehensive services that encompass cyberattack prevention, automation, and secure communication solutions. The company operates across four key business areas: industry, defense, cyber security, and software consulting, serving a diverse clientele that includes government agencies, industrial manufacturers, and energy providers. Insta Digital has forged strong partnerships with leading companies such as Valmet and Lockheed Martin, which enhance its technological capabilities and market reach. Its commitment to environmental responsibility is evident in significant projects, such as the instrumentation installations for the Naistenlahti 3 biomass-fired boiler plant, and initiatives aimed at recovering waste heat from data centers in collaboration with Microsoft and Fortum. Insta Digital's vision emphasizes collaboration and expertise in technology, automation, and cybersecurity, ensuring that it remains a trusted partner in critical infrastructure and defense sectors. The company has achieved 14 consecutive years of revenue growth, reflecting its dedication to continuous improvement and customer satisfaction. With a strong international network spanning over 50 countries, Insta Digital is well-positioned to meet the evolving needs of its clients and the global market while fostering a culture of responsibility and sustainability. Through its innovative solutions, Insta Digital aims to drive the green transition and create a more efficient future for all.

Name: Bayernets GmbH
Company description: Bayernets GmbH is a leading gas transmission company dedicated to ensuring a reliable and sustainable gas supply for Germany's economy. With a strong focus on developing hydrogen infrastructure, Bayernets is actively involved in creating a comprehensive hydrogen network in Bavaria, collaborating with regional distribution network operators to enhance the region's energy transition. The company's mission is to support the decarbonization of the energy sector by leveraging existing gas infrastructure while planning for future hydrogen needs. Bayernets serves a diverse clientele, including industrial consumers and energy suppliers, and partners with various stakeholders to synchronize strategies for hydrogen utilization. Through innovative projects and a commitment to sustainability, Bayernets aims to play a pivotal role in shaping a decarbonized energy landscape in Bavaria and beyond.

Name: Rabot Energy
Company description: Der Energieanbieter Rabot Energy macht es für jeden möglich, unkompliziert aktiver Teil der Energiewende zu werden.  Rabot Energy denkt Energie neu und bietet für Kund*innen einen dynamischen Stromtarif für Haushalt und Elektroauto mit 100% Ökostrom an. Das heißt, im Gegensatz zu anderen Stromanbietern, kauft Rabot Energy Strom kurzfristig über den Day-Ahead und Intraday-Markt ein, nutzt somit die stündlichen Preisschwankungen an der Strombörse und gibt den Einkaufspreis direkt an Kund*innen weiter. So können zum Beispiel E-Autos automatisiert dann geladen werden, wenn der Börsenstrompreis in einem festgelegten Ladezeitfenster besonders gering ist. Da bei viel Wind und Sonne die Preise niedrig sind, wird so nicht nur der Geldbeutel geschont, sondern auch die Umwelt.  Den Energieverbrauch sowie das smarte und automatisierte Energiemanagement können Verbraucher*innen in Echtzeit in der Rabot Energy App nachverfolgen und steuern. Ziel ist es, intelligenten und nachhaltigen Stromkonsum für jeden zugänglich zu machen und den Ausbau erneuerbarer Energien voranzutreiben, um den Klimawandel zu bekämpfen.

Name: Berliner Stadtwerke
Company description: Berliner Stadtwerke GmbH is a municipal energy provider dedicated to supplying 100% green electricity to households and public institutions in Berlin. The company aims to increase the share of ecologically produced energy in the city while actively contributing to the reduction of CO2 emissions, aligning with its mission to make Berlin climate-neutral. Berliner Stadtwerke serves a diverse clientele, including approximately 6,500 properties such as schools, government offices, and public lighting systems, ensuring that over 200,000 streetlights operate on environmentally friendly power. Additionally, the company is expanding its public charging infrastructure for electric vehicles, with plans to double the number of charging points by 2030. Through partnerships with local residents and organizations, Berliner Stadtwerke is committed to fostering a sustainable future for the city and its inhabitants.

Name: Ormazabal
Company description: Ormazabal is a leading company specializing in the design and manufacturing of electrical solutions for medium voltage distribution networks. With over 55 years of experience, the company is committed to transforming the electrical grid into a more reliable, resilient, and sustainable infrastructure. Ormazabal's innovative products, such as the cgm.zero24 and sbp.zero24, utilize advanced technologies like gas-insulated switchgear (GIS) and natural air insulation, aiming to reduce environmental impact while enhancing energy efficiency. The company serves a diverse clientele, including industrial sectors, renewable energy providers, and critical infrastructure, ensuring the safe and efficient distribution of electricity from high voltage transmission lines to end consumers. Ormazabal's mission is to facilitate the integration of renewable energy sources and promote sustainable mobility, positioning itself as a key player in the future of energy distribution.

Name: Madrileña Red De Gas
Company description: Madrileña Red de Gas is a leading natural gas distribution company operating in the Community of Madrid, dedicated to providing reliable and efficient energy solutions. The company's mission is to facilitate a sustainable energy transition by integrating renewable gases, such as biomethane and green hydrogen, into its distribution network, thereby contributing to the reduction of carbon emissions and promoting energy efficiency. Madrileña Red de Gas serves a diverse clientele, including residential, commercial, and industrial customers, and collaborates with various stakeholders, including government entities and energy suppliers, to enhance its service offerings and ensure compliance with regulatory standards. The company is committed to social responsibility, prioritizing employee well-being, safety, and environmental sustainability in its operations. Through its strategic initiatives, Madrileña Red de Gas aims to lead the energy sector towards a greener future while maintaining a strong focus on customer satisfaction and community engagement.

Name: WEMAG AG
Company description: WEMAG AG is a regional energy provider based in Schwerin, dedicated to sustainability and environmental protection. The company focuses on innovative energy solutions, including the use of heat pumps for efficient cooling, and actively engages in community initiatives such as sponsoring local sports events like the Schweriner 5SeenLauf. WEMAG AG aims to foster a strong connection with the community and its clients, which include residential customers and businesses in the region. Through its subsidiary, WEMAG Netz GmbH, the company also emphasizes the importance of education and training, offering internships and career opportunities to young individuals. WEMAG AG's mission is to provide reliable energy services while promoting sustainable practices and community involvement.

Name: PZEM
Company description: PZEM Energy Company B.V., a subsidiary of EP NL and part of the EPH Group, is a leading energy provider in the Netherlands, specializing in electricity generation, trading, and supply solutions for businesses. Established in 1919, PZEM has evolved to play a crucial role in the energy sector, focusing on delivering reliable and sustainable energy solutions while supporting the transition to a net-zero future. The company's mission emphasizes operational excellence and financial stability, with a vision centered on sustainability and efficiency in energy consumption. PZEM serves a diverse clientele, including industrial customers, municipalities, and residential consumers, and is committed to providing tailored energy solutions that meet the evolving needs of its market. The company operates a diverse portfolio of gas-fired power plants and engages in wholesale energy trading across Europe, particularly in key markets such as the Netherlands, Germany, and the United Kingdom. PZEM's strategic partnerships, including a notable contract with Urenco Nederland B.V. for the supply of CO2-free electricity, highlight its dedication to innovative energy solutions and collaboration with industry leaders. As it prepares for a rebranding to EP Commodities B.V. in February 2025, PZEM aims to enhance its visibility and strengthen its market position in the business energy sector. With a strong focus on innovation, PZEM utilizes advanced plant optimization software to forecast market prices and manage volatility, ensuring efficient operations and strategic decision-making. The company is also involved in hedging and risk management, enabling its clients to navigate the complexities of the energy market effectively. PZEM's commitment to sustainability and efficiency positions it as a dynamic player in the energy landscape, actively participating in shaping the future of energy through its comprehensive service offerings and collaborative efforts with various stakeholders.

Name: Power Plus Communications
Company description: Power Plus Communications AG is a leading provider of smart metering systems and communication technology, specializing in the development and implementation of smart meter gateways and solutions for smart grids. Based in Mannheim, Germany, the company is committed to fostering interoperability and collaboration through a robust partner network that spans various industries, enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of energy management. Power Plus Communications aims to drive innovation in intelligent measuring systems, contributing to the advancement of smart buildings and e-mobility. Their target market includes energy providers, utility companies, and businesses seeking to optimize their energy consumption and management practices. With a focus on sustainability and quality, Power Plus Communications is dedicated to delivering cutting-edge solutions that meet the evolving needs of the energy sector.

Name: Soly
Company description: Soly is a leading provider of sustainable energy solutions, specializing in solar panels, home batteries, charging stations, and energy management systems. The company's mission is to make solar energy accessible to everyone, striving for a 100% sustainable future for both individuals and businesses. Soly serves a diverse clientele, ranging from households to corporate clients, offering customized solutions that include attractive discounts through partnerships with organizations like Corporate Benefits. The company takes pride in its innovative products, such as bifacial glass-glass solar panels and advanced home batteries, which are not only efficient but also contribute to the energy transition. By utilizing dynamic energy contracts and smart technologies like the Soly Brain, Soly helps customers optimize their energy consumption and save on costs. In addition to residential solutions, Soly is also a prominent player in the commercial sector, providing flexible options for leasing and purchasing solar panel systems tailored to the financial needs of businesses. Their target market includes small to large enterprises looking to reduce energy expenses and improve their environmental impact. Soly collaborates with various partners, including energy suppliers and local governments, to facilitate the installation of solar systems and innovative solutions like ZonneCarports, which maximize space utilization for energy generation. With a strong focus on sustainability and customer satisfaction, Soly positions itself as a reliable partner in the energy transition, offering tailored advice and support to ensure businesses can effectively transition to renewable energy.

Name: AKG Group
Company description: AKG Group is a leading global provider of high-quality radiators and heat exchangers, renowned for its customer-oriented solutions in thermal management. With over 100 years of experience, the company operates 11 business units across various countries, including Germany, France, the USA, and China, employing around 3,200 professionals who produce over 2.5 million heat exchangers annually. AKG's mission is to deliver innovative and reliable thermal management solutions for diverse applications, including construction equipment, industrial coolers, and renewable energy systems. The company is committed to sustainability, exemplified by its recent partnership with Consolar to produce advanced PVT heat pump collectors, contributing to a greener future. AKG serves a wide range of clients, from industrial manufacturers to renewable energy providers, and aims to meet the growing demands of the global market with tailored solutions and cutting-edge technology.

Name: EPA ATTIKI
Company description: The first “spark” was lit back in 1857! It has been 160 years since the old Athens gas plant was established. Today, Fysiko Aerio Hellenic Energy Company acts like a bridge between the past and the future as the natural and historic successor that carries the unique know-how and accumulated expertise, whilst retaining the role of the leading energy provider amongst residential, business and corporate customers. Implementing its vision which is to be the first energy choice for the customer, Fysiko Aerio Hellenic Energy Company brings innovation in products & services that meet customers’ deepest needs & expectations.

Name: TEN Thüringer Energienetze GmbH & CO. KG
Company description: TEN Thüringer Energienetze GmbH & Co. KG is a key player in the energy sector, specializing in the planning, construction, and operation of energy networks, particularly focusing on hydrogen infrastructure and renewable energy sources. The company is committed to facilitating the transition to a climate-neutral energy system by providing innovative solutions for the integration of hydrogen into existing energy frameworks. TEN serves a diverse clientele, including industrial operators and energy providers, and collaborates with partners such as GASCADE and Ferngas to enhance the regional energy landscape. With a vision to connect significant industrial sites in Thuringia to a hydrogen core network by 2029, TEN aims to ensure a reliable and efficient energy supply while supporting sustainable development initiatives. The company also emphasizes compliance with regulatory standards and offers comprehensive services to assist clients in navigating the complexities of energy transition projects.

Name: Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden
Company description: Nederland is verdeeld in vijfentwintig veiligheidsregio’s, waar Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden (de VRH) er één van is. Om de veiligheid in de regio te vergroten en voorbereid te zijn op (grootschalige) incidenten, bundelen hulpdiensten en gemeenten hun krachten. De Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden bestaat uit: - Brandweer Haaglanden (en meldkamer); - GHOR: Geneeskundige Hulpverleningsorganisatie in de Regio; De Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden werkt intensief samen met andere organisaties, zoals de gemeenten in de regio, Politie eenheid Den Haag, ministeries, provincie Zuid-Holland, defensie, energieleveranciers, ziekenhuizen en waterschappen. Om samen op te kunnen treden als het nodig is én om voorbereidingen te treffen om calamiteiten te voorkomen. Altijd paraat! De Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden werkt 24 uur per dag, 7 dagen in de week aan de veiligheid in de Regio Haaglanden. Zij doet dit voor alle regiogemeenten: Delft, Den Haag, Leidschendam-Voorburg, Midden-Delfland, Pijnacker-Nootdorp, Rijswijk, Wassenaar, Westland en Zoetermeer. De burgemeesters van deze gemeenten vormen samen het bestuur van de Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden. De taken van de Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden staan omschreven in de Wet op de Veiligheidsregio's.

Name: Norske Skog
Company description: Norske Skog is a leading global producer of publication and packaging paper, with a specialization in newsprint, magazine paper, and recycled containerboard. With over 60 years of experience, the company operates four mills in Europe and one in Australia, boasting an impressive annual production capacity of 1.3 million tonnes of publication paper and 0.8 million tonnes of packaging paper. Norske Skog is dedicated to sustainability and innovation, with a mission to minimize its environmental footprint through responsible business practices and continuous improvement, aiming for net-zero emissions by 2050. The company serves a diverse clientele, including publishers, packaging manufacturers, and various industries that require high-quality paper products.  Norske Skog is committed to enhancing its operational efficiency and maintaining a competitive edge in the market by optimizing production costs and adapting to changing market demands. As part of its strategic initiatives, the company is transitioning towards packaging solutions to meet the growing demand for eco-friendly products while upholding high standards of quality and reliability under its NOR and STRATO brands. The company actively engages in initiatives to promote biodiversity and responsible sourcing of certified wood, adhering to internationally recognized environmental management systems.  Norske Skog collaborates with various partners, including suppliers of raw materials and energy providers, to ensure compliance with environmental standards and certifications. With a workforce of around 1,700 employees, the company is headquartered in Oslo, Norway, and is publicly traded on the Oslo Stock Exchange under the ticker NSKOG. Through its strategic focus on sustainability and innovation, Norske Skog positions itself as a key player in the global paper market, contributing positively to the circular economy while meeting the evolving needs of its clients.

Name: Items GmbH
Company description: Items GmbH & Co. KG is a specialized service provider in the energy sector, with a strong focus on the Meter-to-Cash process chain for energy supply companies (EVUs). With over 25 years of experience, the company delivers comprehensive solutions encompassing market communication, billing, payment and receivables management, customer service, and quality assurance. This ensures that energy providers can efficiently meet regulatory requirements while enhancing their operational efficiency through standardized and automated processes tailored to individual needs. Items GmbH serves a diverse clientele, including critical infrastructure operators and essential service providers across sectors such as energy, water supply, and healthcare.  The company is dedicated to strengthening the cybersecurity and operational resilience of its partners in an increasingly regulated environment, offering both temporary support and full outsourcing options. Items GmbH is also a leading IT service provider, specializing in the needs of municipal energy and water management as well as public transportation. With a team of over 370 committed employees, the company develops innovative solutions for digital transformation aimed at improving the quality of life in cities and regions.  Items GmbH's mission is to create sustainable and efficient energy supply systems through digitalization, networking, and automation, addressing the challenges posed by climate change. The company fosters close relationships with its clients and partners to provide tailored solutions that meet the specific demands of the industry. Items GmbH promotes a corporate culture of openness, teamwork, and personal development, enhancing employee satisfaction and innovation. The firm also specializes in consulting, empowering energy providers, particularly municipal utilities, by translating regulatory and market developments into practical, sustainable strategies. Led by experienced professionals, Items GmbH aims to be at the forefront of energy transformation, offering valuable resources and guidance to help clients navigate the complexities of the energy market.

Name: Welotec A Westermo company
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Laer, 7 Zum Hagenbach, 48366
Company description: Welotec is a leading technology company that specializes in intelligent industrial IoT solutions, with a strong focus on enhancing productivity and energy efficiency across various sectors, including energy, industry, agriculture, and transportation. With over 50 years of experience, Welotec is dedicated to supporting its clients in their digital transformation journeys by providing tailored solutions that optimize processes and ensure sustainable practices. The company's mission is to empower businesses by transforming their machinery and systems for greater profitability, safety, and sustainability.  Welotec's product offerings include industrial routers, IoT edge gateways, and digital substation solutions, which cater primarily to the energy and productivity sectors. The company serves a diverse clientele, including energy providers, industrial manufacturers, machinery and plant engineering firms, and transportation companies. By collaborating with various partners, Welotec drives innovation and addresses complex challenges faced by its clients.  Committed to sustainability and ethical practices, Welotec actively participates in initiatives such as the vPAC Alliance and Linux Foundation Energy, promoting environmental responsibility and social equity. The company focuses on enhancing operational efficiency and cybersecurity, aiming to shape a smarter and more sustainable industrial future. Through continuous improvement and innovation, Welotec ensures that it remains at the forefront of technological advancements in the industrial IoT landscape, ultimately delivering effective solutions that meet the evolving needs of its clients.

Name: CIRCUTOR
Company description: CIRCUTOR S.A.U. is a leading company based in Viladecavalls, Barcelona, specializing in the design and manufacturing of advanced electrical and electronic solutions, particularly in the fields of energy management and automation. The company is dedicated to enhancing energy efficiency and sustainability across various sectors, including industrial facilities, commercial enterprises, and utility companies. CIRCUTOR's mission is to empower businesses to optimize their energy consumption while minimizing their environmental impact, aligning with its vision of fostering a sustainable future through innovative energy solutions. The company's extensive product portfolio includes advanced energy meters, power quality analyzers, reactive power compensation devices, harmonic filtering solutions, and energy management systems. These products are designed to meet the evolving needs of a diverse clientele, which encompasses industrial facilities, energy providers, and electrical contractors. CIRCUTOR collaborates with various partners in the energy sector to deliver cutting-edge technologies, ensuring that its solutions adhere to international standards and certifications. CIRCUTOR targets a wide market, ranging from small businesses to large industrial operations, striving to optimize energy consumption and reduce operational costs for its customers. The company is committed to technological advancement and customer satisfaction, playing a pivotal role in the global transition towards sustainable energy practices. Through its dedication to quality and innovation, CIRCUTOR continues to drive advancements in energy management technology, making it a trusted partner for clients navigating the challenges of modern energy management.

Name: KMW
Company description: Kraftwerke MainzWiesbaden AG (KMW) is a leading energy provider in the Mainz and Wiesbaden regions, specializing in the generation and management of energy through a diverse portfolio that includes wind parks, solar parks, and various types of power plants such as gas and steam turbine plants. The company's mission is to drive sustainable energy solutions while ensuring reliable energy supply and contributing to environmental protection. KMW collaborates with partners like Green Mountain to develop innovative projects, including a state-of-the-art data center that emphasizes sustainability and efficiency. Its target market includes local municipalities, businesses, and residential customers seeking reliable and eco-friendly energy solutions. With a commitment to progress and community engagement, KMW aims to be at the forefront of the energy transition in the region.

Name: Fortiss
Company description: Fortiss GmbH is a prominent research institution located in Munich, specializing in the development of software-intensive systems and innovative solutions tailored for the manufacturing and automotive sectors. The company's mission is to enhance competitiveness through cutting-edge research and practical engineering, focusing on key areas such as Industry 4.0, artificial intelligence, and digital manufacturing. Fortiss is dedicated to supporting the transition to a sustainable energy future by optimizing energy management, integrating renewable resources, and enhancing grid stability.  The company collaborates with a diverse array of clients, including small and medium-sized enterprises, larger industrial partners, energy providers, and grid operators, to tackle challenges related to automation, production efficiency, and system integration. Fortiss offers tailored workshops, research projects, and prototyping services designed to meet the specific needs of its clients.  With a strong commitment to ethical research practices, gender equality, and fostering a culture of integrity and transparency, Fortiss aims to shape the future of industrial technology while contributing to sustainable development in the manufacturing landscape. By leveraging advanced technologies and interdisciplinary approaches, Fortiss is positioned to play a pivotal role in the digitalization of the industry and the evolution of energy management systems. Through its innovative software platforms and applications, Fortiss addresses the increasing complexity and demands of energy systems, driving sustainable growth in the energy sector.

Name: Hermann Sewerin GmbH
Company description: Hermann Sewerin GmbH is a leading company specializing in the development and manufacturing of high-quality measurement and detection technology for water, gas, and energy supply networks. With a commitment to innovation and excellence, the company aims to provide reliable solutions that enhance the efficiency and sustainability of utility management. Hermann Sewerin GmbH serves a diverse clientele, including municipal utilities, energy providers, and industrial clients, while also collaborating with sales partners across Europe, such as those in Italy and Turkey. The company’s mission is to support its customers in optimizing their operations through advanced technology, ensuring a responsible approach to resource management. With a focus on customer satisfaction and teamwork, Hermann Sewerin GmbH fosters a collaborative environment that empowers its employees to deliver exceptional service and solutions.

Name: Energie SaarLorLux AG
Company description: Energie SaarLorLux AG is a prominent energy supplier based in Saarbrücken, specializing in the provision of heating services through a centralized district heating system. The company is committed to delivering reliable and efficient heating solutions to residential and commercial clients, ensuring that their heating needs are met in accordance with regulatory standards. With a focus on customer satisfaction, Energie SaarLorLux AG aims to enhance the quality of life for its users while promoting sustainable energy practices. The company collaborates with local partners, including Stadtwerke Saarbrücken Netz AG, to optimize its service delivery and maintain high operational standards. By prioritizing transparency and customer engagement, Energie SaarLorLux AG seeks to foster trust and long-term relationships with its clients.

Name: NeN
Company description: NeN è un fornitore di energia innovativo che offre gas e luce 100% green attraverso un modello di abbonamento completamente digitale. La missione di NeN è semplificare la gestione delle forniture energetiche, eliminando la burocrazia e rendendo le bollette chiare e comprensibili per tutti. Con una sola offerta che prevede una rata fissa mensile, i clienti possono bloccare il prezzo della materia prima per un anno, garantendo stabilità e trasparenza nei costi. NeN si rivolge a un ampio pubblico, inclusi clienti domestici e piccole imprese in tutta Italia, e collabora con iniziative come "Nipote in affitto" per supportare le persone anziane nell'apprendimento delle tecnologie digitali. La visione di NeN è quella di rendere l'energia accessibile e sostenibile per tutti, promuovendo un consumo responsabile e consapevole. NeN si distingue per la sua offerta di gas e luce a impatto zero, grazie a un impegno attivo nella compensazione delle emissioni di CO₂ attraverso progetti di carbon offset in Ruanda e Ucraina. La compagnia garantisce ai clienti di pagare solo per l'energia effettivamente consumata, senza costi aggiuntivi. La clientela di NeN comprende sia utenti domestici che aziende, con un focus particolare su coloro che cercano soluzioni energetiche ecologiche e convenienti. NeN collabora con partner come LifeGate per monitorare e compensare la propria impronta di carbonio, rivolgendo la sua offerta a un mercato sempre più attento alla sostenibilità e all'efficienza energetica. Con un mix energetico 100% green, NeN si propone di rendere l'energia accessibile e responsabile per tutti. L'azienda ha sviluppato un programma di fidelizzazione chiamato Radici, che premia i clienti con sconti e vantaggi in base alla loro anzianità. Con un forte impegno verso la sostenibilità, NeN si distingue per il suo approccio innovativo e digitale nella gestione delle forniture, supportato da un'app intuitiva e una serie di servizi aggiuntivi. NeN si impegna a garantire trasparenza e supporto ai propri clienti, offrendo anche promozioni e sconti per incentivare l'adozione delle proprie forniture, adattandosi così alle esigenze del mercato e contribuendo a un futuro più sostenibile per tutti.

Name: Cronos Unternehmensberatung GmbH
Company description: cronos Unternehmensberatung GmbH is a leading consulting firm specializing in digital transformation within the energy sector. The company focuses on implementing modern technologies, particularly SAP solutions such as SAP S/4HANA and the SAP Sales & Service Cloud, to optimize business processes for its clients. With a mission to enhance efficiency and flexibility through innovative approaches like hyperautomation and AI-driven solutions, cronos aims to empower energy providers and utility companies to thrive in the digital age. The firm collaborates closely with renowned partners, including Tricentis, Microsoft, SAP, and UiPath, to develop customized solutions that meet the specific needs of the industry.  Targeting energy suppliers and public clients in the German-speaking region, cronos provides effective strategies for digitalization and process automation. The company has established itself as an SAP Diamond Initiative Partner in the energy sector, reflecting its commitment to excellence and industry leadership. Additionally, cronos offers innovative platforms, such as the CheckIn App, which facilitates visitor registration and workplace booking while adhering to ISO 27001 standards. By focusing on tailored IT strategies and process optimizations, cronos supports its clients in navigating the complexities of digital transformation, ultimately improving operational efficiency and customer experiences. Through its dedication to continuous improvement and strategic partnerships, cronos Unternehmensberatung GmbH is poised to drive the future of energy management and digitalization.

Name: Brunata Zenner Sp. Z O.o.
Company description: Brunata ZENNER Sp. z o.o. is a modern company specializing in energy measurement and management solutions, dedicated to promoting sustainable resource consumption through intelligent measurement devices and advanced energy monitoring systems. With a mission to make homes and buildings smarter, the company provides precise measurement of heat and water consumption, helping clients optimize resource use and improve environmental health. Operating across Europe, from Norway to Italy, Brunata ZENNER serves a diverse clientele, including public utilities, energy suppliers, municipalities, and property managers, employing over 400 professionals in Poland alone. The company is part of the BrunataMinolZenner group, leveraging over a century of innovation in measurement technology and IoT solutions to enhance energy efficiency in residential and commercial properties. Brunata ZENNER is committed to creating a greener future by enabling smarter energy consumption in both private and public spaces.

Name: Ifeu - Institut Für Energie- Und Umweltforschung Heidelberg GGmbH
Company description: Ifeu - Institut Für Energie- Und Umweltforschung Heidelberg GGmbH is a prominent research institute dedicated to addressing critical energy and environmental challenges, with a strong emphasis on sustainable building practices and energy efficiency. The institute's mission is to facilitate the transition towards a decarbonized and energy-efficient built environment, aligning its efforts with European directives such as the Energy Performance of Buildings Directive (EPBD). Ifeu engages in collaborative partnerships with a diverse array of stakeholders, including national ministries, industry representatives, energy providers, and European institutions, to foster knowledge exchange and develop practical solutions for implementing energy efficiency standards and renovation strategies. Ifeu's target market encompasses governmental bodies, construction companies, environmental organizations, and residential consumers, all of whom benefit from the institute's expertise in energy performance, building renovation, and sustainable development practices. The institute is particularly focused on analyzing energy consumption patterns and developing strategies to reduce energy use, especially in residential settings. Through initiatives like the Concerted Action EPBD VI, Ifeu plays a vital role in shaping policies and practices aimed at reducing greenhouse gas emissions and enhancing the overall energy efficiency of buildings across Europe. In addition to its work in the building sector, Ifeu also explores innovative technologies and strategies for optimizing heating systems, utilizing smart technologies and data analysis to empower users and operators to manage energy consumption effectively. The institute's research initiatives span various sectors, including transportation and renewable energy, aiming to promote informed decision-making and foster sustainable practices. By bridging the gap between scientific research and practical application, Ifeu is committed to advancing energy efficiency and environmental sustainability, ultimately contributing to a more sustainable energy system for future generations.

Name: EEW Energy From Waste GmbH
Company description: EEW Energy from Waste GmbH is a leading European company specializing in the thermal recycling of waste and sewage sludge. With 17 facilities across Germany and neighboring countries, the company processes up to 5 million tons of waste annually, converting it into valuable energy in the form of process steam for industrial applications, district heating for residential areas, and environmentally friendly electricity. EEW's mission is to contribute to a sustainable circular economy by conserving natural resources, recovering valuable raw materials, and reducing carbon emissions. The company employs approximately 1,400 dedicated professionals and collaborates with various partners, including local governments and energy providers, to enhance waste management solutions and energy supply. EEW is committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace, offering its employees opportunities for professional development and a supportive work environment.

Name: Conexus S.p.A.
Company description: Conexus S.p.A. is a forward-thinking company specializing in the development and management of high-voltage and medium/low-voltage electrical networks, transformer substations, and renewable energy solutions, including wind and photovoltaic plants. With a commitment to innovation and reliability, Conexus aims to enhance electricity distribution networks by integrating advanced technology with a human-centered approach. The company serves a diverse clientele, including energy providers and industrial clients, and partners with various stakeholders to deliver comprehensive energy solutions, such as electric energy storage systems and e-mobility charging solutions. Conexus is dedicated to maintaining the highest standards of quality and sustainability, as evidenced by its certified Integrated Management System, which adheres to international standards. The company's mission is to combine vision with practicality, ensuring that its services contribute to a sustainable energy future.

Name: Janitza Electronics GmbH
Company description: Janitza Electronics GmbH is a leading company in the field of energy measurement technology, specializing in innovative solutions for energy management and monitoring. The company's mission is to empower organizations to optimize their energy consumption and enhance sustainability through advanced measurement and analysis tools. Janitza is dedicated to enhancing energy efficiency and sustainability across various industries by providing precise data and advanced measurement tools. The company serves a diverse clientele, including industrial enterprises, energy providers, businesses in the automotive sector, and facility managers, helping them navigate the complexities of modern energy demands and CO2 transparency. Janitza collaborates with various partners to deliver cutting-edge technology and services, ensuring that its clients receive the best solutions tailored to their specific needs. With a strong focus on growth and innovation, Janitza is committed to fostering a culture of open communication and continuous improvement. The company emphasizes collaboration and knowledge sharing among its teams, which drives continuous improvement and innovation in energy management practices. By equipping its employees with the skills and knowledge necessary to succeed, Janitza aims to remain at the forefront of the energy technology sector. Through its dedication to sustainability and efficiency, Janitza Electronics GmbH is poised to make a significant impact in the evolving energy landscape.

Name: Kalmar Energi
Company description: Vår vision: Tillsammans skapar vi förutsättningar för att bygga och trygga ett innovativt, tillgängligt och hållbart Kalmar. Vi är det självklara alternativet för den lokala kunden när det gäller val av energileverantör. Vi erbjuder alltid den mest konkurrenskraftiga och klimatsmarta energilösningen. Vi är en viktig faktor för att skapa tillväxt, ekonomiska värden och bidrar till ett långsiktigt hållbart samhälle med fokus på människa och klimat. Kalmar Energi omsätter cirka 900 miljoner kronor och har cirka 100 medarbetare.

Name: FornovoGas S.p.A
Company description: FornovoGas S.p.A is a leading company specializing in the production and distribution of renewable gas solutions, focusing on sustainable energy practices. The company's mission is to provide innovative and efficient energy solutions that contribute to a greener future, aligning with global sustainability goals. FornovoGas serves a diverse clientele, including industrial sectors, energy providers, and municipalities, aiming to meet the growing demand for renewable energy sources. Through strategic partnerships and a commitment to technological advancement, the company is dedicated to enhancing the accessibility and efficiency of renewable gas, positioning itself as a key player in the energy transition.

Name: TEDOM Energie
HQ Location: Czech Republic, South Moravian, Brno, 731/13 Klášterského, 61700
Company description: Jsme český dodavatel elektřiny a plynu. Patříme do strojírensko-energetické skupiny TEDOM, která již od roku 1991 určuje trendy v oblasti kombinované výroby tepla a elektřiny u nás i ve světě.  Společnost TEDOM energie vznikla v roce 2021 a naše pobočky najdete po celé České republice. Naši energetičtí poradci vám díky široké síti našich partnerů připraví nabídku na míru v oblasti fotovoltaiky, tepelných čerpadel nebo smart technologií pro domácnosti i firmy.

Name: Wekiwi Italia
Company description: Wekiwi Italia is a digital energy provider specializing in electricity and gas services. The company aims to simplify energy management for its clients by offering transparent pricing options, including fixed and variable rates, tailored to meet individual needs. Wekiwi's mission is to provide high-quality services with a focus on customer satisfaction, leveraging technology to enhance user experience through its mobile app, which allows customers to monitor their supplies and manage their accounts easily. The company primarily targets residential and business clients looking for efficient and cost-effective energy solutions. Wekiwi has established itself as a competitive player in the market, often ranking highly in online comparison platforms, and is committed to maintaining strong partnerships with its clients and stakeholders.

Name: Innova Energie
HQ Location: Netherlands, South Holland, The Hague, 85 Oude Middenweg, 2491ac
Company description: Innova Energie is a reliable energy supplier and partner with over 15 years of experience in the energy sector, based in Den Haag-Leidschenveen and serving clients across the Netherlands. The company specializes in providing both gas and 100% green electricity, along with a variety of sustainable energy solutions such as solar panels, infrared panels, and charging stations. Innova Energie's mission is to raise awareness about energy consumption and assist customers in making informed choices that prioritize convenience, sustainability, and cost-effectiveness. The company is committed to societal engagement and aims to contribute positively to the community by supporting various charitable organizations. With a focus on transparency and personal growth, Innova Energie fosters a collaborative work environment that encourages innovation and teamwork among its employees, who are dedicated to the shared vision of a sustainable future.

Name: Hilo
Company description: Hilo is a pioneering company focused on promoting sustainable energy consumption through its innovative smart home service. By partnering with organizations like Québecor, Hilo aims to facilitate the adoption of energy-efficient practices among employees, helping them manage their electricity usage more effectively while reducing their ecological footprint. The company's mission is to empower individuals and businesses in Quebec to engage in responsible energy consumption, thereby contributing to the collective effort against climate change. Hilo's target market includes both individual consumers and corporate clients looking to enhance their energy management strategies. Through initiatives like seasonal challenges that reward participants for reducing energy consumption, Hilo not only helps users save on their electricity bills but also fosters a community committed to sustainability.

Name: Marine Service GmbH
Company description: Marine Service GmbH, founded in 1958 by Dr. Karl-Heinz Krämer, is a family-owned company that has established itself as a market leader in marine consultancy, LNG/LPG technology, and offshore wind energy. Now managed by the third generation, Christian Krämer, the company is committed to driving the maritime industry's transition towards a more efficient and sustainable future. Marine Service specializes in providing comprehensive services, including marine consultancy, newbuilding supervision, and plan approval, while also developing innovative solutions such as their proprietary LNG fuel gas systems for various types of vessels. The company is actively involved in projects utilizing alternative green fuels like hydrogen, BioLNG, and ammonia, and offers consultancy for offshore wind power converter platforms. With a philosophy of "Pioneering Solutions," Marine Service GmbH serves a diverse clientele, including international shipping companies and energy providers, positioning itself as a valuable partner in global maritime projects.

Name: Intelligent Energy System Services GmbH
Company description: Intelligent Energy System Services GmbH (IE2S) is a specialized consultancy firm dedicated to tackling strategic and technical challenges within the energy transformation and mobility transition sectors. As an operationally independent joint venture between the transmission system operator TransnetBW and the IT and management consultancy MHP, IE2S leverages expertise from the energy, automotive, and digitalization fields to provide sustainable value to its clients. The company's mission, "Empowering Climate Positive Generations," reflects its commitment to delivering innovative, technology-agnostic solutions that balance ecological, economic, and social responsibilities. With a robust portfolio of over 350 projects, IE2S caters to a diverse clientele, including energy suppliers, industrial companies, and regulatory bodies, focusing on optimizing energy supply strategies and facilitating the transition to renewable energy sources. IE2S collaborates with industry leaders and partners to develop comprehensive strategies for energy management and infrastructure development, enhancing its capabilities in providing integrated solutions that comply with regulatory standards. The firm is dedicated to fostering a livable future through its strong emphasis on sustainability, compliance, respect, and teamwork. By anticipating future trends in the energy sector, IE2S aims to deliver tailored consulting services that not only address current market demands but also pave the way for innovative advancements in energy management and mobility. Through its commitment to data protection and sustainable practices, Intelligent Energy System Services GmbH positions itself as a forward-thinking partner in the quest for a more sustainable and efficient energy landscape.

Name: Spacewell Energy
Company description: Spacewell Energy, also known as Dexma, is a leading provider of energy management solutions headquartered in Barcelona, Spain. The company specializes in delivering advanced software tools that empower organizations to monitor, analyze, and optimize their energy consumption, thereby promoting sustainability and operational efficiency. Spacewell Energy's mission is to enable businesses to achieve their energy management goals through innovative technology and data-driven insights. The company is dedicated to facilitating the transition towards a more sustainable energy future, helping clients navigate the complexities of energy management and compliance with regulations such as the Energy Savings Opportunity Scheme (ESOS). Targeting energy managers, commercial energy providers, and organizations focused on enhancing their energy efficiency practices, Spacewell Energy serves a diverse clientele that includes energy retailers and various stakeholders in the energy market. By partnering with industry leaders and innovators, the company drives the adoption of cutting-edge energy management solutions, leveraging digital transformation and artificial intelligence to enhance operational performance. With a strong commitment to sustainability and innovation, Spacewell Energy is at the forefront of shaping the future of energy management, providing organizations with the tools they need to streamline operations and optimize energy consumption effectively. Through its comprehensive approach, Spacewell Energy aims to lead the energy sector's digital transformation and support clients in achieving their sustainability objectives.

Name: Kraus & Naimer Group
Company description: Kraus & Naimer Group is a leading manufacturer specializing in electrical switching devices, including network and emergency power switches, industrial switches, and photovoltaic solutions. The company is committed to providing safe and efficient switching solutions that facilitate seamless transitions between power supply systems, such as from the grid to backup sources like generators or solar energy. With a focus on innovation and quality, Kraus & Naimer aims to meet the diverse needs of its clients, which include industrial sectors and energy providers. The company also values education and community engagement, offering internship opportunities to students to gain insights into the professional world and the workings of the electrical industry. Through its dedication to excellence and customer satisfaction, Kraus & Naimer continues to strengthen its position in the market while fostering the next generation of talent in the field.

Name: Sero
Company description: We're a proud B-Corp who are committed to helping the social housing sector move faster towards creating greener, healthier, and more affordable homes. Our team of experts in energy, finance, and retrofit, along with our technology, work hand-in-hand with landlords to plan, fund, and implement large-scale retrofit programs.  As an Energy Services Company, we’re dedicated to helping landlords reach Net Zero while also supporting residents in transitioning to greener homes and reducing their energy bills.

Name: INTENSE AG
Company description: INTENSE AG is a leading provider of IT solutions specifically tailored for the energy sector, focusing on digital transformation and integration services. The company has recently established dflow GmbH, which offers "Integration as a Service" to energy suppliers, enhancing their operational efficiency and adaptability. INTENSE AG's mission is to empower utility companies by providing innovative platforms and integration solutions, such as their TENTAC utility service platform, which supports smart IT integrations. With over 25 years of project experience, INTENSE AG serves a diverse clientele, including municipal utilities and energy providers, and collaborates with partners like msg and m3 management consulting. The company is committed to driving the digital future of the energy industry, ensuring that its clients are well-equipped to meet the challenges of a rapidly evolving market.

Name: FŐGÁZ
Company description: As the oldest gas supplier in Hungary, we are a dominant player in the domestic market due to our successful operation which is based on a stable foundation. We are the only gas supplier operating in Hungary awarded the Superbrands, the Business Superbrands and the MagyarBrands qualifications at the same time. These qualifications recognize all our efforts and improvements which – as part of our business policy – are aimed at excellence in our performance.

Name: Elettromeccanica Tironi
Company description: Elettromeccanica Tironi, founded in 1960, is a leading manufacturer of high and extra-high voltage transformers, with a rich heritage that spans over four generations. The company is committed to delivering innovative and sustainable energy solutions, focusing on quality and technological advancement to meet the evolving demands of the energy market. With a strong presence in Europe and beyond, Elettromeccanica Tironi serves a diverse clientele, including major energy providers and infrastructure projects, particularly in high-speed rail and national transmission networks. The company emphasizes environmental responsibility and social engagement, actively participating in community initiatives and promoting sustainable practices within its operations. Through continuous investment in research and development, Elettromeccanica Tironi aims to enhance its product offerings while maintaining a deep connection to its local roots in Modena.

Name: Vandebron
Company description: Vandebron is a Dutch energy supplier dedicated to accelerating the transition to 100% sustainable energy in the Netherlands. The company focuses on providing renewable energy solutions, particularly emphasizing the integration of solar energy generated by households. To address the rising costs associated with energy return to the grid, Vandebron has introduced fixed return costs for solar panel owners, ensuring a fair distribution of expenses among all customers. Their mission is to promote green energy usage while maintaining transparency in pricing, particularly as the demand for solar energy continues to grow. Vandebron serves a diverse clientele, including households with solar panels, and partners with various stakeholders in the renewable energy sector to foster a sustainable energy future.

Name: DP Infrastructures
Company description: DP Infrastructures is a leading provider of innovative cloud IoT solutions specifically designed for the utilities and energy sectors. The company's flagship product, the DPSELTA IoT Suite, enables clients to effectively manage and monitor their assets, optimize operations, and maximize return on investment through advanced data analytics and real-time monitoring capabilities. With a strong commitment to security and compliance, the platform adheres to ISO 27001 standards and incorporates advanced encryption and access control measures. DP Infrastructures serves a diverse clientele, including utility companies and energy providers, and partners with industry leaders to enhance interoperability and integration within existing infrastructures. The company's mission is to revolutionize the management of complex, decentralized systems, empowering clients to achieve greater efficiency and productivity in their operations.

Name: E.ON Italia S.p.A.
Company description: E.ON Italia S.p.A. is a leading energy provider in Italy, offering a comprehensive range of solutions and services for electricity and gas to over 1 million customers, including residential clients, businesses, and public administrations. The company is committed to promoting sustainable development and energy independence, aligning with its mission to facilitate the transition to a decentralized energy model. E.ON Italia emphasizes innovation and efficiency, providing tailored offerings such as photovoltaic systems, energy management solutions, and e-mobility services. The company also prioritizes diversity, equity, and inclusion within its workforce, as evidenced by its certification for gender equality. With a focus on sustainability and customer-centric solutions, E.ON Italia aims to contribute positively to the economic, social, and environmental landscape for current and future generations.

Name: ENERGY4U GmbH
Company description: ENERGY4U GmbH is a leading IT consulting firm specializing in the energy and utilities sector, with a strong partnership with SAP AG in areas such as Utilities and Business Intelligence. The company, part of the Alten SA group since December 2024, is dedicated to supporting clients in navigating the challenges of the energy transition through innovative IT and process consulting, machine learning, and the implementation of SAP technologies. With over 150 dedicated employees across six locations in Germany, including its headquarters in Karlsruhe, ENERGY4U offers a comprehensive range of services tailored to energy providers and utility companies. The firm is committed to fostering a supportive workplace culture, recognized as a "Great Place to Work®," and actively engages with academic institutions to contribute to the development of future talent in the industry. Through its advanced solutions and expertise, ENERGY4U aims to empower its clients to achieve operational excellence and drive sustainable energy practices.

Name: LnettAS
Company description: LnettAS is a Norwegian company that operates within the energy sector, specifically focusing on providing a new government initiative called Norgespris. This program offers private customers a predictable electricity price of 50 øre/kWh, inclusive of VAT, for their homes and holiday properties, serving as an alternative to the existing electricity support scheme. LnettAS aims to enhance customer satisfaction by ensuring transparency and stability in electricity pricing, while also facilitating the billing process through partnerships with electricity suppliers. The target market includes private households and vacation homes, with a consumption cap of 5,000 kWh per month for residential customers and 1,000 kWh for holiday properties. By actively engaging customers to opt into the Norgespris program, LnettAS seeks to provide a reliable energy solution while maintaining compliance with regulatory standards set by the government.

Name: Lenergy SpA
Company description: Lenergy SpA is a pioneering company dedicated to promoting and supporting Renewable Energy Communities (Comunità Energetiche Rinnovabili - CER) across Italy. The company aims to make renewable energy more accessible and beneficial for individuals, businesses, and local authorities, enabling them to produce, share, and consume energy sustainably and efficiently. Lenergy's mission is to facilitate the transition to renewable energy by providing tailored solutions that reduce energy costs and environmental impact, while enhancing community collaboration. Their target market includes residents of municipalities with fewer than 50,000 inhabitants, who can benefit from significant savings on energy bills through the installation of photovoltaic systems and participation in CERs. With a commitment to sustainability and customer satisfaction, Lenergy also offers premium services, flexible payment options, and expert support to ensure a seamless transition to energy independence.

Name: Fjordkraft
Company description: Fjordkraft AS, a subsidiary of Elmera Group ASA, is a prominent electricity retailer based in Norway, specializing in providing innovative energy solutions to both residential and business customers. The company's mission is to create the most attractive electricity retail experience in the Nordics, with a vision to supply electricity services to 3 million people at home and work.
