Their clientele includes mobile network operators, public transport authorities, and organizations requiring secure communication solutions, such as emergency services.  NET CHECK specializes in innovative technologies that enhance the reliability and security of communication networks. This includes advanced monitoring and testing solutions for TETRA digital radio systems, intelligent localization services for real-time tracking of people and objects, and proactive monitoring of passive optical network infrastructures. The company is committed to delivering high-performance systems tailored to the unique needs of critical infrastructure sectors, including government security agencies, private energy suppliers, and transportation companies.  With a strong focus on quality, NET CHECK is ISO 9001 certified, reflecting its commitment to continuously improving processes and services to meet the highest standards of excellence. The company also strengthens its market position through strategic partnerships, such as its collaboration with the magazine CHIP for benchmarking reports and the recent acquisition of Focus Infocom, which enhances its capabilities in mobile network optimization. Through these efforts, NET CHECK aims to set industry standards and drive innovation in network performance evaluation, ensuring that it remains at the forefront of the telecommunications landscape.

Name: Greenventory
Company description: Greenventory is a pioneering company dedicated to facilitating the energy transition for businesses, municipalities, and energy suppliers through innovative software solutions and expert consulting. Specializing in identifying and optimizing energy potentials for renewable sources, particularly in large facilities such as factories and residential buildings, Greenventory utilizes a modular software platform that provides tailored energy analyses and roadmaps for sustainable energy integration. The company's mission is to empower clients to make informed decisions that align with the Energiedienstleistungsgesetz, ensuring compliance and promoting climate neutrality.  Greenventory collaborates with a diverse range of partners, including renowned institutions like Fraunhofer ISE and KIT, to leverage cutting-edge technology and data-driven insights. Its target market encompasses housing associations, retail chains, corporations, and municipal utilities, all of whom are increasingly committed to sustainable energy practices. As a spinoff from two research institutes, Greenventory aims to create a sustainable future by leveraging technical expertise to analyze energy demand and renewable potential, enabling the planning of both small and large-scale energy projects. Through its comprehensive approach, Greenventory accelerates the implementation of renewable energy projects and contributes to a greener future. The company works closely with a network of specialized partners to ensure that clients receive tailored advice and proposals based on their specific energy needs. With a steadfast commitment to sustainability and excellence, Greenventory inspires others to adopt efficient energy practices and actively contribute to a greener planet.

Name: WEESS GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Düsseldorf, 67 Berliner Allee, 40212
Company description: Empower Your Home with Modular Energy Storage As a leading home energy storage provider, we specialize in modular battery systems that offer reliable and efficient energy solutions for residences. Our innovative products are designed to store electricity from solar panels or the grid, providing homes with clean backup power and energy independence. By combining high-quality lithium batteries with smart software and safety features, our modular systems can be easily customized to match each household's energy needs. Our storage solutions come in different sizes and can be scaled up by adding more modules. This flexibility allows homeowners to start small and expand storage capacity over time. We are committed to facilitating the transition to renewable energy one home at a time. Our user-friendly modular battery systems make home energy storage simple and accessible. With customizable capacity and intelligent controls, we empower families to reduce energy bills, prepare for outages, and achieve energy sustainability. Contact us today to learn how our modular energy storage solutions can help your home optimize renewable power, reduce reliance on the grid, and gain energy resilience.

Name: Petoro
Company description: Petoro AS is a Norwegian state-owned company established in 2001, tasked with managing the State's Direct Financial Interest (SDFI) in oil and gas licenses on Norway's continental shelf. The company’s primary mission is to maximize the financial value generated from the SDFI portfolio, which accounts for approximately one-third of Norway's total oil and gas reserves. Petoro is dedicated to ensuring that the revenues from these resources benefit the entire nation, significantly contributing to the Government Pension Fund Global. The company operates under the guidance of the Ministry of Petroleum and Energy, focusing on sustainable and responsible management of its substantial oil and gas assets. Petoro collaborates closely with major industry players, particularly Equinor ASA, to market and sell petroleum products, optimizing the management of significant oil and gas fields such as Johan Sverdrup and Troll. The company emphasizes operational efficiency and safety while navigating the challenges of the energy transition, aiming to maintain Norway's role as a reliable energy supplier to Europe. Petoro is committed to reducing greenhouse gas emissions through initiatives like electrification, with a target of achieving a 55% reduction by 2030. The company primarily serves the Norwegian government and stakeholders in the energy sector, focusing on the European gas market for its sales and trading activities. Petoro's strategic priorities include maturing fields, area development, and addressing environmental concerns, positioning it as a key player in the transition to a low-emission society. Through its governance and operational efficiency, Petoro aims to create long-term value for the state while contributing positively to the climate agenda and ensuring economic stability for Norway.

Name: HHK Datentechnik GmbH
Company description: HHK Datentechnik GmbH is a leading provider of innovative software solutions specializing in surveying and geoinformation since 1984. The company is dedicated to enhancing efficiency and precision in various sectors, including civil engineering, mechanical engineering, real estate, administration, and planning. With a mission to deliver tailored solutions that meet the unique needs of surveying and engineering firms, land registries, energy providers, and municipalities, HHK aims to drive success through advanced technology and expertise. The company actively engages with its clients and partners through events like the Norddeutschen Fachtage, fostering networking and knowledge exchange in the geodetic and geoinformatics fields. HHK's commitment to innovation and inter-disciplinary collaboration positions it as a trusted partner in navigating the complexities of modern geospatial applications.

Name: Stedin Meetbedrijf
Company description: Stedin Meetbedrijf is een betrouwbaar en ondernemend meetbedrijf van nationaal formaat. Op de markten voor gas en elektriciteit vormt Stedin Meetbedrijf een belangrijke schakel in de dynamiek tussen eindverbruikers, netbeheerders en energieleveranciers. In opdracht van tal van bedrijven en overheidsinstellingen realiseert Stedin Meetbedrijf een efficiënte verwerking van meetgegevens.  Actueel en duidelijk inzicht in uw meetgegevens stelt u in staat om uw energiefactuur te controleren en tijdig in te spelen op onvoorziene pieken in uw energieverbruik. Deze mogelijkheid begint met de keuze van een goed meetbedrijf. Als organisatie bent u namelijk zelf verantwoordelijk voor een juiste meting van het energieverbruik en daarmee vrij in uw keuze aan wie u deze zogenaamde meetverantwoordelijkheid uitbesteedt.  Het team van Stedin Meetbedrijf draagt graag, en professioneel, zorg voor uw meetverantwoordelijkheid. Hierbij stellen wij een efficiënt gebruik van uw energiemeters voorop.

Name: Goldenergy S.p.A.
Company description: Goldenergy S.p.A. è molto più di un fornitore di energia: siamo la luce che illumina i tuoi momenti e il calore che rende unica ogni giornata. La nostra missione è semplice e ambiziosa: offrire soluzioni energetiche affidabili, sostenibili e su misura, mettendo sempre al centro le persone. Parte del Gruppo Goldengas S.p.A., realtà italiana con oltre 50 anni di esperienza nel settore, portiamo avanti una tradizione di fiducia, innovazione e vicinanza al cliente. Dall’esperienza maturata nella distribuzione di GPL, oggi ampliamo l’offerta con energia elettrica e gas naturale, accompagnando famiglie, imprese e professionisti verso un consumo più consapevole, efficiente e conveniente. Crediamo nell’energia come strumento di connessione: non solo quella che alimenta case e aziende, ma anche quella che accende relazioni autentiche, empatia e collaborazione.  Grazie a un approccio personalizzato, tecnologie avanzate e consulenza dedicata, costruiamo soluzioni concrete per migliorare la qualità della vita e contribuire alla tutela dell’ambiente. Con Goldenergy scegli un partner trasparente, vicino e affidabile: perché l’energia non è solo ciò che usi, è ciò che vivi.

Name: SMART/LAB Innovationsgesellschaft MbH
Company description: SMART/LAB Innovationsgesellschaft mbH is a prominent IT service provider specializing in e-mobility, established in the early 2010s and headquartered in Aachen, Germany. The company focuses on developing comprehensive products and concepts for the operation and billing of charging infrastructure, catering to a diverse range of B2B clients, including car dealerships, hospitals, hotels, supermarkets, energy suppliers, and municipalities. Through its brands, ladebusiness and ladenetz.de, SMART/LAB is committed to advancing e-mobility across Europe by managing a unique network of energy suppliers, businesses, and roaming partners, overseeing over 390,000 charging points across the continent. The company's mission is to create a comprehensive and user-friendly network of charging stations that ensures interoperability with other market players, facilitating seamless electric vehicle charging experiences. SMART/LAB emphasizes continuous innovation, leveraging years of research and development to maintain its leadership position in the German and European markets. The company is dedicated to providing secure and efficient data processing services while ensuring compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other relevant legal frameworks, thereby empowering businesses with tailored solutions that enhance operational efficiency and safeguard personal data. SMART/LAB collaborates with various partners, including municipal utilities and energy suppliers, to deliver customized solutions that meet the evolving needs of electric vehicle users. The company’s strategic partnerships, such as its recent collaboration with DKV Mobility, aim to enhance service offerings and expand the charging network further. With a strong emphasis on practical implementation and user experience, SMART/LAB leverages insights from funded research projects to drive advancements in sustainable mobility. Through its initiatives, the company is dedicated to promoting accessibility and efficiency in electric mobility, contributing to a greener future and fostering trust and transparency in the digital landscape.

Name: MAC Srl
Company description: MAC Srl is a pioneering company in the energy industry, dedicated to providing innovative solutions for residential clients and small businesses. The company’s mission is to empower users to monitor and manage their energy consumption effectively, significantly reducing energy bills and preventing blackouts caused by overloads. With its flagship platform, Chain2Gate Energy Aware, MAC Srl offers a user-friendly, plug-and-play solution tailored for the Italian market, as well as an energy meter for international contexts. The company’s products, including smart plugs and energy management systems, enable real-time monitoring and active management of energy loads, resulting in an average energy savings of 15% and a 100% reduction in blackouts. MAC Srl targets communities transitioning to energy efficiency and electric mobility, positioning itself as a key player in the development of smart energy solutions.

Name: VoltStorage
Company description: VoltStorage is an energy storage company that develops innovative products and solutions to help providers and customers maximize energy value, eliminate curtailment/waste, and bridge the energy gap through grid deferral. 🔌The Problem Gridlock:  Energy consumption continues to grow globally, with demand quickly outpacing supply and overstressing power grids. ⚡The Need Perpetual Power: Energy providers need long duration storage solutions to bridge renewable power availability, supplement long-term power grid upgrades, and assure non-flammable, non-degradable, long lasting assets. 🚀The solution VoltStorage: We create products and technologies to ensure that energy generated is never wasted and is always available when needed - enabling the resilient and green grids of tomorrow. 🔋VoltStorage Iron Salt Battery Vault Ultra low-cost, non-flammable and durable battery technology Based on well known flow battery principles, VoltStorage developed the novel and proprietary ISB technology tailored for the Long-Duration Energy Storage (LDES) segment.

Name: Travvant
Company description: Being there for people is what Travvant stands for. Whether you count on us for outplacement, career counseling or inplacement, we always put you first. With this customized approach, we try to make a difference every day. Together we hone talents, build job happiness and look for a match between people.  Today we sail a clear, national, niche-oriented course with a team of +25 experienced and certified consultants at Travvant. *Outplacement* There's no match with one of your employees? Through outplacement you can look for the best solution for both employee and employer. After dismissal, we take care of your employee as well as possible, provide tailor-made guidance and then launch him or her smoothly back into the job market. *Career guidance* As an organization, you can encourage your employees to take the future of their careers into their own hands. That way, you will motivate them, work on their resilience and adaptability, stimulate internal mobility and contribute to wellbeing in the workplace. A win-win for both employee and employer. *Inplacement* We also offer guidance about internal mobility. We help your employees broaden their horizons and find interests, passions and room for development. Besides we check what their energy providers and takers are. That allows your company to put the right talents in the right place.

Name: KEN S.A.
Company description: With respect and responsibility towards the household consumer and its business customers, ΚΕΝ aims to establish its presence within the Greek market, securing a place amongst the 5 top suppliers in the country within the next 3 years but also to become the main Medium Voltage supplier. Sustainable development and respect for the community and the environment, providing reliable, high quality services at a low cost and the initiation of innovative ideas and services make up KEN’s main area of activities in order to establish itself as the most reliable and competitive energy supplier, securing a strong relationship of trust with its customers.

Name: Stadtwerke Wörgl GmbH
Company description: Stadtwerke Wörgl GmbH is a regional energy provider based in Wörgl, Austria, specializing in electricity and district heating services. With the launch of their new product, strom.REGIONAL, effective July 1, 2023, the company aims to offer customers a more flexible and competitive energy supply, focusing on sourcing a higher percentage of electricity from local production. Their mission is to provide sustainable and affordable energy solutions to households and businesses in Tirol, ensuring a stable and risk-free energy supply. The company is committed to increasing its share of self-generated electricity to over 50% through strategic partnerships and investments in local energy production. Stadtwerke Wörgl primarily serves customers in Tirol, including private households, schools, and businesses, and emphasizes the importance of regional energy sourcing to enhance local economic stability and environmental sustainability.

Name: GAS DrOvF
Company description: GAS DrOvF is a forward-thinking company dedicated to providing innovative solutions in the gas industry. With a mission to enhance efficiency and sustainability, GAS DrOvF aims to lead the market by developing cutting-edge technologies and services that meet the evolving needs of its clients. The company serves a diverse clientele, including energy providers, industrial manufacturers, and environmental organizations, all seeking reliable and eco-friendly gas solutions. Through strategic partnerships and a commitment to excellence, GAS DrOvF is positioned to make a significant impact in the energy sector, driving progress towards a more sustainable future.

Name: Elettragas
Company description: Elettragas è una realtà emergente che opera con passione e successo come fornitore di gas naturale nel libero mercato dell'energia. Accreditata nel 2011 presso l'A.E.G.G., la Società nasce totalmente indipendente da gruppi nazionali e multinazionali. Questa autonomia si traduce nella possibilità strategica di acquistare gas dai migliori grossisti ed alle migliori condizioni di mercato, con indiscusso beneficio per il cliente finale. L'offerta di Elettragas è differenziata per segmento commerciale e si rivolge a tutte le tipologie di utenza, dai grandi gruppi industriali alle piccole e medie imprese, dai condomini alle abitazioni private. Grazie alla sua rete di partnership e collaborazioni, Elettragas riesce a coprire quasi tutto il territorio nazionale: Abruzzo; Emilia Romagna; Lazio; Lombardia; Marche; Molise; Puglia; Toscana; Umbria; Veneto. L'Azienda si basa su una struttura snella, composta da figure professionali con background complementari e funzionali al perseguimento della qualità del servizio offerto. Il fattore di successo di Elettragas è quindi rappresentato da un mix vincente che unisce competenza e professionalità ad una realtà giovane e dinamica, interamente dedicata alla soddisfazione del cliente.

Name: Kraftriket
Company description: Kraftriket eies av flere små og mellomstore strømselskaper og er en nasjonal leverandør av strøm med lokal tilhørighet. Vi skal ta vare på alt det positive som ligger i det å være en lokal strømleverandør, med nærhet til kundene og lokalmiljøet. Vi skal passe godt på integriteten vår, vi skal «lytte godt til kundene våre», vi skal utvikle relevante og attraktive produkter og vi skal bli best på kundebehandling.

Name: Co.met GmbH
Company description: Co.met GmbH is a leading provider of innovative solutions for the energy sector, specializing in smart meter gateway administration, data management, and network monitoring services. The company's mission is to facilitate the digital transformation of energy management, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements while enhancing operational efficiency for its clients. Co.met GmbH serves a diverse clientele, including energy suppliers, network operators, and municipal utilities, and collaborates with partners like EE Infratec GmbH and BTC AG to deliver tailored services. With a focus on regional engagement and personalized interactions, the company aims to strengthen its presence in local markets while continuing to participate in key industry events. Co.met GmbH is committed to providing cost-effective, future-proof solutions that meet the evolving needs of the energy landscape.

Name: The IT Solutions
Company description: The IT Solutions B.V. is a forward-thinking company specializing in energy solutions, particularly in the context of the evolving energy market. With a mission to empower businesses through informed energy management, the company provides comprehensive insights into energy billing processes, including year-end and final invoices. The IT Solutions B.V. is committed to supporting its clients in navigating the complexities of energy contracts and the upcoming green gas blending obligation, which aims to reduce CO₂ emissions significantly by 2030. Their target market includes businesses looking to optimize their energy consumption and adapt to new regulations, while their partnerships with energy suppliers ensure they remain at the forefront of industry developments. Through personalized advice and expert guidance, The IT Solutions B.V. strives to facilitate a smooth transition for companies towards sustainable energy practices.

Name: Freebo
Company description: Freebo is a dynamic company specializing in electricity contract comparison, making it easy for consumers to find the best electricity deals tailored to their usage needs. The company's mission is to empower customers to save money on their electricity bills by providing a user-friendly platform that allows them to compare various electricity providers and contract types, including fixed and market-based pricing options. Freebo targets a diverse clientele, including homeowners and renters, who are looking for cost-effective and environmentally friendly energy solutions. By partnering with multiple electricity suppliers, Freebo ensures that its users have access to a wide range of options, enabling them to make informed decisions based on their consumption patterns and preferences. The company's vision is to simplify the energy market, making it accessible and transparent for all consumers, ultimately contributing to a more sustainable energy future.

Name: Energomix S.A.
Company description: Leading energy advisor in Poland - professional and independent energy consulting services to corporate & SME clients. We specialize in providing electricity & gas cost savings to small and medium firms. We support our clients through entire energy cost management process: energy & gas purchasing, optimisation of distribution expenses, power factor correction, LED lighting, PV modules, energy reporting & monitoring. We service over 3 000 business clients with >200 sales reps in 5 regional offices. We cooperate with majority of energy suppliers in Polish market.

Name: GUTMANN GmbH
Company description: GUTMANN GmbH is a private energy provider based in Innsbruck, Austria, specializing in the supply of 100% Austrian green electricity and supporting the transition to renewable energy through financial incentives for heat pump installations. The company offers subsidies for residential and commercial clients who install new heat pumps, promoting energy efficiency and sustainability. GUTMANN's mission is to provide independent, regional energy solutions that prioritize environmental responsibility and customer satisfaction, ensuring that clients receive fair pricing and transparent service. With a focus on residential homes, multi-family buildings, and non-residential structures, GUTMANN partners with customers to facilitate a seamless transition to eco-friendly energy sources. The company is committed to fostering a sustainable future while maintaining strong customer relationships through dedicated support and service.

Name: Allplan GmbH
Company description: ALLPLAN GmbH was founded in Vienna in 1967. Since then our former technical bureau for heating, ventilation and air conditioning has become an international consulting firm in the fields of technical building services as well as energy and environmental management. A team of experts in various technical fields and external specialists are at your disposal. Comprehensive EDV/CAD/GIS-systems enable calculations and simulations in different technical fields. ALLPLAN employees dispose – in addition to technical expertise – of a long and comprehensive experience in project development and project management. Our company works together with the experts of the austrian universities (for instance Vienna University of Technology as well as with the institutes and associations as mentioned below). Most of our international projects are carried out in Central and Eastern Europe. In the fields of energy and environment we are worldwide active. We are pleased to count to our customers: -International financial institutes (World Bank, EBRD or supporting programs of EU) -Industrial Enterprises -Owners of energy projects (wind energy park founders, water power stations, depot owners etc.) -Energy suppliers -Ministries of Central and Eastern Europe -Communities -Austrian Development Organisations Our experts solve complex problems on basis of the technical background; they consider and include business management as well as legal and financial aspects. Various Know-How carriers meet together in the center of this network and develop entire solutions during the process. As environmental managers of ALLPLAN we take over full corporate responsibility for the project and stay in direct contact with our customers. We provide a comprehensive consultation and follow-up during all phases of the project. Clearly defined steps of the project enable us to work out the goal, the planning and the realization of the project in continuous cooperation with our customers.

Name: Ventum
Company description: Ventum Wij zijn een energieleverancier met een missie. Het leveren van energie gaat bij ons namelijk gepaard met het leveren van een warm gevoel. Door onze vernieuwende blik en duidelijke visie kunnen wij uw cliënt en uzelf een zo optimaal mogelijke service bieden. Partner portaal Wanneer u voor Ventum gekozen heeft als energieleverancier krijgt u toegang tot ons klanten- en partnerportaal. Deze portalen dienen er toe u een helder en overzichtelijk inzicht te geven in de gegevens van uw cliënten. 100% Acceptatie In Nederland hoort niemand zonder energie te zitten, iedereen verdient een warm gevoel. Daarom hanteren wij geen waarborgsom en beloven wij scherpe tarieven te bieden. Hierbij gaan wij vooral uit van onze kernwaarden: vertrouwen, respect en gemak. Beste prijs Ventum is voor iedereen en zo ook onze scherpe tarieven. Zo kunt u direct gaan besparen op uw huidige energie rekening. Snelle service Bij significante afwijkingen informeren wij u proactief. Ziet u toch iets wat u niet thuis kunt brengen of komt u er zelf niet uit? Op onze website vindt u antwoord op de meest gestelde vragen. Wij zijn natuurlijk ook bereikbaar via social media of telefonisch zonder lange wachttijden! Wij zijn iedere werkdag telefonisch bereikbaar van 08:00 tot 21:00 uur op telefoonnummer 088-2000 400. Per e-mail kunt u ons te allen tijde bereiken op klantenservice@ventum.nl en ontvangt u binnen 60 minuten een reactie.

Name: Rovakaira
Company description: Rovakaira Oy is a leading electricity distribution company based in Rovaniemi, Finland, serving the regions of Rovaniemi, Kittilä, and Sodankylä. The company is dedicated to building a sustainable and reliable electrical future for Lapland, focusing on long-term investments in its infrastructure to ensure efficient energy distribution. With a mission to provide cost-effective electricity solutions to over 32,000 customers, Rovakaira emphasizes community engagement and environmental responsibility, actively working to minimize its ecological footprint while enhancing energy efficiency for its clients.  Rovakaira specializes in electricity distribution and network construction services, catering to a diverse clientele that includes municipalities and local businesses. The company collaborates with various partners, including local municipalities and energy suppliers, to adapt to the evolving energy market and regulatory landscape, ensuring a stable and secure energy supply for the future. With a strong commitment to reliability and customer-centric solutions, Rovakaira aims to maintain high standards in energy distribution while continuously developing and improving its services.  The company’s innovative approach to technology and infrastructure development positions it as a key player in the energy sector, dedicated to meeting the evolving needs of its customers and contributing to a sustainable energy future in Lapland. Through its weather-resistant network and focus on energy efficiency, Rovakaira is not only enhancing the quality of life for its residents but also paving the way for a greener tomorrow.

Name: Biolectric
HQ Location: Belgium, Flanders, Temse, 2 Jan De Malschelaan, 9140
Company description: The future is green! 🌱 At Biolectric, we produce and build micro AD plants that turn cow and pig slurry into green energy. Biomethane or Electricity & Heat. The farmer can choose his output. It takes just three cows to power a family with clean energy for a whole year. With methane emission reductions of up to 82%, we deliver green power, lower electricity bills, and a smaller carbon footprint – all while ensuring no cows are harmed. It’s a true win-win for farmers and the planet. We’re shaping the future of agriculture by offering solutions for sustainable energy and efficient local waste management. Since 2011, we've helped farmers become more independent, future-proof their farms, and enhance the nutritional value of their digestate. With partners across Europe and beyond, we're setting a new standard for the farming and energy sectors. For more information, visit our website: www.biolectric.com

Name: Kooi Austria
Company description: Kooi Austria specializes in innovative mobile camera surveillance solutions designed to enhance security at construction sites and other vulnerable locations. With a mission to provide peace of mind, Kooi offers a range of products, including the Unit For Observation (UFO), which utilizes advanced infrared technology for 24/7 monitoring and immediate response to suspicious activities. The company aims to prevent theft, vandalism, and project delays, ensuring that clients can focus on their work without security concerns. Kooi serves a diverse clientele, including construction firms, renewable energy providers, and infrastructure projects, and partners with organizations like SUNOTEC and Van Gelder to deliver tailored security solutions. By combining high-quality technology with a dedicated alarm center staffed by security specialists, Kooi is committed to protecting valuable assets and promoting safe working environments across various sectors.

Name: MicroStep - HDO S.r.o.
Company description: We are a supplier of IT and SW solutions for energy trading companies, energy suppliers and industries.

Name: ENERGUS
Company description: Energus works with electrical systems. Our main focus is effective use of resources and electrical energy. We install electrical and automated systems in large objects like retail centers and industrial objects. Our area of works range from simple electrical installations, reworking of existing systems to make them more efficient, to process automation and monitoring. Our projects have a high investment return rate - with efficiency increased by 40%, which translates to actual electricity bill reduction by 40%, investment can be returned after only 4 months of operation. Average result is 15% reduced electricity bills. Our goal is more efficient and thus greener future.

Name: Ale El - Nära Tryggt Enkelt
Company description: Ale El Ekonomisk förening är ett medlemsägt energibolag som äger och underhåller elnätet i Ale och delar av Lilla Edets kommun. Vi levererar el till både privatkunder och företag.  Dotterbolaget Ale El Elhandel har funnits sedan 2011 efter förfrågan från våra kunder som önskade en helhetsleverantör. Vi erbjuder enkla elavtal där det alltid ingår fossilfri energi utan extra kostnad. Certifieringen Schysst Elhandel tryggar våra kunder i sitt val av elleverantör. *Ale El är en långsiktigt hållbar arbetsplats och har under flera år fått höga betyg i medarbetarundersökningar. Vi prioriterar säkerheten och värnar om varandra och vår arbetsmiljö. Vill du veta mer om oss?  Besök vår hemsida eller kontakta oss så berättar vi mer.

Name: Volytica Diagnostics
Company description: Longer lifetime. Higher ROI. Full confidence in your battery operations. Our analytics platform unlocks the true potential of your assets – turning raw data into actionable insights and recommendations that boost performance and profitability. We transform existing data into your competitive edge. With over 12 years of experience and more than 3 GWh analyzed every day, volytica diagnostics helps leading energy providers, fleet operators and investors make better decisions, reduce OPEX, and extend system lifetime. Ready to see your batteries clearly? contact@volytica.com | www.volytica.com

Name: Escandinava De Electricidad
Company description: We are an electricity supplier offering energy to individuals and companies. We believe in sustainability, savings and transparency. That is why we work to offer cleaner, cheaper and easier energy. We are the responsible electricity company. Follow us on: Twitter: @EscandinavaElec  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/escandinavaelectricidad  Instagram: @escandinavaelectricidad

Name: CRE Consorzio Per Le Risorse Energetiche S.C.p.A
HQ Location: Italy, Emilia-romagna, Cesena, 135 Via Leopoldo Lucchi, 47521
Company description: Romagna Energia è nata come consorzio il 22 Dicembre 1999, in concomitanza con la liberalizzazione del mercato elettrico, dall'associazione di grandi aziende della Romagna, in particolare del settore agro-alimentare; nel 2008, a seguito di un enorme sviluppo sia in termini di volume che, conseguentemente, di bilancio, è divenuta Romagna Energia Società Consortile.  Romagna Energia è un fornitore di energia elettrica e di gas naturale, si rivolge a tutte le imprese esistenti sul territorio italiano, alle cosiddette utenze "non civili".  A oggi è uno dei principali player del mercato energetico nazionale con 500 consorziati e oltre 2000 siti in fornitura (alta, media e bassa tensione), 1,5 miliardi di KWh di energia elettrica dispacciata e un fatturato di circa 191 milioni di euro (anno 2009).  Romagna Energia è il primo consorzio associativo italiano per punti di prelievo e il secondo per volumi di energia; è presente in tutte le regioni d'Italia ed è in continua crescita.  La società è senza scopo di lucro con obiettivo di bilancio zero attraverso ristorni sulla tariffa dell' energia. I soci sono rappresentati dai consumatori stessi, a differenza della maggior parte delle società di vendita presenti sul mercato; l'utente finale non rappresenta solamente un semplice cliente, ma diventa socio di un progetto per fornire energia e servizi di elevata qualità, utilizzando le tecnologie più efficienti e compatibili con l'ambiente.  L'attività di Romagna Energia in ambito energetico non si limita alla sola fornitura di energia e gas, ma offre anche capacità e conoscenze in ambito di fonti rinnovabili, autoproduzione, certificati verdi, ecc.

Name: B-next group
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Herford, 12 Bielefelder Str., d-32051
Company description: b-next AG is one of the world’s leading providers of corporate software in the capital markets trading surveillance and compliance sector. The corporation has around 70 employees. Its customer base in the finance sector includes, among others, renowned banks, brokers, supervisory bodies and energy suppliers. In the 30-year history of the company, several hundred customer projects have been successfully carried out. b-next is represented by its own branch offices in Germany, Great Britain and the United States. The slogan ‘SECURE | PROTECT | COMPLY’ stands for the company’s powerful and comprehensive solutions covering the entire spectrum of compliance requirements in the capital markets. b-next’s products help companies meet regulatory requirements and manage operational risks. The major value driver for b-next are the development of innovative, cloud-based applications as well as the use of artificial intelligence, in particular for a strategic approach to compliance.

Name: ENPROM GmbH
Company description: ENPROM GmbH, part of the ENPROM Group, is a leading German company specializing in the planning and construction of high and extra-high voltage power lines and substations. With a dedicated team of 230 employees across three locations in Germany, ENPROM is committed to advancing the energy transition, leveraging its expertise to support sustainable energy solutions. The company recently relocated to a modern office space in the EUROPACENTER | Adlerduo in Berlin-Adlershof, a hub for technology and innovation in Germany. ENPROM's mission is to contribute to the energy sector's evolution by providing high-quality infrastructure, while its vision focuses on fostering innovation and collaboration within the industry. The company serves a diverse clientele, including energy providers and infrastructure developers, and actively engages in community events, such as the B2Run corporate run, to promote teamwork and corporate culture.

Name: Xemex
Company description: Bij Xemex maken we energie slim. Al meer dan 25 jaar ontwikkelen wij technologie die energiestromen inzichtelijk, beheersbaar en duurzaam maakt. Vanuit onze vestigingen in Schoten (BE) en Rosmalen (NL) helpen we consumenten, bedrijven en energieleveranciers om hun energieverbruik te monitoren, optimaliseren en automatiseren. Onze oplossingen – zoals het Enny Energie Management Systeem (EMS), slimme meters en de modulaire Lewiz Gateway – geven realtime inzicht in verbruik en opwekking. Ze zorgen ervoor dat apparaten automatisch worden aangestuurd op basis van zonneproductie, batterijniveau of dynamische tarieven. Zo vergroten we de zelfconsumptie en verlagen we de energiekosten. Via ons open cloudplatform koppelen we eenvoudig met laadpalen, omvormers, batterijen, warmtepompen en andere slimme apparaten. Dit maakt het mogelijk om energie slim te sturen, zowel op woning- als wijkniveau. Onze technologie is flexibel en schaalbaar, en geschikt voor zowel residentiële als commerciële toepassingen. Duurzaamheid, innovatie en klantgerichtheid vormen de kern van ons werk. We geloven in een toekomst waarin iedereen zijn energieverbruik begrijpt en actief bijdraagt aan een groenere wereld. Of u nu één woning beheert of een compleet energienetwerk: met Xemex heeft u altijd grip op uw energie. Contact 📍 Schoten (BE) & Rosmalen (NL) 📞 +32 32 01 95 95 📧 info@xemex.eu 🌐 www.xemex.eu Slimmer met energie. Samen vooruit

Name: Wikipower
Company description: Wikipower permet aux consommateurs de réduire leurs factures d’énergie, de télécoms et de technologies durables au travers de ses services d’achat groupé et de comparateur de prix. Implantée en plein cœur de Liège, elle offre un cadre de travail moderne et agréable. Avec une mission bienfaisante et de belles valeurs, notre équipe évolue dans une ambiance dynamique, sereine et conviviale. Wikipower est une entreprise à forte croissance nationale et internationale, sacrée Trends Gazelle Nationale 2020 de la catégorie "petites entreprises". Afin de relever les nombreux défis identifiés pour 2023, nos 40 collaborateurs actuels sont à la recherche de nouveaux super-collègues. Commercial, Informatique, Marketing, Management : il y en a pour tous les goûts. Nous recherchons également une cinquantaine d'étudiants pour rejoindre notre call-center et participer aux tâches administratives. Vous recherchez un emploi stable où vos performances seront reconnues et valorisées ? Rejoignez l’aventure Wikipower !

Name: Zenova
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, Calle De Bravo Murillo 337 7ºb, 28020
Company description: Zenova is a pioneering company that revolutionizes the management of utility supplies for real estate professionals, offering a comprehensive digital platform that streamlines processes related to water, electricity, and gas supply changes. With a mission to enhance efficiency and save time for its clients, Zenova automates the management of invoices and energy consumption, ensuring that users can focus on more critical tasks while enjoying significant cost savings. The company serves a diverse clientele, including over 1,200 real estate partners, asset managers, and various sectors such as coworking spaces, built-to-rent developments, and vacation rentals. Zenova's commitment to sustainability is evident in its partnerships with green energy providers, aligning with ESG criteria to promote environmentally responsible practices. By simplifying the utility management process, Zenova not only improves operational efficiency but also enhances the overall experience for its users, positioning itself as a leader in the real estate market.

Name: GreenPocket GmbH
Company description: 💻 Software has become an everyday tool in all aspects of life – business and private. We want to evaluate everything, whether KPI's, financial data, even our daily steps. Only our energy consumption is a black box, but especially there we need to take action. But without knowing our consumption, we cannot change our behavior. ⚡ It is our mission to make the management of the energy consumption so easy that it becomes a habit and a given for everyone – whether company or private household. This way, our data-driven intuitive solutions create real value and help utilities and their customers to effectively reduce their energy consumption and carbon footprint. 🌍 And we go one step further: with our AI-driven software, we not only bring transparency but intelligence into the data, delivering an automated, flexible tool that makes the digitalization of the energy industry a real opportunity for everyone involved. 🎯 As a specialist for energy management and visualization software since 2009 with a team of over 45 colleagues, we have been creating decisive added value for national und international energy suppliers as well as their corporate and private customers on their way to climate neutrality.

Name: Solinnovation I Värnamo AB
Company description: På Solinnovation tror vi på ett bättre sätt att generera el till privatpersoner, lantbrukare och företag, till en lägre kostnad samtidigt som det bidrar till en bättre miljö. ￼Solpaneler är det bästa och säkraste sättet att spara pengar. Du producerar egen miljövänlig el, slipper dyra elräkningar från de stora elbolagen och höjer samtidigt värdet på din fastighet. Varför inte välja en billigare energikälla som också är miljövänlig? Produkterna som vi erbjuder tillverkas av välkända och världsledande företag. Vi erbjuder omfattande produkt- och produktionsgarantier. Utifrån din elförbrukning och tillgängliga takytor designar vi en anläggning efter dina behov. Vi tar hand om hela processen från projektering till nyckelfärdig solcellsanläggning.

Name: Westenergy Oy
Company description: Westenergy is a company in the circular economy in Western Finland. We refine waste into electricity, district heating and recovered materials. The energy produced at Westenergy is helping to reduce the consumption of fossil fuels, support the production of biogas and with a near 50 percent share in local heat production, we are a crucial local energy supplier in the Vaasa region.  In co-operation with our partners we have been pioneers in developing new construction materials, geopolymers and recycled metals to ensure the highest possible rate of material utilization. We are part of multiple projects in the circular economy and we want to do our part for a clean and sustainable world.

Name: GESAM Gas & Luce
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Lucca, Viale Europa Angolo Via Nieri, 55100
Company description: Ti diamo il benvenuto nel mondo di GESAM Gas & Luce, da cinquant’anni, prima con Ge.SA.AM, poi con GESAM S.p.A. (attuale GESAM Reti S.p.A.), il principale brand energetico della città di Lucca. Forniamo da sempre gas naturale, energia elettrica e sistemi di efficientamento energetico a famiglie, imprese e condomini. Siamo partiti dalla Provincia di Lucca e nel tempo siamo cresciuti e abbiamo costruito una rete di sportelli, raggiungendo anche le Province di Pisa e Pistoia. La nostra storia inizia nel 1974 con GESA-AM, quando il Comune di Lucca rileva la rete di distribuzione del gas e diventa il principale fornitore di gas della città murata. Nel 1995 la società si trasforma in GESAM S.p.A. e nel 2003, con la liberalizzazione del mercato del gas, il ramo d’azienda della vendita del gas viene conferito a GESAM Gas S.p.A. Nel tempo la società evolve, cresce e si modifica, nell’assetto e nel parco prodotti offerto alla clientela, fino a diventare nel 2013 GESAM Gas & Luce S.p.A. Un interlocutore esperto, serio e affidabile; un punto di riferimento per migliaia di famiglie, imprese e condomini che affianca alla fornitura di gas naturale quella di energia elettrica e di prodotti ad alta efficienza (Caldaie a condensazione, Climatizzatori, Pompe di calore, Impianti fotovoltaici). Nel 2019 GESAM Gas & Luce entra a far parte del Gruppo Canarbino, tra i primi 10 player del mercato energetico italiano, e dal 1° ottobre 2024, come ultimo step evolutivo, GESAM Gas & Luce ha cambiato denominazione ed è diventata un brand di Segnoverde S.p.A. Unipersonale. Un percorso all’insegna della sostenibilità, centrale nella visione aziendale di GESAM Gas & Luce e del Gruppo Canarbino.

Name: Adnet
HQ Location: Croatia, City Of Zagreb, Zagreb, 37 Ulica Grge Tuškana, 10000
Company description: We at Adnet focus on developing systems for modelling, monitoring and controlling networks, as well as turnkey engineering. Cooperating with major partners, we developed tools that are considered the best in their field. NetVision is our longest standing product: a Supervisory Control And Data Acquisition (SCADA) system deployed in numerous South East European locations. Most notably, the software is deployed at the Croatian electricity hub, the National Dispatching Centre (NDC). There we have an IEC-based SCADA, History RDB, EMS, DS, GMS... In addition to electricity networks, we support gas, oil and water networks. Energy supply is being liberalised throughout Europe - a profitable opportunity that requires an effective Business Management process. ESBM stands for “Energy Supplier Business Manager”. It seamlessly interfaces to your Energy Market Operator and Distribution System Operator, as well as your Customers and your Accounting system.

Name: LGF Energy
Company description: Our work will make you, your family and your company forever get rid of the growing electricity bills every month, and thanks to our experience in the industry, you can be sure of the quality of your installation. You don't have to worry about assembly. Everything is done without forging in the walls, and our specialists guarantee that all you will do is look at the effects of their work with pleasure.

Name: Electrawinds
Company description: Electrawinds is a dynamic company focused on renewable energy solutions, specializing in the development and operation of wind energy projects. With a mission to promote sustainable energy practices, Electrawinds aims to contribute to a greener future by harnessing the power of wind to generate clean electricity. The company partners with various stakeholders, including local governments, energy providers, and environmental organizations, to expand its reach and impact in the renewable energy sector. Targeting both commercial and residential clients, Electrawinds is committed to delivering innovative energy solutions that not only meet the growing demand for sustainable power but also support the transition to a low-carbon economy. Through its strategic initiatives, Electrawinds seeks to empower communities and businesses to embrace renewable energy, ultimately fostering a more sustainable world.

Name: Greenlink Interconnector Limited
HQ Location: Ireland, Saggart Co.dublin, 4075 Kingswood Road Citywest Business Campus, d24 yy36
Company description: Greenlink is a 500MW, 190km electricity interconnector stretching under the Irish Sea from Great Island in Co. Wexford, Ireland, to Pembroke in Wales, and is one Europe's most important infrastructure projects.   Greenlink comprises a subsea and underground high voltage direct current (HVDC) interconnector system and associated converter stations, and will link the existing electricity grids in Ireland and the UK, operated respectively by EirGrid and National Grid.   Greenlink is being developed by Greenlink Interconnector Limited, owned by Partners Group on behalf of its clients, and was recognised as a Project of Common Interest (PCI) by the EU.  The privately-financed project will stimulate inward investment and jobs, put downward pressure on consumers' electricity bills, enhance energy security and support the growth and integration of low carbon energy in Ireland and the UK.  Following financial close in March 2022, onshore construction works are now under way and the project is expected to be commissioned by the end of 2024.

Name: CARBOUNION BOHEMIA Spol. S R.o.
HQ Location: Czech Republic, Praha, Prague, 846/1 Václavské Náměstí
Company description: Jsme významný nezávislý dodavatel elektřiny, zemního plynu a uhlí v České republice. Nabízíme energie pro domácnosti, podnikatele i velkoodběratele za dlouhodobě nízké ceny, které umíme zajistit díky dlouholetým zkušenostem, osvědčené spolupráci s výrobci a silnému finančnímu zázemí. Jako skupina Carbounion působíme na středoevropském trhu s energetickými komoditami. Naše aktivity pokrývají celý palivo-energetický řetězec, od obchodu s černým uhlím a jeho zpracováním až po dodávky energií včetně elektromontážních prací.

Name: Elkraft Sverige AB
Company description: Sveriges bästa samarbetspartner för företag i Norden Med Elkraft Sverige som elleverantör och samarbetspartner säkerställer ditt företag att ni har de lägsta möjliga totala elkostnaderna och den enklaste administrationen. Vårt erbjudande riktar sig till företag som har många lokaler eller en föränderlig verksamhet, till exempel butikskedjor och företag med många lokalkontor. Elkraft Sverige garanterar att elleveransen sker på ett tryggt, professionellt och kostnadseffektivt sätt.

Name: Ustekveikja Energi AS
Company description: Ustekveikja Energi AS er et selskap som omsetter elektrisk kraft til sluttbrukermarkedet. Kundemassen er i dag ca 2 Twh i Norge og Sverige. I tillegg til å være aktive i kraftmarkedet med krafthandel, driver vi forvaltning av produksjon og kraftrettigheter for kraftverk og kommuner. Vi forestår driften av Ustekveikja og Ørteren kraftverk for Hol Kommune. Ustekveikja Energi AS er lokalisert med administrasjon og kontorer i Geilovegen på Geilo og har i dag 34 ansatte. Vi er kjent for å være en seriøs, stabil og konkurransedyktig strømleverandør som utfordrer til de store regionale strømleverandørene i Norge. Vi gjør alltid vårt ytterste for at gode forhold lønner seg.

Name: Oktogrid
Company description: We digitise transformers and bring them online and connected for a safer energy transition. Oktogrid's technology allows electricity providers to add a digital interface to any transformer in less than ten minutes with no tooling needed. Our method gives non-invasive access to critical transformer and grid performance data in realtime making it possible to monitor, forecast, and react to local congestions and reduce cost of asset management. We effectively turn an energy challenge into a data science opportunity for electricity transmission and distribution companies to build data-driven organisations; enabling them to make new decisions in a new energy scenario for a cleaner future.

Name: Octopus Energy Deutschland
Company description: 🐙 Octopus Energy ist ein globaler Enertech-Pionier. Wir nutzen Technologie, um die Energiewende weltweit voranzutreiben und Kund*innen rund um den Globus 100 Prozent Ökostrom zu fairen Preisen zu bieten. Octopus Energy ist seit 2016 auf dem Markt und in neun Ländern operativ. 💚 Unsere Mission: Die globale Energiewende vorantreiben und einen Weltklasse-Service bieten 💚 Unser Credo: 100% Ökostrom zu fairen Konditionen 💚 Unser Ass im Ärmel: Unsere Energiemanagement-Plattform „Kraken“ Die etablierten Energieanbieter haben sich lange genug ausgeruht auf der Wechselträgheit ihrer Bestandskund*innen. Bei Octopus Energy stehen unsere Kund*innen im Mittelpunkt - bei allem, was wir tun. Und das meinen wir ernst! Wir sind immer auf der Suche nach neuen Kolleg*innen, die uns dabei helfen, unsere Mission voranzutreiben. Sorge gemeinsam mit uns dafür, dass das Thema grüne Energie die Aufmerksamkeit bekommt, die es verdient – als spannendes Themenfeld, ganz ohne erhobenen Zeigefinger. Das klingt gut? Dann schau doch mal auf unserer Karriere-Seite vorbei: https://www.octopusenergy.de/karriere

Name: Gudbrandsdal Energi AS
Company description: Gudbrandsdal Energi er den lokale strømleverandøren som ble en nasjonal utfordrer til de store strømselskapene. Vi holder til på Vinstra i Gudbrandsdalen, og selskapet ble etablert allerede i 1916. I dag er vi blant de ti største kraftleverandørene i Norge med over 100.000 kunder.  Vi har alltid vært opptatt av at kundene våre ikke skal betale for mye for strømmen de bruker. Samtidig ser vi på det som vår plikt som strømleverandør å bidra til at vi bruker mindre strøm.  Ved å redusere strømforbruket sparer en både penger og miljøet. Det er en måte å leve mer bærekraftig på. Derfor har vi satt oss et hårete mål: Vi skal hjelpe våre kunder å bruke 30% mindre strøm.  For oss er det å redusere strømforbruket et lagarbeid for klimaet og bedre privatøkonomi. Teknologi gir oss gode verktøy for å redusere strømforbruket vårt. Men teknologi er ingenting verdt uten mennesker og vår evne til å ta de riktige valgene. I Gudbrandsdal Energi satser vi på mennesker som kan hjelpe deg. Det er ikke uten grunn at vi i en årrekke har hatt topplasseringer i kundetilfredshetsundersøkelser som Norsk kundebarometer (BI) og EPSI, og kan skilte med å være landets mest prisbelønte strømleverandør. Det er fornøyde kunder vi lever av og for. Firmaopplysninger: Gudbrandsdal Energi AS Organisasjonsnummer: 916 319 983 Besøksadresse: Strandgata 39, 2640 Vinstra Tlf: 61294700 Epost: marked@ge.no Web: www.ge.no

Name: Netrisk Group
Company description: Netrisk Group is a leading and fast-growing fintech company in the CEE.  Netrisk Group’s goal is to empower Customers to make the right financial choices and to save them money across insurance, banking, telecom, and utility verticals.    With the help of our 1100 dedicated and passionate coworkers, Netrisk operates in 6 markets (Austria, Czech Republic, Hungary, Lithuania, Poland and Slovakia). We aim to create a challenging, friendly, equal-opportunity, and fun environment enabling our coworkers to excel professionally and personally.  Our digital platforms, proprietary solutions, and dedicated professional teams enable millions of people to make easier, smarter, and better decisions regarding insurance, banking, telecom, and utility products. Our online supermarkets offer independent and transparent comparison based on price, quality, product features, and benefits. We work hard to provide comparison and save money for our Customers. The opportunity – and our ability – to support our Customers with their crucial decisions is our passion. We work hard to earn our customer’s trust each day, with each purchase. We are honored by the millions of comparisons that our clients trust us with.  Over time, Netrisk Group has built strong and trustworthy relations with hundreds of prominent insurers, service providers, telecom carriers, banks, energy providers, and utilities. We work hard with our business partners to deliver the broadest product comparison on the market and to match their quality products with our huge client base.  We’re eager not only to maintain our position as a trusted partner but to continuously develop our people, technologies, and processes in order to drive more impact and to serve better our Customers and communities where we operate.  We are also proud to drive profitable growth and deliver exceptional results to our Shareholders who are supporting us in our journey.

Name: ENIO GmbH
Company description: Founded in 2013, ENIO is a leading technology company in the field of control and management of charging infrastructure for electric vehicles. ENIO GmbH is one of the established providers of software for electromobility and serves the European market from Norway to Croatia. The largest shareholder is Deutsche Funkturm, a subsidiary of Deutsche Telekom. Successful companies from 5 to 100,000 employees trust in ENIO. Thousands of charging points are already controlled and billed by ENIO. Customers include Deutsche Telekom AG, GEWISS, Eprihodnost, Comfortcharge, numerous property management companies, municipalities, supermarkets and energy suppliers. With ENIO energy management, we get the full power out of your power line for you without overloading the entire system. Phase-accurate load management turns your charging infrastructure for e-cars into a model for success – including cost savings and full user satisfaction.

Name: Solarize
Company description: Wir schaffen den Abrechnungsmotor für die emissionsfreie Stromzukunft. Unsere Meter-to-Cash Lösung ermöglicht  dynamische Tarife, Dezentrale Versorgungsmodelle, PPAs und Energiegemeinschaften - in Zusammenarbeit mit Stadtwerken, Energieversorgern, PV-Anlagenbetreibern und Immobilienbesitzern. English We are creating the billing engine for the carbon free electricity future. Meter to cash for dynamic tariffs, onsite supply models, PPAs and energy communities - partnering with utilities, energy suppliers, asset and property owners.

Name: Stadtwerke Hartberg
Company description: Stadtwerke Hartberg is a forward-thinking energy provider committed to delivering 100% regional green electricity sourced from water, wind, solar, and biomass. The company prioritizes environmental sustainability and health, ensuring that its energy production is free from radioactive waste and CO2 emissions. With a mission centered on promoting a sustainable energy future, Stadtwerke Hartberg employs innovative strategies such as load management and smart metering to optimize energy consumption and reduce carbon footprints for its clients. The company serves a diverse clientele, including households and businesses in the Hartberg region, and collaborates with local partners to enhance its eco-friendly initiatives. By integrating advanced storage systems and promoting energy efficiency, Stadtwerke Hartberg aims to contribute significantly to a greener, more sustainable future for the community.

Name: ENSTROGA GROUP
Company description: ENSTROGA GROUP, ENERGY FOR LIFE ENSTROGA was born with the objective of supplying more affordable electricity and gas to the energy market, as well as a greener and more sustainable approach. Since then we have grown into one of Europe’s top independent energy suppliers, serving hundreds of thousands of customers throughout the continent.  ENSTROGA approaches new markets with the mission of bringing the same expertise and know-how to consumers looking for a better alternative to the big suppliers.

Name: Zmarta
Company description: At Zmarta, we want to make it easy for consumers to make smarter decisions with their money. This is why we offer a range of financial services for loans and mortgages, electricity and insurances. Most of our partners are banks, electricity providers and insurance companies. We envisage a world where no one pays a penny too much. We empower our customers to make smarter decisions that improve their personal finances, and we offer our partners in-depth customer knowledge and a cost-efficient way to reach their target audiences. Zmarta has a team of passionate and trustworthy employees who will do their absolute outmost to provide you with the best solution for you. We strive for operational excellence and work tirelessly to build an industry leading financial technology platform, so you can relax in the knowledge that you have made the smartest financial decision.

Name: Onafhankelijk Adviesplatform.org
Company description: Uw vertrouwde partner voor energiebesparing en kostenreductie. Wij bieden onafhankelijk advies, energie-audits, en ondersteuning bij de keuze van energieleveranciers, met een focus op duurzaamheid en economie. Laat ons u helpen uw energieverbruik te optimaliseren en besparingen te maximaliseren! 🌍💡

Name: Energie Schwaben gmbh
Company description: Willkommen in einem Unternehmen, das schon heute an der Zukunft arbeitet. Grüner Strom aus jeder Steckdose, saubere Luft in allen Großstädten? Zugegeben, auch wir können die Welt nicht im Handumdrehen zu einem besseren Ort machen. Als einer der führenden Energieanbieter Bayerisch-Schwabens tragen wir mit unseren Produkten und Ideen aber bereits jetzt dazu bei, den aktuellen und zukünftigen Herausforderungen in Sachen Klimaschutz zu begegnen und die global gesteckten Ziele erfolgreich umzusetzen. Wusstest du, dass wir in Deutschland die Energiezukunft nicht nur mitgestalten, sondern in einigen Bereichen echte Pioniere sind? Mit innovativen und nachhaltigen Lösungen die überzeugen. Und auch ein bisschen stolz machen. Wenn auch du Lust hast, gemeinsam mit rund 400 Kolleg:innen an der Energieversorgung von morgen zu arbeiten oder mit deinen Ideen so richtig durchzustarten, sollten wir uns kennenlernen!

Name: Reel
HQ Location: Denmark, Capital Region, Copenhagen, 17 Overgaden Neden Vandet, 1414
Company description: Reel is the next-generation electricity supplier for climate-conscious companies. Reel matches your company with renewable electricity to reduce your emissions and electricity costs. How we work: With Reel as your electricity supplier, your company will sign a Power Purchase Agreement (PPA). This agreement builds a new solar or wind park to match your company’s electricity consumption. In return, your company reduces its emissions and receives electricity at an attractive, fixed price.  Who we are: Reel’s team of electricity specialists and sustainability experts is driven by a single purpose: to empower all companies to accelerate the renewable energy transition. Start your journey at https://www.reel.energy/en/

Name: Ecofys
Company description: Ecofys, a Navigant company, is a leading international energy and climate consultancy focused on sustainable energy for everyone. Founded in 1984, the company is a trusted advisor to governments, corporations, NGOs, and energy providers worldwide. The team delivers powerful results in the energy and climate transition sectors. Working across the entire energy value chain, Ecofys develops innovative solutions and strategies to support its clients in enabling the energy transition and working through the challenges of climate change.

Name: Stadtwerke FREIBERG AG
Company description: Energieanbieter und -dienstleister in der Silberstadt® Freiberg.

Name: EA Elautomation AB
Company description: Elcor Sverige AB specializes in energy and electrical infrastructure, providing reliable, scalable, and future-ready solutions for the global energy sector. With 13 high-performing production sites across Northern Europe, the company delivers certified switchgear and control systems that power everything from local substations to national power grids and renewable energy projects. Elcor's mission is to enable energy providers and utilities to build robust and efficient networks that meet future demands while supporting the green transition. Their expertise includes AC/DC power supply, protection relays, and smart grid automation, ensuring reduced energy loss and compliance with ESG targets. Serving a diverse clientele that includes utilities, grid operators, and renewable energy projects, Elcor is committed to delivering modular, type-tested solutions backed by 24/7 service availability, making them a trusted partner in the evolving energy landscape.

Name: SELGAS Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Trentino-alto Adige, Bolzano, 12 Via Bruno Buozzi, 39100
Company description: Siamo una società di Vendita di Gas Naturale ed Energia Elettrica operante in Alto Adige. Nasciamo nel 2002 con lo scopo di rispondere alla crescente domanda di energia nel territorio e lo facciamo decidendo di offrire al mercato del riscaldamento locale uno dei combustibili più efficienti ed eco-compatibili: il Gas Naturale. La nostra maturità passa attraverso diverse fasi societarie e all’espansione della fornitura di Gas non solo al segmento domestico ma anche all’industria e ai servizi. Nel recente 2017 decidiamo di ampliare la nostra gamma di servizi anche alla fornitura di Energia Elettrica, completando quindi la nostra definizione di Fornitore di Energia in Italia. La propensione ad offrire i propri servizi in Alto Adige è dettata dalla nostra decennale esperienza sul mercato energetico locale, rispettandone le tradizioni e le sensibilità. Il forte radicamento sul territorio si riflette anche sulla struttura della nostra proprietà. Siamo una società locale affidabile per un’efficiente fornitura di Gas ed Energia Elettrica. Ci contraddistinguiamo per il forte orientamento al Cliente, perché la Sua soddisfazione è la Nostra fonte di energia.

Name: E 3 Energetika Ekologija Ekonomija d.o.o.
HQ Location: Slovenia, Nova Gorica, Nova Gorica, 21 Prvomajska Ulica, 5000
Company description: E 3 energy, ecology, economy E 3 is one of the major electricity suppliers in Slovenia. Our products, ambitious business plans and development orientation all promote efficient and environmentally-friendly energy. We are in the business of energy. We stand for reliable electricity and heat supply and offer a well-designed range of energy services, thus providing our customers with the most appropriate combination of energy sources in view of their needs, as well as promoting energy efficiency. Become our partner and improve your energy competencies. We are committed to the future, and therefore ecology. We ensure high environmental standards. Select our energy solutions and help reduce carbon footprint and increase use of renewable energy sources. A key aspect of any our business relationship is economy. We supply energy from selected sources offering just prices and other conditions, providing also management and advisory services, thus helping you achieve your economic targets.

Name: One Bill Global
Company description: One Bill Global streeft ernaar om uw leven te vereenvoudigen door diensten die je dagelijks gebruikt te combineren. Dit op vlak van volgende diensten: Mobiel De tarieven van onze mobiele abonnementen sluiten perfect aan bij de filosofie van One Bill Global: niet betalen voor wat je niet nodig hebt. Ons mobiel aanbod laten we volledig aansluiten op uw noden. Energie (Residentieel) Voor elektriciteit en gas voor residentiële klanten werkt One Bill Global samen met Mega, een duurzame en goedkopere energieleverancier in België.  Energie (B2B) OBG werkt ook B2B. Hiervoor werken we samen met Enbro. Als onafhankelijk tussenpersoon garandeert Enbro u de best mogelijke deal op de markt. Solar One Bill Global werkt samen met Earth om een uniek product op de Belgische markt te brengen: zonnepanelen op huurbasis. Ontdek snel ons huurmodel: alles voor jou geregeld door OBG en Earth. Onmiddellijk gebruik van uw zonnepanelen en een onmiddellijke besparing op uw energiefactuur. - One Bill Global aspire à faciliter la vie en combinant les services que vous utilisez quotidiennement.  Mobile Nos tarifs correspondent parfaitement à notre philosophie: ne pas payer pour ce dont on n’a pas besoin. Nous adaptons notre offre mobile complètement à vos besoins.  Energie (résidentiel) Pour l’électricité et le gaz pour nos clients résidentiels, OBG travaille en collaboration avec Mega, fournisseur d’énergie durable et surtout le moins cher en Belgique.   Energie (B2B) Pour les clients B2B pour l’électricité et le gaz, OBG travaille en collaboration avec Enbro. En sa qualité d’intermédiaire indépendant, Enbro vous garantit la meilleure offre possible du marché. Solaire OBG collabore Earth avec  pour mettre un produit unique sur le marché belge: des panneaux solaires en location! Découvrez rapidement notre modèle de location: tout est pris en charge par OBG et Earth, pour une utilisation  immédiate de vos panneaux et une économie considérable sur votre facture d’énergie.

Name: KlimaInvest Green Concepts GmbH
Company description: Klimalnvest is one of the leading full-service energy and climate protection agencies for municipal utilities and energy suppliers in Germany. As a supplier of certified green electricity and green gas products, we have been offering customised solutions for climate protection strategies since 2009. Limiting global warming is one of the greatest challenges of our time. One of the key levers is the expansion of renewable energies and driving forward the energy transition. Energy supply companies in particular can make a major contribution to this. With well thought-out concepts and the utilisation of natural resources, we support over 500 energy suppliers on their way to greater climate protection. In our great team, we work every day with commitment and sustainability in the truest sense of the word to drive forward the energy transition and protect our climate. We share this intrinsic motivation, want to make a difference and help our customers on their way to the energy transition. Do you want that too? You can find our current job vacancies here: karriere.klima-invest.de Further information about KlimaInvest:  klima-invest.de instagram.com/klimainvest_green_concepts

Name: OSTA Rugs And Broadloom
Company description: HERITAGE AND EXPERIENCE Founded in Belgium since 1934, OSTA is an authentic manufacturer of pure wool and man-made fiber rugs. Our name is established by nearly 100 years of masterly excellence and experience in the weaving industry. The highly skilled in-house design team aspires to reinvent itself and refine the designs of today and tomorrow. The entire OSTA team strives to provide the best quality and services for our partnerships around the world. INNOVATION AND DESIGN  For almost 100 years we have specialized in outstanding Belgian design and innovation. The design studio is located in the heart of the showroom. It boasts a tremendous variety of materials, colors, yarns, as well as an extensive library from which to derive inspiration. KNOWLEDGE AND INNOVATION Our weaving mill is based in Avelgem, mere minutes away from Oudenaarde, which is Flanders’ historical tapestry weaving center. We are proud to continue the fine art of weaving and keep this remarkable legacy alive. Our team aspires to offer the widest possible scope of high-end techniques and textures, ranging from the sophisticated  Jaquard to high-end wilton. We achieve luxurious high pile, elegant cut and loop (commonly referred to as Brussels weave), and even intricate high-performance rugs. The finest materials are selected to weave our products, from natural fibres such as pure wool or cotton to even recycled polyester. OSTA highly values its in-house knowledge, and so the design team joins forces with our skilled master craftsmen to innovate and create the unexpected. RECYCLING AND ECOLOGY Sustainability is key in all our actions. We produce partly our own energy by solar panels which are placed throughout the roof of the factory. The remaining of the energy need is bought from an energy supplier which guarantees the origin from fully renewable power sources (wind and solar energy). And we have our textile waste, paper, cardboard, plastics, pallets, cartridges, batteries and many more recycled.

Name: Global Wind Energy Council
HQ Location: Belgium, Brussels Capital, Brussels, 80 Rue D'arlon, 1040
Company description: The Global Wind Energy Council (GWEC) helps open new markets for wind power.  GWEC has a proven track record of success in helping to build the wind power industry in emerging markets around the world, including China, Brazil, Mexico, South Africa, and India, and more recently, Mongolia, Argentina and Vietnam.    We work with national and international policy makers and industry associations to help ensure that wind power establishes itself as the answer to today’s energy challenges, providing substantial environmental and economic benefits. GWEC is a member-based trade association that represents the entire wind energy sector. The members of GWEC represent over 1,500 companies, organisations and institutions in more than 80 countries, including manufacturers, developers, component suppliers, research institutes, national wind and renewables associations, electricity providers, finance and insurance companies. Policy development: We represent the wind industry’s interests in international negotiations to ensure that wind power takes its place as a major energy source (IEA, IRENA, UN, etc). Global outreach: We work with local partners to help open up new markets, helping to create the policy environment for wind power to thrive across the world. Information and education: We provide authoritative information, analysis and data about the status of the industry globally, along with our expectations for the future. GWEC events: The meeting place for key wind sector players around the world… organised by the industry, for the industry…

Name: Alens
Company description: Alens fornisce un servizio di consulenza a tutto tondo su tutti gli aspetti legati al mondo energetico, sostenibilità ambientale, impatto consumi, nella più assoluta indipendenza da fornitori di energia, fornitori di impianti, tecnologie ed ogni tipo di provider. Il nostro team di esperti si occupa di efficienza energetica all’interno del mercato delle commodities, con focus su energia elettrica e gas naturale.  Lavoriamo sia sul mercato italiano, sia sui mercati europei, con attenzione particolare ai paesi mediterranei.  ALENS opera anche come ESCo, consentendo ai propri clienti di efficientare i propri siti, senza alcun investimento economico. Tramite i propri partners, Alens è in grado di realizzare interventi di risparmio energetico, recuperando l'investimento sulla base dei risparmi economici generati al cliente.  Le formule contrattuali proposte sono quelle dell’ EPC contract - contratti a performance energetica.  Valutiamo tutte le tipologie di intervento, in particolare:  - impianti di illuminazione - cicli ORC - cogenerazioni - recuperi di calore   ALENS è ESCo certificata UNI CEI 11352 da TUV SUD.  Alens nasce dalla sfida di professionisti indipendenti e dei soci Davide Mariani, Paolo Guardamagna che si sono formati negli anni come esperti di gestione energia attraverso esperienze pluriennali maturate sul campo. Nello staff Alens sono presenti diversi EGE (esperti gestione energia) certificati ai sensi della norma UNI-CEI 11339 da parte terza accreditata e professionisti dell'M&V certificati CMVP (Certified Measurement & Verification Professional).  L'ufficio tecnico vanta più di 10 ingegneri qualificati.

Name: Energy Dome
Company description: Energy Dome is an innovative energy storage company specializing in the development of utility-scale carbon dioxide (CO2) battery systems. The company's mission is to provide cost-effective, efficient, and scalable energy storage solutions that enhance the integration of renewable energy sources into the grid. Energy Dome's flagship technology utilizes compressed CO2 to store and discharge energy, boasting a roundtrip efficiency of over 75% and a service life exceeding 30 years without performance degradation. The company has partnered with notable clients such as Alliant Energy, Madison Gas and Electric, and Shell Global Solutions to implement its technology in projects like the Columbia Energy Storage Project in Wisconsin. Targeting utilities and energy providers, Energy Dome aims to revolutionize energy storage and contribute to a sustainable energy future.

Name: VNG Handel & Vertrieb GmbH
Company description: VNG Handel & Vertrieb GmbH (VNG H&V) is a Leipzig-based gas trading company and a wholly owned subsidiary of VNG AG, part of the EnBW Group. The company specializes in the procurement and distribution of natural gas, green ammonia, and hydrogen, aiming to play a pivotal role in the transition to a sustainable energy economy. VNG H&V has recently signed a term sheet with Aker Horizons for the supply of green ammonia from Norway to Germany, highlighting its commitment to renewable energy sources. The company serves a diverse clientele, including industrial customers and energy suppliers across Europe, and collaborates with various partners to enhance its green energy offerings. VNG H&V's mission is to ensure reliable energy supply while actively contributing to climate protection and sustainability, aligning with its vision of fostering a greener future through innovative energy solutions.

Name: Elegant
Company description: Energieleverancier Elegant is actief op de Belgische markt sinds april 2012 en levert 100% groene stroom en aardgas in Vlaanderen aan ongeveer 100.000 klanten.  We onderscheiden ons door 3 belangrijke troeven:  1- Eenvoud Bij Elegant houden we alles simpel. Een scherp tarief, passend bij je verbruik. Bij ons geen verhalen over het belang van groene stroom en wat mensen moeten doen om de wereld te redden. Groene stroom is voor ons normaal, geen lifestyle. Ons bedrijf is eenvoudig en efficiënt ingericht, zodat we zo weinig mogelijk kosten hebben. Daarom betaal je ook een lagere prijs voor stroom en gas. 2- Geen gedoe We hebben onze dienstverlening zo efficiënt gemaakt dat je zo weinig mogelijk tijd bij ons verliest. Overstappen. Verhuizen. Alles kan met een paar klikken. We zijn er voor nuchtere mensen: voor iedereen die geen gedoe wil. 3- Vlekkeloze service Elegant krijgt al vanaf de start de hoogste score in de service-vergelijking van de VREG, namelijk 5 sterren. Dit danken we aan onze bijzonder gemotiveerde "persoonlijke dossierbeheerders". Elegant heeft geen anoniem callcenter, maar een zeer gemotiveerd team van persoonlijke dossierbeheerders. Elke klant heeft het rechtstreeks nummer van zijn of haar dossierbeheerder, en kan die altijd bereiken met elke vraag, om een vlotte verhuis te regelen, een nieuwe klant aan te brengen ...

Name: Smart Services Network
HQ Location: Belgium, Evere Brussels, 3 Avenue Du Bourget, 1140
Company description: Smart Services Network is een organisatie die werkt met een vaste partner voor gsm abonnementen en een vaste partner als energieleverancier. Door deze exclusieve samenwerking zijn wij in staat om via beide partners een voordelig abonnement af te sluiten bij consumenten.

Name: Hidroelectrica
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, Nr. 15-17 Bd. Ion Mihalache, 011171
Company description: Hidroelectrica este principalul producător de energie electrică din România, un jucător important în domeniul hidroenergetic în Europa și principalul furnizor de servicii de sistem din România, având un rol important pentru securitatea SEN. Societatea deține și exploatează 182 de centrale hidroelectrice, 5 stații de pompare, un parc eolian cu o putere instalată totală de 108 MW și are o capacitate totală instalată de producere a energiei hidroelectrice de 6,3 GW.
