Societatea are șapte sucursale hidroelectrice și o sucursală ce administrează parcul eolian Crucea, Porțile de Fier și Vâlcea fiind cele mai importante din punct de vedere al capacităților acestora de producție a energiei și ponderilor în producția de energie totală a Grupului.   Societatea s-a angajat să producă energie 100% din surse regenerabile și a jucat, încă de la început, un rol esențial în proiectarea și crearea de concepte tehnologice și operaționale care au devenit standardul în sectorul sau de activitate.   Totodată, Hidroelectrica este vânzător angro, precum și furnizor de energie electrică direct către clienții finali, clienți casnici (rezidențiali) și noncasnici (incluzând afaceri din diverse sectoare industriale, cum ar fi construcția de automobile, telecomunicații și construcții etc).   Ca producător de energie din sursă hidro și, mai recent, din sursă eoliană, societatea valorifică sinergiile existente între portofoliul de producție și cel de furnizare, dar și cele generate prin diversificarea portofoliului de producție către alte surse regenerabile, cum ar fi energia eoliană și solară prin mixarea acestora cu sursa hidro.   Începând cu data de 12 iulie 2023, societatea este listată la Bursa de Valori București, la sfârșitul lunii octombrie 2023, Hidroelectrica ocupând locul 1 în top tranzacționare la BVB, cu o valoare de 2,8 miliarde RON.

Name: Yuso
Company description: Yuso is an energy supplier with a strong affinity for Renewable Energy Sources (RES). From Battery Energy Storage Systems to energy communities, Yuso develops the technology needed to shift from fossil fuels to renewable energy sources. Yuso steers batteries and other utilities for behind-the-meter optimization and for grid supporting services. Yuso offers its expertise to customers for financial analysis of their business case and optimization of project revenue streams.

Name: EverPower Ltd

Contact us today at info@everpower.ie or call +353 1 625 1000.

Name: Evonity

Our solutions are designed for both domestic and commercial applications, catering to businesses, installation companies, and fleet operators worldwide. 🔌 Our Expertise: ✅ AC & DC Charging Stations – Reliable, future-proof, and scalable solutions ✅ Super Fast Charging Technology – High-speed DC chargers for maximum efficiency ✅ B2B-Focused Solutions – Tailored for installers, businesses, and energy providers ✅ OCPP 2.0.1 Compliant – Seamless integration with smart charging networks 🌍 Why Choose Evonity? ✔️ Manufacturer-Direct Pricing – Competitive pricing for installation companies and businesses ✔️ Innovative & Sustainable – Designed for high efficiency, reliability, and future growth ✔️ Seamless Integration – Smart connectivity with energy management systems ✔️ Scalable Charging Solutions – From home to large-scale commercial EV infrastructure 🚀 Join us in accelerating the EV revolution with cutting-edge charging solutions! 📍 Website: www.evonity.com 📩 Contact us: info@evonity.com

Name: Wattn
Company description: Wattn is a pioneering company focused on making energy consumption more understandable and manageable for households and businesses. Led by Elin Hessen, a seasoned expert in the energy sector, Wattn's mission is to empower individuals to save money on their electricity bills through smart energy usage and efficiency tips. The company offers innovative solutions like the Norgespris, a fixed electricity price initiative aimed at providing predictable energy costs for consumers. Wattn serves a diverse clientele, including homeowners and small to medium-sized enterprises, and collaborates with various partners to enhance sustainability practices. With a strong commitment to environmental responsibility, Wattn aims to help its clients make informed decisions that benefit both their finances and the planet.

Name: Stadtwerke Torgau
Company description: Energy supplier for Torgau and the region for more than 30 years. We supply around 16,000 people in Torgau and the region with electricity, gas and heat around the clock - maybe you too?

Name: Building Contractor
Company description: Teknofilm is a leading building contractor specializing in the application of solar window films, aimed at enhancing energy efficiency and thermal comfort in various architectural settings. With a mission to improve indoor comfort while reducing energy consumption, Teknofilm has successfully partnered with notable clients such as the Italian Space Agency, where they implemented advanced solar film solutions to optimize energy use and reduce CO2 emissions. The company focuses on providing innovative solutions that not only enhance the aesthetic appeal of buildings but also contribute to significant cost savings on energy bills. Targeting both commercial and residential markets, Teknofilm is committed to delivering high-quality, certified materials that meet the evolving needs of its clients, ensuring a sustainable and comfortable environment.

Name: SUDenergie SA
Company description: SUDenergie SA is a leading energy provider in Luxembourg, dedicated to promoting sustainable energy solutions and facilitating the transition to renewable energy sources. With a mission centered on environmental responsibility, SUDenergie has been actively investing in renewable energy projects, including solar and wind energy, since 2015. The company serves approximately 38,000 clients, including both residential and business customers, offering a range of services such as natural gas and electricity supply, energy efficiency programs, and incentives for energy-saving projects. SUDenergie is committed to social responsibility, supporting local cultural and sporting events, and providing educational opportunities for youth. With a strong focus on transparency and collaboration, the company has built lasting relationships with its partners and stakeholders, ensuring a sustainable future for the communities it serves.

Name: HEAT Gas Technologies GmbH
Company description: HEAT gas technologies is an international provider specialising in the planning, manufacturing and developing of components, and in installations and services involving the production, processing and distribution of natural gas (CNG, LPG, LNG, Biogas, H2)or oil for all consumer groups including end consumers. Our corporate focus includes environmental Technology for SCR and SNCR Ammonia Supply Systems and installations as well.  HEAT gas technologies aims to expand its market position while sustainably improving our state-of-the-art products and meeting our partners' and customers' high standards through our services HEAT gas technologies is part of an internationally active group (RMA pipeline equipment) that specialises in designing and planning, producing, delivering as well as servicing components, products and complete systems in the areas of: - natural gas distribution networks,  - gas storage and processing to energy suppliers,  - oil & gas exploration,  - gas and coal power plants and industry - environmental technology, - renewable energy, - Biogas grid injection, - H2 blending systems.

Name: Well Guidance
Company description: Empowering Energy Exploration for a Sustainable Future... Well Guidance is a Directional Drilling Services company based in the Netherlands, and is the culmination of the people and experience from three companies operating internationally from The Netherlands, over the past 30 years. This resulted in Well Guidance becoming the largest independently-owned Dutch Directional Drilling service provider, providing a broad range of advanced well-placement technologies to the global energy markets. Our services include, but are not limited to: •	Directional Drilling •	Measurements While Drilling •	Logging While Drilling tools •	Performance Drilling •	Surveying Services and personnel.  Well Guidance prides itself in bringing innovative and cost-effective solutions to our customers’ projects, which are in the main government entities, rig operators or energy suppliers that are actively involved within the Geothermal and Oil & Gas industries.  Our specialized downhole equipment has performed under a wide range of directional borehole conditions, and our team bring experience not only from the Netherlands but on many projects throughout the EU, and internationally. Our management team have over 100 years of combined drilling experience.  Our field personnel have, on average; •	over 25 years experience in the drilling industry (esp. Oil & Gas), •	of which over 12 years is on average in Geothermal Drilling, •	and over 5 years is in high temperature Geothermal Drilling projects. Well Guided Drilling Solutions •	Geothermal Directional Drilling Specialists, •	Multi-skilled, multi-lingual, highly-experienced team •	State-of-the-art MWD/LWD survey tools (EM&MP) •	Well planning with the industries premier applications •	Rotary Steerable Systems, PDM's, stabilizers, jars, accelerators,  •	Drill-Bit Selection & Optimisation •	Mud Pulse Gyro-MWD. •	High-temperature EMS tools

Name: Msu Solutions GmbH | Kraftwerk
Company description: Msu Solutions GmbH | Kraftwerk is a dynamic company specializing in innovative software solutions for the energy and utilities sector. With a mission to drive transformation and progress through technological advancements, the company focuses on enhancing operational efficiency and sustainability for its clients. Msu Solutions GmbH partners with notable organizations, including EWE Go GmbH and GETEC Group, to deliver comprehensive services such as cloud platforms for e-mobility and technical management software. Their target market includes energy providers, housing companies, and businesses in the commercial sector, all seeking to optimize their processes and embrace renewable energy solutions. Through ongoing research and development initiatives, supported by the European Regional Development Fund, Msu Solutions is committed to fostering a sustainable future in the energy landscape.

Name: Quby
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Holland, Amsterdam, 22 1st Floor Joan Muyskenweg
Company description: We believe that our services can help every household change towards a more sustainable and efficient home, without compromising on the important things in life. We partner up with our clients, like energy providers and insurance companies, to create valuable consumer services using data-driven technology.  Over 100 professionals at our Amsterdam office are working to create data-driven services across Europe. Working at Quby means being part of a close group of passionate and ambitious experts. We love to work hard, learn new things every day to find the best solutions around. In our informal open office, there’s a playful vibe thanks to cool events, parties and games – not to mention plenty of great benefits!

Name: European Energy Pooling
Company description: Your independent intermediary for support and access to the European energy market. If you are an Energy Supplier or Direct-Connected Industrial Group, we can offer you smart access to the European gas market, competitive prices and instant shipper license availability. If you are a Trader or Shipper, we can offer you competitive prices via pooling effect and are able to deliver large and small volumes. EEP offers 24/7 trading and shipping services on the European high-pressure gas market.

Name: SPOT Energie
Company description: Over ons Bij SPOT Energie zijn we gepassioneerd over het leveren van onafhankelijk energieadvies aan de zakelijke markt. Ons team van experts biedt strategisch inkoopadvies dat bedrijven helpt om hun energiekosten te optimaliseren en duurzame keuzes te maken. Met onze diepgaande kennis van de energiemarkt en een klantgerichte aanpak, zorgen we ervoor dat onze klanten altijd de beste deals krijgen. Onze missie Onze missie is om bedrijven te empoweren met de kennis en tools die ze nodig hebben om slimme, duurzame energiekeuzes te maken. We streven ernaar om een betrouwbare partner te zijn die waarde toevoegt door middel van transparant en onafhankelijk advies. Onze visie Wij geloven in een toekomst waarin bedrijven niet alleen financieel profiteren van hun energiekeuzes, maar ook bijdragen aan een duurzamere wereld. Door strategisch advies en innovatieve oplossingen willen we de energiemarkt transformeren en bedrijven helpen hun ecologische voetafdruk te verkleinen. Waarom SPOT Energie? Onafhankelijk Advies: We zijn niet gebonden aan energieleveranciers, wat betekent dat ons advies altijd in het beste belang van onze klanten is. Expertise en ervaring: Ons team bestaat uit ervaren professionals met diepgaande kennis van de energiemarkt. Innovatieve oplossingen: We blijven voortdurend op de hoogte van de nieuwste trends en technologieën om onze klanten de meest effectieve oplossingen te bieden. Klantgericht: We luisteren naar de behoeften van onze klanten en bieden op maat gemaakte oplossingen die echt werken. Onze Locatie We zijn onlangs verhuisd naar een moderne en inspirerende locatie in Breda. Ons nieuwe kantoor biedt een dynamische werkomgeving die samenwerking en innovatie stimuleert. Kom bij ons team We zijn altijd op zoek naar getalenteerde en gemotiveerde professionals die ons team willen versterken. Als je geïnteresseerd bent in een carrière bij SPOT Energie, bekijk dan onze vacatures en ontdek hoe je deel kunt uitmaken van ons groeiende team.

Name: NIFE Energieadvies
Company description: New Impulse For Energy! Dat is waar NIFE voor staat. Want bij NIFE Energieadvies sporen we ondernemers en organisaties aan om goed naar hun energiezaken te laten kijken. Wij zorgen ervoor dat u zo weinig mogelijk betaalt voor uw energie. Dit doen we al meer dan vijftien jaar door samen te werken met energieleveranciers en meetbedrijven.  Hier steken we graag onze energie in: •	NIFE zorgt ervoor dat u bespaart op uw energiekosten door voordelig voor u in te kopen •	NIFE controleert al uw energiecontracten en -facturen •	NIFE zorgt voor totale ontzorging

Name: SolarBlick GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Münster, 41 Annette Allee, 48149
Company description: We can all contribute to the energy transition. But some of us can make a really big contribution. Are you one of them? By installing solar panels on your property, you can gain many advantages for your company, your community or your family at the same time. With a solar energy system, the sustainable future that we all wish for our children, will grow on your agricultural land, your community property or on the roof of your industrial plants. SolarBlick is your experienced and responsible partner for all project steps: from the evaluation and planning phase to construction to commissioning and operation in the years that follow. You benefit from a compact solution with one contact person for the entire joint project - thanks to our strong partnership with service providers from plant construction, financing partners and Germany's largest green electricity provider. Our experts will be happy to advise you individually and without obligation. SolarBlick We build your energy transition.

Name: Gaxa
Company description: Gaxa è il fornitore di energia dal cuore sardo e oggi fornisce luce e gas in rete a oltre 60.000 clienti in tutta la Sardegna. Siamo nati in Sardegna e ci impegniamo ogni giorno per essere vicini ai cittadini sardi attraverso soluzioni energetiche capaci di migliorare la loro vita.  Puntiamo a migliorarci sempre e ad offrire un servizio sempre più accessibile, conveniente e, soprattutto, completo.  Seguici nel nostro viaggio all'insegna della trasformazione, della crescita, dell'energia. Gaxa: l’energia per la Sardegna.

Name: GUGLER Water Turbines GmbH
Company description: GUGLER Water Turbines GmbH is a leading global supplier of modern turbine technologies, specializing in the design and manufacture of various types of turbines, including Francis, Kaplan, and Pelton, with capacities up to 40 MW. The company focuses on providing comprehensive solutions for small to medium-sized hydropower plants, delivering not only turbines but also associated electromechanical equipment, control systems, and SCADA systems to optimize performance. GUGLER is committed to sustainability and innovation, contributing to renewable energy projects worldwide, such as the Nam Cuoi hydropower plant in Vietnam and the Anashironi project in Peru. Their clientele includes energy providers and infrastructure developers looking to enhance their renewable energy capabilities. With a strong emphasis on efficiency and reliability, GUGLER aims to support the global transition to clean energy while minimizing environmental impact through advanced engineering solutions.

Name: FORTIA ENERGIA
Company description: Fundada en 2007 por un grupo de grandes consumidores, surgió como una solución innovadora para el aprovisionamiento de electricidad a la industria electrointensiva y es en la actualidad la mayor comercializadora independiente del Mercado Ibérico de Electricidad. Con un modelo basado en la transparencia y la flexibilidad, facilita soluciones de suministro innovadoras y adaptadas a los requerimientos de los grandes clientes corporativos del sector industrial, siendo el proveedor de electricidad y gas para más de un centenar de centros de producción en España y Portugal.

Name: CiS - Drone Systems| GIS Software | Development
Company description: CiS GmbH – Tailored Drone and Software Solutions for Complex Challenges! CiS GmbH, founded in 1990 in Rostock, is a leading German manufacturer of drone and software solutions for industry, business, and public applications. We offer flexible and modular drones – from mechanical design and advanced control algorithms to intuitive planning software. Through intensive research and development of state-of-the-art drones for hard-to-reach indoor areas and tactical scenarios in the security sector, we are currently the only German company that offers and manufactures solutions of this development depth. Each of our products is developed and produced in our modern facility in Rostock, adhering to the highest safety and efficiency standards. Furthermore, our focus has always been on digital information systems. Our goal is to efficiently capture hard-to-access data and present it in a user-friendly manner. Therefore, we also develop specialized GIS applications for network operators and energy suppliers at our Rostock location. Thanks to our strong background in the GIS field, we can offer fully integrated solutions that meet the current demands of the industry. Our clients operate across a variety of sectors, including the energy industry, public service, industry, and agriculture. Our passion is to collaboratively develop innovative solutions with our partners and advance developments in the field of drone technology and software.

Name: LIFEPOWR
Company description: LIFEPOWR is at the forefront of transforming the energy landscape by orchestrating energy flows to balance the grid while unlocking the flexibility of thousands of decentralized energy assets.  Our technology empowers consumers to lower their energy bills and even earn from the energy market—effortlessly. At the same time, we accelerate the energy transition by directly cutting CO₂ emissions from gas-fired peaker plants. Based in Antwerp and active since 2015, our team of experts develops cutting-edge solutions built on years of experience in energy management and storage. Our flagship platform, FlexiO, is more than just an EMS. Going beyond traditional energy management, FlexiO optimizes energy flows, reduces costs, and monetizes flexibility in one seamless solution. It integrates behind-the-meter energy management with market optimization, unlocking value for households, businesses, and energy providers alike. Originally launched under its own name as a demo-client, FlexiO is now scaling rapidly as a white-label solution, adopted by leading players across the energy sector.

Name: Miogas & Luce
Company description: Miogas & Luce è un brand di Segnoverde S.p.A. Unipersonale. La nostra storia inizia negli anni Sessanta dall’unione di cinque società municipalizzate operanti nella fornitura di gas naturale ed energia elettrica. Nel tempo cresciamo e diventiamo il principale fornitore di gas, luce e sistemi di efficientamento energetico dell’area Sud di Milano. La presenza sul territorio e la vicinanza alle persone che lo abitano sono da sempre i nostri punti di forza; per questo la nostra rete di sportelli è cresciuta e oggi ci trovi nei comuni di Rozzano, Melegnano, Binasco, Gaggiano, San Giuliano Milanese, Pieve Emanuele e Zibido San Giacomo. La cortesia, la gentilezza e la competenza dei nostri dipendenti, degli operatori di sportello e dei consulenti della rete commerciale sono i nostri tratti distintivi e il motivo per cui rappresentiamo un punto di riferimento per tante famiglie, imprese e condomini che hanno scelto di rivolgersi a noi. Attenzione al Cliente e ascolto dei suoi bisogni, personalizzazione del servizio offerto, attaccamento al territorio, costruzione di sinergie e partnership con le realtà locali: sono i punti fermi che ci guidano e che ci spingono a tenere alta la fiducia di chi sceglie Miogas & Luce come partner per l’energia.

Name: Skoon Energy
Company description: Skoon Energy is a pioneering online marketplace that is reshaping the clean mobile energy landscape. Our mission is to drive the global transition to sustainable energy by connecting energy providers and consumers through our data-driven software platform. By facilitating the efficient utilisation and distribution of clean mobile energy systems, we empower industries, film sets, and grid operators to make significant strides towards a cleaner future. At Skoon Energy, we understand the urgent need for flexible and accessible energy solutions. Our cutting-edge platform serves as a digital hub where energy providers can manage and share their clean energy systems, and consumers can seamlessly access and report on these resources to power their operations. By bridging the gap between supply and demand, we are paving the way for a sustainable energy ecosystem that unlocks clean energy, always.

Name: Montini Servizi
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Brescia, 49 Via Arcangelo Tadini, 25125
Company description: Benvenuti in Montini Servizi, dove l’energia incontra l’innovazione e il servizio personalizzato. Fondati nel 2013 dall’ambizione di Emanuel Montini e trasformati in s.r.l. nel 2014, ci siamo rapidamente affermati come leader nel settore dell’energia e del gas nel nord Italia.  La nostra missione? Essere il collegamento ideale tra i fornitori di energia/gas e voi, i consumatori. Siamo più di un semplice intermediario: siamo i tuoi consulenti di fiducia, dedicati a guidarti verso le soluzioni energetiche più vantaggiose e sostenibili.

Name: Commerciale Gas & Luce
HQ Location: Italy, Lombardy, Gallarate, 2 Via Damiano Chiesa, 21013
Company description: Commerciale Gas & Luce è un brand di Segnoverde S.p.A. Unipersonale. La nostra storia inizia negli anni Sessanta a Gallarate, da una costola di AMSC S.p.A. – Azienda Multiservizi Comunali attiva dal 1907, con la metanizzazione del comune di Gallarate. Nel tempo cresciamo e diventiamo il principale fornitore di gas, energia elettrica e sistemi di efficientamento energetico del varesotto. La presenza sul territorio e la vicinanza alle persone che lo abitano sono da sempre i nostri punti di forza; per questo da più di 60 anni ci impegniamo a fornire il miglior servizio possibile e oggi mettiamo a disposizione dei nostri Clienti due sportelli fisici: la storica sede di Gallarate e quella più recente di Busto Arsizio. Il nostro tratto distintivo è il rapporto diretto e trasparente che instauriamo con la clientela, famiglie, imprese, condomini e amministrazioni locali che scelgono di rivolgersi a noi; una relazione basata sulla fiducia, la competenza e la cortesia dei dipendenti, gli operatori di sportello e i consulenti della rete commerciale. Attenzione al Cliente e ascolto dei suoi bisogni, personalizzazione del servizio offerto, attaccamento al territorio, costruzione di sinergie e partnership con le realtà locali: sono i punti fermi che ci guidano e che ci spingono a tenere alta la fiducia di chi sceglie Commerciale Gas & Luce come partner per l’energia.

Name: Clevergy GmbH & CO. KG
Company description: Die Clevergy GmbH & Co. KG ist ein deutscher Stromanbieter und ein Tochterunternehmen der Kommunalversorger Stadtwerke Nürnberg und Hannover mit Sitz in Leipzig. Diese sind Teil der Thüga-Gruppe, Deutschlands größtem Zusammenschluss regionaler Energieversorger. Clevergy wurde zu Beginn des Jahres 2008 gegründet und begann am 1. Mai 2008 mit der Stromlieferung in folgenden 13 deutschen Städten: Trier, Saarbrücken, Mainz, Pforzheim, Leipzig, Mannheim, Bremen, Bremerhaven, Solingen, Koblenz, Cottbus, Stuttgart und Hamburg. Seit Januar 2009 ist die deutschlandweite Belieferung vollzogen.  Ab 2010 soll Gas vertrieben werden. Blog: www.meta-strom.de

Name: Belgian Eco Energy
Company description: BEE is a Belgian Energy company 🐝  BEE supplies sustainable energy to companies from its own production units and its network of locally generated sustainable energy. BEE provides an ecologic and economic answer to the energy transition:  By investing in local renewable energy installations, BEE helps its customers to achieve sustainability and cost saving goals.” At BEE you can: ⚡️ Buy sustainable, locally produced energy from BEE  ⚡️ Generate your own energy and rely on full support from our professionals.  ⚡️ Regain control over your energy supply and at the same time make substantial savings on your energy bills.

Name: Techem España
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Alcorcón, 16 Avenida Del Tranvía, 28925
Company description: Techem, su aliado en materia de ahorro energético En calidad de uno de los proveedores líder de servicios energéticos a nivel internacional, Techem está en primera línea para la gestión del ahorro de energía y agua. Nuestra labor es aliviar a los propietarios de viviendas, comunidades de vecinos y a los administradores de fincas de los elevados gastos que supone el consumo de calefacción y agua. De esta forma se ahorra energía y se salvaguardan los recursos, cosa que, a largo plazo, repercute positivamente en todos nosotros y en el medio ambiente. Nuestros productos y soluciones evitan alrededor de 8.5 millones de toneladas de CO2 cada año. Gracias a dispositivos de medición de fabricación propia, como repartidores de costes de calefacción y contadores de agua y energía, calculamos el consumo real de la calefacción, agua o frío por vivienda. Estos datos se utilizan para asignar individualmente las facturas de energía de las viviendas. A través de esta distribución, contribuimos a reducir los costes operativos de nuestros clientes. Diseñamos servicios inteligentes y prácticos: los administradores de fincas pueden asignar y facturar los gastos de forma rápida y eficiente. Nuestro objetivo es reducir sus cargas de trabajo, simplificar sus intervenciones y ahorrarles tiempo a la vez que los propietarios pagan solo por su consumo real. La compañía fue fundada en 1952, ahora está activa en 20 países con alrededor de 3.500 empleados y presta servicios en más de  11.5  millones de viviendas. Techem está representada en todo el mundo por unas 130 sucursales. Puede encontrar más información sobre nuestros servicios y la compañía en https://www.techem.es/

Name: ESOLEO
Company description: ESOLEO jest częścią Grupy Polsat Plus. Czerpiemy z 25 lat doświadczenia GPP, realizując własną wizję zrównoważonego biznesu opartego o najnowocześniejsze technologie i wiedzę ekspertów, pasjonatów energii odnawialnej. Oferujemy kompleksowe rozwiązania fotowoltaiczne dla domu i biznesu. W ofercie posiadamy także magazyny energii i pompy ciepła. Bierzemy udział w zielonej transformacji największego, polskiego prywatnego dostawcy energii elektrycznej ZE PAK (pod względem zainstalowanej mocy wytwórczej i ilości wyprodukowanej energii elektrycznej), budując największe w Polsce farmy fotowoltaiczne. W październiku 2021 r. konsorcjum ESOLEO i PAK Serwis ukończyło budowę jednej z największych w Polsce farmy fotowoltaicznej o mocy 70 MW. Farma powstała na 110 ha rekultywowanych terenów kopalni węgla brunatnego Adamów, a do jej budowy spółka zaangażowała m.in. byłych górników, którzy zostali przekwalifikowani i realizują kolejne projekty związane z energią odnawialną. Prąd, który popłynął do odbiorców będzie w stanie zasilić energią elektryczną miasto o wielkości ok. 70 tys. mieszkańców.

Name: Repowered
Company description: Wij zijn Repowered. Smart energy providers. Wij geven eigenaren van grootzakelijke energieaansluitingen inzicht in en grip op hun energie. Daarvoor stemmen we vraag en aanbod op elkaar af. We geven deskundig advies én verzorgen de slimme sturing van assets. Zo haal je het maximale rendement uit je energiesysteem: je krijgt toegang tot energiemarkten, verduurzaamt je bedrijf én versterkt je bedrijfscontinuïteit. Daarmee maak je jouw energie future-proof.

Name: Ihomer
Company description: 𝐢𝐡𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐫: 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐲 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐬𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐬𝐨𝐟𝐭𝐰𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐄𝐕 𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐠𝐲 𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭. With deep roots in e-mobility, we help grid operators, energy suppliers, large-scale consumers, CPOs, and OEMs take control of electrification. As a strategic partner, we’re involved from day one—helping you set the right course. We build scalable solutions for charging, energy management, and monitoring. From charge management platforms and real-time consumption insights to smart control systems that tackle grid congestion. Always tailored to your existing environment and built to scale. In short: we bring clarity, control, and scalability. So you can keep moving forward—even when the grid says “no."

Name: Atriensis
Company description: Atriensis is a leading partner in the sustainability of social housing stock in the Netherlands, dedicated to creating affordable, sustainable, healthy, and safe homes for residents. The company offers a comprehensive range of services, including process facilitation, technical support, resident participation, and communication, with a strong emphasis on the energy transition and making neighborhoods gas-free. Atriensis collaborates closely with housing corporations, municipalities, and other stakeholders to develop integrated solutions that meet the current and future needs of tenants. With a team of experts, including senior advisors and directors with extensive experience in the social rental sector, Atriensis aims to share knowledge and implement innovative strategies that accelerate the energy transition.  The firm is headquartered in Amstelveen, with additional offices in Eindhoven and Zwolle, focusing on building support and collaboration among all parties involved to successfully achieve sustainability goals. Atriensis is committed to assisting housing corporations in navigating the complexities of the National Performance Agreements (NPA) for 2025-2035, addressing financial constraints and operational challenges. By fostering local partnerships with energy providers and other stakeholders, Atriensis enhances the effectiveness of sustainability initiatives. The company's mission is to ensure affordable and comfortable housing for all, while its vision encompasses a more sustainable future for the social housing sector. Through its innovative approach and extensive expertise, Atriensis is dedicated to driving the transition towards a greener and more sustainable housing landscape.

Name: Ignitis Group Polska
Company description: Ignitis Polska Sp. z o.o. istnieje od 2017 roku. Spółka  prowadzi obrót energią elektryczną oraz gazem ziemnym.  Spółka jest spółką zależną Ignitis UAB - największego dostawcy energii na Litwie. Ignitis Polska Sp. z o.o. jest częścią państwowej Grupy Ignitis.

Name: UMETER.NL
Company description: READ OUT SMART METER  REMOTELY Daily read out - quarter data for electricity and hourly data for gas. For free you get a clear insight into your energy consumption. It does not matter which energy supplier you are using. Only smart meter is needed. TOTAL CONTROL Sign up to umeter.nl and get the full picture of the consumption and production the electricity in your house. We provide the great analytic tools so you will be able to control your budget per 15 minutes! The only thing you need is a smart meter that could be installed by your grid operator. Request it by phone or online. DASHBOARD UMeter provides you clear graphs and wizzards to give you complete understanding of your energy system. You are able to set up saving targets, compare gas and electricity consumption with your neighbours be in touch with limits of consumption and know how much money you save current month! GAS AND ELECTRICITY REPORTS The most user-friendly reports and dashboards that could help you to move forward business and save private spendings on energy. COMPARE CONSUMPTION WITH NEIGHBOURS We provide a knowladge base that allows users to compare their electricity and gas consumption with their neighbours or buildings similar to their own.

Name: GoEnergy Luce & Gas
HQ Location: Italy, Calabria, Corigliano Calabro, 12 Via Alcide De Gasperi, 87064
Company description: goEnergy è una società che opera nel mercato libero della vendita di Luce e Gas, proponendosi come fornitore di energia per la famiglia, l’impresa e gli enti pubblici. goEnergy è specializzata in fonti rinnovabili ed offre ai propri clienti servizi di consulenza per interventi di efficientamento energetico di edifici industriali e civili.

Name: PRIMAGAS Energie GmbH
Company description: About PRIMAGAS Off-grid energy supply with conventional and biogenic liquid gas. PRIMAGAS offers private and commercial customers off-grid energy solutions throughout Germany. For more than 75 years the company, headquartered in Krefeld, has been a reliable and service-oriented partner for all those who rely on environmentally friendly energy. The TÜV NORD certified PRIMAGAS with the seal "Tested service and installation quality" as the first liquid gas supplier in Germany high quality in three areas: service, customer satisfaction and installation standards. Around 250 employees in the office and in the field as well as well over 3.000 sales partners for technical customer service provide advice on all questions relating to off-grid gas supply. In addition to liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) and liquefied natural gas (LNG), PRIMAGAS is the only German energy supplier to offer its customers biogenic LPG (Futuria propane). Liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) Liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) provides the benefits of gas supply wherever there is no connection to the natural gas grid. It is stored in above-ground or buried tanks directly on site. LPG emits around 15 percent less CO2 than heating oil. Hardly any soot or particulate matter is released during combustion. The energy source evaporates without residue and can even be used in nature and water conservation areas without any restrictions. Liquid gas can be used with all modern heating technologies such as gas condensing boiler technology or combined heat and power units (CHP) and can be combined with renewable energies. Biogenic liquefied petroleum gas: Futuria Propane Since 2018, PRIMAGAS has been the first German supplier to market the renewable energy carrier biogenic liquefied petroleum gas (Futuria Propane). Since November 1, 2020, the GEG recognizes biogenic LPG as a sustainable energy alternative for new buildings.C More information at www.primagas.de and www.futuria-propan.de .

Name: Thüga Aktiengesellschaft
Company description: Thüga Aktiengesellschaft is a leading entity in the German energy and water supply sector, operating as a minority shareholder in a network of approximately 100 municipal utilities and regional suppliers. Headquartered in Munich, the company is dedicated to enhancing the future of municipal energy and water supply through collaborative partnerships, with a strong focus on sustainability and the energy transition. Thüga's mission is to support its partners in achieving competitive advantages by providing extensive consulting and services, particularly in the areas of decarbonization, digitalization, and the development of innovative energy solutions.  With a workforce of around 240 employees, Thüga plays a crucial role in facilitating knowledge exchange and project development within its cooperative network, primarily serving local municipalities and their residents. The company is committed to driving the energy transition forward, particularly through initiatives like hydrogen projects and municipal heat planning, thereby contributing to climate neutrality and sustainable energy practices. Thüga aims to enhance its market position by actively seizing opportunities while managing associated risks, ensuring sustainable growth and profitability. The clientele of Thüga includes various municipal utilities and energy providers across Germany, with a focus on fostering regional cooperation and innovation in energy supply and management. The company collaborates with a diverse range of stakeholders to improve energy efficiency and support the transition to renewable energy sources, aligning with broader environmental goals. Through strategic investments and partnerships, Thüga seeks to strengthen its portfolio and contribute to the stability and security of energy supply in the regions it serves. Overall, Thüga Aktiengesellschaft is committed to providing reliable and sustainable energy solutions while ensuring compliance with the highest technical and security standards, leading the transition towards a more sustainable energy future.

Name: Doosan Lentjes
Company description: Doosan Lentjes is a leading engineering company specializing in waste-to-energy (WtE) solutions and air quality control systems. With nearly a century of experience, the company is committed to driving innovation in the energy sector while prioritizing sustainability and environmental responsibility. Doosan Lentjes aims to provide efficient and reliable technologies that help clients manage waste and reduce emissions, thereby contributing to a cleaner and greener future. The company serves a diverse clientele, including municipalities, industrial clients, and energy providers, and collaborates with various partners to enhance its technological offerings. Through its mission to foster continuous learning and development among its employees, Doosan Lentjes strives to create a collaborative and dynamic work environment that empowers its workforce to excel.

Name: Power Heat
Company description: Power Heat Piping South AB is a leading provider of piping solutions based in Malmö, Sweden, specializing in energy and oil infrastructure. The company is dedicated to delivering high-quality services and products that meet the evolving needs of its clients in the energy sector. With a mission to enhance efficiency and sustainability in piping systems, Power Heat Piping South AB aims to be a trusted partner for businesses seeking reliable and innovative solutions. The company serves a diverse clientele, including industrial facilities and energy providers, and collaborates with various partners to ensure optimal service delivery. Through its commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction, Power Heat Piping South AB is positioned to play a pivotal role in the future of energy infrastructure.

Name: Gopower Gas & Light
HQ Location: Italy, Tuscany, Livorno, 45 Via Aurelio Lampredi, 57121
Company description: L'Azienda Gopower, società toscana accreditata presso il MSE, opera nel settore energetico nazionale come fornitore di gas naturale ed energia elettrica, coprendo tutte le fasi della filiera, dall'approvvigionamento all'erogazione ai clienti finali. Le forniture energetiche sono integrate da una vasta gamma di prestazioni e di servizi accessori, passando dalla consulenza alla formazione, dall'assistenza tecnica alla fornitura di prodotti tecnologici, coprendo sia gli ambiti ambientali, sia quelli dell'efficientamento energetico (incluse le diagnosi energetiche e la fornitura di prodotti Led). Partner diretta di Confesercenti nel nuovo servizio "Sportello Energia" dedicato a tutti gli associati, Gopower è riconosciuta come interlocutore ideale per un'ampia varietà di attori, tra cui: Aziende private; Associazioni di Categoria; Privati cittadini. Mission e Vision La mission di Gopower è favorire la diffusione della cultura energetica e delle idee innovative attraverso prodotti, attività e servizi che soddisfino i bisogni del più ampio pubblico possibile.  Nella propria vision, Gopower introduce una proposta di eticità nel mercato energetico, quale marchio imprescindibile del proprio modo di operare, per far convivere l'innovazione, la tutela dell'ambiente e la qualità dei servizi e prodotti erogati. Per informazioni: Telefono 0586 41 06 41  e-mail info@gopower.it

Name: Litesko
Company description: Esame inovatyvus šilumos energijos tiekėjas, kuris nuo 1998 metų rūpinasi tūkstančių Lietuvos gyventojų, verslo įmonių ir viešojo sektoriaus įstaigų šiluma bei karštu vandeniu.  „Litesko“ apjungia penkis miestus Lietuvoje, kuriems tiekia šilumos energiją bei karštą vandenį, tai Marijampolė, Telšiai, Druskininkai, Biržai ir Kelmė. Būdami tarptautinės „Veolia“ grupės, ekologinės transformacijos lyderės, dalimi, siekiame ne tik aprūpinti klientus energija, bet ir kurti tvaresnę ateitį.🌱   Naudojame vietinius atsinaujinančius išteklius, modernizuojame infrastruktūrą ir nuolat diegiame pažangias technologijas, mažinančias poveikį aplinkai. Mūsų misija – patikimas šilumos ir karšto vandens tiekimas ir atsakingo požiūrio į aplinkos apsaugą skatinimas 🌱 ✉️ Susisiekite su mumis: info@litesko.lt

Name: Ulefos Sverige
Company description: Ulefos AB, tidigare VATEK, VA Teknik AB är ett försäljningsbolag som marknadsför produkter för kommunala vattendistributionsnät samt vatten- och avloppsreningsverk. Vi har varit verksamma sedan 1981. Vi utvecklar och arbetar med funktionella  produkter av hög kvalitet för VA-, VVS- och  Gasmarknaden. Produktprogrammet består av gatugods, ventiler, rörkopplingar, brand- och spolposter, reparationsmuffar, elektrosvetsning,PE-rördelar, avvattningsrännor och rörproppar. Vi har sedan 2007 har vi sålt gatugods från gjuterierna Ulefos Jernverk och Niemisen Valimo, och sedan 2010 är vi en del av Cappelen Group. Cappelen Group består idag av säljbolagen Ulefos som finns representerade i Sverige, Norge, Danmark och Finland, samt gjuterierna Ulefos Jernverk och Niemisen Valimo. Vi är bland de ledande och mest etablerade leverantörerna i Sverige och vi samarbetar med välkända tillverkare i Europa. Tillsammans har vi lång erfarenhet och kunskap om marknaden och våra kunder är till största delen kommuner, energileverantörer samt entreprenadföretag över hela Sverige. Vi distribuerar våra produkter genom de ledande rörgrossisterna som även lagerhåller produkterna för att hålla en hög tillgänglighet och servicegrad ända ut till slutkunden. Huvudkontoret för Ulefos AB ligger i Stenkullen, 2 mil öster om Göteborg samt lokala säljkontor i Karlskoga, Bålsta och Kristianstad.

Name: R&R Systems BV
Company description: Innovatieve systemen voor een duurzame en schone wereld. Met de energiebesparende systemen van R&R ben je klaar voor de toekomst. We bekijken hoe we de beschikbare energie op alle plekken zo goed mogelijk kunnen inzetten met behulp van innovatieve oplossingen. Daardoor ben je minder afhankelijk van energieleveranciers en blijft de energie beschikbaar en betaalbaar. Ons streven: nul op de meter.

Name: DiniTech GmbH
HQ Location: Austria, Styria, Sankt Stefan Im Rosental
Company description: DiniTech GmbH is a leading provider of innovative charging solutions, specializing in the development and production of both hardware and software for electric vehicle charging systems. As a TIER 1 supplier, the company collaborates with OEMs, energy providers, and automotive clubs, delivering high-quality products that meet the highest industry standards. DiniTech's flagship product, NRGkick, is distinguished by its unique safety features, including temperature monitoring across all phase pins, significantly reducing risks associated with electric vehicle charging. The company is committed to continuous improvement and innovation, backed by rigorous internal quality management and external audits. With a strong focus on sustainability and reliability, DiniTech aims to lead the market in providing safe and efficient charging solutions tailored to the needs of its diverse clientele.

Name: Clevergy
Company description: Our mission is to help you optimize your energy consumption. In other words: Make you save money while you save the planet  To accomplish this, we partner with key energy providers and enable their customers with powerful tools to reduce their consumption  Our algorithms & AI as a Service systems enables us to provide: - Visibility: Understand where your consumption comes from and compare with similar homes - Advisory: Receive personalized tips and reduce your consumption with our prediction systems. Integrate smart devices that fit with your specific needs  - Control: Program your own devices from one single App. Leverage our algorithms to find the optimum efficiency formula

Name: JB Energija d.o.o.
Company description: We are a company whose main industry field is energetics. We emphasize how important of an impact renewable energy sources have. Our job is engineering and planning power stations, advising our customers about the proper usage of power stations, and also building power stations. With solar power stations, we can become self-sufficient and reduce electricity bills.

Name: Impeak
Company description: Impeak GmbH is a leading company in direct sales, with over 15 years of successful experience in the energy and telecommunications sectors. The company specializes in providing personalized consulting and individual support to both private and business clients, particularly in energy supply and fiber optic expansion. Impeak's mission is to deliver an optimal shopping experience by assisting customers in finding the best products and tariffs, while simultaneously focusing on a sustainable and long-term growth strategy. The target market includes end consumers as well as businesses, and the company's partnerships with renowned energy suppliers and telecommunications providers enhance its market position.  Impeak is dedicated to the development of its employees, offering numerous career opportunities, including pathways for career changers, to build a dynamic and successful sales team. The company emphasizes personal development and sustainable growth, providing comprehensive support and training for sales professionals both on-site and through an innovative online learning platform. Employees benefit from a structured career path that allows them to progress from sales roles to leadership positions, supported by a dedicated training portal tailored to the needs of direct sales.  Impeak values fair compensation, combining a reliable base salary with performance-based incentives, empowering employees to set their own goals and achieve desired earnings. The company is committed to maintaining a trustworthy reputation in the direct sales industry, collaborating with well-known brands to offer high-quality products and a robust sales infrastructure. Through team-building events and recognition programs, Impeak celebrates collective successes and fosters a supportive work environment, ensuring that both employees and clients thrive.

Name: EP NL
Company description: EP NL is a reliable and ambitious player that takes a leading role in shaping the future of the energy landscape in the Netherlands. With this as our foundation, EP NL consists of three pillars: ‘flexible generation’, ‘trading and asset optimization’ and ‘energy solutions for business’.  We play a significant role in the Dutch energy transition by providing reliable electricity supply through our current gas-fired power plants. They provide efficient and adaptable solutions to meet the increasing demand for flexible and renewable energy in the electricity supply. Due to global movements in commodity prices and the energy transition, energy markets are highly dynamic and volatile. We continuously respond to this situation. We hedge and optimize our portfolio on commodity markets and provide various tailor made products to the electricity grid. We trade in: electricity, natural gas and carbon emissions. In addition to our important role in electricity production and trading, we are expanding our influence as an established energy supplier.  We focus on supplying electricity and gas to small and large businesses, offering standard and customized contracts. EP NL is part of the EPH-group, a leading European energy-company, acting in 9 countries and part of EP Power Europe.  For more info go to our website at epnl.nl

Name: Stadtwerke Neuwied GmbH
Company description: Stadtwerke Neuwied GmbH is an energy supplier settled in the Rhineland. In everything we do, we believe that we can secure the quality of life in our city and the region, help shape it and improve it every day with our work. A secure supply of energy, ecologically responsible action, caring service and social commitment are not just a duty, but a matter of the heart. Stadtwerke Neuwied are 100 percent owned by the city of Neuwied. That obliges. We act entrepreneurially so that energy as a product remains affordable. We act responsibly by supporting associations, voluntary work and all those who are committed to the best of our ability.  Ecology and economy are inextricably linked. We are actively shaping the energy and transport transition in Neuwied as our contribution to environmental and climate protection. We create solutions for the efficient and resource-saving use of energy. We create new, environmentally friendly mobility offers in the city. We connect people by expanding the fiber optic network. By taking the lead and investing our profits in the infrastructure, we strengthen Neuwied as an attractive and sustainable place to live and do business on the Middle Rhine.

Name: Metzum
Company description: (Vi søker flere nye kollegaer) Vi er et teknologiselskap med hovedkontor i Vestlandets hovedstad, Bergen. Vi lanserte Metzum i januar 2020 som en felles teknologisatsing mellom Fjordkraft AS og Rieber & Søn AS. Ideen sprang ut fra et ønske om å utvikle løsninger for effektivisering av forretningsprosesser for aktører i kraftmarkedet. Metzum leverer fremtidsrettet programvare til strømleverandører, nettselskapet og andre kundegrupper med behov for effektive løsninger for avregning og fakturering. Våre løsninger er modulære og bygget på moderne prinsipper; tilrettelagt for effektiv drift i skyen. Dette gir løsninger som skalerer og effektiviserer driften for våre kunder.

Name: Motiva Valtion Kestävän Kehityksen Yhtiö
Company description: Motiva Valtion Kestävän Kehityksen Yhtiö is a Finnish company dedicated to promoting energy efficiency and sustainable development across various sectors. The company specializes in conducting energy audits for large enterprises, helping them identify energy consumption patterns and opportunities for savings, in compliance with national energy efficiency laws. Motiva's mission is to facilitate investments and actions that enhance energy use efficiency, ensuring that clients can achieve significant cost savings through guaranteed energy savings. The company collaborates with energy service companies (ESCOs), contractors, and energy providers to deliver comprehensive energy efficiency solutions tailored to the needs of its clients, which include both public and private sector organizations. By focusing on innovative energy-saving measures and supporting the transition to renewable energy, Motiva aims to contribute to a more sustainable future for Finland.

Name: ESCO Slovensko
Company description: ESCO Slovensko provides comprehensive and innovative energy services in the field of effective, economical, and environmentally friendly solutions for companies, municipalities, and state organizations. We bring together the international experience of CEZ, the leading energy company in the region of central Europe, with the experience and background of SPP, the largest energy supplier in Slovakia.  We provide wide range of services tailored to your needs and we cover the whole process from design and planning to construction and operation of energy installations. Our services: -	Energy performance contracting (EPC) -	Heating, ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC) -	Photovoltaics and energy accumulation solutions -	Energy consulting and management -	Technical facility management  -	Local distribution grids for energy -	Electrical substations and other distribution installations

Name: Hydro Energy
Company description: Hydro Energy is a forward-thinking company based in Radom, Poland, specializing in providing sustainable energy solutions. The company focuses on renewable energy sources, offering services such as photovoltaic installations, heat pump systems, and infrastructure for electric vehicles. Hydro Energy's mission is to support clients in their pursuit of zero emissions, cost savings, and modernity, which translates into environmental protection and energy independence. The company caters to a diverse clientele, including both individual consumers and businesses across Poland, delivering comprehensive services that help reduce energy bills and enhance property value. As a certified service partner, Hydro Energy emphasizes quality and experience, enabling the effective implementation of innovative solutions in ecology and renewable energy. The company's vision is to create a "green team" that collaborates with clients to foster positive changes in environmental awareness within society. By promoting eco-friendly transportation and energy efficiency, Hydro Energy aims to contribute to a greener future. The company partners with various stakeholders in the renewable energy sector to provide tailored solutions that meet the needs of urban environments, empowering communities through accessible and sustainable energy options. With a commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction, Hydro Energy is dedicated to leading the transition to a cleaner, more sustainable energy landscape.

Name: Our New Energy
Company description: Our New Energy is an independent international energy services house. We support the pan-European energy industry by leveraging our market knowledge and capabilities to provide tailor-made services targeting renewable producers, conventional asset owners, industrial off-takers and energy suppliers. Our team brings a wealth of experience having been an active market participant since the inception of market parity PPAs. We assist by connecting generators, consumers and investors, simplifying and demystifying market conditions that present a constant array of challenges for new and established players in the energy industry. We currently work with investment funds, private equity firms, independent power producers (IPPs), renewable developers, asset managers, energy traders, energy service companies (ESCOs), mid-size utilities and energy-intensive industries.  Today, we have mandates in several countries giving us a unique insight into current market opportunities, developments and trends which coupled with our extensive industry knowledge allows us to deliver market-leading innovative and bespoke solutions to our clients in a timely and cost-effective manner.

Name: InWega
Company description: Siamo il consulente energetico che stai cercando. Fatti aiutare nella scelta del miglior fornitore di gas e luce, ottimizza i consumi e la spesa in bolletta, riqualifica i profili energetici del tuo edificio. Siamo un gruppo di oltre 40 persone, composto da tecnici commerciali, ingegneri, installatori, periti tecnici e geometri. Un efficiente back office supporta tutte le richieste interne e dei clienti, ed un'organizzazione integrata permette l'analisi di numerosi aspetti legati all'efficienza energetica e allo studio di soluzioni dedicate e mirate all'ottenimento dei risultati economici e degli obiettivi dei clienti.

Name: EXTOR Energy Zrt.
Company description: Our parent company, EXTOR Electronics Kft. was founded in 2000, is a 100% Hungarian-owned company, which deals with power supply tasks, mainly with the sale, service and project implementation of uninterruptible power supply equipment and systems. Using its unique experience in power supply, EXTOR Kft. has extended its activities to the utilization of solar energy, the complete design and construction of solar power plants, the supply, installation and operation of related equipment.  Our major references include the full construction of a 2×46.6 MW solar power plant on MVM Émász, the full construction of a 41.92 MW solar power plant on OPUS Titász, and the full construction of a 5 MW and a 15 MW solar power plant on E.ON electricity supplier area. We have also completed the construction of a 46.7 MW solar power plant on OPUS Titász area, including the connection to the 132/22 kV public grid. In the projects listed, our tasks included permitting, designing, selecting suppliers, technical supervision of the project, on-site coordination of construction. In addition, the commissioning of the completed solar power plants and substations and their handover to continuous operation.   Our company, EXTOR Energy Zrt., started its operations in 2022 to take forward the renewable energy tasks and operational expertise as a wholly owned subsidiary of EXTOR Kft., with the full support of our parent company.

Name: Dispatch
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Holland, Amsterdam, 27 Piet Heinkade, 1019 br
Company description: Maintaining a balanced energy grid is key for a successful energy transition. Dispatch aids the further and quicker transition towards intermittent renewable energy sources through battery energy storage systems. We finance, develop and manage utility-scale stationary and stand-alone battery energy storage systems directly connected to the high voltage grid. We lease the battery projects to energy suppliers on a long-term basis.

Name: Goldgas Deutschland
Company description: Die goldgas GmbH ist ein Energieversorger, der deutschlandweit Strom- und Gastarife anbietet. Der Fokus liegt dabei auf der Vermarktung und der sicheren Belieferung von Ökostrom, Biogas und Erdgas. goldgas versorgt seine Kundinnen und Kunden nicht nur sicher und langfristig mit Energie, sondern auch mit innovativen und bedarfsorientierten Services. goldgas-Tarife sind fair und transparent gestaltet und bieten ein sehr gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis. Dafür stehen auch zahlreiche Auszeichnungen, die goldgas regelmäßig u. a. für Kundenservice, Nachhaltigkeit und Fairness erhalten hat. Gegründet als erster freier Energieanbieter in Deutschland, beliefert goldgas seine Kunden seit 2009 mit Energie. Das Unternehmen hat seinen Firmensitz Sitz in Eschborn bei Frankfurt und ist als ein 100-prozentiges Tochterunternehmen der VNG AG Mitglied des EnBW-Konzerns.  goldgas GmbH Rahmstraße 1 65760 Eschborn Weitere Informationen zum Datenschutz finden Sie hier: https://www.goldgas.de/datenschutz

Name: Meißener Stadtwerke GmbH
Company description: Wir bei den Meißener Stadtwerken (MSW) sorgen schon seit über 30 Jahren als lokaler Energieanbieter für die sichere Versorgung mit Strom, Erdgas, Wasser und Fernwärme im Stadtgebiet Meißen. Wir stehen unseren Kunden jederzeit zuverlässig mit Fachexpertise zur Seite.  Die sich ständig wandelnden Herausforderungen der Energiebranche bewältigen wir mit zielgerichteten Aufgaben und spannenden Projekten – jetzt und in Zukunft.

Name: ECOENERGIA Srl
Company description: Fornitore di energia elettrica del mercato libero. La nostra è un’azienda in continua evoluzione, sempre attenta alle esigenze di risparmio e di trasparenza nei confronti del cliente. Ma soprattutto sempre attenta e sensibile alle sfide poste dal grande tema del cambiamento climatico.

Name: Go Power
HQ Location: Ireland, Leinster, Dublin, Blanchardstown Corporate Park
Company description: Go Power is an exclusively commercial energy supplier, committed to lower prices and dedicated customer support.  With offices in Dublin, Belfast, Cork, Derry, Mayo, Monaghan and Head Office in Cookstown Tyrone,  as well as Account Managers across the country we are on hand to supply industrial, corporate and business electricity customers across Ireland. What Go Power can offer: •	Competitive energy prices •	Hassle-free switching process •	Certified 100% renewable energy •	Dedicated account manager  •	Online portal to monitor energy use •	Lowest possible standing charge Who we supply: Large energy users Commercial real estate SMEs Agri sector Contact us: Tel: 01 866 5612 (Rep of Ireland) Tel: 028 867 60600 (UK)

Name: EEBUS Initiative E.V.
HQ Location: Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Köln, 183 Deutz-mülheimer Straße, 51063
Company description: The EEBus Initiative e.V. is developing a communication standard for energy-relevant devices and systems with its member companies and associations. The standard covers the entire chain from the grid operator and energy supplier to the end device (such as heat pumps, charging stations, battery storage systems, PV inverters and white goods). As a registered, non-profit organisation, the Initiative ensures that the results from its working groups and the scientific and research findings are transferred to the EEBUS specification and subsequently to the national (DKE, FNN) and international (CEN, Cenelec, ETSI, IEC and ISO) committees.

Name: Eurobearings
Company description: EUROBEARINGS Srl (EUB) is your reliable partner for Design, Manufacture and Rehabilitation of WHITE METAL sliding Guide, Thrust and Combined BEARINGS. Complete with instrumentations, sealing systems and housings EUB manufacturing provides customized production solutions on a wide range of applications: - BEARINGS, SEALING SYSTEMS AND COMPLETE PEDESTALS FOR STEAM , GAS AND HYDRO TURBINES - BEARINGS, SEALING SYSTEMS AND COMPLETE PEDESTALS FOR TURBO AND HYDRO GENERATORS - BEARINGS FOR GEAR BOXES - BEARINGS FOR NAVY DIESEL ENGINES - BEARINGS FOR ROLLING MILLS - BEARINGS FOR CEMENT MILLS EUB flexible production can adapt to specific customer design needs on different application’s fields, following any kind of specification, while applying the latest technologies in machining coating and controlling. EUB is proud partner of the Key Players in Power Generation such as SIEMENS, ALSTOM, VOITH HYDRO, VG POWER, ANSALDO ENERGIA, MAPNA TURBINES,, etc. On the Rehabilitation activities, EUB is supplying services to most of the European Energy Providers and has Frame Agreement signed with ENEL and EDF.

Name: Teutoburger Energie Netzwerk EG
Company description: The Teutoburger Energie Netzwerk eG ia local energy supplier based in Hagen am Teutoburger Wald.

Name: Busitec GmbH
Company description: Since 1998 we offer innovative and individual solutions in the field of Enterprise Content Management (ECM), Records Management and Cloud Solutions. Our integrative solutions are the basis for higher efficiency in your company. Our Consultants and designers know that each company has individual structures, processes and requirements so they consequently count on communication, coordination and individuality; but in the end only one thing counts: our customer´s satisfaction. We provide – analysis of the situation and concept – technological advice – selection of software – project realization – system integration – coaching How our products and services help you – Process and workflow automation lead to more efficiency – Records Management System results in time saving, more flexibility and better performance – Portal solutions lead to more transparency and team collaboration – Business intelligence solutions deliver important numbers and interrelations – Business Applications give you more flexible, faster processes and higher usability To develop solutions for your company, we collaborate with renowned partners, such as ELO Digital Office, Microsoft Corporation, ecspand and Nintex. Our customers work within sectors such as healthcare, industry or energy provider.

Name: Albert Maier GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Baden-württemberg, Weil Der Stadt, 19 Industriestr., 71263
Company description: Welcome to Albert Maier GmbH! For more than 60 years we have been a leading manufacturer of transformer accessories for oil-immersed transformers. With our long year experience and through consistent development of our products we are a reliable partner for transformer manufacturer and energy suppliers worldwide With our long year experience and through consistent development of our products we are a reliable partner for transformer manufacturer and energy suppliers worldwide. What’s the formula for success that made us become a reliable and long-term business partner for many leading transformer manufacturing companies of today from the time when we established business in 1949? It’s our partners trust in our expertise and in the continuous performance of our network. We have been establishing subsidiaries and partner companies in order to deliver best service and to be able to live up to the rising standards of high quality transformer components. This close cooperation with our partners allows us to meet our own demands in terms of quality and costs of pre-products and finished components within our supply chain. Nowadays we manufacture with more than 100 employees in Germany and Turkey butterfly valves and dehydrating breathers for power transformers as well as oil level indicators, moisture holders, pressure relief devices, and tank components for oil-immersed distribution transformers.

Name: ALI Energy Advisor
HQ Location: Italy, Veneto, Portogruaro, 13 Piazza Della Repubblica, 30026
Company description: Non siamo un fornitore di energia e gas. Siamo consulenti specializzati che ti aiutano a ottimizzare i costi, navigare il mercato e adottare soluzioni sostenibili. Affianchiamo reseller, PMI e grandi aziende con strategie su misura per un’energia efficiente e vantaggiosa. Sei un reseller? Ti supportiamo in ogni fase operativa, dalla costituzione della società agli adempimenti normativi, fino alla fatturazione in outsourcing e all’assistenza legale. Ti aiutiamo a costruire un business solido, con gli strumenti giusti per crescere. Sei una PMI? Grazie ai gruppi d’acquisto, accedi a condizioni riservate alle grandi aziende. Hai sempre un referente dedicato per la gestione della tua utenza, la risoluzione dei problemi e l’ottimizzazione dei costi energetici, senza vincoli e con piena trasparenza. Sei una grande azienda? Ti aiutiamo a pianificare gli acquisti, negoziare forniture su misura, ottimizzare la gestione dell’energia e dell'efficenza energetica. I nostri tecnici EGE certificati ti guidano nell’adozione di strategie ESG e nella riduzione dell’impatto ambientale. Offriamo: ✔ Analisi di mercato per prevedere le fluttuazioni e ottimizzare i costi ✔ Accesso a incentivi per energivori, energy release e interrompibilità gas ✔ Strategie di efficientamento energetico e gestione di TEE e PPA on-site ✔ Supporto nella certificazione ISO 50001 e nella realizzazione di impianti EsCo Perché scegliere ALI Energy Advisor? 🔹 Strategie personalizzate per ogni tipo di impresa 🔹 Condizioni vantaggiose e monitoraggio costante del mercato 🔹 Sostenibilità ed ESG, con esperti certificati per migliorare il tuo impatto ambientale 🔹 Un team di specialisti sempre al tuo fianco, senza vincoli contrattuali Con ALI Energy Advisor, trasformi l’energia in un vantaggio strategico.

Name: UBIMET Group
Company description: WEATHER MATTERS: We have revolutionized meteorology and weather forecasting using leading-edge, proprietary AI technology to provide businesses with weather insights for more safety and efficiency, customized to their needs and systems.  Scientists and IT specialists process 100 TB of data daily and distill them into highly precise, relevant and scalable weather insights as a reliable decision base. As global innovation leader, leading insurers and energy providers, infrastructure operators, media and sports companies to champions of the new economy rely on us. UBIMET was founded by a chemist and a meteorologist more than 15 years ago. Today,  additionally to locations in Austria, Germany, Switzerland, USA and Australia, nowcast GmbH and MeteoNews AG are part of the UBIMET Group. Our portals UWZ-Unwetterzentrale, wetter.tv and the Morecast app complete our portfolio. We are hiring. Find out more: https://www.ubimet.com/en/company/career/ For more information visit www.ubimet.com/en

Name: Greenchoice
Company description: Greenchoice is een energieleverancier die zich richt op het MKB en biedt oplossingen voor zowel klein- als grootzakelijke klanten. Het bedrijf stelt zijn klanten in staat om hun energiezaken eenvoudig te beheren via het online platform "Mijn Greenchoice Zakelijk", waar zij hun verbruik, termijnbedragen en facturen kunnen inzien en aanpassen. Greenchoice streeft ernaar een betrouwbare partner te zijn voor slimme energiekeuzes, met een focus op transparantie en klantgerichtheid. De missie van het bedrijf is om ondernemers te ondersteunen in hun energiebehoeften, terwijl ze ook rekening houden met de opbouw van energietarieven en overheidsheffingen. Hun klantenbestand omvat een breed scala aan bedrijven, van kleine ondernemingen tot grote zakelijke klanten, die allemaal profiteren van de flexibele en toegankelijke diensten die Greenchoice biedt.

Name: VBS - Vacuum Barrier Systems
Company description: Vacuum Barrier Systems offers a unique range of vacuum jacketed lines and cryogenic transfer systems. From short flexible hoses to large plant distribution systems, from “do it yourself” mail order sales to complete turnkey systems, Vacuum Barrier Systems will provide the most cost effective solution. With over 30 years of experience serving various industries, strong links with installation companies and gas suppliers in different countries and technical support from world leaders in their fields, we can handle both small and large projects. In addition to transfer lines, we also specialize in specific cryogenic process equipment such as LN2 dosing systems for the food and beverage industry, LN2 circulation systems for MBE (Molecular Beam Epitaxy), spraying systems for halogen lights manufacturing... Our activities cover all European countries, the Middle East, Africa, Russia and India. In many geographical areas, our presence is supported locally by trained professionals.

Name: Lumenaza GmbH
Company description: Lumenaza GmbH is a Berlin-based company that develops solutions driving the digitalization of the energy transition, enabling both individuals and businesses to benefit from the generation and use of green energy.  Through its SaaS platform, Lumenaza has been transforming companies into aggregators of electricity and electricity suppliers since 2013.  Within its end-to-end solutions for aggregation of electricity and electricity tariffs under a white-label model, Lumenaza takes on areas such as billing, balancing group management, business process outsourcing (BPO), CRM, flexibility, customer communication, customer portals, market communication (MaKo), product catalog, redispatch, electricity trading, and virtual power plants.  Lumenaza’s SaaS platform serves customers including energy suppliers/municipal utilities, aggregators of electricity/electricity traders, and new market players/OEMs, such as Octopus Energy, EnBW, E.ON, Hycube, SonneNext, and Regionah Energie.  Under the LUOX Energy brand, Lumenaza GmbH offers end customers a green, dynamic electricity tariff that allows them to purchase electricity at exchange prices and, through biogas, wind, or solar installations, to feed their green electricity into the market at exchange prices via aggregation of electricity.

Name: Electra Italia SpA
Company description: Electra Italia is a young, dynamic company and part of a leading Swiss energy group. This enables us to access and exploit not only group experience but also cutting-edge technological and organizational resources. Set up in 2000 following the deregulation of the electricity supply market in Italy, Electra Italia immediately began to make its mark as an energy provider for industry thanks to its key attributes: - effective energy procurement, - bespoke product development, - extensive market presence, - efficient customer services, - clear, transparent billing.    The companies that have chosen Electra Italia as their energy requirement provider bear witness to our market standing: a partnership characterised by purpose-specific solutions and prompt responses to every kind of customer request. With its customers, Electra Italia forges a proactive relationship to ensure the most efficient management of their energy needs.  Choosing Electra Italia means choosing: - innovative products, - flexible supply contracts with various purchasing options, - direct access to markets,  -active portfolio management with fewer risks and greater opportunities.

Name: OCTA+
Company description: OCTA+ est un fournisseur d'énergie belge indépendant, spécialisé dans la fourniture d'électricité, de gaz naturel, de mazout de chauffage et de solutions de recharge pour flottes professionnelles. Avec plus de 130 ans d'expertise, la société se positionne comme un partenaire de confiance pour les grandes entreprises, offrant des solutions énergétiques sur mesure qui visent à optimiser les coûts et à soutenir la transition énergétique. La mission d'OCTA+ est de simplifier la gestion énergétique de ses clients tout en garantissant des tarifs compétitifs et un service client réactif, avec un interlocuteur dédié pour chaque entreprise. En s'engageant à fournir des solutions durables et innovantes, OCTA+ s'adresse à un large éventail de clients, allant des particuliers aux PME et grandes entreprises, tout en collaborant avec des partenaires pour renforcer son offre de services.

Name: Lux Consulting
Company description: Bij Lux Consulting zijn we gepassioneerd over het versnellen van de energietransitie. Daarom ondersteunen we organisaties die actief werken aan een duurzame toekomst. Onze focus ligt op netbeheerders, energieleveranciers, waterpartijen, gemeenten, waterschappen en andere instellingen die deze uitdaging aangaan.  We hebben een breed scala aan professionele Business Consultants met specialismen als projectmanagement, change management, procesoptimalisatie, management consulting, IT en nog veel meer. Lux Consulting biedt dagelijkse kennis en deskundige ondersteuning om jouw energieambities te verwezenlijken én om alles voor jouw organisatie zo in te richten om dat haalbaar te maken. Onze consultants zijn uw partners in verandering, met een diepgaand begrip van de uitdagingen en mogelijkheden die de energietransitie met zich meebrengt. Door middel van kennis, kunde en praktische oplossingen helpen we u bij het realiseren van uw duurzame doelen en het creëren van een betere wereld voor de toekomstige generaties. 💡🌍   Wij onderscheiden ons door een hands-on approach, onze consultants denken én werken vanaf het eerste moment  met u mee.  Ontdek hoe Lux Consulting u kan begeleiden op uw weg naar een groenere en veerkrachtigere toekomst. Bezoek onze website https://luxconsulting.nl/ voor meer informatie en neem vandaag nog contact met ons op voor een inspirerend gesprek over uw projecten. Samen kunnen we de kracht van verandering ontketenen! 🚀  Ons doel is organisaties bekrachtigen voor een duurzame toekomst 🌱🔌   #EnergieTransitie #SustainableSolutions #PartnersInChange #GreatPlaceToWork

Name: VNS - Versorgungsnetz Service GmbH
Company description: Our goal - green electricity for everyone We at supply network service have been working since 2018 to ensure that the energy transition succeeds. Our team, which currently consists of 12 colleagues, sees itself as a link between the transmission system operators and land owners. As a service provider, we would like to use experience, expertise and the right strategy to help ensure that the dialogue between the transmission system operator and the owner of the space is successful. Making the projects successful ensures that everyone can use electricity from renewable energies and that the grid expansion is successful. We are only satisfied when all parties are satisfied. Our portfolio If a transmission network operator or energy supplier would like to use a certain area for his project, we determine the owner and check the legal situation of the area. In order to secure the areas, we are looking to talk to the owners. We clarify land registry matters and provide answers to any questions that may arise. Because trust can only be created with openness and reliability. Even if it gets difficult, we are there for you as an intermediary to find a solution. Our objection management is trained to consider all arguments and still come to a result that satisfies all parties. Your data and contracts are in safe hands with us. Seriousness and discretion come first. The right acquisition of the land is our goal in order to realize the network expansion.

Name: TEAM CONSULT G.P.E. GmbH
Company description: Since 1987 TEAM CONSULT offers independent expertise for international and local energy suppliers as an external consulting firm focused on energy economics in the context of German and European energy business. TEAM CONSULT is the leading specialty consultancy for questions regarding the German gas industry.  Various projects for global and local energy suppliers and team members with a wide range of practical experience in the field of energy economics and related technologies make TEAM CONSULT a highly experienced expert. Market trends in the international energy business arising from day-to-day business are identified at an early stage. The range of products and services offered by TEAM CONSULT comprises: Evaluation of long-term gas supply contracts, negotiation support of price revisions, attendance of arbitration procedures, support for investment decisions (e.g. power plant projects), gas storage strategies, development of market entry strategies, support for design of regulatory guidelines and evaluation of practicability and consequences.

Name: AirHub
Company description: AirHub is the all-in-one drone operations platform for mission-critical environments. We support public safety agencies, security providers, and operators of critical infrastructure with secure and compliant drone operations - from planning to execution, fleet management, and real-time situational awareness. 𝐅𝐨𝐫 𝐏𝐮𝐛𝐥𝐢𝐜 𝐒𝐚𝐟𝐞𝐭𝐲 Used by police, fire brigades, and emergency services, AirHub enables Drone as First Responder (DFR) programs, real-time coordination during incidents, and automated flight logging for transparency and accountability. 𝐅𝐨𝐫 𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 Private security companies, border- and coast guards, customs, and perimeter protection teams use AirHub to monitor high-risk areas, integrate drone feeds into command centers, and ensure secure data workflows in line with national regulations. 𝐅𝐨𝐫 𝐂𝐫𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐈𝐧𝐟𝐫𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐮𝐜𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞 Energy providers, ports, rail networks, and telecom operators rely on AirHub for routine inspections, incident response, and surveillance operations. Our platform supports centralized fleet oversight and data-driven insights - while ensuring regulatory compliance.

Name: RIVACON GmbH
