Company description: RIVACON advises banks, asset manager and energy providers on challenging topics in data analysis, quantitative modelling, risk management, the design of valuation and data architectures, as well as in the application of predictive analytics and machine learning. We have distinctive technical know-how in the development of integrated valuation platforms and have our own powerful valuation library.

Name: Renerco Plan Consult
Company description: renerco plan consult offers comprehensive technical consulting and planning services for renewable energies. Our clients are international investment companies, banks and institutional investors. Also energy suppliers, cooperatives, municipal companies and private individuals. So far we have been involved in wind projects with a capacity of more than 4 GW and solar projects of more than 2 GW. We would be happy to support you with your projects in your home market Germany and other European countries.

Name: Bonergie
Company description: Uw totaalenergieadviseur Bonergie helpt particulieren en ondernemers met het verlagen van energiekosten. Met creatieve oplossingen voor elke energie-uitdaging zoekt Bonergie samen met haar netwerk van sparringpartners naar het maximaliseren van energie-efficiëntie. De Aanpak Sinds 2011 ondersteunen wij klanten als energie-intermediair, Eind 2012 werd Bonergie (samenvoeging Bonestroo Energie) opgericht. Na enkele uitdagingen waaronder een faillissement van een energieleverancier, hebben we in 2014 een groei ingezet door onze inzet en doorzettingsvermogen. Persoonlijke benadering en aandacht voor de unieke behoeften van de klanten maken Bonergie bijzonder. Afhankelijk van uw vraag nemen we een coördinerende, regisserende of ondersteunende rol aan, waarbij het belang van de klant altijd voorop staat. Missie en Diensten Onze missie is om klanten te helpen hun energiekosten te verlagen door: 1.	Onafhankelijk en gratis advies voor lagere energietarieven. 2.	Verminderen van energieverbruik. 3.	Maximaliseren van eigen energieopwekking met een hoog rendement. Bonergie biedt energiemaatwerkadviezen en beschikt over expertise als EPA-W adviseur. Met opleidingen in Nederland en Duitsland op het gebied van zonnepanelen en batterijopslag maakt Bonergie een unieke partner voor energieoplossingen. Recente Ontwikkelingen Na de sluiting van de Energiewinkel in 2019 ligt de focus op kostenbesparing. In 2023 ontstond een sterke vraag naar zonnepanelen, maar ontstonden ook personeelstekort en  leveringsproblemen. Door ontwikkelingen in 2024 rondom saldering is de vraag naar batterijen en energiecontracten zonder terugleverkosten gestegen. Bonergie, als Register Solar-Specialist en Storage-Specialist, helpt bij de keuze voor de juiste batterij, zonnepanelen en energiecontract. Bij Bonergie staat kwaliteit voorop. Problemen zien wij als uitdagingen. Ontdek de kracht van Bonergie en maak uw energiegebruik efficiënter en duurzamer! Neem contact met ons op voor uw duurzame toekomst!

Name: Heinz Lackmann GmbH & Co. KG
Company description: Heinz Lackmann GmbH & Co. KG is a leading provider of innovative solutions in the energy sector, specializing in the development of intelligent metering systems and tailored software solutions for the German energy market. As a family-owned business, Lackmann combines tradition with modern technology to drive the digital transformation of the energy transition. The company's mission is to facilitate the integration of renewable energy sources and enhance efficiency through advanced metering and data management solutions. Their diverse clientele includes municipal utilities and energy providers, with a focus on delivering comprehensive services such as installation, quality management, and logistics. With a commitment to sustainability and innovation, Lackmann aims to support its partners in navigating the complexities of the evolving energy landscape.

Name: A2-retail
HQ Location: Italy, Apulia, Foggia, 5 Via De Leonardis, 71121
Company description: A2Retail | Soluzioni di Affiliazione per Gas e Luce con A2A Benvenuti su A2Retail, il punto di riferimento per chi desidera diventare affiliato di uno dei maggiori fornitori di energia in Italia: A2A. Offriamo un programma di affiliazione semplice, efficace e senza costi iniziali, ideato per garantire guadagni elevati e supporto continuo ai nostri partner

Name: FEBEG
Company description: FEBEG is the Federation of Belgian Electricity and Gas Companies You can also follow us on Facebook => fb.com/febeg.be , and on Twitter => @_febeg.be FEBEG is the employers’ association for: - Electricity generators - Traders and shippers of electricity and gas - Electricity and gas suppliers - Suppliers of energy services - Laboratories in the electricity and gas sector FEBEG has currently 32 members which jointly represent approximately 7.895 employees and a turnover of 16,4 billion EUR FEBEG Mission Statement - Urging for a sustainable, secure and competitive energy supply by means of: - A free and well-functioning electricity and gas market - A stable, favorable and non-discriminating legal, regulatory and economic framework - Defending members’ common interests in economic, fiscal, social, legal and environmental matters - Studying and encouraging all regulatory, scientific and industrial developments and innovation in the sector - Improving quality and security of data transfer and transactions in the sector

Name: BouwEnergie.nl
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Brabant, Oosterhout, 21 Markt, 4901 ep
Company description: BouwEnergie is, als energieleverancier, speciaal opgezet om aannemers, bouwbedrijven, projectontwikkelaars en wooncorporaties te ontzorgen. Middels ons platform kunnen de gebruikers eenvoudig bouw- en definitieve aansluitingen van een energiecontract voorzien, raadplegen of bewerken en deze overzichtelijk, per project, bewaren. Projecten en de aansluitingen kunnen worden voorzien van een eigen kenmerk wat het overzicht en gemak nog groter maakt. BouwEnergie zorgt voor bewustwording van de verbruiken op de bouwplaats en levert enkel 100% groene Nederlandse Zon en Windenergie op de aangemelde aansluitingen. Dit draagt bij aan een optimale CO2 prestatie.  We factureren de werkelijke verbruiken achteraf per maand en werken dus niet met onoverzichtelijke voorschot nota's.  Kortom veel gemak, overzicht en lage verbruikstarieven!

Name: EFriends Energy
Company description: eFRIENDS energy is the first utility offering energy sharing, buying, selling and trading between prosumers in real-time. As an energy supplier in Austria, eFRIENDS energy targets all households, whether owning their own solar power, or living in an apartment or a building, where solar power is not possible. With eFRIENDS energy, customer have the possibility to use real green energy - mostly solar power - from their personal eFRIENDS network.

Name: EasyEnergy.com
Company description: Volgens easyEnergy kan de Nederlandse energiemarkt een stuk eerlijker en transparanter. De meeste energieleveranciers rekenen een stevige winstopslag bovenop de prijs die zijzelf betalen. Met dat geld, jouw geld dus eigenlijk, financieren ze hun personeel, dure panden en niet te vergeten, de voetbal sponsordeals. Daarnaast werken veel energieleveranciers met lokkertjes: welkomstbonussen en kortingen die je moeten overhalen om te switchen. Al die kosten moeten natuurlijk wel terugverdiend worden, en jij mag raden wie de rekening daarvoor betaalt. Bij easyEnergy vinden we dat onrechtvaardig en doen we het anders. Revolutionair anders. Net als alle andere energieleveranciers koopt easyEnergy haar energie in op de Europese Gas- en Elektriciteitsmarkt. Het grote verschil is echter dat easyEnergy deze beursprijs één-op-één doorgeeft aan al haar klanten, zonder verborgen kosten, nu én in de toekomst. We rekenen een minieme opslag, en we brengen, net zoals elke energieleverancier, vaste leveringskosten in rekening. Bij ons is dat per maand maar 5,00 euro voor groene stroom en 5,00 euro voor gas. Hier doen wij alles voor. Of je nu een nieuwe klant bent of al een tijdje bij ons bent, dat maakt voor ons niet uit. Hierdoor levert easyEnergy blijvend voordelige energie in Nederland.

Name: Evapolar
HQ Location: Cyprus, Nicosia, Nicosia, 235 Strovolou Ave. Strovolos, 2048
Company description: The leading company in the evaporative cooling industry — Evapolar was founded in 2015. What first began as a new step towards private cooling solutions, has turned into the top-rank provider of personal air treatment solutions and B2B cooling systems.  Our unprecedented Innovative evaBREEZE® technology is what makes our products unique. We engineered mineral nano-membrane fibers which provide an efficient evaporative cooling effect. By harnessing the power of water, we turn it into a perfect cooling temperature.  No scary energy bills, no waste, no freon liquids, no bulky items. We offer very user-friendly smart air-cooling gadgets that humidify, purify and cool down at the same time.  Stylish, minimalist, and any-design-friendly, Evapolar air treatment devices perfectly fit within any décor, from your white Scandinavian living room to a hygge camping van.  With warehouses in Australia, Hong-Kong, Germany, and the United States, we offer worldwide shipping and premium customer support.  Today Evapolar devices are cooling the living spaces of people in 92 countries. Our team members are in different corners of the world. We have mastered the art of Zoom, learned each other’s time zones, and found a common language in work chats. What we share is a great desire to make the world a better (and a more chill) place.  Exceptional team, dream product, one-of-a-kind technology, an eco-friendly approach, and making the world cooler, one Evapolar at a time.

Name: Citygrid Powered By Seneco
Company description: Seneco A/S, part of the Fagerhult group, is a Danish company that develops and sells innovative control and monitoring products for street lighting. We analyse traffic on the road to enable light only where relevant - delivering energy savings up to 92 %.  Reducing cities' energy bills and carbon footprint.

Name: ASM Energia S.p.A.
Company description: Asm Energia S.p.A. è il principale fornitore di gas e luce del territorio lomellino ma operativo in tutta italia. Negli anni ha rafforzato la presenza sul mercato, da un lato con la continua attenzione alle esigenze del contesto territoriale, dall’altro con la qualità e l’efficienza di un servizio altamente competitivo. La presenza sul tessuto locale rappresenta uno dei valori imprescindibili, che si sviluppa attraverso una serie di sportelli informativi nei diversi comuni lomellini.

Name: Grange Solar
Company description: Grange Solar are part of Grange Roofing, we specialise in commercial and industrial solar Photovoltaic (PV) systems to assist building owners and tenants in reducing their electricity reliance from the electricity network and to reduce their electricity bills. Grange Roofing are an Irish owned company who employ around 100 staff, we have over 20 years operating history and commercial roofing experience in Ireland.  We design and install turnkey commercial/industrial solar PV systems. Solar PV is a proven way of generating electricity on site to offset a percentage of the electricity demand. Our solar PV system design will be site specific to best meet the needs of your business.

Name: AMT Gastroguss
Company description: AMT Gastroguss is a producer of high-quality cookware and gastronorms, currently known in over 100 countries.  As one of the few companies on the market, we design and manufacture all the in our own factory. Over 100 years of tradition, cooperation with proffesional chefs from around the world and knowledge of the catering industry allow us to offer solutions that meet the needs of all culinary artists: both professional chefs and cooking enthusiasts. *Proffesional’s choice* AMT cookware is created in cooperation with chefs from around the world. They are the first to test it.  By choosing AMT, you gain access to proven, high-quality products recommended by professionals. *Healthy cooking without oil* Our cookware are designed in a way to facilitate the preparation of balanced meals with high nutritional value. Thanks to the non-stick Lotan coating you can fry without any fat or oil! *Energy efficient cookware – Save time, energy and money* AMT cookware is made of special hand-casted aluminum, which is an excellent thermal conductor. A thick base (8-9 mm) ensures even heat distribution, both on the bottom and the sides. Thanks to that it heats up faster and maintains temperature even after the heat is switched off. Results? Food preparation takes up to 40% less time and saves up to 20% energy, which means lower energy bills for you! *Prestigious awards* Over the years, AMT has won numerous awards and got certificates that confirm the highest quality of our products. We are the only cookware manufacturer recommended by the World Association of Chefs Societies (WACS) and Verband Der Köche Deutschland (VKD), the largest German association of chefs. It’s they, who gave us the title: „The World's Best Pan”. We’ve been awarded the A-Class Safety and Energy Efficiency Certificate from TÜV Rheinland, won in the "Best Value for Money" category of Focus Money, gained the „excellent” result in ETM Testmagazin... and many more.

Name: Green Power Ibiza
HQ Location: Spain, Balearic Islands, Abad, 1 Avenida De Isidor Macabich De Sant Rafael De Sa Creu, 07816
Company description: Residential & Commercial Solar Solutions: Leading residential rooftop solar installation company. Green Power is a pioneer name in the renewable energy design, installation and service of solar water pumps and controllers, on-grid inverters and solar rooftop panels. It offers solar rooftop panels for homes at affordable prices. We promote for investment in solar rooftop panel solutions which will simultaneously lead to higher savings. Solar and renewable energy is the way of the future. From saving money, or reducing your carbon footprint, or both, Solar energy is all set to transform our lives. Commercial: Responsible businesses are looking for sustainable alternatives, to reduce their energy costs. Green Power is a trusted name for Solar Panel Installation for Commercial Buildings, governments, schools, farms, businesses and Industries. The high-efficient commercial solar panels for Solar energy is proven to give good return on investment best proven durability and industry-best power & product warranty Don’t let high electricity bills drain your business finances. Commercial solar is a huge development, and the optimum option to enjoy all essential components of comfort at workplace, without having to worry about unexpected bill amounts Unaffected by the fluctuating utility rates, your business remains immune from volatility, with a system to keep generating energy constantly. At Green Power, our approach brings together proven solar expertise with value-added services, to help businesses to increase their return on investment, reduce energy costs effectively, and parallelly hit their sustainability goals. With our Solar solutions, you Save money, Improve Resilience and Cut Emissions- gaining more stability over your energy costs and control over your business. Contact Green Power +34 651 720 792 for commercial solar panel cost.

Name: House 2 Home Retrofit Ltd.
Company description: House 2 Home has been Ireland's leading 'one stop shop' for energy upgrades since 2013. We aim to provide our customers with warmer homes and cheaper energy bills. As a business we are also extremely passionate about the environment and renewable electricity.

Name: ACCIONAPLUG
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 1 Avenida De La Gran Vía De Hortaleza, 28033
Company description: This 50-50 joint-venture (JV) between ACCIONA Energía and Plug Power, integrates in a unique platform the expertise and know-how of two leaders in their respective markets, and provides tailored made and competitive solutions along the whole value chain of the green hydrogen business. The JV develops, operates, and maintains green hydrogen projects, serving the growing demand in the Iberian Peninsula.  The goal is to reach a 20% market share of the green hydrogen business in Spain and Portugal by 2030, which entails an initially planned investment of over €2 billion. Plug Power will serve as the preferred electrolyzer technology supplier and ACCIONA Energía as the preferred clean electricity provider, positioning Spain and Portugal as global leading green hydrogen hubs.  The JV is capable of providing integrated solutions, serving the entire value chain of green hydrogen: from renewable power development, construction and operation to clean hydrogen generation, liquefaction, distribution and dispensing.

Name: Huurcheck Dé All In One Dossier Verwerking. AI-automation Alle Tools Laagste Prijs Zelf Testen?
Company description: 👉 Huurcheck & Verkoopcheck in het kort:  Ons geheim: gebruikersgemak, modulair, systeem past zich aan op jouw behoefte. 🔑Risicoloos en uniform werken. In een paar klikken naar de sleuteloverdracht.  🔦Onze belangrijkste tools voor verhuur en verkoop gratis testen:  www.huurcheck.nl/demo Je krijgt je inlog direct in je mailbox. ——————————————————————- In 2012 zagen we het gebrek aan enerzijds kwaliteit en anderzijds innovatie in de vastgoedbranche en hebben een systeem ontwikkeld, door verschillende tools te bouwen en deze naadloos met elkaar te integreren.  Via API ook implementatie in jouw systeem mogelijk. Dossieropbouw is nog nooit zo snel geweest!  —————————————————————— Onze producten: ✅ DIGITAALWONINGDOSSIER  De klanten-login in de branding van jouw kantoor (AVG-proof).  De klant verzamelt de benodigde gegevens en zet deze klaar voor jou. Incl DigiD koppeling met de Belastingdienst; ✅ CREDITCHECKS Digitale checks (Wwft-proof) die met 1 klik alle informatie geven over je klant. Dat kan! Met 1 klik stuur je alle data door. 🏠 OOK VOOR VERKOOP & AANKOOP  Alles geschikt voor verkoop/aankoop. Wwft en AVG proof. Name: Payshop
Company description: Com mais de 20 anos a Payshop, empresa do Grupo CTT, é uma Instituição de Pagamentos líder de mercado no meio de pagamento presencial. No seu vasto portfólio de produtos encontram-se o pagamento de faturas (de eletricidade, água, gás, telecomunicações e outras), carregamento de telemóveis, pagamento de portagens, pagamento de impostos, carregamento de títulos de transporte, carregamento de cartões pré-pagos, venda de vouchers, pagamento de compras online. E mais recentemente uma wallet escolar e uma gateway de pagamentos. O serviço de pagamentos Payshop está disponível numa rede nacional de cerca de 7.000 Pontos de Pagamento CTT / Payshop, dos quais  mais de 5.000 Agentes Payshop. A Rede de Agentes Payshop é constituída por estabelecimentos comerciais de proximidade, como papelarias, tabacarias, quiosques, supermercados e outros, escolhidos de acordo com rigorosos critérios de segurança e qualidade de serviço. A maior rede de pagamentos presenciais do País.

Name: INAC Process AB
Company description: INAC Process AB, operating under the brand Actemium Energy AI, is a specialist business unit based in Gothenburg that focuses on virtual development and AI-based solutions within the energy sector. The company is dedicated to optimizing energy processes through innovative technologies, aiming to enhance efficiency and sustainability in energy management. With a mission to provide cutting-edge support and solutions, INAC Process AB serves a diverse clientele, including energy providers and industrial partners, who seek to leverage advanced technologies for improved operational performance. The team, led by Business Unit Manager Marie Kurtin and Head of Innovation and Technology Léon Löwered, is committed to driving innovation and fostering collaboration in the energy landscape.

Name: Green Energy Lab
Company description: Green Energy Lab, a research initiative for sustainable energy solutions, is part of the Austrian innovation campaign “Vorzeigeregion Energie” (“Showcase Region Energy”) of the Climate and Energy Fund. Green Energy Lab is Austria’s largest innovation laboratory for green energy. It comprises the test markets Vienna, Lower Austria, Burgenland, and Styria—all in all about five million end customers. More than 100 partners from research, industry, and the public sector join the energy suppliers of these four Austrian provinces, namely “Wien Energie” in Vienna, “EVN” in Lower Austria, “Energie Burgenland” in Burgenland, and “Energie Steiermark” in Styria, in order to develop customer- and demand-oriented, scalable solutions all the way from prototypes to marketability. Thanks to Green Energy Lab’s direct access to the core market of energy suppliers, new developments can immediately be tested on a large scale. By 2025, Green Energy Lab will have invested 100 million euros in innovative projects.

Name: Blue Oak
Company description: Blue Oak is een bedrijvencentrum met gloednieuwe kantoren in Deerlijk. Blue Oak biedt onderdak aan vier bedrijven met mobiliteit, IT en energie als rode draad; Addax Motors (constructeur van 100% elektrische bestelwagens), Cogenius (IT-diensten aan de energiesector), Elexys (energieleverancier) en European Commodities (ARP voor de energiesector).

Name: Rijnen BV
Company description: Familiebedrijf Rijnen BV is groot geworden als kolenhandelaar. Inmiddels kun je bij Rijnen terecht voor een ruim assortiment aan producten. Als totale energieleverancier kunnen zowel particulieren als bedrijven terecht voor houtpellets, haardhout, kolen, smeermiddelen, reinigingsproducten, gas en oliën.  Kwaliteit en service staan hoog in het vaandel. Makkelijk online bestellen en een dagelijkse levering door heel Nederland en Vlaamstalig België.

Name: Utility Brokers
HQ Location: Ireland, Munster, Cork, 4400 Airport Business Park
Company description: Utility Brokers is now operating under the name of our parent company Horizon Energy Group. We will no longer contact any of our customers or friends using utilitybrokers.ie email addresses. If you receive an email from anyone using a utilitybrokers.ie email address, please do not respond and forward the email to info@heg,ie.   If you would like more information on how we can help you measure, monitor and reduce your energy bills, please see our website www.heg.ie or contact us here on LinkedIn.

Name: Holland Energie
Company description: Uw energiezaken moeten gewoon goed geregeld zijn, zonder gedoe. Als ondernemer heeft u behoefte aan scherpe tarieven en goede ondersteuning op energiegebied. Bij ons krijgt u naast persoonlijke service ook gratis waardevolle adviezen over kostenbesparingen. Wij zijn dus niet alleen uw energieleverancier maar vooral ook uw partner in energie. Geen vraag is te gek of wij hebben het antwoord voor u. Nu en in de toekomst. De voordelen op een rij: - Scherpe tarieven en standaard CO2 neutrale stroom - Vast contactpersoon en direct contact via 036 nummer zonder wachttijden - Verbruiks Manager: zelf inzicht in uw stroom- en gasverbruik  - Holland Energie Prijzen App; inzicht in de uur- en dagprijzen - Standaard controle op o.a. energiebelastingteruggave - Gratis advies over laadpalen en laadoplossingen - Gratis advies over zonnepanelen en gratis aanvraag SDE subsidie - Gratis advies over energie opslag door batterijen en accu's Holland Energie helpt u met het optimaliseren van uw energiehuishouding zodat u de vruchten daarvan plukt. Alles onder 1 dak met 1 vast aanspreekpunt.  Lees meer op https://holland-energie.nl/   Wilt u meer informatie of een vrijblijvende afspraak maken? Bel dan direct met 036- 2044 000

Name: CARE International Insurance Broker
Company description: CARE is an Italian international insurance broker, with headquarters in the business district of Milanofiori (close to Milan) and many correspondents in key-countries across the globe. Furthermore, in the Swiss city of Lugano, CARE Suisse follows directly and independently the market of the Confederation. Our company is a professional and rigorous intermediary between firms and the most prestigious specialised insurance companies; as such, we know and understand the clients' specific needs, we find and negotiate for them the most appropriate cover and we accompany them for the whole duration of the insurance contract, providing support in case of damages up until reimbursement. International freight forwarders and worldwide logistics operators are our main clients in the Marine field, but we can count as our customers food industries, pharmaceutical companies and energy providers as well. In the professionalism of our specialists and consultants these firms find the necessary peace of mind which allow them to concentrate on the development of their business, without having to worry about the consequences resulting from the risks of their activities.  We are, in short, a leading specialist insurance broker. Lloyd's Correspondent. Proud member of the unisonSteadfast network. Official insurance broker of the MarcoPoloLine network.  Supporter of the International Propeller Club - Port of Mantua Creator of Optimist, the first marine insurance product for sustainable logistics Winner of a Special Mention of the 2021 Logistico dell'Anno Prize for Optimist Learn more about our services and skills on our website: www.brokercare.com Iscritto al RUI (Registro Unico Intermediari) B 000014352 Broker assicurativo soggetto alla vigilanza dell'IVASS

Name: Equal Energy NL
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Brabant, Eindhoven, 8c Jan Van Hooffstraat, 5611
Company description: Bij Equal Energy geloven we niet alleen in een groene en duurzame wereld. Als jong en gedreven intermediair tussen energieleverancier en klant herkennen we ook de waarde van het collectief. Want samen bereik je simpelweg méér dan alleen. Het is een filosofie die de basis vormt van alles wat we doen. Transparant, betrokken en met een flinke portie lef. Maar ook uiterst laagdrempelig en scherp gefocust op de toekomst. Kortom, nét even anders! Equal Energy bedient haar klanten op maat met groene stroom en gas. Duurzame en kwalitatief hoogwaardige producten die het comfort binnen de woon- en werkomgeving vergroten. En ervoor zorgen dat je zonder omkijken dóór kunt. Altijd en overal. We leveren energie aan individuele afnemers. Particulier én zakelijk. Maar liever nog trekken we de kaders breder. En gaan we een hechte en langdurige samenwerking aan met klantencollectieven, zoals verenigingen, bedrijven, sportclubs en vriendengroepen. Want door groene energie gezamenlijk in te kopen, is de winst het hoogst. Voor het milieu én de portemonnee van onze klanten… Toekomstgericht investeren in het milieu heeft bij Equal Energy de hoogste prioriteit. Daar handelen we dan ook naar. Primair via de verkoop van groene stroom en gas. Maar ook door een stevige korting te geven op een breed scala van duurzame producten, zoals zonnepanelen, spouwmuurisolatie en laadpalen. Last but not least gaat 10 procent van onze winst naar duurzame initiatieven. Zo dragen we structureel bij aan het behoud van het regenwoud in het Amazone-gebied. Do you care about the future? Go Equal! Met Equal Energy ga je ook op energiegebied op weg naar een duurzamere toekomst. Heb jij de guts om als ambassadeur samen met ons de wereld een beetje beter te maken? Kom dan in actie en meld je vereniging, bedrijf, sportclub of vriendengroep vandaag nog aan!

Name: Tenten Solar Bodegraven
Company description: Wilt u minder betalen aan uw energieleverancier en tegelijkertijd duurzaam stroom opwekken? Kies dan voor zonnepanelen van Tenten Solar in Bodegraven. Wij leveren de beste zonnepanelen en u profiteert van lagere energiekosten. Zonnepanelen zijn de beste manier voor het duurzaam opwekken van stroom, dus zeer milieuvriendelijk. Perfect voor een duurzame toekomst en ook fijn voor uw portemonnee. *Gecertificeerd bedrijf *De beste zonnepanelen, met garantie *Montage volledig volgens de richtlijnen *Al meer dan 2000 tevreden klanten gingen u voor *U betaalt direct minder aan energie

Name: Fitters
Company description: Distributienetwerken voor gassen en perslucht van uitzonderlijk hoog niveau, compressoren en industriële ventilatie, dat is wat Fitters u biedt. Daarbij gaan we voor absolute kwaliteit. Alleen de allerbeste en veiligste oplossingen vinden wij goed genoeg voor onze klanten. En dat waarderen zij. Niet voor niets weten gasleveranciers, ziekenhuizen, laboratoria, bouwbedrijven, metaalverwerkers en tal van andere bedrijven uit geheel België ons te vinden. Al sinds 1957. We hebben ons destijds in rap tempo ontwikkeld tot een gerespecteerde speler in de markt van ‘Lassen en Gassen’ en we groeien elk jaar verder. Onze focus blijft daarbij nadrukkelijk gericht op kwaliteit.

Name: Multisun Sp. Z O.o. S.k.
Company description: Electric energy is a very important asset, essential to everyday life, which we have to buy. Surely you wondering how to optimize the process to reduce costs and protect against inevitable increases.  MULTISUN LTD helps lower energy bills by offering professional service at the whole process related to both the design stage, as well as executive photovoltaic systems. With the professional help you will be able to produce cheap, clean electricity for its needs. We specialize in solutions in the field of renewable energy and offer their services to consumers, businesses, farmers and local government units. We will also help to find the right financing for you tailored to the needs and opportunities.

Name: Econetique
Company description: In 2009, The FXB Group, a well known and established organisation in the Furniture Industry, embarked on a mission to not only streamline their operations to be more eco-friendly, but to offer their expertise to other organisations. Econetique was born. Today, Econetique is one of the premier renewable energy providers in the Maltese Islands. Having built a reputation on our engineering expertise, we truly offer complete solutions for any project, residential or Industrial. At Econetique, we work around the concept of the Triple E formula: Ecology: our projects are tailor made to blend into the environment, minimising any negative impact to the environment and sustaining the natural ecological balance. Engineering: We believe in the best. All our projects are researched, designed and managed by qualified Engineers, each specialised in their respective fields. This ensures a high quality of installations, to ensure you get the maximum benefit of our products. Excellence: We employ the best people, we source the best products and we design your solutions around YOU.  Our aim is to provide excellent value for money solutions at all times. With offices in Malta and Gozo, we offer services all over the island. Whether a small domestic installation, or a major commercial project, Econetique will make your Idea a Reality.

Name: CarPay-Diem
Company description: CarPay-Diem is a mobile fueling and digital marketing platform, allowing any mobile app or connected vehicle to activate any fuel pump or charging pole independently of the brand; the equipment being operated or the method of payment. CarPay-Diem integrates into and enriches any existing mobile application from either fuel retailers or any other mobile app or connected vehicle willing to upgrade their offering with a pay@pump function combined with an innovative direct marketing approach. CarPay-Diem is a neutral platform, that can act as the single point of access (mobile payment hub) to sites from multiple retailer brands. The CarPay-Diem marketing platform allows retailers and  energy providers to rethink digital marketing in a groundbreaking new way. CarPay-Diem lets retailers engage with drivers directly. Off- or-on-site, at the moment of purchase to take direct action on shaping the customer's journey and ultimately generate more sales on their sites.

Name: RenewHydro
Company description: RenewHydro is a pioneering company dedicated to advancing sustainable energy solutions through innovative hydroelectric technologies. With a mission to harness the power of water to create clean, renewable energy, RenewHydro aims to contribute to a greener future while promoting environmental stewardship. The company collaborates with a diverse range of clients, including government agencies, private sector companies, and environmental organizations, to implement hydroelectric projects that meet the growing demand for sustainable energy. RenewHydro's vision is to lead the transition to renewable energy sources, ensuring that communities benefit from reliable and eco-friendly power solutions.  By focusing on cutting-edge technology and sustainable practices, RenewHydro is positioned to play a crucial role in the global shift towards renewable energy. The company targets markets that prioritize sustainability, including municipalities, energy providers, and industrial sectors seeking to transition to renewable energy sources. Through strategic partnerships with industry leaders and stakeholders, RenewHydro is committed to creating a sustainable future while addressing the increasing demand for renewable energy solutions.  In addition to its focus on energy efficiency and ecological balance, RenewHydro emphasizes community engagement and education regarding the importance of renewable resources. The company envisions a world where hydroelectric power is a primary source of energy, reducing reliance on fossil fuels and minimizing environmental impact. Through its commitment to research and development, RenewHydro seeks to lead the way in hydroelectric energy solutions, fostering a more sustainable future for generations to come.

Name: Luce E Gas Italia
Company description: Luce e Gas Italia SpA è fornitore di energia elettrica e gas naturale, operante nel mercato libero. Con un team giovane e dinamico ed un servizio sempre più innovativo, Luce e Gas Italia rappresenta un nuovo approccio alla fornitura di elettricità e gas. Offerte semplici, basate su analisi di mercato accurate, che mirano a ridurre o eliminare del tutto le maggiorazioni sul prezzo all'ingrosso. Convenzioni riservate ai clienti su servizi per salute, benessere e tempo libero. Luce e Gas Italia SpA Sede Legale: Corso Svizzera, 185/BIS - 10149 Torino

Name: Energibolaget I Sverige AB
Company description: Energibolaget i Sverige AB was founded 1999 and is one of the leading electricity retail companies in the Nordic region without own grid. We have a global perspective in the deregulated electricity retail market and are active in Sweden, Finland and Spain. We want to sell electricity to a competitive price and make it as easy as possible for customers to switch electricity supplier. We will set an example and always follow established procedures and look to the best of the customers'. To make this possible we will be more efficient, smarter and faster. The arguments the customers have to buy, is our arguments to sell. The electricity we sell might be like everyone else's, but our values are not. This is our principle: Peter's principle: No hassle. No Gimmicks. No YAP. Just electricty. Simple as that.

Name: Å Strøm
Company description: Å Strøm is a Norwegian electricity supplier. LOS and Glitre Energi Strøm have become Å Strøm. We're still the same people, just a few more, with even more knowledge and power to provide you with the best solutions for the future.

Name: PureSolar
HQ Location: Netherlands, North Brabant, Valkenswaard, 9b John F. Kennedylaan, 5555
Company description: PureSolar is een bedrijf gespecialiseerd in enkel en alleen zonnepaneelsystemen. Dit is een bewuste keuze. Hierdoor kunnen wij tegen zeer concurrerende tarieven hoogwaardige service en kwaliteit leveren. PureSolar vindt dat een zonnepaneel systeem maatwerk dient te zijn. Onze adviseurs komen bij u langs om de specifieke situatie te beoordelen en zij presenteren u direct een op maat gemaakt pakket. PureSolar ontzorgt u totaal op het gebied van zonnepanelen. Zo doen wij ook de subsidieaanvraag voor u en indien nodig begeleiden we het vergunningtraject. Indien u dit wenst verzorgen wij ook de aanmelding van uw zonnepanelen bij uw energieleverancier. Verder vinden wij van PureSolar het erg belangrijk onze klanten energiebewust te maken. Hiervoor heeft PureSolar een ambassadeursprogramma opgezet. Dit houdt in dat wanneer u klanten aanbrengt u hiervoor wordt beloond met bijvoorbeeld een besparingspakket of een monitoringssysteem. Wilt u hier meer over weten? Vraag het aan een van onze adviseurs.

Name: EVS Energy
Company description: Pionier in de vrije energiemarkt EVS Energy is actief in de energiesector sinds 2002. Ons bedrijf heeft zijn wortels in de elektrosector. Bij de vrijmaking van de energiemarkt hebben we ons, op vraag van onze klanten, meer en meer verdiept in de wereld van de energie. Zo groeiden advies en begeleiding bij de aankoop van energie uit tot onze hoofdactiviteit. Onafhankelijk en onpartijdig Aanvankelijk werkte EVS Energy exclusief samen met enkele energieleveranciers. Die werkwijze gaf ons geen voldoening. Daarom kozen we in 2005 voor een volstrekt onafhankelijke opstelling. Sindsdien werken we met onze klanten samen op contractuele basis. De beste formule voor elke klant Omdat we onafhankelijk en onpartijdig zijn, hebben we geen voorkeur voor één of meerdere energieleveranciers. EVS Energy gaat voor elke klant op zoek naar de beste voorwaarden op de markt, op maat van het profiel van de klant. We baseren ons daarbij op onze grondige marktkennis en op harde data over het energieverbruik van de klant. Geen loze beloftes Geen holle slogans of loze beloftes bij EVS Energy. Voor we met een klant gaan samenwerken, berekenen we of de winst van de klant groter zal zijn dan de kostprijs van onze service. Als dat niet zo is, zeggen we dat vooraf klaar en duidelijk. Winst voor de klant, jaar na jaar Voor tal van bedrijven is de winst hoger (vaak zelfs aanzienlijk hoger) dan de kostprijs die EVS Energy aanrekent. Ook dat wordt vooraf duidelijk gemaakt en aangetoond met harde data. Resultaat: een jarenlange en voor de klant winstgevende relatie. Geen wonder dat EVS Energy zoveel trouwe klanten heeft.

Name: E-nergia Gas And Power
Company description: E-nergia Gas and Power is a slovenian energy provider. E-nergia Gas and Power is part of Europe Energy Holding srl, an international group that operates in the gas and electricity market; trading, consulting and selling directly to the end customer.  With multiple branches throughout Europe,  Europe Energy Holding has developed a logistic platform and a strong geographical presence that allows Europe Energy to undertake the gas and electricity trading activities in more than 20 countries in Europe, reaching as far as Turkey and Ukraine. In 2016, Europe Energy dealt with over 12 billion kWh of energy and 6,4 tWh of natural gas.

Name: OK Energie
Company description: La vostra fiducia, la nostra energia. Una scintilla pronta a creare un nuovo universo, fatto di trasparenza, di chiarezza, di un costante confronto con i clienti.  Ok Energie è un’azienda profondamente radicata nel territorio abruzzese, attiva da diversi anni con un proprio marchio nel settore carburanti, si propone oggi come nuovo fornitore di energia elettrica e gas. L’ascolto delle persone, delle loro esigenze, l’attenzione ai particolari diventano proposte concrete per migliorare il nostro quotidiano. Con noi, quando si parla di energia, “zero problemi, tutto ok!".

Name: Sonnen Italia
Company description: Disporre di energia pulita e a basso costo per tutti è una delle più grandi sfide del nostro tempo. sonnen, con sede produttiva nel villaggio energetico bavarese di Wildpoldsried, nasce con l’obiettivo di offrire a tutti la possibilità di essere protagonisti del proprio futuro energetico. Per questo, propone soluzioni per l’autoproduzione e l’accumulo di energia rinnovabile e la creazione di network di condivisione tra produttori e consumatori. sonnen offre a tutti, in tutto il mondo, l'opportunità di essere indipendenti dall’energia da fonti fossili e dai fornitori di energia tradizionali.   Noi di sonnen ci impegniamo, ogni giorno, per costruire il sistema energetico del futuro. Un sistema in cui l’energia è rinnovabile e le persone sono al centro. Per questo, sviluppiamo nuove tecnologie e modelli di business. Grazie ai nostri sistemi di accumulo di energia intelligenti, alla nostra centrale elettrica virtuale e ai servizi digitali, siamo precursori del nuovo mondo energetico. Un'azienda in rapida crescita, dove innovazione, creatività, passione e opportunità di sviluppo personale trovano il loro spazio. Ciò che ci guida è la nostra vision di un futuro di energia pulita e a basso costo per tutti, con l’obiettivo di preservare il nostro pianeta anche per le prossime generazioni.

Name: Eficae Soluciones
HQ Location: Spain, Extremadura, Badajoz, 18 Av. Castillo Puebla De Alcocer, 06006
Company description: Eficae Soluciones was founded in 2016 from the collaboration between three industrial engineers graduated from the University of Extremadura forming a multidisciplinary team in various areas. The decision was taken to create EFICAE Soluciones to offer a comprehensive engineering and energy consultancy service to companies and entities in both the public and private sectors with a different model, maintaining professional ethics in terms of the constant search for the best solution for our clients and shedding light on a sector as opaque as the energy sector. Since its creation, EFICAE Soluciones has specialised in different services related to energy efficiency and development, such as: Photovoltaic installations, having participated as an engineer in more than 40 MWp of self-consumption and 300 MWp of grid connection. -Energy audits, having audited more than 120 entities in different sectors. -Supply optimisation (electricity and gas bills), currently managing more than 4 GWh. -Development of technological solutions for the monitoring and management of energy demand. The objective of EFICAE Soluciones as a company is to have a sustainable growth in the coming years, however, the current situation of the sector offers an open field of very promising future projects for which we will count, as always, with our partners and we will continue to seek new alliances to remain a reference team and undertake projects together.

Name: HD Solar - Specialist In Duurzaamheid
Company description: Specialist in zonne-energie Onderscheidend door onze dak-geïntegreerde systemen, landelijke samenwerking met Solar-systemen.nl, uitstekend installatie-team met eigen mensen en bewezen garantie en service. HD Solar levert zonnestroom installaties voor particulieren, het MKB en agrariërs.  Voor de particuliere markt hebben wij ons aangesloten bij een landelijke franchise organisatie met meer dan 12 jaar ervaring in de branche, solar-systemen.nl. Dat maakt van ons een betrouwbare en stabiele partner in de snel veranderende en groeiende sector van zonne-energie. Daarnaast kunnen wij door een landelijke inkoop A-kwaliteit leveren met zeer goede garanties en tegen scherpe tarieven. Wij maken alleen gebruik van panelen van beursgenoteerde bedrijven en met Europese dealers zodat wij uitgebreide garanties kunnen geven tot 25 jaar.

Name: DHS Complete Hire
HQ Location: Ireland, Leinster, Drogheda, Cement Road, a92
Company description: Welcome to DHS Complete Hire.     At DHS Complete Hire, formerly known as Drogheda Hire & Sales, we have been a trusted name in the Irish construction industry for over 30 years. Our recent rebranding reflects our ambition to grow beyond our current bases in Drogheda and Dublin, positioning us as your comprehensive one-stop shop for all equipment needs. Our Services: Plant & Access Hire: We provide a wide range of plant and powered access equipment from top manufacturers, ensuring you have the right tools for any project. Tool Hire: From DIY and gardening to sanding and cleaning, we offer tools and equipment to help get the job done—big or small. Training Centre: Our fully equipped training centre offers certified IPAF operator courses and more to ensure safe and efficient use of equipment, helping professionals stay compliant and skilled. Welding & Engineering Supplies: We stock products from top reliable brands to support your welding and engineering projects. BOC Gas: As authorized BOC agents, we are your local cylinder gas supplier. Shop: Stocking a selection of smaller tools, accessories, and essential equipment for purchase.. With depots in Drogheda (041 9841419) and Dublin (01 9108757), we are strategically positioned to serve more locations faster, ensuring you get the equipment you need when you need it. Whether you're a homeowner, tradesperson, or contractor, our experienced team is here to provide expert advice and top-tier service.

Name: Cogenius
Company description: Cogenius is een jong en groeiend bedrijf dat softwaretoepassingen ontwikkelt voor de energiemarkt en tevens financiële, operationele en strategische adviesdiensten aan energieleveranciers aanbiedt. Met het softwarepakket Lynx 2, is Cogenius intussen een gevestigde waarde bij energieleveranciers in de Belgische markt. Naast het voorzien in een all-in ERP pakket waarmee alle cruciale processen van een energieleverancier ondersteund worden, fungeert Cogenius ook als een expert die zijn klanten bijstaat in het aanpakken van de diverse uitdagingen die de energiesector vandaag stelt.

Name: Gaslicht.com
Company description: Do you want to know what's the best offer for your electricity and gas? Go to Gaslicht.com and find out! Gaslicht.com is the independent website for comparing energy suppliers in Holland. Wilt u weten wat de beste energieleverancier is voor u? Ga naar Gaslicht.com en vergelijk daar energieleveranciers op basis van uw verbruik en regio! Gaslicht.com is de onafhankelijke energievergelijker voor Nederland. Kijk ook op https://www.gaslicht.com

Name: Elgas Slovensko
Company description: Elgas je uznávaný, bezpečný a overený dodávateľ plynu a elektriny pre veľké, stredné a malé firmy. Elgas je štvrtý najväčší dodávateľ plynu na Slovensku. Elgas je členom silnej energetickej skupiny GGE, ktorá je jednou z najrýchlejšie rastúcich energetických spoločností v strednej a východnej Európe.

Name: Genesi Energia
HQ Location: Italy, Umbria, Terni, 1 Piazza San Giovanni Decollato, 05100
Company description: Fornitore di energia green, efficienza energetica e mobilità elettrica. General contractor 110% e 90% per gli interventi di efficientamento energetico con sconto in fattura.

Name: Sensing & Control Systems
Company description: S&C provides a chip level design and development (ASICs, FPGAs and SoCs) plus embedded software in several fields like Industry 4.0, Smart Energy, Image recognition and Digital health as most relevant. Our involvement goes from the initial stage of chip design to mass production. As part of our advance development, we employ AI-driven chip design, it involves the use of artificial intelligence (AI) technologies such as machine learning in the tool flow to design, verify, and test semiconductor devices. We use AI to come up with the right set of parameters that delivers the highest ROI in a big solution space in the fastest possible time. In other words, better (and faster) quality of results than otherwise possible. We also offer IoT solutions to organizations in different sectors including telecom, energy providers, healthcare, buildings construction and management, hardware and appliance manufacturers, retailers, insurance companies and Smart Cities. Our platform is a complete IoT end-to-end solution that easily integrates with an existing communication network, monitoring tool or control systems. It connects to any device including sensors, actuators, appliances, meters, wearables, smartphones, smart home and building devices (thermostats, lights, energy plugs, air conditioning, heaters, etc.), cameras, locks, etc.

Name: Teléfono Directo
Company description: Teléfono Directo le ofrece todas las comodidades de contar con un teléfono directo para contactar rápidamente a cualquier servicio de atención al cliente de la empresa que quiera.  Este servicio de información telefónica ofrece un amplio y variado directorio en dónde se pueden encontrar los números de teléfono directo gratuito de entidades, empresas y organismos. Le ofrecemos una relación de los teléfonos gratis de las principales compañías de telefonía, aseguradoras, proveedores de electricidad y gas que puede encontrar facilmente en nuestra web y ahorrar dinero llamando a números sin coste en lugar de las caras tarifas que tienen los números telefónicos de la mayoría de call centers.

Name: Arbipoint - Digital Customer Center
Company description: Arbipoint - is a Automated merchant services in towns and villages for citizens Fully automated multifunctional system available 24x7 Provision of services to citizens and companies (payments for electricity, water and gas bills, parking fees, payment of taxes and fees to municipality, receiving pension payments, direct access to state services, etc.) Access to all services only with ID card or payment card Signing digital contracts with citizen authentication, face or fingerprint recognition (insurance, telecommunications, energy, official documents, and applications, etc.) Purchasing products and services from our partners – Merchants

Name: European Commodities
Company description: European Commodities provides access to the European energy market for energy suppliers and large industrial sites. We are focused on the European power market. Our services include among others load or production forcasting, portfolio balancing, spot and forward market access, demand response optimization, asset management. We can act as a transparent service provider, all risk being taken by the customer/retailer but we can also provide fixed price products, very easy to understand.

Name: EBLD Schweiz Strom GmbH
Company description: Als Stromanbieter mit Schweizer Tradition bringen wir Energie aus 100% Wasserkraft in deutsche Haushalte - mit dieser Mission begeistern wir unsere Kunden jeden Tag. Dabei sind Transparenz, Nachhaltigkeit und soziale Verantwortung die wesentlichen Säulen unserer Unternehmensphilosophie. Ob Sie Rat brauchen, eine Frage haben oder eine individuelle Lösung benötigen - bei schweizstrom steht Ihnen immer ein kompetenter Ansprechpartner zur Seite. Als Tochterunternehmen des Schweizer Energieversorgers EBL steht schweizstrom seit 1898 für Tradition, Kontinuität und eine sichere sowie zuverlässige Stromversorgung.

Name: AWATTar GmbH
Company description: Nachhaltige Energie ist wichtiger denn je. Wir sind der erste Stromanbieter in Österreich und Deutschland mit einem stündlich dynamischen Tarif und schaffen so nicht nur neue Einsparpotenziale für unsere KundInnen, sondern auch mehr Platz im Stromnetz für Wind- und Solarenergie. Wir wurden bereits mit dem “Greenstar(t)” Award des österreichischen Klimafonds ausgezeichnet und mischen seit einiger Zeit auch den deutschen Strommarkt auf. Wir haben seit Kurzem mit dem führenden Smart Home Unternehmen tado° einen finanzstarken Investor an unserer Seite, und der Trend zur E-Mobilität und dezentraler Energieproduktion beflügelt unser Wachstum zusätzlich.

Name: Pluss Advanced Technologies B.V.
Company description: Pluss Advanced Technologies B.V. offers a wide range of products based on Phase Change Materials (PCM) and applications for Thermal Energy Storage. We are a solutions provider for PCM thermal storage solutions for cold chain logistics, the building industry, pharma logistics, and the agro-food industry. With over 18 years of experience in the field, we have developed 67 different Phase Change Materials for heat or cold applications ranging from -75°C to 151°C. For cold chain logistics, we provide high-end PCM and related packaging solutions to maintain products at the correct and desired temperature during transportation from farm to fork. PCM can be utilized with all types of perishable goods, including fresh flowers, meat, fish, and soft fruits. For the building industry, our solutions can store thermal energy in PCM via solar or general ventilation. Utilizing renewable energy when available to generate heat or cold and storing it for when needed can significantly reduce energy bills. These options are available to make commercial buildings sustainable and to prepare domestic homes for smart grid integration. Other solutions we offer include a variety of PCM encapsulations that can be used for pharma logistics and cold chain applications. Additionally, we offer off-grid cold storage or dryers for farms in the agro-food sectors.

Name: Nabalia Energía
Company description: Te presentamos NABALIA Energía: Comercializadora de energía eléctrica que nace para adaptar sus precios a nuestros clientes situándose como la mejor opción del mercado. Simplemente marcamos la diferencia, practicando un nuevo concepto de gestión como proveedor de electricidad, siguiendo la línea de la transparencia, el servicio, la cercanía y dar las soluciones inmediatas a cada usuario. Contáctanos en el 902 430 822 ó info@nabaliaenergia.com

Name: Evergreen Eléctrica
Company description: Founded in 2009 in Malaga, we were born with the aim of being your electricity supplier providing you with the best service and support in the sector and, for this reason, we also have both English and Spanish speaking experts, able to provide you with the best attention, because we are with you from the first moment.

Name: Novaluz Energía Empresas
Company description: Novaluz Energía Empresas is a dedicated energy provider specializing in 100% clean energy solutions for small and medium-sized enterprises (PYMEs) and self-employed professionals. The company focuses on delivering tailored energy services, including electricity and gas supply, solar self-consumption installations, and dedicated energy advisory services. Novaluz's mission is to ensure customer satisfaction through high-quality service, compliance with legal and environmental standards, and a commitment to sustainability. The company partners with various stakeholders to optimize energy costs and promote efficient resource use, while its target market primarily consists of PYMEs seeking reliable and transparent energy solutions. With a strong emphasis on environmental protection and continuous improvement, Novaluz aims to lead the transition towards a greener energy future for businesses.

Name: NOVATEC SOLAR GmbH
Company description: Novatec Solar is a leading technology provider and undertakes manufacture, supply and turnkey delivery of solar boilers based on unique Fresnel collector technology. The solar boilers are suitable for a range of applications including concentrated solar power stations and industrial processes e.g. enhanced oil recovery. Novatec Solar utilises the sun as valuable energy supplier in conjunction with its state-of-the-art CSP technology to offer sustainable energy solutions. www.novatecsolar.com Legal Info: http://www.novatecsolar.com/18-1-Legal-Info.html

Name: Grünauer GmbH
Company description: Werden Sie unabhängig von Ihrem Stromanbieter - Mit einer Solaranlage aus unserem familiengeführten Meisterbetrieb: - Persönliche Beratung vor Ort - Montag bis Sonntag rund um die Uhr erreichbar - Zuverlässig seit über 20 Jahren - Qualitativ hochwertige Komponenten - 25 Jahre Leistungsgarantie auf Solaranlagen

Name: Solo Energy
Company description: At Solo we believe the age of fossil fuels is dead, and we want to start making the transition to 100% renewables happen as quickly as possible, like now. We think the world can and should be powered only by renewable energy. At Solo we want to show how energy storage and our clever software provides the solution to the problem, by storing excess renewable energy for later use so we don’t need to rely on fossil fuels as back-up anymore. Energy storage also allows you to keep your energy bills down. Solo helps you to use more of the energy you generate yourself, while sharing low-cost renewable energy through the grid to further reduce your bills.

Name: CAPTIS SPRL
Company description: Captis est né en 2008 suite à une collaboration avec un fournisseur local d'énergie verte.   L'activité de ce dernier n'a cessé de croître, et celui-ci est devenu l'un des plus importants fournisseurs de gaz et d'électricité en Belgique.   Aujourd'hui notre filiale compte plus de 100 agents francophones, prêts à décrocher pour aider quelques 500.000 clients en Belgique.

Name: TGN Energy
Company description: Our mission is to maximize energy access while minimizing environmental impact. We do this by helping companies, industries, property owners, fleet operators and many more to optimize their local energy system, minimize their energy bills and facilitate sustainable and profitable growth.

Name: Wolna Energia
Company description: Energia słoneczna to pewne źródło odnawialnej energii. Wykorzystaj ją poprzez panele słoneczne! Dzięki nam wytworzysz własną czystą energię, obniżysz miesięczne rachunki za prąd lub gaz i uchronisz się przed podwyżkami cen energii elektrycznej. Wykorzystaj oszczędności na lepsze jutro! Posiadamy własne ekipy monterskie, montujemy panele fotowoltaiczne w całym kraju – możemy zamontować również dla Ciebie.

Name: AssmannPeiffer Rechtsanwälte Partnerschaft MbB
Company description: AssmannPeiffer advises companies throughout Germany on energy law issues, in particular energy suppliers, municipal utilities, network operators, municipalities and energy-intensive companies. As a "boutique law firm", we at AssmannPeiffer are an experienced team of highly specialized lawyers for energy law. In addition to issues of classical energy law such as regulatory proceedings or the awarding of concessions according to the German Energy Industry Act (EnWG), we are primarily concerned with the law of renewable energies (EEG, biofuels according to BImSchG or KWKG). In addition, private law issues from energy contract law and energy contracting, i.e. energy contracting, i.e. the drafting and negotiation of energy supply contracts including legal representation and enforcement. We focus on the legal implementation of new business ideas in the energy sector and new energy concepts such as power-to-X, virtual power plants and tenant power.

Name: ELTEC Green Energy GmbH
Company description: Welcome to Eltec Green Energy GmbH, your premier destination for cutting-edge power distribution solutions. As a subsidiary of the esteemed Eltec Group, boasting a legacy spanning back to 1970, we stand as leaders in power transformer system integration for the global energy industry. We in Eltec have also our well-established, European-based, consulting division. Comprising a team of international engineers, energy specialists, policy experts, and utility advisors the Group draws on a network of regional and international associates to offer a broad range of services in the energy sector. Our transformers are meticulously engineered to not only optimize performance but also to maximize energy efficiency and ensure long-term durability. This dedication to excellence has solidified our position as the preferred choice for a myriad of power transmission and distribution applications. About us: Drawing upon decades of expertise and a steadfast commitment to innovation, we pave the way towards a sustainable energy future. Our diverse range of highly efficient and reliable power transformers caters to the evolving needs of the electrical power industry. Whether you require small distribution transformers or large power transformers, we possess the capability to deliver bespoke solutions tailored to your exact specifications. Vision statement  To create a sustainable energy future by introducing economically- sound and technically appropriate, clean energy solutions for us and future generations Mission statement  We have a strong commitment as an energy provider and as a project developer to sustainability. To realize our vision, we believe in an energy mix of clean technologies suitable for the local area's energy needs and resource availability. => Worldwide Presence => Local Partnerships => Global Logistics At Eltec Green Energy GmbH, we don't just provide transformers; we power the future. Join us in shaping a sustainable tomorrow, one transformer at a time.

Name: Asociación ANAE Asociación Nacional De Ahorro Y Eficiencia Energética
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 2 C/ San Marino, 28022
Company description: ANAE es una asociación de consumidores de energía, diferente a cualquier otra existente. Se constituyó a finales del 2010 y desde entonces no hemos dejado de ahorrar dinero en las facturas de nuestros socios (más de 200.000€ en el 2011). ANAE es totalmente independiente, no está ligada a ninguna tendencia política, fabricante, instalador ni a compañías energéticas. Gestionamos más de 86 GWh de consumo de electricidad repartidos en unos 650 suministros y con una potencia contratada de  18 MW. Los suministros de nuestros socios abarcan todo el abanico de tarifas desde baja tensión hasta alta tensión en 6 periodos. Conseguimos ahorros efectivos en las facturas de energía y agua para nuestros socios, de manera directa, mediante la optimización de suministros y la asesoría energética o de manera indirecta mediante auditorías energéticas o instalaciones de eficiencia energética realizadas por empresas que validamos con criterios de calidad/precio favorables para nuestros socios. Pretendemos explotar al máximo las formas de comprar energía que legalmente dispone un consumidor:   - Realizando negociaciones colectivas con las comercializadoras, para conseguir precios fuera de catálogo.   - Potenciando la figura del consumidor directo al mercado y actuando como central de compras, comprando la energía directamente en el mercado mayorista.   - Creación de comercializadoras de electricidad y gas para nuestros socios.

Name: Open-i
HQ Location: Netherlands, Utrecht, Utrecht, 204 B De Heldinnenlaan, 3543
Company description: Open-i is een degelijke en ambitieuze software- en consultancy leverancier die zich voornamelijk bezighoudt met vraagstukken binnen de energie en overheid. Naast een aantal eigen applicaties op het gebied van Billing, CRM en urenverantwoording levert Open-i ook gedegen en enthousiaste Test Specialisten, Business Analisten, Business Consultants en Projectleiders.   Open-i werkt vaak en het liefst samen met klanten op een partnerbasis. Het leveren van oplossingen aan klanten door flexibele inzet van verschillende consultancydisciplines geeft de medewerkers de uitdaging die ze zoeken in hun werk. Ook resultaatverplichtingen op verschillende gebieden gaat Open-i niet uit de weg. Dit resulteert in vaak jarenlange samenwerking met klanten. Een bijzonder product dat Open-i levert is FINE, dit staat voor Flexible INvoice Engine en verzorgt de automatisering van alle CRM-, Billing- en Metergerelateerde processen voor energieleveranciers en netbeheerders. Mocht u met Open-i in contact willen komen neem dan gerust contact op via: De Heldinnenlaan 204 B 3543 MB  Utrecht Tel:  +31 (0)346 831116 Email: info@open-i.nl

Name: Mega
Company description: Mega, founded in 2013 by Thomas Coune and Michaël Corhay, is a Belgian energy provider dedicated to making energy contracts affordable for all Belgians. With a mission to offer a sensible alternative to large multinational corporations, Mega started as a small supplier in Liège and has since grown into a dynamic team focused on enhancing customer experience. The company emphasizes a human touch in its operations, ensuring that real people manage contracts rather than relying solely on automated systems. Mega serves a diverse clientele, including both individual consumers and businesses, and has recently expanded its offerings to include mobile telecommunications services, positioning itself as a competitive player in the market. With a commitment to sustainability and customer satisfaction, Mega aims to continue its growth while fostering a supportive community among its employees and clients.

Name: Caetano Energy
HQ Location: Portugal, Porto, Vila Nova De Gaia
Company description: Caetano Energy is a dynamic company focused on providing innovative solutions in the energy sector, particularly in the field of electric mobility and sustainable energy. With a mission to promote environmentally friendly transportation options, Caetano Energy aims to lead the transition towards a greener future by offering a diverse range of electric vehicles and energy-efficient technologies. The company collaborates with various partners, including automotive manufacturers and energy providers, to deliver high-quality products and services to its clients, which include both individual consumers and businesses seeking to reduce their carbon footprint. By targeting the growing market for electric vehicles and renewable energy solutions, Caetano Energy is committed to making sustainable mobility accessible and practical for everyone.

Name: BlueEnergy Eficiencia Energética
HQ Location: Spain, Badajoz, Fuente Del Maestre, 56 C/ Molino Del Viento, 06360
Company description: Blue Energy es una asesoría energética dedicada a reducir las facturas de luz y gas de pymes, grandes empresas y particulares, controlando su gasto anualmente para una eficiente gestión energética. Nuestros equipos realizan estudios exhaustivos de eficiencia energética, analizando diversos factores (facturas de electricidad, hábitos de consumo, instalaciones, etc.) ofreciendo posteriormente a nuestros clientes posibles mejoras que van desde el cambio a tarifas más ventajosas a la implementación de equipos que reduzcan u optimicen el consumo.

Name: RCT - Remote Control Technology
Company description: IoT solution provider for O&G and building monitoring RCT Remote Control Technology, based in Germany, is one of the leading IoT solution providers for smart remote monitoring of tank installations in Ex environments in the energy industry and of operating states in building technology. The company supports energy suppliers, petrol station operators as well as public utilities, municipalities and property management companies on the path to digital transformation - and taps the potential of the "Internet of Things" for more efficient business processes. RCT develops and manufactures transmission units for the detection of tank levels or operating states - for local and global networks. The range of solutions includes level monitoring of liquid and gaseous media in storage tanks such as liquid gas, heating oil, diesel and A1 fuels as well as technical gases, water and chemicals in stationary and mobile applications. In addition, RCT offers smart solutions for the remote monitoring of buildings and facilities. These include the recording of power consumption and the monitoring of movement, temperature, pressure, humidity as well as heating, cooling and air conditioning systems.  With certifications according to ATEX, CE, ISO, QPS, TÜV and others, the products developed and manufactured by RCT in Germany stand for safe and tested device technology. For secure and fast data transmission, the manufacturer relies on state-of-the-art transmission technologies such as Cellular 4G/3G/2G, NBIoT, Sigfox, LoRaWAN, CatM1, LTE, WLAN, RF and GPRS. Developers and programmers of software solutions With the IoT platform "RCT Monitor" as well as IoT platforms, RCT has cloud-based solutions for applications in the "Internet of Things" of the energy world. This enables the simple, secure and scalable networking of physical objects such as IoT transmission units for tank and object monitoring and of PC-based systems. Contact us: info@r-c-t.biz

Name: Enter G
Company description: Energy Trading    Merchant Power Trading    Risk Management    Hedging and Market Access Solutions Energy Business Consulting    IT and Customer Care Outsourcing Services    White label sales for energy suppliers    Digital Sales Channel Development    Calculation of Customer Lifetime Value    Energy Retail Go to Market Strategy    Energy Retail Development Strategy

Name: FMC Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Avellino, Montefusco, Via S. Egidio Area Pip, 83030
Company description: Azienda Leader nella produzione di Pannelli e Kit Fotovoltaici Produzione moduli fotovoltaici I moduli fotovoltaici della FMC sono progettati per grandi requisiti di energia elettrica. Con una garanzia di 20 anni, essi offrono prestazioni elevate, affidabili per progetti solari sia in rete che fuori rete. Installazione Ancora prima di soffermarsi sulle caratteristiche del proprio tetto e di ciò che lo circonda, il primo dei requisiti di cui ci occupiamo per l’installazione dei pannelli fotovoltaici è da verificare seduti dietro alle nostre scrivanie con i nostri tecnici, calcolatrice da una parte e bollette elettriche dall’altra. Soluzioni energetiche personalizzate Siamo in grado di fornire un sistema di energia solare personalizzato per le vostre esigenze specifiche.

Name: Yuno Energy
Company description: A home energy provider that gives people complete visibility of their usage, spending and payments from just one app.

Name: QConnex GmbH
Company description: QConnex makes the Internet of Things easier, safer and more affordable. We are smart home experts. We bring together the best of two worlds – German technology and Asian manufacturing. Our experienced IoT team in Hamburg is responsible for the software side of the business. We source high quality products… … and embed modules that convert them into smart devices. These are then customized for customer-facing businesses such as utility companies, retailers and energy suppliers.

Name: Qubino
HQ Location: Slovenia, Nova Gorica, Nova Gorica, 7 Ulica Klementa Juga, 5250
Company description: Would you like to turn your home smart? Would you like to be able to remotely control your home from anywhere in the world, with only a tap on your smartphone? With Qubino Smart Home Solutions you can make any home smart. You can start with as little as being able to remotely control your electric devices, your smart lights or shades, your garage door, etc. or furthermore, you can create scenes for different times of the day, from “Good morning” to “Good night” scenes, or scenes tailored to your mood.  Would you like to be on top of your energy consumption and are looking for ways to save energy? With Qubino Smart Meters you can measure your energy consumption and consequently lower your electricity bills. Qubino devices are one of the smallest Z-Wave microcontrollers in the world, used to control lights, shutters and other electrical devices in your home, via a smartphone or tablet. Small size and specially designed casing ensure a simple installation (ease of cabling fixing) inside a flush mounting box. Qubino devices re constantly being tested and have been proved and tested by professional electricians.  Some additional features: -	The devices can be used as an extension to control the heating/cooling system.  -	The devices have the option to connect a digital temperature sensor.

Name: Pakform - Packaging Solutions
HQ Location: Ireland, Co. Cork, Little Island, t45
Company description: Welcome, we are PAKFORM! We work hard to give our customers what they need: top quality packaging, delivered on time and at the right price. We make stronger boxes from fewer raw materials and generate less waste at source due to our eco-friendly manufacturing methods. This includes renewable energy providers and almost all materials supplied by sustainable forestry. Corrugated cardboard meets all environmental guidelines and is a great packaging option that has a minimal impact on the planet. We manufacture printed and plain corrugated cardboard boxes, ideal for shelf, retail and transit, and offer our customers a consistent and reliable service to ensure that their products reach their customers in well-presented packaging that enhances their brand. We have years of experience creating top quality packaging for the Pharmaceutical, Food & Drink, IT Hardware, and Engineering industries, and our dedicated team will provide you with a friendly and professional service from initial enquiry through to quotations, samples and delivery of your packaging. Every customer has unique requirements and expectations, and we are delighted to exceed every time.

Name: Digitalprojekt 4 GmbH
Company description: Digitalprojekt 4 GmbH (DP4) began as an innovation subsidiary of EWE AG, Germany's fifth-largest energy supplier. Our team's first project was AMPERAS, with which we created a digital marketplace for energy supply contracts. Later, we founded energieberater.io, where we used our AMPERAS platform to offer customized energy consulting for businesses throughout Germany. In 2021, we shifted to electromobility, secured financing and proudly joined EWE Go in mid-2023. EWE Go builds charging stations across Germany that are 100% powered by renewable energy and together we are committed to the growing e-mobility industry in Germany. Our teams are focused on developing cutting-edge digital solutions that enable a seamless charging experience for electric vehicle users.  As an international team, we pride ourselves on our open-minded, dedicated and friendly culture. Together we have developed a set of values which are as follows: Make an Impact, Have fun, Trust the Team and Stay Focused.

Name: Stredoslovenská Energetika A. S.
Company description: Sme tradičný a stabilný dodávateľ elektriny a plynu s viac ako 100-ročnou tradíciou.  Na strednom Slovensku sme najväčší dodávateľ energie a v celoslovenskom meradle sa naša spoločnosť nachádza na druhom mieste s trhovým podielom 21 %. Energiu dodávame viac ako 700-tisíc zákazníkom. Okrem výhodných dodávok elektriny a plynu poskytujeme množstvo inovatívnych produktov a služieb, zameraných na úsporu a bezpečnosť v domácnostiach aj vo firmách.  Naše užitočne produkty a služby: Zelená energia - 100% ekologická elektrina, Zelená domácnosť - Fotovoltika, Solárne panely, Tepelné čerpadlo, asistenčná služba SSE Opravár, Energetický certifikát, Energetický audit a Nabíjacie stanice pre elektromobily.

Name: Energika España
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 54 Calle De Cristóbal Bordiú, 28003
Company description: Energika propone a sus clientes una verdadera mejora de la eficiencia energética ya que, con sus actividades de asesoramiento, se propone como un socio absolutamente independiente de cualquier proveedor de energía, asociación empresarial o consorcio, posicionándose en el mercado de la  Gestión de la Demanda Energética de la parte del consumidor. Un equipo de profesionales siempre al día sobre los aspectos técnicos y normativos del mercado de la energía se encarga de todo lo relacionado con su suministro: desde la elección del operador más conveniente hasta el control mensual de las facturas, pasando por el contacto con los proveedores y distribuidores para efectuar rectificaciones o atender solicitudes específicas de los clientes El mismo enfoque de mejora de la eficiencia energética lo mantiene Energika ante los proveedores de tecnología: el objetivo es poseer un equipo de especialistas capaces de proponer al cliente final la solución tecnológica más eficaz y conveniente desde el punto de vista de la relación costes/beneficios.

Name: Universal Contact Center
Company description: UCC is a call center, which was created in the context of the strategic evolution and development of the most innovative energy supplier in the Greek market. Our corporate vision is purely anthropocentric and centers around the two-way growth of both our staff and the company. Our philosophy is built upon employees’ satisfaction since creating a better workplace for our people ensures efficiency, productivity and thus, increased performance and sales. Further to that, we provide continuous training and unique benefits to our staff. Our end goal is to create  an unbeatable team of specialized energy consultants that elevate customer experience by suggesting integrated energy solutions tailor made to their needs.

Name: OUTBOUND Partners
Company description: OUTBOUND partners traint en coacht uw inside sales om het proces van cold calls, e-mails en social messaging te verbeteren. We helpen u groeien door inside salestaken te outsourcen naar ons team salesspecialisten. Een flexibel inzetbare of fulltime Sales Development Rep (SDR) bouwt uw database en geeft gekwalificeerde leads aan uw accountmanagers voor een vervolggesprek, een online demo of plant afspraken rechtstreeks in de agenda van uw salesteam. We zijn een telemarketing-boetiek en hebben ervaring bij het uitvoeren van campagnes voor softwarebedrijven, fondsenwerving voor non-profit organisaties, telecom- en energieleveranciers.

Name: TWINLOGY S. R. O.
Company description: 💙 TWINLOGY s. r. o. je dodávateľ elektriny/plynu, distribútor elektriny, realizátor energetických služieb a komplexných riešení v energetike.  👍 TWINLOGY sme si vysnívali a následne vytvorili v roku 2016 s víziou prekonať a posúvať zaužívané hranice energetiky v oblasti maloobchodného predaja elektriny, plynu a zároveň poskytovať všetkým segmentom naších zákazníkov komplexné riešenia a služby na úrovni ALL INCLUSIVE.  😎 Sme kompaktný tím ľudí s mnohoročnými skúsenosťami v energetike, ktorý má jasnú predstavu o tom ako poskytovať zákazníkom tie najlepšie a najosobnejšie služby na tak bezemočnom trhu, ktorým energetika nesporne je. Tešíme sa, že môžeme veci robiť inak a bez obmedzení, či už je to stratégia na ktorej sa podieľajú všetci zamestnanci, alebo kreatívny a inovatívny marketing, či kvalitný obchodný tím, ktorý nie je iba doručovateľom zmlúv, ale odborníkom a partnerom tisícov naších zákazníkov. 🏊 Denne pomáhame naším zákazníkom preplávať komplikovanými vodami energetického biznisu tak, aby sa mohli na plno venovať svojmu primárnemu predmetu podnikania. Zanedbateľný ročný churn je dôkazom, že to robíme správne. 💪 Tisíce spokojných B2B a B2C zákazníkov pomohli TWINLOGY narásť zo štartovacích 1,6 mil. EUR na dnešných takmer 20 mil EUR ročného obratu. Veríme, že ich dôveru nesklameme a oni nám pomôžu naplniť našu víziu v modernej energetike.  ➜ Potrebujete komplexnú pomoc s energetikou? poradiť? nakúpiť elektrinu alebo plyn? ➜ Kontaktujte nás 📞 02/3305 7927 📧 energy@twinlogy.com ➜ Viac informácií nájdete tiež na www.twinlogy.com

Name: LITGAS
Company description: LITGAS is a natural gas supplier and trader, part of the largest energy company group in Lithuania Lietuvos Energija.   Currently the main activity of LITGAS is of strategic importance – the company supplies the minimum required natural gas volume to ensure minimal continuous operation of the Klaipėda’s LNG terminal. From the moment of being appointed as a designated supplier by order of the Minister of Energy ensuring the minimum required gas quantity became the responsibility of LITGAS.   For this purpose on August 21, 2014, after almost a yearlong procurement procedure, a 5-year contract for the supply of 0.54 bcm of natural gas (around 950 thousand cubic meters of LNG) was signed with the Norwegian energy company Statoil.   The designated supplier helps Lithuania to achieve its strategic goals: it creates and supports open access to the global natural gas market, gives the opportunity for suppliers to make use of advantages this market offers, ensures security of supply and promotes real competition on the Lithuanian natural gas market.
