In addition to being a designated supplier, LITGAS has ambitions to become a competitive player on the natural gas and LNG supply markets, also pursue growing activities of bunkering, i.e. supply of LNG as fuel for ships. The company has non-binding master agreements for LNG purchases with 15 global suppliers which combined supply more than half of the world’s LNG. These agreements enable quick purchases of gas by LITGAS on international spot markets.

Name: Solar Markt Csoport
Company description: Solar Markt is a leading, independent green energy platform company in East Central Europe and a strategic partner of E. ON Hungary. Our unique green energy solution integrates renewable production capacities from various local sources and provides PPAs for a wide range of responsible corporate clients. We support our clients’ decarbonization agenda to ensure long-term competitiveness in their markets. A Solar Markt Kelet-Közép Európa vezető, független zöldenergia platform vállalata, az E.ON stratégiai partnere. Egyedi zöldenergia rendszerünk tetszőleges mennyiségű termelői kapacitás befogadására és nagyszámú, felelősen gondolkodó vállalati ügyfél kiszolgálására képes. Szolgáltatásaink hozzájárulnak ügyfeleink dekarbonizációs és hosszú távú versenyképességi céljainak eléréséhez.  With the Green Cloud Decarbonization Platform, we aim to create and maintain a new green energy marketplace, fundamentally simplifying green energy contracting and procurement. Our state-of-the-art solution bridges renewable energy providers, investors and corporates dedicated to real sustainability impact. A Green Cloud Dekarbonizációs Platform néven egy nyílt zöldenergia-piacteret építünk és működtetünk, amely egyedülálló módon egyszerűsíti le a zöldenergia értékesítését és fogyasztását. Korszerű megoldásunk segítségével hidat építünk a termelők, befektetők és a fenntarthatóság mellett elkötelezett vállalkozások közé.

Name: Filter Plus
Company description: Filter Plus is an Estonian company established in 2019. Our main line of business is manufacturing air and ventilation filters. We have 10 years of experience in the field and we aim to offer our clients high quality ventilation filters to keep their indoor climates clean and save on electricity bills. Filter plus offers extensive customization options for private labeling – from the design of the frames to the personalized details on labels such as QR codes, logos, and EAN codes. This service is not just about adding a brand name, it's about delivering a product that is completely aligned with your brand's identity and values, right down to the packaging.

Name: Cambridge Health Plan Benelux
Company description: Het Cambridge dieet is voor mensen met (zwaar) overgewicht, die snel willen afvallen en met andere diëten onvoldoende resultaat boeken. Al na enkele dagen raakt het lichaam in ketose en start de vetverbranding.   Het Cambridge dieet is ontwikkeld aan de universiteit van Cambridge. Doctor Allan Howard verrichtte alles bij elkaar 7 jaar onderzoek naar het dieet, in samenwerking met Addenbrook’s Hospital. Hierover verschenen diverse wetenschappelijke publicaties. De sleutel is het lage percentage koolhydraten. Omdat het lichaam minder koolhydraten binnen krijgt dan het strikt gezien nodig heeft, gaat het lichaam zelf op zoek naar zijn eigen reserves. Wanneer deze op zijn, wordt de volgende energieleverancier in het lichaam aangesproken: overtollig vet! Enkele dagen na het begin van het dieet start de vetverbranding. Dit is een medisch volkomen verantwoorde manier om snel gewicht te verliezen. Intussen krijgt het licham in de vorm van uitgebalanceerde shakes, soepen en repen, alle benodigde voedingsstoffen binnen, inclusief vitaminen en mineralen.  Het dieet is uitsluitend verkrijgbaar via een onafhankelijk Cambridge consulent. Onderzoeken wijzen uit dat het volgen van een dieet onder begeleiding effectiever is, dan zonder begeleiding. Met name de consulenten van Cambridge vormen in dit opzicht een toegevoegde waarde.

Name: CHATRON
HQ Location: Portugal, Vale De Cambra, Nº 95 Travessa Da Zona Industrial 1 Rossio, 3730-601
Company description: Chatron manufactures and sells products in the area of Natural Solar Lighting, contributing to the reduction of companies' energy bills. The products sold by Chatron are mostly developed and manufactured in this new and modern manufacturing unit located in Portugal. Main products: ▶ Solar Light Tube - natural lighting (residential, commercial and industrial) ▶ Smart Biocooler – evaporative cooling (industrial / commercial) ▶ Uranus System - recessed lighting (Solar + Led) Chatron currently has a total area of approximately 5,000 m2, including offices, laboratory, development, production and warehouse. 📌 Located in the Rossio Industrial Zone, in Vale de Cambra, in one of the most industrialized regions of Portugal (about 40 km south of Porto). Chatron's growth comes as the world awakens to this new reality of protecting the environment and reducing rampant energy consumption. Our core business is "to develop, produce and integrate climate and environmental products using the best available technology to make them as efficient and environmentally friendly as possible."

Name: ENERGY PROGRESS SpA
Company description: Energy Progress S.p.A. è il primo fornitore di Gas ed Energia elettrica di Castrovillari operante sull'intero territorio nazionale. Propone vantaggiose offerte di mercato libero per clienti domestici, enti e piccole e medie imprese.  La presenza diretta sul territorio si traduce in un servizio efficiente, personalizzato e attento alle singole esigenze dei propri utenti con sistema di qualità certificato ISO 9001:2015. E' inoltre impresa di riferimento per la realizzazione di impianti per la produzione di energia da fonti rinnovabili. Società del gruppo Esco Gas S.r.L. certificata secondo la norma UNI CEI 11352. Energy Progress S.p.A. : Tutto il gas e la luce di cui hai bisogno!

Name: Warmte Transitiecentrum Groningen | WTCG
Company description: Het WTCG is de samenwerking van de Groninger gemeenten en de provincie om de warmtetransitie te versnellen. Wij geloven dat duurzame warmte iedereen nieuw woongeluk geeft. In energie ligt opnieuw de basis om comfort en welvaart te vergroten. En als nieuwe energie groen is draagt het ook bij aan ons welzijn. Wij vinden het logisch dat Groningers hierin voorop gaan, want hun welzijn staat extra onder druk. Na de gaswinning heeft de regio met de transitie naar duurzame warmte een nieuw perspectief in het vooruitzicht waar we snel werk van willen maken. Zo maken we de transitie eerlijk en veilig, als duurzame aanjager voor wijk en dorpsvernieuwing en blijvend woongeluk. Samen versnellen maakt ons koploper. Het welzijn van Groningers staat bovengemiddeld onder druk, omdat de inkomens relatief laag zijn en energierekeningen juist hoog. Gaswinning heeft in een groot deel van de provincie zijn sporen achtergelaten. Maar ook de vergrijzing is omvangrijker dan in andere delen van Nederland. Het maakt investeren in eveneens oudere woningen moeilijk of niet aantrekkelijk meer. En als het geld en de wil er wel is, dan is verduurzamen vaak lastig. Het lukt velen om verschillende redenen niet om goede stappen te maken. Daar willen we verandering in brengen. Vanuit onze visie heeft Groningen alles in huis om koploper in de transitie te zijn. Alleen door samen op te trekken pakken we problemen aan die grootschalige verduurzaming in de weg staan. Met een krachtige, gezamenlijke aanpak waardoor iedere Groninger mee kan doen. Het transitiecentrum verschaft helderheid en is een gids voor gemeenten, provincie en partners in transitie. Met een praktische en innovatieve aanpak voor de gewenste versnelling. We ondersteunen ambtenaren, colleges en gemeenteraden proactief in hun transitietaak met kennis, capaciteit en middelen. Wij nemen regie op samenwerking om de kentering te bevorderen. Om grip te krijgen, samen aan de slag te gaan en Groningers grote stappen vooruit te helpen.

Name: The Sustainables
Company description: We offer high-tech scalable solutions to a wide range of partners, from energy providers to banks and manufacturers of sustainable energy measures. With our licensed applications we already reach half of all Dutch home-owners, helping them to make the transition towards energy sustainable home and efficient buildings.

Name: IFS Probity
Company description: IFS Probity*, de Utilities en Order to Cash specialist! * sinds 1 september 2021 onderdeel van Ordina Vooruitgang. Dynamiek. Complexiteit. Dat zit diep in het dna van IFS Probity, al sinds de start in 2001. Op onze eigen – eigengereide en persoonlijke manier – helpen we bedrijven en organisaties om te verbeteren op het snijvlak van IT en business. Als partners in improvement. De roots van IFS Probity liggen in de utilities. We kennen deze sector als geen ander en kunnen daardoor energieleveranciers, netbeheerders en waterbedrijven helpen met de meest complexe business en IT-vraagstukken. Door de jaren heen hebben we daarnaast diepgaande expertise opgebouwd op het gebied van high volume order-to-cashprocessen. Die kennis zetten we inmiddels breed in voor klanten uit verschillende sectoren. IFS Probity helpt bedrijven en organisaties om essentiële, complexe en high volume processen op het snijvlak van IT en business te verbeteren. Meer concreet bieden wij diensten aan op vlakken zoals: - Applicatie consultancy - Business consultancy  - Project- en procesmanagement Vragen of interesse? Neem dan contact op: IFS Probity B.V.  Stationsweg 183-B 3771 VG Barneveld  0342-420120 / info@ifsprobity.nl

Name: Heatprofs
Company description: Heatprofs helpt klanten om hun woning te verduurzamen, door over verduurzamingsmaatregelen te adviseren en deze vervolgens door te voeren. Dat is een toekomstbestendige oplossing voor de huidige hoge energietarieven enerzijds en de afhankelijkheid van buitenlandse energieleveranciers anderzijds.  Wie zijn stroom en warmte uit duurzame bronnen haalt of zelfs volledig energieneutraal woont, is minder afhankelijk van de grillen van energiemaatschappijen en geopolitieke ontwikkelingen.

Name: Energy Services
Company description: Kent u dat? Dat u door de jungle van energieleveranciers, netbeheerders, meetbedrijven en installateurs niet meer weet waar u moet beginnen om de beste energievoorziening voor uw organisatie te realiseren? Tel hier ook nog eens alle technologische ontwikkelingen bij op, plús de snel veranderende energie wet- en regelgeving, en uw uitdaging is compleet. Energy Services maakt al uw energievraagstukken graag een stuk simpeler. Niet alleen besparen we op uw kosten, managen we uw verbruik of komen we met een onderbouwd energieplan, we nemen uw volledige energieportefeuille uit handen. Zo kunt u zich op de business richten waar ú goed in bent. Wij worden graag uw nieuwe collega op energiegebied. Welkom bij Energy Services!

Name: Groen Eerlijk Nederland
HQ Location: Netherlands, South Holland, Alphen Aan Den Rijn, 11 Koperweg, 2401
Company description: Groen Eerlijk Nederland is opgezet om misbruik binnen de energiebranche tegen te gaan en zogezegd de stem te zijn voor het recht van de consument.  Wij hebben het onze missie gemaakt om het onderzoeksproces naar de meest voordelige energieleverancier volledig uit handen te nemen voor de consument.  Uit talloze onderzoeken is gebleken dat er vaak te veel wordt betaald voor gas en elektra. Wij als Groen Eerlijk Nederland hebben dit zelf ook meegemaakt in ons persoonlijk leven. Vaak wordt er gebruik gemaakt van ‘’slapende klanten’’, waar wij zelf ook een van waren.  Wij hebben alle universele behoeften van de consument gerangschikt: hierdoor wordt alles gefilterd en wordt er alleen op maat gewerkt met de klant. Wij bij Groen Eerlijk Nederland geloven erin dat we ervoor kunnen zorgen dat elke klant een fijn gevoel heeft bij hun leverancier én dat het voldoet aan hun eisen en behoeftes. Zowel financieel als op andere vlakken. Dit doen wij op een groene, maar vooral eerlijke manier.

Name: PakketAdvies B.V.
Company description: We have been working with qualified private and business energy suppliers for many years. Our advisors receive further training on a daily basis and are always aware of all the ins and outs of the energy market. Everyone at PakketAdvies is happy to help you make the right choice regarding your energy matters. We believe it is important that our customers receive a realistic, honest and clear picture of the energy market. Our offers are therefore always clear, unambiguous and tailored to your specific situation.

Name: Sol-Living GmbH
HQ Location: Germany, Lower Saxony, Wallenhorst, 1 Am Hollager Berg, 49134
Company description: First see what can be done - then do what can be seen! Become your own electricity supplier - with sun, the best storage technology and us as an experienced partner at your side. As a service company, our focus is on the project planning and commissioning of energy supply systems for private households and the power supply of medium-sized companies. We deliver photovoltaic systems that realize our vision. With our Sol Living Hybrid system, our customers take their energy future into their own hands.

Name: EnQu
Company description: Wer wir sind und was wir bieten Die in Kiel und Berlin ansässige enQu GmbH versorgt viele tausend Haushalts- und Gewerbekunden sicher und zuverlässig mit Energie: Strom und Erdgas. Bundesweit. Seit 2017 ist Statkraft, Europas größter Erzeuger erneuerbarer Energie, an enQu beteiligt. Neben attraktiven Preisen setzt enQu auf kundenfreundliche Vertragsbedingungen, innovative Strom- und Gastarife und zahlreichen Serviceleistungen.  Wer uns auszeichnet  In der bundesweit durchgeführten Vergleichsstudie „Stromanbieter 02/2017“ der Deutschen Gesellschaft für Verbraucherstudien mbH (DtGV) belegte enQu unter hundert weiteren Energieversorgern einen erfolgreichen 3. Platzt. Wen wir versorgen enQu wendet sich an Haushalts- und Gewerbekunden, die Wert auf eine preiswerte Energiebelieferung mit zuverlässigem Service und konstanten Preisen legen. Kunden, die Interesse an klimaneutralen Energieprodukten, praktischen onlinebasierten Zusatzleistungen, aber auch Interesse an Lieferungen mit preiswertem Erdgas und Heizstrom besitzen, bietet enQu ein zeitgemäßes wie vielfältiges Portfolio an Produkten.  Was unsere Kunden schätzen  Die Kommunikation zwischen Unternehmen und Kunde erfolgt vorzugsweise digital. Ähnlich einer Onlinebank entfallen zeitraubende Telefonate oder Besuche im Servicecenter.  enQu Kunden haben stets einen bequemen Online - Zugriff auf ein überraschend umfangreiches Service- und Dienstleistungsangebot. enQu Kunden entscheiden darüber hinaus selbst, ob sie diese preisbegünstigt elektronisch oder eher konventionell in Anspruch nehmen.

Name: K2 Systems GmbH
Company description: K2 Systems GmbH is a leading provider of innovative mounting systems and digital solutions for solar energy applications. The company is dedicated to facilitating the transition to renewable energy by offering user-friendly and flexible mounting solutions that cater to a wide range of installations, including rooftops, facades, and parking areas. K2 Systems aims to enhance the efficiency and safety of solar installations through continuous product development and the integration of advanced technologies, such as AI for obstacle detection. Their target market includes solar installers, project developers, and energy providers, with a strong emphasis on collaboration with partners in the solar industry. By participating in key industry events like Intersolar, K2 Systems showcases its commitment to innovation and expertise, providing valuable resources and support to both newcomers and professionals in the photovoltaic sector.

Name: CPR Energía
Company description: 💡 ¡Bienvenidos a Cuestión de Prioridades SL! 💡 Somos una asesoría energética con más de 5 años de experiencia en el sector, comprometidos con mejorar la eficiencia energética y ahorrar dinero para nuestros clientes en todo el territorio español. Creemos firmemente que la eficiencia energética es una cuestión de prioridades y por eso nos esforzamos por ofrecer soluciones personalizadas y orientadas a resultados. Nuestro equipo de expertos trabaja mano a mano con nuestros clientes para mejorar su eficiencia y ahorrar dinero en sus facturas de energía. Ofrecemos soluciones tanto en el ámbito eléctrico como fotovoltáico, para garantizar que nuestros clientes obtengan el máximo rendimiento y ahorro de su factura. Tanto si es para tu residencia como para negocio estamos seguros de que podemos ayudarte y orientarte.  #EficienciaEnergética #AhorroDeEnergía #AsesoríaEnergética #SolucionesPersonalizadas #OrientadasAResultados #EnergíaEléctrica #EnergíaFotovoltáica

Name: Ebalanceplus
Company description: ebalanceplus project aims to create smart solutions to   - predict and unlock the energy flexibility - manage the grid flexibility with new business models and resilience services - store energy and control electric power in multiple devices  - avoid grid congestion and power peaks - improve grid performance - reduce environmental impact and energy bills. The project will demonstrate its solutions in 4 demo sites in Denmark, France, Italy and Spain.  This project has received funding from the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under grant agreement N°864283

Name: Zirconite De Negocios
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Lleida, 8 Carrer Cristófol De Boleda, 25008
Company description: Zirconite de Negocios nace para dar respuesta a dos necesidades del sector energético, la atención personalizada al cliente y el ahorro de costes.  Somos asesores energéticos y colaboradores oficiales de Iberdrola. La eficiencia energética es un punto importante para reducir el consumo de energía, ahorrar costes energéticos y mejorar la sostenibilidad medioambiental.  Al utilizar la energía de forma eficiente, podemos reducir nuestra dependencia de los combustibles fósiles, que contribuyen al cambio climático y aumentan la contaminación. Zirconite revisa y analiza tus contratos energéticos y las condiciones contratadas, para garantizar que tu contratación sea la mejor opción para tu empresa y el mejor precio según tu consumo. Analizamos tus facturas de energía y los contratos de suministro, para la asistencia y gestión en la negociación con nuestro proveedor de energía, Iberdrola, con el fin de reducir tus costes energéticos, negociar el mejor contrato y costes para tu consumo. Al trabajar con nosotros, las empresas pueden alcanzar sus objetivos de sostenibilidad y, al mismo tiempo, crear un impacto positivo en sus resultados. Si quieres colaborar con nosotros y quieres seguir creciendo, necesitamos gente como tú, inconformista, que quiera desarrollarse profesionalmente en una empresa puntera en el sector. Buscamos colaboradores energéticos con perfil comercial para asesorar a empresas ofreciendo soluciones que les permitan reducir los costes del consumo energético, así como dotarles de las herramientas necesarias para una correcta gestión energética.  Si estás interesado en colaborar con nosotros, contáctanos en el 973 268 797 ¡Esperamos tener noticias tuyas!

Name: Sun4All Project
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 3 Calle De Camprodon, 08012
Company description: Following a two-level approach, consisting of financial support and community-related activities, the Horizon 2020 funded project #Sun4All will help households, which are facing the risk of #energypoverty, to switch to #renewableenergy while reducing their energy bills. The Sun4All support scheme will be tested in Europe by the cities of Almada (PT), Barcelona (ES), and Rome (IT) and by the community of municipalities Coeur de Savoie (FR). Solar power to the people! Visit our website: https://sunforall.eu/ Contact us via e-mail: info@sunforall.eu

Name: Staria Technologies
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Santa Perpètua De Mogoda, 18 Carrer De Obradors, 08130
Company description: Currently, there are 15 million streetlights in Spain, of which only 0.1% are solar-powered. Spain is the European Union country with the most hours of sunlight and the country that pays the most for public lighting electricity. Staria Technologies is a leader in creating intelligent solar lighting solutions for outdoor spaces through the use of sustainable energy. ❶ No electricity bills to light your streets or businesses ❷ Quick installation without the need for cables ❸ Intelligent solar-powered streetlight with the most efficient components on the market ❹ Control of the streetlights through management software ❺ Zero-emission product ❻ Recyclable product ⚒️ PRODUCT DESIGNED AND MANUFACTURED IN BARCELONA Staria Technologies leads the energy transition towards a more sustainable world. 📞 +34 622 08 26 53 💌 gerard@stariatechnologies.com 🌐 www.stariatechnologies.com

Name: Solar Components I Distribuidor Energía Solar
HQ Location: Spain, Valencia, Torrent, 40 Nave 8 Calle Tonellet, 46900
Company description: Proveedor de energía solar

Name: Sonnen Spain
Company description: La energía limpia y asequible para todos es uno de los mayores desafíos de nuestro tiempo. Con sede en el pueblo energético bávaro de Wildpoldsried, sonnen GmbH quiere que todas las personas determinen su propio futuro energético. Eso significa, entre otras cosas, la producción y el almacenamiento económicos de energía renovable y la interconexión inteligente de productores y consumidores. sonnen ofrece así a las personas de todo el mundo la oportunidad de independizarse de los combustibles fósiles y del proveedor de energía convencional. En sonnen, estamos construyendo el sistema energético del futuro. Un sistema energético en el que la electricidad sea limpia y las personas sean las protagonistas. Para ello, estamos desarrollando nuevas tecnologías y modelos de negocio que antes no existían. Ya sea almacenamiento de energía inteligente, centrales eléctricas virtuales o servicios digitales, marcamos las tendencias de un nuevo mundo energético. Esto crea un espacio para la innovación, la creatividad, la pasión y las oportunidades de desarrollo personal en una empresa en rápido crecimiento. Nuestro impulso es nuestra visión de energía limpia y asequible para todos. Porque queremos que nuestro planeta siga siendo habitable para la próxima generación. Si quieres cambiar y rediseñar el sistema de energía junto con nosotros, esperamos recibir tu solicitud a través de nuestra página de contacto https://sonnen.es/contacto-cliente-lp/

Name: Solarsì Surl
Company description: Le strade da percorrere sono 2 , continuare sulle costosissime fossili pensando che per alimentare casa piuttosto che Azienda occorrano ancora Gas Gasolio e fornitori di Energia elettrica , tutto a vantaggio dei poteri forti , oppure acquisire piena consapevolezza che non occorre altro che energia solare fornita da madre natura per essere completamente autonomi e liberi da qualsiasi bolletta .

Name: Nowcast
Company description: “A system which perfectly detects and records every single lightning stroke, with all its characteristics – this objective is definitive for nowcast” – Prof. Hans-Dieter Betz, inventor of LINET nowcast has developed an extraordinarily efficient and precise lightning detection system. As a leader in quality nowcast delivers its data to national weather services, energy suppliers, insurance companies and many more sectors with highly reliable and comprehensive lightning data. The system stems from the long-standing research work carried out by Prof. Hans-Dieter Betz at the Ludwig-Maximilians-University in Munich. In the year 2002, nowcast GmbH was founded for the purpose of marketing this technology. Since then, the lightning-detection system has been successfully offered all over the world under the brand name of LINET (Lightning Detection Network). The central spheres of activity of nowcast GmbH comprise research and development in the field of lightning-detection, as well as the operation and sale of the lightning-detection system LINET and the meteorological uses derived from it and storm data.

Name: Baer Energie- & Messtechnik GmbH
Company description: Founded in 1987, baer Energie & Messtechnik is the go-to specialist for communications and energy measurement solutions. Our products are used in industry and by energy providers around the world. We believe that the challenge of our generation can only be met by better control and reduced energy consumption and that you can only do that when you have a clear picture of what’s actually happening. That’s why we develop meter data capture and transmission technologies that give our customers a clear and accurate insight into their energy consumption in real time. It’s not only energy efficiency that is driving change. Social and technological developments, such as eMobility, together with industry deregulation are increasing competition and forcing companies to focus on new business models. Whether you’re dealing with electricity, gas or water, building energy management or district heating,  our products and expertise can help you maximise these new opportunities and the revenue streams that they offer. Contact and legal: http://baer-emt.de/contact/

Name: Voltfox
Company description: 24/7 Carbon-Free Energy (CFE) Solutions Voltfox is an energy sector software provider based in Germany. The company was founded in 2018 to help accelerate the digital transformation of the energy industry using blockchain technology. We are proud to be the only early-stage European startup invested in by the famous Draper University Ventures. At Voltfox, we are at the forefront of the energy industry's transition towards sustainability. Our specialized 24/7 Carbon-Free Energy (CFE) software for energy providers represents the cutting edge of this transformation. 24/7 Carbon-Free Energy Matching is the core of our innovative approach. It involves the precise matching of energy generation with consumption to contribute to reducing greenhouse gas emissions, making a positive impact on the environment and climate change. Using our software, the energy providers simplify climate action for their energy off-takers.  We are committed to transforming the energy landscape by making 24/7 Carbon-Free Energy matching an industry standard. By working with Voltfox, you're not just investing in software; you're investing in a greener, more sustainable future for our planet. Voltfox is a proud member of Eurelectric and the United Nations 24/7 CFE Compact.  Join us in our mission to harness the full potential of clean energy and lead the way toward a more sustainable world.

Name: SemanticEdge
Company description: Founded in 2000, SemanticEdge is a pioneer in conversational AI, specializing in advanced AI-driven solutions that transform human-machine communication for some of Europe’s largest banks, insurers, and energy providers. With over 20 years of innovation, we harness the latest in generative AI to deliver natural, intuitive customer interactions. Our interdisciplinary team has built award-winning AI assistants that power seamless conversations. These solutions, field-tested across millions of interactions, deliver exceptional customer experiences by continuously adapting to the highest standards of language understanding and voice recognition technology. Our AI-driven platforms have been showcased at global trade fairs in Berlin, Amsterdam, London, New Orleans, and Las Vegas. As a leader in conversational AI, we combine deep industry experience with cutting-edge generative AI, providing a unique competitive advantage to our clients as they adapt to the evolving landscape of AI-powered customer service.

Name: Mindline Energy
Company description: mindline energy ist das bundesweit einzige Institut, das sich auf die Forschung für Energieversorger und kommunale Dienstleister spezialisiert hat. Mit über 100 Kunden in der Versorgungsbranche arbeitet mindline energy für große und kleine Stadtwerke, für Regionalversorger und für neue Energieanbieter. Große Verbundunternehmen mit vielen Sparten gehören ebenso zu den Kunden wie kleine Spezialisten im Bereich der Versorgungswirtschaft. Darüber hinaus hat mindline energy besondere Forschungsexpertise im Software- und Immobilienbereich. Datenschutz: https://mindline.de/mindline-energy/datenschutz Impressum: https://mindline.de/mindline-energy/impressum

Name: ECozy
Company description: The Future of Heating: Smart, Efficient, and Sustainable with eCozy The smart home market is booming, yet many heating systems remain outdated – inefficient, inconvenient, and far from eco-friendly. The result? High energy bills, wasted resources, and frustrated users. That’s where eCozy comes in. We develop intelligent radiator thermostats that combine sleek design, intuitive control, and cutting-edge technology. Our mission: to make heating smarter, more efficient, and more sustainable – for households and commercial partners alike. What sets eCozy apart: ✅ Smart Technology: Intelligent algorithms optimize energy use and cut operating costs. ✅ User-Friendly: Quick installation, seamless smart home integration, and easy-to-use controls. ✅ Sustainable: Save energy and reduce your CO₂ footprint – without compromising on comfort. ✅ Award-Winning Design: Recognized with two Red Dot Awards for outstanding design and innovation. Who is eCozy for? 🏭 Industry Players: Expand your product line with innovative thermostats. 🏢 Proptech Companies: Boost property value with energy-efficient solutions. 🏠 Homeowners: Enjoy more control, comfort, and cost savings. Why work with eCozy? ✔ Innovation: We’re setting new standards in the smart heating space. ✔ Efficiency: Reduce energy consumption by up to 30%. ✔ Reliable Partnership: We deliver tailored solutions – from concept to launch. Ready to revolutionize heating? Visit ecozy.de or contact us directly – we look forward to connecting with you.

Name: Berg Energie GmbH
Company description: Berg Energie GmbH has been reliably supplying the Worms region with heat for 70 years. We are an independent energy supplier and Aral brand sales partner based in Worms. As an owner-managed family business, we are deeply rooted in the region. Berg Energie therefore stands for honesty, transparency and personality. Let us convince you too!

Name: EQuota
Company description: Wir sind eQuota, ein Digital-Startup mit Sitz in Berlin. Wir vermarkten für unsere Kunden die CO2-Einsparungen im Rahmen der gesetzlich vorgeschriebenen Treibhausgasminderungsquote (THG-Quote) aus der Inverkehrbringung aller alternativen Kraftstoffe, wie z.B. Ladestrom, Biomethan oder grünen Wasserstoff. Dadurch verschaffen wir unseren Kunden attraktive Zusatzerlöse bei minimalem Aufwand für die Abwicklung der erforderlichen Prozesse. Zu unseren Kunden gehören Stadtwerke & EVU, Betreiber von Ladepunkten und deren Dienstleister sowie gewerbliche als auch private E-Mobilisten. Quotenverpflichteten Mineralölunternehmen ermöglichen wir einen einfachen und planbaren Zugang zu neuen Erfüllungsoptionen der THG-Quote. Unsere Dienstleistungen umfassen: - automatisierte, digitale Erfassung und Verarbeitung der für die THG-Quote relevanten Daten und Dokumente - Abwicklung aller behördlichen Prozesse - Bündelung der THG-Quoten unserer Kunden für eine erfolgreiche Vermarktung - Vermarktung der THG-Quoten zu Großhandelspreisen ************ We are eQuota, a Berlin based digital startup. We market the CO2 savings generated from using renewable fuels within the legally required greenhouse gas reduction quota (GHG quota) framework. We provide attractive additional revenues with minimal effort for handling the required processes to our customers. Our customers include municipal utilities & energy suppliers, charging point operators and their service providers, as well as commercial and private e-vehicle owners. We provide mineral oil companies with easy and predictable access to new GHG quota fulfillment options. Our services include: - automated, digital collection and processing of data and documents relevant to the GHG quota - Handling of all regulatory processes - Bundling of our customers' GHG quotas for successful marketing - Marketing of the GHG quotas at wholesale prices (bearbeitet)

Name: MINI-NRG
Company description: eLUMEN GmbH is a distribution partner of APSystems®, Jolywood® and Hoymiles®. We can supply customers in Germany, Austria and Switzerland with solar panels, micro-inverters and LEDs within 5 working days. The product warranty is up to 15 years. We want to help everyone significantly reduce electricity bills and protect the precious environment. Free yourself from polluting energy now and secure clean solar energy easily and free of charge!

Name: ENERGIE BARRANDOV
Company description: Energie Barrandov je výhradně český dodavatel elektřiny a plynu se specializací na domácnosti. Jsme Energetickým Regulačním Úřadem licencovaný dodavatel a zákazníci tedy mají jistotu dodávek elektřiny a plynu. Jsme mladou společností, ale náš team tvoří odborníci z energetiky s mnohaletými zkušenostmi. Energie Barrandov je alternativní dodavatel energií a od dominantních dodavatelů se lišíme osobním přístupem, flexibilitou našich cen a jednoduchostí.

Name: Swemet AB
Company description: SweMet AB (Publ, PLC) is an established supplier of smart grid and smart metering technology with services in the Nordics and Internationally based on AMR and AMM Automatic Meter Reading and Automated Meter Management. We create the future of smarter grids and from our earliest days, we have been servicing Energy Suppliers to boost their reliability and electricity distribution.  We want to be at the forefront of developing and deploying Industrial Internet and smart grid technology. Our customers operate, maintain, and develop energy distribution systems, based on smart metering, as well as on the refinement and utilization of grid data. Our solutions enable Energy Suppliers to achieve their primary responsibility, to ensure faultless delivery of electricity to end users. We help them better manage risks, detect and fix problems faster, and deal with the demands of the smarter grid.

Name: JSC Saikas
Company description: Our company specializes in developing insurance and accounting information systems. We offer such back end and front end systems: - Insurance IS; - Insurance self-service systems; - Accounting and Business management system; - Work time and payroll accounting system; - Accounting system for heat energy suppliers.

Name: Controol
Company description: De wereld van energie verandert in een rap tempo. Controol kan het verschil maken voor uw klant door de energie behoefte in kaart te brengen. Hierdoor creëert men bewustwording en is men in staat de energiebehoefte naar de toekomst toe beter te voorspellen.  Controol biedt allerlei slimme oplossingen om klanten de regie in handen te geven en hun totale energiekosten te managen en te optimaliseren. Daarbij maakt het voor uw eindklant niet uit wie zijn of haar netbeheerder of energieleverancier is.

Name: OZE PROJEKT S.A.
Company description: OZE PROJEKT S.A. is a Polish company dedicated to providing essential contact information for local energy suppliers, particularly in an era marked by increasing digitalization and reliance on electricity. The company aims to facilitate quick access to contact details for energy providers, ensuring that households and businesses can efficiently address technical inquiries or emergencies. With a mission to enhance safety and peace of mind for its clients, OZE PROJEKT S.A. serves a diverse clientele, including individual consumers and businesses across Poland, where over 90% of the population uses electricity daily.  In addition to its information services, OZE PROJEKT S.A. specializes in renewable energy solutions, particularly focusing on heat pumps, including air, ground, and water models. The company is committed to providing efficient and sustainable heating solutions that cater to the diverse needs of its clients, ranging from individual homeowners to larger residential communities. By promoting energy efficiency and reducing environmental impact through its innovative products and services, OZE PROJEKT S.A. positions itself as a leader in the renewable energy sector. The company collaborates with reputable manufacturers and suppliers to ensure high-quality offerings that enhance energy independence for its customers. With a vision centered on delivering reliable and eco-friendly energy solutions, OZE PROJEKT S.A. is well-equipped to meet the growing demand for sustainable energy alternatives in the market. Through its dual focus on providing critical contact information and innovative renewable energy solutions, OZE PROJEKT S.A. plays a vital role in supporting the energy needs of Polish consumers and businesses alike.

Name: Wenable
Company description: Wenable gelooft in eerlijk en persoonlijk contact voor zowel consumenten als leveranciers.  Wenable is een projectorganisatie welke met meerdere labels actief is in de verkoop en verduurzaming van de energiehuishouding. Hierbij streven wij ernaar om zowel consumenten als zakelijke gebruikers te ontzorgen met betrekking tot hun energierekeningen en is tevens ons doel de energiekosten zo laag mogelijk te houden.  Wenable is er voor iedereen. Wij zijn de specialist op het gebied van data-generatie, -beheer en -distributie. Met onze kennis en ervaring bundelen wij deze data samen met andere SAAS applicaties tot een tailor-made pakket voor telemarketing in de sectoren energie, telecom, verzekeringen en hypotheken.  Het resultaat? Wenable ontzorgt en neemt alle activiteiten met betrekking tot zowel de outbound als inbound telemarketing en klantenservice inclusief compliance van jouw bedrijf over.

Name: ComSensus
Company description: ComSensus d.o.o, based in Ljubljana (Slovenia), is an innovation and high-tech SME founded in 2011. Our main activity is focused on the development of highly customized products and solutions for remote monitoring and control, predominantly for the energy sector and the IoT business segment. For the last years, ComSensus has got specialized on the development of real-time data measurement and processing solutions related to the deployment of smart homes and buildings, and focused on the improvement of energy efficiency for both energy providers and consumers, as well as optimization of energy consumption and usage.

Name: Energomat.pl
Company description: New breed of utility company. We're an independent, online PL electricity supplier and broker. We allow our customers to switch energy supplier online in less than 60 seconds! Looking for international partners.

Name: GlowPower Ireland
Company description: We are an exciting new energy supplier that has recently entered the Irish market. Glowpower is led by energy industry experts with over 30 years of combined industry experience across the globe. We formed to breathe new innovative thinking into the stale energy market. We oppose out-dated thinking, old practices and excessive charging. We believe in listening to customers and to building market-leading designs and solutions from the ground up. We believe in partnerships, collaborations and outsourcing to industry’s best brains. Our promise is to be accountable for our actions. We are committed to listening and helping you understand and benefit from energy usage education. Glowpower exists to deliver electricity to you in the most cost effective, seamless and transparent experience possible. We want to empower you to manage your own and your community energy needs with smart technology plus the best combined energy services, innovative designs and savings.

Name: ADERRO GP ENERGY
Company description: Suntem echipa care în 2010 a pornit la drum cu dorinţa de a oferi clienţilor servicii profesioniste şi de calitate, personalizate în cel mai mic detaliu dar la cele mai înalte standarde, având ca suport un colectiv de oameni dedicaţi, care sunt in stare să pună clientul pe primul loc, adică servicii exact aşa cum am fi vrut noi sa primim. Activăm pe o piaţă efervescentă şi în continuă schimbare, dar rămânem oneşti şi transparenţi faţă de valorile noastre. Suntem furnizorul de energie electrică pregătit să răspundă prompt, 24/24 şi 7/7, oricăror provocări, susţinând oricând interesele clienţilor noştri.  Suntem furnizori de lumină, căldură, mişcare şi voie bună. Suntem ADERRO. ____________________________________________________________ We are the team that started out in 2010 with the desire to provide customers professional and quality services, customized in the smallest detail but to the highest standards, with the support of a team of dedicated people who are able to put the customer on first place, ie services exactly as we wanted to receive. We activate in a effervescent and changing market, but remain honest and transparent to our values. We are the electricity supplier ready to respond promptly, 24/24 and 7/7, to any challenges, supporting always our clients' interests.  We are suppliers of light, heat, movement and fun. We are ADERRO.

Name: Messer Bulgaria
HQ Location: Bulgaria, Sofia-capital, Sofia, 3a Bul Dimitar Peshev, 1528
Company description: Messer is the world's largest privately owned specialist for industrial, medical, and specialty gases. Under the brand 'Messer - Gases for Life', the company offers gases and services in Asia, Europe, and America. The cooperation between the more than 11,500 highly qualified international employees is based on mutual respect. Messer pays particular attention to diversity and inclusion.  Messer's 'Gases for Life' are used in industry, environmental protection, medicine, the food industry, the electronics industry, welding and cutting technology, 3D printing, construction, research and science. Messer offers one of the largest product portfolios on the market and develops application technologies for gases in state-of-the-art competence centers. 'Gases for Life' are as important as water and electricity in most industrial processes and can play a significant role in their decarbonization, for example through the use of green hydrogen, CCUS, or oxyfuel technology. In its customers' processes, Messer's customized gas solutions ensure greater safety, efficiency, quality, capacity, and environmental compatibility and/or reduce the associated emissions and costs.  Messer Bulgaria was established more than 25 years ago and is the first European gas supplier to enter the Bulgarian market.

Name: Seevia
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Leganés, 1 Avenida De Gregorio Peces Barba, 28919
Company description: SEEVIA was born as a spin-off of the AMPL laboratory of the Carlos III University of Madrid. As a research group, we have developed cutting-edge technologies that are a reference in the fields of AI, Computer Vision and Industry. Thanks to this, we are working for leading companies worldwide, such as European car manufacturers, a global insurance company, TIER-1 automotive suppliers, steel manufacturers and renewable energy suppliers, among others. During the development of these projects we have developed a common bond, a common vision of how AI can improve our world. At SEEVIA we materialise this vision and passion for innovation by accompanying our clients in creating accessible and cutting-edge solution.

Name: Precies Advies
Company description: Wij fungeren als zijnde intermediar in de energiesector tussen veelal de meeste energieleveranciers, particulieren en ondernemers. Hierbij word gekeken naar de meest efficiente oplossingen in het kader van kosten besparing en verduurzaming. Doordat wij jarenlange expertise bezitten en nauw samenwerken met diverse partijen in de sector kunnen wij op een pragmatische wijze onze klanten maatwerk bieden.

Name: Coil Defender Europe
HQ Location: Malta, Birkirkara, Birkirkara, Level 3 C/o Smart
Company description: Coil Defender is a world leading technology for the protection of the heat exchange surfaces of HVAC+R systems from corrosion and the other negative effects of the environment. It has a range of unique formulations, manufactured in Australia, to protect air conditioning systems from corrosion and microbiological threats.  Coil Defender products help air conditioning systems work more efficiently, extend their lifespan, reduce electricity bills by saving energy, and create a more comfortable and healthy living space by increasing indoor air quality. The coatings, treatments and cleaners are all water based, non-toxic and environmentally friendly, protecting and enhancing the heat exchange surfaces of air conditioning systems.  Get in touch with our team of professionals to provide you with more information on becoming a reseller or on how to make use of Coil Defender products.

Name: Hub Controls
Company description: Hub Controls is an award-winning Irish tech start-up in the home automation/energy management sector. Founded in 2014 by CEO Oliver Hynes, we launched our first product, the Hub Controller smart thermostat in November 2016. Hub Controller is the only proven energy-saving smart thermostat thanks to the unique Automatic Energy Reduction technology. We make future-proof smart-home products that are easy-to-use, empowering you to have control over your utility bills. The Hub Controller is a smart thermostat that helps you reduce your home energy bills and works on all oil and gas heating systems.

Name: M1GLIO
Company description: Our focus is on the development of complete systems that ensure that all individual products communicate with each other so that a minimum of energy is consumed.  At the start in 2012 we decided to produce all core products such as heat pumps, convectors (cooling and heating), ventilation units and sanitary water tanks, but above all to develop the software with our own people, which enables us to tailor both the devices and the software to each building.  This allows our system to be fully monitored and controlled remotely, allowing our customers to enjoy better aftercare and monitor their energy bills.

Name: Conrad Connect
Company description: Conrad Connect - The Energy Meta Cloud for utilities and electricity providers In a world where sustainability is more important than ever. Conrad Connect enables you to build IoT-driven smart services for your customers without worrying about the complexity of technology. Our proven Energy Meta Cloud and know-how help you to interconnect all relevant energy assets, regardless of type, technology or manufacturer.

Name: Energie.be
HQ Location: Belgium, Saint-josse-ten-noode Brussels Region, 7 Koning Albert Ii Laan, 1210
Company description: Energie.be is een no-nonsense Belgisch groene energieleverancier met één doel: de energiemarkt voorgoed veranderen door ze eenvoudig, eerlijk en duurzaam te maken.  Eerlijkheid boven alles: We blijven weg van misleidende prijsstrategieën en kleine lettertje. Maar bieden één zo scherp mogelijk tarief aan, jij kiest of het vast, variabel of dynamisch is. Dat doen we niet alleen vandaag maar jaar na jaar. Het bewijs hiervan? Check de V-test. Daar vind je ons steeds terug in de top.   Eenvoudiger kan niet: Eenvoud: dát is de rode draad doorheen alles wat we doen. Geen overbodige producten of diensten, of 10 verschillende tarieven voor éénzelfde product, wel verstaanbare mensentaal, een simpele website en gebruiksvriendelijke klantenzone. En we doen alles digitaal. Zo houden wij onze kosten laag en jouw energie goedkoper. Win-win dus! De toekomst is duurzaam: We focussen ons op de lange termijn, voor zowel onze planeet, als onze klanten en collega’s. We maken de energietransitie begrijpbaar voor onze klanten en bieden hun innovatieve oplossingen aan die écht een impact hebben Kortom, bij Energie.be zit je niet alleen vandaag, maar levenslang goed.

Name: JV Digital
Company description: JV Digital is your company for Email marketing & Marketing automation. JV Digital is based in Amsterdam, but works with an international crew of specialists, which live all over the globe. We specialize in marketing automation & email marketing. This has been our main focus since 2012. Our aim Our aim is to help you build better relationships with (potential) customers, in order to gain a better ROI on marketing automation & email marketing campaigns. We deliver the right content, to the right customer at the right time. And preferably in an automated way. This enables us and you (our client) to keep on testing and optimizing the campaigns. Clients Clients differ from NGOs to commercial enterprises – from SMEs to multinationals – and from B2B to B2C. Some examples are: - Greenpeace Netherland (NGO) - Exact (Business software company) - Persgroep (Publisher) - Essent (Energy supplier) - Live on demand (Crowdfunding platform) Interested in our story? Do not hesitate to drop us a line. We are happy to help you out with any questions on email marketing & marketing automation. (without any obligations)  https://jvdgtl.io/contact?utm_source=linkedin&utm_medium=social

Name: Slipper
Company description: Slipper is Norways first power deal auto-switching company helping customers save money on their electricity bills.

Name: AURINO - Dobra Energia
Company description: Nie czekaj, aż rachunki za prąd osiągną niebotyczny poziom.  Przestaw się na dobrą energię od AURINO. Zapewniamy finansowanie w zakresie: ☀ dotacji ☀ leasingu ☀ kredytu ☀ ulgi podatkowej Oferujemy: FARMY FOTOWOLTAICZNE - https://www.aurino.pl/farmy-fotowoltaiczne/ OFERTA DLA DOMU - https://www.aurino.pl/fotowoltaika-dla-domu/ OFERTA DLA BIZNESU - https://www.aurino.pl/fotowoltaika-dla-biznesu/ OFERTA DLA ROLNICTWA - https://www.aurino.pl/fotowoltaika-dla-rolnictwa/ PROJEKTOWANIE - https://www.aurino.pl/projektowanie-instalacji-fotowoltaicznych/ AUDYTY - https://www.aurino.pl/audyty-instalacji-fotowoltaicznych/ SZKOLENIA - https://www.aurino.pl/szkolenia-farmy-fotowoltaiczne/

Name: Beker Energy
Company description: We are consulting, engineering and construction company providing to our Clients best in class technical solutions in photovoltaic and energy management field.  We encourage your company to cut the costs of energy bills and  become zero emission with Beker technical solutions.  Beker is part of the Energy Group – since 2015 we specialize in designing and implementing advanced solutions in the field of railway automation, teletechnics, guaranteed power supply systems, energy distribution and optimization of energy costs for enterprises. We are a group of people oriented towards cooperation, new ideas and progress. We are united by ambition, energy and openness to new things. What we are conservative about is that we exist for our clients. Our Clients are at the heart of everything we do. Always. Find out more about the green solutions we provide. Join us.

Name: NRG Project & Storage
Company description: NRG Project sp. z o.o. to zespół specjalistów z wieloletnią praktyką w branży elektromobilności i magazynowania energii. Jesteśmy producentami najwyższej jakości rozwiązań z obszaru pozyskiwania i gromadzeniem energii elektrycznej. Dostarczamy pakiety bateryjne dla przemysłu górniczego, motoryzacji i systemów awaryjnych. Naszym najnowszym produktem jest zestaw magazyn energii z inwerterem. Zestaw stworzyliśmy aby w sposób niezależny od dostawcy energii móc gromadzić i wykorzystywać energię elektryczną. Więcej o nas na naszej stronie producenta magazynów energii.

Name: BDH - Advies
Company description: Over ons:  BDH - Advies opgericht eind 2005 is een adviesbureau op het gebied van business-to-business marketing strategie voor de installatiebranche en energiesector. Zowel de aanbodzijde van klimaatapparatuur (Zowel woningbouw als utiliteit) als de energiesector (Zowel de energieleveranciers als netwerkbeheerders) maken in de huidige snel veranderende markten gebruik van de diensten van ons bureau. BDH kent 3 kernactiviteiten, te weten: - Advisering op het gebied van marketing strategie. - Ondersteuning brancheorganisaties - Ontwikkeling en implementatie van informatie concepten.

Name: Alpiq Retail CZ
Company description: Jsme inovativní dodavatel elektřiny a plynu pro domácnosti a firmy. Chceme na trh vnést skvělou zákaznickou zkušenost společně se stabilitou švýcarské korporace s více než 100 letou historií.

Name: Era Energy
Company description: (for English, croll down) Era Energy staat voor een nieuwe en unieke manier van zakendoen in de energiemarkt. Waar het grootste deel van de energieleveranciers zich wil onderscheiden door een zo laag mogelijke prijs, geloven wij dat u als klant meer verdient. De prijs is namelijk slechts een momentopname en door veranderingen op de markt kan de prijs op enig moment gunstig, maar op een ander moment weer nadelig uitvallen. Era vindt dat u recht heeft op een compleet aanbod. Dit houdt niet op bij een goed tarief, dat is slechts het begin. Het bevat ook bewustwording van de werking van de energiemarkt en een duurzame oplossing aangereikt krijgen. En hiernaast is nog alle ruimte voor een verbetering van de aarde waarop wij leven! Era Energy stands for a new and unique way of operating in the energymarket. Where most of the energiesuppliers try to differentiate theirselves with low pricing, we believe that you, as a customer, deserve more. Price is temporarily and with the fluctuating prices in the energymarket, the rate can be advantageous at one time, as well as very disadvantageous at another.  Era Energy believes that you deserve a complete offer. This doesn't end with a good price, that's just the beginning. It also contains awareness of how the energiemarket operates, and receiving a durable solution. A solution for a better planet.

Name: ENERTY
HQ Location: Lithuania, Vilnius, Vilnius, 25 Lvovo Str., lt-09320
Company description: ENERTY (previously known as SBE Energy) is a licensed company and has a status of an independent electricity provider. After successful start in 2010 February the company was aquired by the International closed investment fund "Marfello Holdings Limited".  Free market, most importantly, means the possibility to independently decide and choose the most trustworthy and proper service provider for you and to buy the service under the best conditions. ENERTY offers for their customers exactly that service. Lithuania's electricity consumers have the possibility to choose their electricity provider and to sign a contract that will satisfy the needs of both parties.

Name: Anode Energie
Company description: Anode Energie, which was established in the energy capital of Europe, Rotterdam, is an independent Dutch energy supplier active in several West European countries. We are able to offer you a truly unique range of products thanks to our creative and flexible approach. Anode’s products range from simple and easy to understand consumer contracts (fixed price or variable contracts), business contracts (click products, index trackers) to more sophisticated portfolio management solutions, giving you the opportunity to significantly optimise your energy budget. See for more information and contact details: http://www.anode.nl Anode Energie is een zelfstandige Nederlandse energieleverancier. Zij richt zich op (grotere) producenten en afnemers in diverse sectoren. Hierbij verleent zij altijd dezelfde service en klantvriendelijkheid. Het maakt daarbij niet uit, of zij handelt in energie met grotere industriële klanten, de glastuinbouw, kantoren, kleine zakelijke verbruikers (MKB) of particulieren. Anode Energie handelt hiernaast op diverse binnenlandse en buitenlandse energiemarkten. Hiervoor heeft het bedrijf de beschikking over zowel een Nederlandse, Luxemburgse als diverse Belgische leveringsvergunningen. De activiteiten op energiegebied strekken zich ook al uit tot landen als Duitsland, Oostenrijk en Zwitserland. Kijk voor meer informatie en contactgegevens http://www.anode.nl

Name: TeaMWise
Company description: Teamwise is a demand-response aggregator in the Belgian and Dutch electricity market. We provide ancillary services to Elia and TenneT, the Belgian and Dutch Transmission System Operators, using demand side resources and decentralized generation. If your company has flexible consumption or decentral generation (including emergency generators), we can help overcome technical, administrative and financial barriers, so you can monetise this flexibility while contributing to grid security. Teamwise is a cooperation between Nuhma and energy supplier Anode Energie - both have a large experience in the energy market, and put this experience at Teamwise's disposal.

Name: Mr. Energie

Company description: Mr. Energie is an energy broker. Mr. Energie manages your energy contracts to provide you with the best conditions on the market. We conduct an active management of your bills. Mr. Energie selects the cheapest provider according to your profile 3. Mr. Energie transfers you to this provider  4. Mr. Energie keeps an eye on the market to ensure you that your bill stays low!    Mr. Energie counts already over 6 000 satisfied clients and 700 companies. A real community that want their bills actively managed without the administrative hassles. Why not take a closer look at Mr. Energie? We’re sure that you’ll realise wonderful things can happen! Moreover, Mr. Energie has won this year's prize for the 'Réseau Entreprendre Wallonie' competition! Joining Mr. Energie's community is rapid and simple: visit our website www.mrenergie.be

Name: Asociatia Furnizorilor De Energie Electrica Din Romania
Company description: The Association of Electricity Traders and Suppliers in Romania is a nonprofit, independent, nongovernmental interprofessional association, whose main purpose is to define and support a common position of its members in matters related to the electricity supplying industry, as well as to represent its member electricity suppliers in front of the administration authorities and bodies with competences related to the electricity supplying industry, both in Romania and abroad, including for improving communication among social partners in approaching the matters related to the electricity supplying industry

Name: EoT Plus S.R.L.
HQ Location: Italy, Liguria, La Spezia, 22 Via Terralba, 19100
Company description: WHO WE ARE EoT Plus is a company based on the idea that creating competences, experiences, and challenges for the future is a synonym for success.   Its founding members are entrepreneurs with decades of experience in the production and commercialisation of goods in the industrial sector.   EoT Plus offers services and innovative solutions in the field of energy efficiency for both residential and industrial use.  Obtaining economic benefits for the customer by means of consumption optimisation represents EoT Plus' main objective.  This is then complimented by a strong attention to the production of green energy with the interest of future generations in mind.  EoT Plus, with its strategic partners, Energy srl (www.energysynt.com) and EoT Solutions USA (www.eotsolutions.com), is part of a circuit of companies specialised in the research and experimentation of energy saving solutions and the production of totally renewable energy sources. WHAT WE OFFER Energy Analysis - EoT Plus has forged an agreement with the University of Pisa. Any analysis of the customers’ consumption shall be carried out in cooperation with the Department of Engineering, Systems, Territory and Constructions of University of Pisa. Hence EoT Plus is able to supply a service with high technological value and under the scientific supervision of researchers and experts from the sector. Feasibility of proposed actions - following the energy audit, EoT Plus proposes solutions supported by specific feasibility studies for each single project. The proposal describes the most sustainable solutions from a technical, economic and financial point of view. The cooperation with the University of Pisa also extends to this stage: the proposed solutions shall be sustained by strict technical and scientific considerations. Plants for the production of energy from renewable sources - EoT Plus aims to search for technical solutions using plants for the production of energy from renewable sources, such as photovoltaic plants (isolated or connected to the grid) or cogeneration plants, for the production of thermal energy by solar heat.  The possibility to make use of “inexhaustible” sources for self-production allows for an important reduction in the energy supply costs, whether electricity and heat. Energy storage systems - EoT Plus proposes the lithium storage system X-Hybrid series Sk-SU, in conformity with standard CEI 021.  This is the most recent technology in the field of solar inverters, allowing to reduce its dependence on the traditional energy suppliers and to increase the consumption of self-produced energy (minimum 80%). Furthermore, through the Wi-Fi function supplied as standard on the device, it offers remote control from a specific portal. FOR WHOM EoT Plus' capabilities and benefits best suit the following use cases: Industry Each company has specific needs and priorities for customised solutions. As a first step EoT Plus proposes an estimation of the company’s energy consumption. This is then followed by a tailormade action plan to obtain a significant reduction of the energy consumption costs and transforming the company into an ecologically sustainable entity.  EoT Plus wishes to demonstrate that more attention paid to the interests of our planet can represent a key factor for success and increase the competitiveness of businesses. Residential Energy saving is also a very important issue for the final consumer. EoT Plus offers a portfolio of solutions also for residential households. Also in this case, the estimation has proven to be a valuable instrument for the proposal of efficient actions adapted to the specific features of the house that is under consideration. EoT Plus can also be engaged at the design stage of the property, so that efficient and ecologically sustainable energy technologies are built in from the  get-go.

Name: Dr. Herwig GmbH

Our interactive customer portal allows you to offer an improved service to your clients. A part of the Asolvi portfolio, aquired in October 2023.

Name: DY Energy
Company description: We are a leading provider of renewable energy solutions, specializing in the installation of photovoltaic (PV) systems for commercial and industrial properties. Our mission is to make solar energy accessible and affordable for everyone, enabling our clients to save on their energy bills while making a positive impact on the environment. With a strong focus on quality and reliability, we ensure that our teams of experts are the highest-quality. Our extensive experience of over half a decade has allowed us to forge reliable partnerships across Europe, further enhancing the reliability and efficiency of our skills of installations. Whether your goal is to reduce energy costs, contribute to a cleaner environment, or maximize the benefits of solar energy, our dedicated team is here to assist you. We offer tailored solutions to meet your unique needs, ensuring that you achieve your energy goals efficiently and effectively. By choosing us as your solar energy partner, you can trust in our commitment to excellence, professionalism, and customer satisfaction. Let us help you harness the power of the sun and embark on a greener, more sustainable future. Feel free to reach out to us to discuss your solar energy needs and explore the possibilities together.

Name: HYCUBE Technologies
Company description: The smart energy solution. HYCUBE Technologies is a rapidly growing German technology company in the field of smart battery storage and energy solutions with headquarters in Mannheim, Germany. Our goal is to make homeowners less dependent on energy suppliers with our innovative smart power storage systems. With passion & know-how we contribute to a more sustainable world with 100% renewable energies. With a total of 1,222 investors, HYCUBE Technologies has developed into the most successful German Seedrs crowdfunding campaign in 2020.

Name: BE ESCO
Company description: Siamo una società che si occupa di Efficienza Energetica a 360 gradi. Ci rivolgiamo principalmente ai clienti Business per i quali troviamo le migliori soluzioni per ridurre i consumi energetici e le emissioni inquinanti delle loro attività. Il nostro obiettivo è la soddisfazione del cliente nel lungo periodo e per ottenerlo abbiamo improntato la nostra attività su tre caratteristiche fondamentali: Indipendenza, Competenza e Formula E.S.Co. INDIPENDENZA Completamente indipendente da fornitori di energia, impianti e tecnologie, Be ESCo non è una azienda commerciale ma basa la sua attività su consulenza e progettazione. Questo significa che siamo liberi di scegliere ogni volta i fornitori e le tecnologie con il miglior rapporto qualità/prezzo in funzione alle esigenze del cliente. COMPETENZA L'azienda è composta da esperti nei rami dell'ingegneria, della progettazione, dell'efficienza energetica e della legislazione di riferimento. Curiosità e aggiornamento costante sono capisaldi del nostro team. FORMULA E.S.Co. Grazie alla formula E.S.Co., i nostri clienti hanno la possibilità di efficientare la propria attività condividendo con Be ESCo i costi ed i risparmi economici generati dagli interventi effettuati.

Name: Solarcell
Company description: At Solarcell we’re on a mission to revolutionize the way you power your life. Say goodbye to soaring electricity bills and environmental guilt—welcome to a world where you’re in charge!

Name: Cue Power
Company description: Cue Power are pioneers in the solar, energy and e-mobility sectors.  We help home owners and businesses to achieve real savings on their energy bills. We are the ideal partner, investing whole-heartedly (sometimes quite literally) in the future energy needs and requirements of all our private and commercial customers. We have developed innovative technologies and business models to enable and empower more widespread adoption of renewables and electric vehicles into the market and national infrastructure. We have deeply rooted belief behind renewable energy and strongly support circular principles to reduce our impact on the environment in ways that not only benefit climate action but also have a strong social impact.  We do this by taking a no nonsense, honest approach to our business, ensuring that all of our clients and partners are well informed to make the right choices with the best value.

Name: NORWEA - Norsk Vindkraftforening
Company description: The Norwegian Wind Energy Association (NORWEA) is the voice of the Norwegian wind and ocean energy industry. NORWEA has, since it was established in 2006, promoted the utilization of renewable energy from wind in Norway.  We are ideally situated in the heart of Oslo ensuring close proximity to Norwegian decision makers. With approximately 130 members: developers, contractors, electricity providers, wind turbine manufacturers, component suppliers, finance and insurance companies, lawyers, consultants and research institutions. NORWEA represents the entire value chain of the industry. We are the industry’s key meeting place for wind and ocean energy academics, political discussions and industrial collaboration. NORWEA’s lobbying helps create a suitable legal and financial framework within which members can successfully develop their businesses. NORWEA analyses, formulates and establishes policy positions together with the wind and ocean industry on key issues. NORWEA produces a large variety of information tools and manages campaigns aimed at raising awareness about the benefits of wind and ocean renewable energy, dispelling the myths about wind and ocean energy and providing easy access to credible information. NORWEA organises numerous regular events: conferences, seminars and workshops, together with and for the industry. This makes NORWEA the most powerful and successfull network for wind and ocean energy in Norway.

Name: EPCSOL
Company description: EPCSOL is a consulting and advisory company that serves clients mainly in the clean tech sector. Our primary location is in Copenhagen, Denmark and we work closely with associates from different parts of the world, EPCSOL is the bridging tool between EPC contractors, Energy providers and Financers. We are a company that has clearly defined its boundaries within the Clean Energy sector and by utilizing the best consulting tools among parties, we streamline Business Processes for our valuable clients. Our approach is simple and vital: to solve your projects' related issues. EPCSOL is well equipped with problem solvers (consultants), experts and technical know-how to ensure total customer satisfaction.

Name: Grupo Arconada

Estamos en el norte y trabajamos en toda España gracias a una amplia red de asesores y técnicos altamente cualificados.

Dit wordt gecombineerd met een totaaloplossing waarbij Inter-on u als opdrachtgever volledig ontzorgt van de werving en selectie tot het verwerken van projectgegevens.

Name: Icechain
Company description: Icechain is a blockchain-based decentralized energy platform that creates and ecosystem where capital, consumers and clean energy providers can interact in a way that is direct, trustworthy and secure. Ice's team members have several years on the energy and blockchain market and are familiar with the risk profile which is acceptable to lenders in order to optimize a project's capital structure.  By using the Icechain platform, everyone can improve the way of use energy reducing their energy consumption and saving at the same time. Icechain creates a virtuous circle where the benefit is global, by integrating energetic demands, suppliers and participants from all over the world within one community, this way the community generates revenues by solving the energy issue and use that benefit to create a better world.

Name: Enermed

Company description: Enermed è il fornitore di energia che: - ti insegna a risparmiare energia consapevolmente; - sviluppa strumenti tecnologici per ottimizzare i costi; - realizza progetti di sviluppo destinati alle virtual smart grid; - offre piattaforme di gestione dell'energia.

Name: Learning With Energy
Company description: Wij ontwikkelen energy learnings over de marktfaciliterende processen, met netbeheerders, energieleveranciers en consultancybureaus als onze klanten. Onze drijfveer is om medewerkers niet alleen te trainen, maar hen daadwerkelijk te laten groeien met heldere, toegankelijke en impactvolle opleidingen. Wij geloven niet dat traditionele trainingen en interne kennisoverdracht voldoende effectief zijn in de dynamische energiesector. Wel geloven wij dat flexibele, up-to-date e-learnings de oplossing zijn voor onboarding en talentbehoud. Daarom bieden wij verhelderende energy learnings die passen bij onze snelveranderende sector, zodat je onboarding efficiënt én effectief wordt. Onboarding van je medewerkers hoeft geen uitdaging te zijn. Onze aantrekkelijke en verhelderende e-learnings met veel interactie maken leren leuk en effectief.

Name: Robin Energie BV
Company description: Gezinnen die van de een op de andere dag geen licht meer hebben, niet meer kunnen koken of de was doen. Wij vinden dat dit niet kan in Nederland. Energie is een primaire levensbehoefte. Dat is dan ook onze missie. Wij willen de energiemarkt weer menselijk maken. Mensen helpen in plaats van straffen. Mensen als mens zien in plaats van nummers. Wij staan altijd aan. Wij zijn Robin Energie. De energieleverancier voor de mens.

Name: Goldgas Österreich
Company description: Die goldgas GmbH, einer der ersten alternativen Gasanbieter am liberalisierten österreichischen Gasmarkt, wurde 2011 gegründet. Als österreichischer Energieversorger mit Firmensitz und Servicecenter in Wien beliefert goldgas Haushalte sowie Klein- und Mittelbetriebe in ganz Österreich. Durch eine effiziente Kosten- und Organisationsstruktur bietet goldgas seinen Kunden, getreu dem Motto: „Österreichs günstiger Energieversorger“, langfristig faire Preise. Faire Preise sind für goldgas Unternehmensphilosophie und Leitmotiv in einem. Hinter goldgas steht mit der VNG Gruppe einer der großen Erdgaskonzerne Europas. Dadurch garantiert goldgas Versorgungssicherheit und faire Preise. 2014 beschritt goldgas mit dem Verein für Konsumenteninformation (VKI) erstmals neue Wege und gewann die Aktion „Energiekosten-Stop“ in der Sparte Gas. Auch bei der VKI Aktion 2017 und 2021 ging goldgas als Bestbieter in der Sparte Gas im Marktgebiet Ost hervor.

Name: Greentech Solutions
Company description: Greentech Solution is an established company in the cleantech industry and is one of the first movers within smart grid integration in Denmark.  Our goal is to help enterprises safe money on their energy bills, by lowering their use of energy in expensive tariffs and by raising the energy consumption in the cheaper tariffs. All this it to be done automatically with our software control system.  Our product Elpareboksen is one of the first systems in the world that implements intelligent control, measurement and supervision of appliances. Elspareboksen is developed and designed to saturate the increasing demand of intelligent systems, that are able to control electrical devices. The solutions we create are developed for businesses where it is possible to move a great amount of electricity. The DEC solution is directed towards companies that develops intelligent el-systems, where we are able to integrate our product.

Name: The Energy Hub
Company description: Ook klaar met te dure energierekeningen? Wij helpen jouw verbruik en kosten optimaliseren door jouw energie-installatie slim aan te sturen!
