Name: FullSet
HQ Location: Austria, Lower Austria, Bruck, 11 Industriegelände West, 2460
Company description: ⚡️ Energy available whenever you need it - energy storage systems for residential, industrial and RES farms applications FullSet is all about: ◾️ protection of your home or business from the effects of power grid failure; ◾️ full control over the energy produced by the photovoltaic installation - you can use it whenever you want; ◾️ safety devices are equipped with surge protection systems and are certified to meet the highest safety standards; ◾️ way to reduce your electricity bills. ⚡️ FullSet is a complete system: energy storage and hybrid inverter. Learn about the FullSet energy storage system and its full capabilities: # even more than 8,000 charge and discharge cycles, # more than 20 years of operation under unchanged conditions, # systems can be combined to achieve greater capacity or power, # you get up to a 10-year manufacturer's warranty.

Name: Greenbird Integration Technology
Company description: Greenbird Integration Technology is a pioneering company dedicated to delivering innovative solutions for the energy sector, with a strong emphasis on data integration and management. The company's mission is to empower organizations to harness the full potential of their data, facilitating a transition to a more sustainable and efficient energy landscape. Greenbird's vision is to lead the digital transformation in the energy industry, enabling clients to optimize their operations while reducing their environmental impact. The company serves a diverse clientele, including utility companies, energy providers, and governmental organizations, and collaborates with strategic partners to provide tailored solutions that address the unique challenges of the energy market. By focusing on the integration of renewable energy sources and smart grid technologies, Greenbird aims to enhance the efficiency and reliability of energy systems, thereby promoting energy independence and reducing carbon footprints. The company also specializes in advanced instrumentation and control systems for nuclear power plants, ensuring safety and operational efficiency through innovative reactor designs. Greenbird's commitment to sustainability and operational excellence positions it as a key player in the evolution of the energy sector, targeting organizations that seek to modernize their operations and improve data management. With a robust portfolio that includes gas turbines, steam turbines, and advanced control solutions, Greenbird collaborates closely with its clients, which range from utilities to independent power producers. The company is dedicated to engineering cleaner and more accessible energy, supporting the global transition towards a lower carbon future. Through continuous innovation and a focus on decarbonization, Greenbird Integration Technology aims to build a world that works for everyone, shaping the future of energy management and contributing to a greener planet.

Name: Yally
Company description: Yally buys homes in and around the central cities in Belgium and makes them more energy-efficient and future-proof. As a landlord of the future, Yally is committed to the comfort and reduction of the tenant's total housing costs by integrating smart technologies in the homes, reducing energy bills and providing an all-in service via the online portal MijnYally.be.

Name: South East Energy Agency
Company description: We have rebranded to the South East Energy Agency, to reflect Waterford joining the partnership with Kilkenny, Carlow, and Wexford, we can now truly deliver a regional approach to our energy efficiency and climate action goals.   New Name, Same Strategy There will be no change to our services, we will still provide expert support to all energy users in the region, whether you’re a homeowner interested in retrofitting, a farmer interested in lowering your farms energy use, a local authority reducing your services energy consumption,  a community wanting to develop renewable energy projects or a business owner wanting to reduce your energy bills, we are your one-stop shop to support all your energy needs in the Southeast. At South East Energy Agency we are committed to supporting every energy user in using energy more efficiently, monitoring energy use, and towards a greater choice of renewable energy sources. Working in partnership, raising awareness, providing support, and delivering low carbon in the region.   We look forward to sharing the new South East Energy Agency brand look and feel with you next week, and working with you towards a greener, more sustainable future.

Name: SOLAR ENERGY SOUMPASIS
Company description: Welcome to SOLAR ENERGY Our company is a strong member of the Greek Energy Market. We operate as a solar contractor, Energy Supplier in Greece and RES Aggregator. Our goal is to provide clean energy to our community. That’s why we offer complete and sustainable solutions focused 100 % on renewable energy.

Name: Eicea Energy
HQ Location: Ireland, Guidimaka, Ballinakill Waterford, 2 Ashdale Nursery Lane, ay11
Company description: Eicea Energy work with the largest Energy Providers in Ireland to bring you the best rates guaranteed for your business utilities. At Eicea Energy, our focus is on providing sustainable green energy solutions to businesses across Ireland. Through our partnerships with Energy suppliers in Ireland and the U.K we can provide your business with the latest carbon saving technologies, at prices that will allow your business to become a force in the green generation. Eicea Energy will help you Future Proof your business, Save Money and Improve your Green Credentials. Our Energy Consultants are nationwide and prepare bespoke analyses of your energy requirements and opportunities, tailored to your individual business needs. At Eicea Energy, we will take your Energy savings to the next level. Our focus is on providing sustainable green energy solutions to businesses across Ireland. We will help you Future Proof your business, Save Money and Improve your Green Credentials. Through our partnerships with Energy suppliers in Ireland and the U.K we can provide your business with the latest carbon saving technologies, at prices that will allow your business to become a force in the green generation. Our experienced Energy Consultants are based nationwide and prepare bespoke analyses of your energy requirements and opportunities, tailored to your individual business needs. “Change the way you think about Energy…. Get your business out of the Red and into the Green”

Name: MarkeDroid
Company description: Markedroid is a cleantech company that provides seamless Virtual Power Plant (VPP) orchestration solutions to households. Our mission is to empower homeowners to take control of their energy consumption, production, storage and selling, while also contributing to a more sustainable future. Our innovative VPP solution allows homeowners to connect their energy-producing assets, such as solar panels to a virtual power plant network and individual forecasts are then aggregated and optimized as a fleet in a cloud-based, asset-agnostic virtual power plant. This virtual network enables homeowners to sell their excess energy to the grid, contributing to the stability of the energy system and reducing their energy bills. At Markedroid, we are committed to providing our customers with the latest and most innovative energy solutions on the market. Our team of experts is constantly working to improve our VPP solution and ensure that our customers are always one step ahead in the energy game. Join us in our mission to create a more sustainable energy future.

Name: GNP Energy Danmark A/S
Company description: - GNP Energy er Nordens 4. største energiselskab - og en uafhængig strømleverandør.  Når du vælger at give os din tillid, er du med til at udfordre giganterne i branchen. I modsætning til disse, har vi hverken kommunale eller politiske interesser, eller eget strømnet.  Vi har ikke egen energiproduktion og derfor har vi heller ingen interesse i at højne strømpriserne.  Vores ambition er i stedet, forudsigelighed og lavest mulige strømomkostninger, over tid, for vores kunder.  GNP Energy har medarbejdere med lang erfaring i energibranchen, alt fra handel med strøm på Nord Pool og erfaring med energibranchen ift. rådgivning og salg.  Hos os finder du ingen tunge markedsmæssige budgetter og store prangende lokaler. Vi holder fokus på en effektiv drift og lave omkostninger.  Vi skal være en kompetencevirksomhed som fokuserer på, at vores medarbejdere skal udvikle sig både fagligt og socialt. Dette skaber trivsel og vækst.  - Positivt og enkelt. Vi er en udfordrer og det stiller høje krav til vores kontakt med vores kunder.  Vores ambition er at have markedets bedste kundeservice.  Via e-mail svarer vi hurtigt og ventetiden på telefon skal ikke være mere end 30 sekunder.  Vores slogan er: Energy Made Easy! Se mere på: www.gnp.energy

Name: S-Labs
HQ Location: Poland, Lesser Poland Voivodeship, Kraków, 1a 1u Dworska, 30-314
Company description: We are innovative IoT laboratory of smart solutions established in 2015 in Cracow – one of Europe’s most recognizable innovation hub. We focus on using technology in order to provide top-notch, user-friendly, interdisciplinary solutions that leverage the quality of people's lives.  We provide advanced data science analytics obtained from sensors and external information sources. and make innovative IoT solutions and products designed for the energy and telecommunications sectors. Our business model merges smart home with energy meters, users with their energy providers.  We are science geeks, future observers, pioneers, and innovators. We change the way how energy is perceived.

The company aims to support energy suppliers and other stakeholders in navigating the evolving landscape of the energy industry by offering a range of consulting services and modern IT solutions. Its target market includes energy companies seeking to optimize their operations and embrace digitalization, making TSG a vital partner in the transition towards a more sustainable energy future.

Name: MegaWatt Solutions

Name: VTree Solar
Company description: We are passionate and creative minds focused on developing products for Smart Cities in a collaborative effort between  Sao Paulo, Lisbon and Bucharest. We create new urban meeting points with solar powered design objects with Wifi, and light electric vehicle chargers for users convenience, activating communities, raising awareness for public initiatives or brands.   In 2015, we started an R&D program to validate new design concepts for cities and parks. After validating the technologies and designs, we  moved to the prototype phase and tested our first product - VTree™ fractal - a tree-shaped, quick installation, solar powered, Wifi and energy provider that can beautifully be integrated in any city or park. We are sustainable, we know what we do and we love what we do. We are VTree™SOLAR. All connected, you're connected! MISSION We aim to provide citizens with state-of-the-art technology, beautifully integrated in their context, whilst environmentally friendly. VISION To plant Wi-fi solar trees in every city, promoting sustainable energy solutions well integrated in the existing urban space CORE VALUES Sustainability, Innovation, Technological capacity, Cooperation and Reliability.

Name: Good Salez
Company description: Good Salez is een dochteronderneming van de XS Direct groep, een fieldmarketing organisatie die al sinds 2007 werving- & promotiecampagnes verzorgt voor bedrijven en instellingen in de profit en non-profit sector. Na met succes het bestaande studentenlabel People Marketing te hebben opgezet, werd het tijd voor een nieuwe uitdaging. In juni 2016 is Good Salez opgericht met als doelgroep, fulltimers. Momenteel is Good Salez in drie steden actief en is er de ambitie om landelijk uit te breiden. Waarom werken bij Good Salez? Good Salez is een fieldmarketing organisatie die werkt met een eigen en uniek ontwikkeld product genaamd, Good Energy www.goodenergy.nl. Good Energy is een maatschappelijke prijsvergelijker voor de energiemarkt, waarbij de klant kan kiezen uit de aangesloten energieleveranciers. De aangesloten leveranciers bieden duurzame energie aan, tegen lagere tarieven. Bij iedere wisseling van energieleverancier door Good Energy, wordt er een mooie donatie gedaan aan KiKa. Onze filosofie is: het creëren van een win-win situatie voor alle betrokken partijen. Wij geloven in ons product en wij willen landelijk het verschil gaan maken in de energiemarkt én voor KiKa. Good Salez werkt mét mensen vóór mensen. Op evenementen, langs de deur, op straat, op de winkelvloer en beurzen. Altijd met een goed gesprek als uitgangspunt. Werken met Good Energy geeft een good feeling! “Good people work for Good Salez!”

Name: Ultra-Controlo International LDA
Company description: Ultra-Controlo is a Portuguese specialist in the design, manufacturing, supply and installation of medical gas systems for industry, hospitals, and clinics. For more than 35 years we are giving the best service and technical support for all our customers including worldwide known gas suppliers.  Our background as sole distributors of leading companies in vacuum and compressed air allowed us to go one step in front and offer very innovative systems to the customers.  Ultra-Controlo is able to operate under different medical gas standards from ISO 7396, HTM and other standards and even to offer medical gas systems that exceed the typical international standards, as we know how to do it better.  Ultra-Controlo is included in the list of the European Manufacturers of Medical Devices and we are proud to have hundreds of medical gas plants running tens of years without a single failure.  Our people are engaged to promote the use of the best systems available to you and this contributes to play a vital role in hospitals where our focus is to protect the physical integrity of all kind of people that needs medical gases.

Name: Enerpeak GmbH
Company description: enerpeak GmbH is a technically sophisticated and reliable leader in advancing the energy transition through utility-scale battery storage system (BESS) development. We combine in-depth market knowledge, pragmatic yet visionary technical expertise, and robust supply chain relationships. As a leading provider, we develop and implement customized battery storage solutions to meet the growing demands of the energy market. Our solutions can operate as standalone systems across all grid-voltage levels or in collaboration with municipalities, PV and wind park operators, and large industrial consumers. enerpeak is built on a highly experienced management team with strong expertise in energy and financial markets, professional technical capabilities, and extensive hands-on experience in project development and supply chain management. This foundation empowers us to drive BESS developments in today's market and create solutions for future demands. We are actively pioneering future mainstream BESS applications that will be ready to scale as regulatory frameworks adapt to market needs, including co-location and multi-use solutions. With strong supply chain partnerships for BESS and critical infrastructure components like transformers and PCS, we can reduce time to market, secure competitive prices, and increase project ROI. Our management team includes a pragmatic former C-level executive from one of Europe’s largest energy providers and a visionary serial entrepreneur with a background in electrical engineering and extensive financial market experience. Together with our seasoned senior staff, we deliver exceptional service to partners and clients as a technically sophisticated, reliable leader in the energy transition.

Name: Stadtwerke Kerpen
Company description: Die Stadtwerke Kerpen GmbH & Co. KG sind seit Ende 2019 aktiv und gelten aktuell noch als „kleinstes und jüngstes Stadtwerk“ in Deutschland. Die Stadtwerke selbst verstehen sich als digitaler und der Nachhaltigkeit verschriebener Energiedienstleister. Zu den Geschäftsfeldern zählt der Vertrieb von Ökostrom, Energiedienstleistungen in den Bereichen Photovoltaik, Wärme und E-Mobilität für Privat-und Gewerbekunden. Darüber hinaus sind sie verantwortlich für die energetische Erschließung von Quartieren mit Wärme, Kälte, Mieter/Quartiersstrom, digitales Quartiersmanagement sowie Glasfaserinfrastruktur. Ein weiteres Themenfeld ist der geförderte Ausbau von Glasfaserinfrastruktur im ländlichen Raum und in Neubauquartieren. Ebenfalls fördern die Stadtwerke den Ausbau und Betrieb von öffentlicher Ladeinfrastruktur. Stadtwerke Kerpen is an energy supplier based in Kerpen, Germany.  We aim to become the partner of choice for energy and technical customer solutions for the people in Kerpen.

Name: Refactor Energy
HQ Location: Spain, Valencia, Valencia, 58 Avenida De Las Cortes Valencianas, 46015
Company description: Hardware, Software and Energy management services to reduce our customer's energy bills and support them on their way to Net Zero.

Name: Utilityfair
HQ Location: Ireland, Leinster, Dublin, 23 Fitzwilliam Street Upper, d02
Company description: Utilityfair is Ireland's largest commercial electricity and gas broker with 15,000+ customers nationwide. We have a verified Trustpilot score of 'Excellent' and thousands of reviews from happy customers. Using our market knowledge, buying power and strong relationships we'll sort out your energy costs and card transaction charges in minutes and make sure that you stay on the best deals year after year. Utilityfair works with over 15,000 businesses in Ireland of all shapes and sizes and from all industries, including start-up and mature companies. Whether our client is a small retail shop, restaurant, property manager or a large energy user running a manufacturing plant, we will sort out their energy costs in minutes and make sure that they never overpay ever again by auto-renewing onto an expensive plan or slipping onto expensive ‘out of contract’ rates. Businesses no longer need to pay too much for electricity and gas or go through a frustrating and time-consuming process of phoning individual electricity and gas suppliers - waiting on hold for ages and trying to figure out the differences between suppliers and the hidden charges.  Utilityfair does all of the heavy lifting so that our customers can make a quick and hassle-free decision that saves money year after year. Our clients can focus on running their business, knowing that they are getting the best deals in the market.

Name: Tynagh Energy Limited
Company description: Tynagh Energy Limited (TEL) represents a highly skilled collaboration of international and local expertise which came together to build Galway’s first power generating station. TEL successfully tendered for a competition in December 2003, run by the Commission for Energy Regulation (CER) to design, finance, construct, operate and maintain a 400MW Combined Cycle Power Plant (CCGT) in east Co. Galway. TEL is in a unique position of being the only independent CCGT plant in the Irish market and provides a flexible daily electricity product to the Irish wholesale electricity market. TEL can provide a fixed forward product known as a Contract for Difference (CfD), where large energy users and electricity suppliers can fix their forward electricity prices. Procuring a CfD provides large energy users with price certainty and allows electricity suppliers to offer a fixed price to their customers. TEL are active participants on the Tullett Prebon OTC market and are also available to contract on a bilateral basis. If you wish to discuss how Tynagh Energy can help you with your electricity requirements please contact the Trading Team at +353 (0)1 857 8700 or trading@tynaghenergy.ie.

Name: Deventer Energie
Company description: Deventer Energie Coöperatie wil de overgang van fossiele en nucleaire energiebronnen naar duurzame energiebronnen sneller mogelijk maken. Zij wil Deventer duurzamer maken. Dit doet zij samen met, voor en door de inwoners van de gemeente Deventer. Deventer Energie wil haar doelstellingen bereiken door: •	informatie te verstrekken   •	de lokale betrokkenheid en draagvlak te vergroten •	de verduurzaming van woningen te stimuleren •	zelf duurzame energie op te wekken door coöperatieve zon en windprojecten e.d. •	de samenwerking tussen partners en lokale (markt)partijen te bevorderen   Met duurzame energie zijn we minder afhankelijk van fossiele energiebronnen, die opraken en bijdragen aan de klimaatverandering. Door lokaal energie op te wekken ben je (steeds) minder afhankelijk van andere energieleveranciers. Deventer Energie is een lokale coöperatie en werkt ook zoveel mogelijk met lokale experts. Samen maken we Deventer duurzamer.

Name: Scandinavian Data Centers
Company description: We are part of a start-up driven by the necessity of the green transition, committed to setting new standards in data centers, energy storage, and heat reuse. By creating a unified ecosystem that integrates these elements, we aim to accelerate this transition and provide significant societal benefits.  At Scandinavian Data Centers (SDC), we build resilient, high-capacity data centers that seamlessly integrate into a broader ecosystem. In collaboration with our sister company, Scandinavian Energy Centers (SEC), we optimize synergies between data storage, energy efficiency, and the reuse of excess heat. Together, we drive the green transition by supporting IT businesses, energy providers, and municipalities, ensuring sustainable and future-proof infrastructure.

Name: Spotty
Company description: Spotty bietet günstigen Strom zum Börsenpreis und ist Ihr moderner und sicherer Energieanbieter in Österreich.  Die langfristige Strompreisentwicklung in Österreich zeigt, dass der Börsenpreis zwar schwanken kann, aber letztlich der günstigste Weg ist, Strom zu beziehen. Stetige Innovation und Kundenzufriedenheit stehen bei Spotty im Mittelpunkt. Spotty macht es seinen Kundinnen und Kunden noch einfacher, Energie- und Kosteneinsparungen zu maximieren und die Kontrolle über ihren Stromverbrauch zu behalten.

Name: Future Homes
HQ Location: Ireland, Co. Louth Louth, Marshes Lower Dundalk, Coes Rd, 0000
Company description: Future Homes are market leaders in delivering easy to use operating systems for residential and commercial applications. We deliver intelligent control  of consumer electronics, appliances and networking systems through smart interfaces. Our applications are used in residential projects, boardrooms, the hospitality sector as well as many parts of the education sector. Our solutions offer the end user one simple to use interface that can give control over lighting, heating, audio visual and energy management. Because our systems can manage and control your energy output, as well as being environmentally friendly, they can reduce your energy bills and save you money.

Name: Energo Optima
Company description: Od ponad sześciu lat nasza firma oferuje kompleksowe usługi montażu fotowoltaiki dla domów i firm w całej Polsce, pomagając klientom czerpać korzyści z energii słonecznej. Nasza misja to dostarczanie wysokiej jakości rozwiązań, które przynoszą realne oszczędności finansowe. Bezpłatna konsultacja Proces zaczyna się od bezpłatnej konsultacji, gdzie analizujemy potrzeby i możliwości techniczne klienta. Na tej podstawie tworzymy indywidualną ofertę, która optymalizuje koszty i maksymalizuje oszczędności. Nasza firma wspiera klientów na każdym etapie — od analizy finansowania, przez pomoc w formalnościach, aż po zakończenie instalacji. Jakość Kluczowym czynnikiem dla naszych klientów jest jakość. Dlatego stosujemy sprawdzone komponenty, które pozwalają nam oferować długoterminowe gwarancje. Dzięki temu inwestycja w fotowoltaikę zapewnia korzyści przez wiele lat. Zadowoleni klienci Nasze doświadczenie i jakość usług zdobyły zaufanie setek zadowolonych klientów. Wielu z nich poleca nas znajomym i rodzinie, co jest dla nas najlepszym dowodem uznania. Każdy klient może liczyć na nasze pełne wsparcie zarówno w trakcie instalacji, jak i po jej zakończeniu. Wybierając nas, decydujesz się na doświadczenie, profesjonalizm i najwyższą jakość. Dzięki naszym usługom fotowoltaika staje się inwestycją, która realnie obniża rachunki za energię. Zapraszamy do kontaktu — nasi specjaliści są gotowi odpowiedzieć na każde pytanie i przygotować ofertę dostosowaną do Twoich potrzeb. Wybierz sprawdzonego partnera, który gwarantuje oszczędności i satysfakcję.

Name: Vaste Lasten Service
Company description: Vaste Lasten Service heeft zich gespecialiseerd in het realiseren van besparingen voor consumenten op hun vaste lasten. Met onze werkwijze kunnen we een gemiddeld huishouden  € 500,- per jaar besparen! De dienstverlening van Vaste Lasten Service richt zich op het pakket van verzekeringen, energie, telefonie, TV en breedband. Bestaande aanbieders worden continu met elkaar vergeleken en hun aangeboden dienst wordt toegespitst op de specifieke situatie van onze leden. Marktkennis De dienstverlening van Vaste Lasten Service houdt niet op na een enkele besparing en/of adviesgesprek. Door collectieve inkoop, contractbeheer en het continu actualiseren van onze marktkennis zijn onze leden altijd verzekerd van een optimaal pakket aan vaste lasten. Ook kunnen leden eenvoudig bij ons terecht met vragen en/of opmerkingen via de ledenservice. Het is een belangrijk onderdeel van de missie van Vaste Lasten Service: consumenten helderheid verschaffen in een ondoorzichtige markt en direct actie ondernemen op mogelijke besparingen! Vaste Lasten Service Adviesgesprek De service van Vaste Lasten Service start met een objectieve en onafhankelijke analyse van de huidige situatie. De kosten van dit eerste adviesgesprek nemen wij voor onze rekening! De adviseur van Vaste Lasten Service zal het huidige pakket vergelijken met andere mogelijkheden en de te realiseren besparing wordt helder en overzichtelijk aan de klant gepresenteerd. Een eventuele aanpassing van het bestaande pakket wordt pas in gang gezet nadat de klant hier toestemming voor heeft gegeven. We hebben geen contractuele verplichtingen met energieleveranciers, banken, geldverstrekkers, verzekeringspartners en/of andere instanties die ons onze onafhankelijkheid zou afnemen. Deze partijen hebben ook geen aandeel in het bedrijf.

Name: Wpd Windmanager
Company description: Wpd Windmanager is a leading company in the renewable energy sector, specializing in the management and operation of wind energy projects. With a strong commitment to sustainability, the company aims to contribute to a cleaner environment by optimizing the performance and efficiency of wind farms. Wpd Windmanager collaborates with various partners, including Deutsche Windtechnik AG and wpd GmbH, to enhance its service offerings and promote eco-friendly initiatives, such as community clean-up events. The company serves a diverse clientele, including project developers, investors, and energy suppliers, focusing on delivering tailored solutions that meet the unique needs of the wind energy market. Through its mission to foster a sustainable future, Wpd Windmanager is dedicated to advancing the global transition to renewable energy sources.

Name: Abliva AB
Company description: Abliva discovers and develops medicines for the treatment of mitochondrial disease. This rare and often very severe disease occurs when the cell’s energy provider, the mitochondria, do not function properly. The company has prioritized two projects. KL1333, a powerful regulator of the essential co-enzymes NAD⁺ and NADH, has entered late-stage development. NV354, an energy replacement therapy, has completed preclinical development. Abliva is based in Lund, Sweden.

Company description: SMATRICS is a leading provider of comprehensive e-mobility solutions in Austria, specializing in the planning, implementation, and operation of charging infrastructure for electric vehicles. SMATRICS partners with notable organizations such as AMIC Energy and the Geiger Group, providing tailored solutions that enhance the accessibility and efficiency of electric vehicle charging. With a commitment to innovation and sustainability, SMATRICS envisions a future where e-mobility is seamlessly integrated into everyday life, supporting both businesses and consumers in their transition to greener transportation options. The company targets a diverse market, including retail locations, fleet operators, and energy providers, ensuring that its services meet the evolving needs of the e-mobility landscape.

Name: Multi-Energy
HQ Location: Belgium, Braine Le Chateau, 208 Chaussée De Tubize, 1440
Company description: Le courtage en énergie, qu'est ce que c'est ? Saviez-vous que le prix du gaz et de l'électricité sont négociés tous les jours en fonction des prix boursiers ?   Multi-Energy aide les consommateurs professionnels à choisir une offre de fourniture d'électricité et/ou de gaz naturel, auprès de plusieurs fournisseurs. La plupart des indépendants et entreprises n'ont pas le temps ni la possibilité d'obtenir des comparaisons transparentes de prix de plusieurs fournisseurs simultanément. Multi-Energy vous donne la possibilité de recevoir la meilleure offre de prix parmi une dizaine de fournisseurs ! Cette offre est obtenue quotidiennement en fonction des prix de l'énergie sur les marchés boursiers. Ce concept est unique en Belgique, venu tout droit d'Angleterre, où les marchés se sont libéralisés bien avant les nôtres.   Multi-Energy n'est pas un fournisseur de gaz ou d'électricité : nous négocions le meilleur prix du jour en fonction de votre profil d’utilisateur. Nous effectuons exactement la même démarche pour les panneaux photovoltaïques.

Name: Comody
Company description: Comody è il Gruppo d’Acquisto partito nel 2019 per offrire ad aziende e privati un servizio di consulenza professionale nel settore energetico, al 100% indipendente dai fornitori di energia e gas. I NOSTRI NUMERI - Più di 2.100 clienti (55% PMI, 25% business, 20% family) - Abbiamo già acquistato più di 17,7M € di energia elettrice e più di 4,8M € di gas - Abbiamo generato un risparmio per i clienti di oltre 3M € - Dodici anni di esperienza nel settore PERCHÈ SCEGLIERCI Il miglior prezzo del mercato? In gruppo si può... Lavoriamo per il gruppo, curiamo l’interesse di ogni singolo cliente. Ognuno è importante per raggiungere il risultato, per questo ci assicuriamo di soddisfarne le specifiche esigenze. COME FUNZIONA Maggiore è il potere contrattuale, maggiore è il risparmio! Uniamo i consumi di tutti i clienti ed effettuiamo un unico acquisto per l’intero Gruppo, configurandoci come un singolo grande cliente industriale. Con il meccanismo dell’asta, mettiamo i fornitori in competizione tra loro per ottenere, in tutta trasparenza, il prezzo migliore. Lavoriamo per i clienti, non per i fornitori. Curiamo esclusivamente i loro interessi. Il nostro lavoro principale è quello di informare e tutelare gli associati nei propri acquisti, garantendo, grazie alla forza del Gruppo, i migliori prezzi disponibili sul mercato, ottenibili grazie a Buyer professionali dedicati che svolgono continue ricerche di mercato, analisi delle offerte, aste online, ecc.

Name: Spire Energie Consulting
Company description: Spire Energie Consulting is een jonge en ambitieuze startup die zich richt op de energiebranche. Spire staat voor groei, ambitie en inspiratie en hier vanuit streven we dan ook naar het behalen van hogere doelen in de energiebranche. Als consultancy bedrijf helpen wij klanten bij de uitdagingen van de energietransitie. Met de toenemende integratie van hernieuwbare energiebronnen, zoals zonne- en windenergie, is het aanpassen en optimaliseren van energienetwerken cruciaal om de fluctuerende energieproductie op te vangen. Die aanpassingen moeten worden doorgevoerd door netbeheerders, meetbedrijven en energieleveranciers. Dat is een complexe taak en vraagt om voldoende kennis, ervaring en kunde om als bedrijf mee te gaan in deze ontwikkeling, en hier komen wij aan te pas. Dat doen we met een no-nonsense aanpak waarbij we de verbinding met de klant zoeken, zodat we samen met de klant op een efficiënte manier tot een oplossing komen. Of het nu gaat om het implementeren van nieuwe producten, het optimaliseren van processen of het invullen van projectrollen, wij zetten onze kennis gewoon in. Met als einddoel zichtbare vooruitgang!

Name: EnergyTIP GmbH - Energiekostenoptimierung
HQ Location: Austria, Lower Austria, Wiener Neustadt, 18 6 Domplatz, 2700
Company description: EnergyTIP GmbH is a leading company specializing in energy cost optimization, dedicated to helping clients reduce their expenses on electricity and gas. Based in Wiener Neustadt, Austria, the company offers a free service that allows users to compare energy prices and discover potential savings. EnergyTIP's mission is to empower consumers by providing them with the tools and information necessary to make informed decisions about their energy usage. The company serves a diverse clientele, including residential customers and businesses, and collaborates with various partners to enhance its service offerings. With a commitment to transparency and customer support, EnergyTIP aims to simplify the process of energy comparison and savings for all its users.

Name: Reversed Digital - Mobile And Web Apps
Company description: Reversed helps companies build digital services that people love. We specialise in building mobile apps and web apps, where design and AI play an important role. Our ambition is to build applications that customers really care about. Our clients praise us for our close collaboration with their internal teams and great project transparency. We work with international digital businesses that want to make an impact in their industry. Think of AI image enhancement software, a finance management app, a digital energy supplier app or a carsharing app. Focussing on long-term relationships helps us to achieve better results together. Let's build for tomorrow.

Name: MySave
Company description: MySave.nl is een onafhankelijke vergelijkingssite, die in 2015 in zijn geheel is vernieuwd. Je kan via MySave.nl gratis diverse financiële producten vergelijken. Ben je bijvoorbeeld op zoek naar de goedkoopste energieleverancier, goedkoopste autoverzekering of de goedkoopste zorgverzekering? Dan ben je bij MySave.nl op het juiste adres! Het afsluiten van een verzekering of ander product wordt altijd gedaan op de website van de aanbieder zelf, alwaar jij beslist om daadwerkelijk over te gaan tot afsluiten.

Name: SIV.AG
HQ Location: Germany, Mecklenburg-vorpommern, Roggentin, 1 Konrad Zuse Str., 18184
Company description: SIV.AG is a leading provider of intelligent and secure software solutions tailored for the energy sector, focusing on simplifying complex processes in energy distribution and management. With a commitment to enhancing customer service, SIV.AG has developed innovative tools such as the MyE.VITA app, enabling clients to manage their energy accounts seamlessly. The company serves a diverse clientele, including energy suppliers and municipal utilities, and is dedicated to optimizing operational workflows through automation and digitalization. As part of the Glöckle Group, which boasts over 120 years of experience, SIV.AG emphasizes trust, transparency, and personalized service in its mission to empower businesses in the energy market. The company aims to be at the forefront of digital transformation, helping clients navigate the evolving landscape of energy management.

Name: Crystal Energy
Company description: Crystal Energy is an independent electricity supplier offering unique and innovative electricity tariffs that promote the more efficient use of energy by encouraging Demand Side Management (DSM). Customers can avail of fully transparent interactions with the wholesale electricity market while benefiting from our experience in energy metering and load management.

Name: Cores Environment
Company description: Cores is een internationale dienstverlener op het gebied van afvalverwerking, en tevens grondstoffen/energieleverancier voor (nuts)bedrijven, instellingen en eindverwerkers. Cores heeft meer dan 25 jaar kennis en ervaring in alle disciplines van de afvalbranche, op financieel, operationeel en logistiek gebied, plus een goed en groot netwerk. Cores is voortdurend op zoek naar mogelijkheden om waarde te kunnen toevoegen aan afvalstoffen. Door bestaande recyclingprocessen te verbeteren of door nieuwe activiteiten te ontwikkelen. Cores werkt daarbij actief samen met afvalbedrijven en leveranciers van recyclingtechnologieën. Ook investeert Cores in afvalprojecten die een bijdrage leveren aan een duurzame leefomgeving. Cores staat voor maatschappelijk verantwoord ondernemen vanuit een gezonde ondernemersgeest.

Name: Whitelite Automation
Company description: Headquartered at our 120,000 sq ft  factory in Carlow, Ireland, Whitelite design and build modules, including plant rooms, associated substations and support modules including mechanical, electrical and pipe modules. Whitelite supply modules to blue chip clients, energy suppliers, and construction projects, Modules are custom built to meet the needs of our clients, offering turnkey solutions which include IT rooms, Mechanical Modules, Electrical Supplies, UPS Rooms, Communications Rooms, Portable Instrument Buildings and Cooling Modules. Whitelite have developed a unique set of core competencies: Structural, Electrical, Cooling, Control, Mechanical, and Integrated Engineering, which allow us to offer bespoke solutions that suit the needs of our clients. Our automation experts specialise in building management systems, which allow the client to monitor and control systems and infrastructure from a mobile location, allowing the user to manage energy control and initiate emergency procedures remotely.  Whitelite have over 700 deployments in operation globally, our facility is close to two deep seaports, which allow for global delivery, has a large local resource pool of skilled & experienced employees who share knowledge and allow for constant improvement in production. Our facility houses 35 ton cranes which allow us to handle any size project from our base in Carlow. Key Clients include Susquehanna International Group,BNFL, Anord, Kerry Foods, Blacknight Solutions, OPW, Schneider, ESB, Scottish Power, GE, Kirby Group, EDF,  Merck Sharpe & Dohme, London Council of The Olympic Games, Mercury Engineering, ESBI, and Bord Gais For more information visit our website: www.whitelite.ie

Name: Teta Project Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Emilia-romagna, Reggio Nell'emilia, 6 Via Garonna, 42124
Company description: Teta Project è una solida realtà ingegneristica che da anni lavora nel settore delle energie rinnovabili e i cui core business si incentrano su efficienza energetica per le famiglie con la linea I PERCORSI DEL RISPARMIO e sul settore biogas e biomasse per le aziende agricole con le linee SMARTBIO e POWERBIO. I consulenti energetici Teta Project infatti sono specialisti del settore in grado di guidare la  famiglia lungo un percorso di diagnosi dei consumi della casa e l’individuazione delle migliori soluzioni energetiche per il risparmio e la salvaguardia dell’ambiente. Il consulente energetico Teta Project ti accompagna e ti consiglia al meglio per aumentare il profitto della tua famiglia riducendo i costi e sfruttando fonti energetiche pulite, disponibili, gratuite. + EFFICIENZA: con gli impianti ad energie rinnovabili si incrementano le prestazioni energetiche degli edifici, perché si riduce il consumo di fonti fossili, si aumenta il valore dell'immobile e si vive meglio. + INDIPENDENZA: azzerare le bollette è possibile. Con un impianto fotovoltaico, una pompa di calore o un sistema solare termico la tua casa o il tuo condominio possono conseguire l’indipendenza energetica e puoi avere energia elettrica, riscaldamento, raffrescamento e acqua calda a costo zero e rispettando l’ambiente. + RISPARMIO: quanto spendiamo ogni mese per le bollette del gas e dell’energia elettrica? E quanto potremmo risparmiare? Liberarsi dalle bollette e guadagnare dall’energia prodotta fa dell’investimento energetico una scelta lungimirante, che si ripaga da sé in poco tempo e che aumenta il reddito disponibile per la famiglia. + FUTURO: Non solo efficienza e risparmio per le tue tasche ma salvaguardia dell’ambiente attraverso l’utilizzo di risorse energetiche pulite e disponibili. E’ il momento che ognuno di noi, nel proprio piccolo, faccia qualcosa per la qualità del mondo in cui viviamo e in cui vivranno i nostri figli.

Name: JCS Solar Co. Ltd
Company description: JCS Solar is a subsidiary of JZ Group, and a vertically-integrated photovoltaic manufacturer with a complete production chain that covers all from ingot casting, wafer slicing, cell production, module assembly to system integration and inverter manufacturing. With integrated mode, we provide our clients with superior and cost-effective products. Our plant is located in Yichang City in Hubei Province, beside the Yangtze River and the Three Gorges Dam. The producing area is about 25 acres(100,000㎡) and currently we have more than 1,800 employees, a number steadily growing. Production capacity of JCS Solar is 240MW in 2011 and will be 600MW in 2012. Our sales and service network has been established around the world, with global sales center in Shanghai, European headquarter in Munich and international logistics center in Rotterdam and Antwerp, and branch office in Sofia, Bulgaria. JZ Group is specialized in real estate development, investments of renewable energy projects, Agriculture, Construction materials and Business consulting and Logistics. Since the foundation of JZ Group in 2002, the Group is growing stronger and stronger with branches covering different areas, distributing its own endeavor to the economic development of Yichang City. JZ Group is speeding forward with the opportunities and supports provided by the local government, and scientific management system, and advanced technology, aiming at becoming a competitive Large-scale integrated green energy supplier.

Name: Hosted Energy
HQ Location: Netherlands, South Holland, Oud-beijerland, 2 Aston Martinlaan, 3261
Company description: Hosted Energy helpt je besparen bij energievraagstukken door het leveren van maatwerk. Hosted Energy adviseert onafhankelijk en is de spil tussen energieleveranciers, netwerkbeheerders en meetbedrijf.

Name: NutSelect
Company description: NutSelect is al jaren actief als distributeur. Wij verbinden productaanbieders van energie, verduurzaming of telecom met ruim 400 verkooppartners. Deze partners hebben toegang tot een cloud-based platform waarmee zij aanbiedingen kunnen vergelijken en verzenden naar (potentiële) klanten. Daarnaast ondersteunen wij onze partners en ontzorgen wij het gehele verkoopproces waardoor zij kunnen focussen op het verkopen van de producten die NutSelect beschikbaar stelt: energie, zonnepanelen, onderhoudscontracten, energierapporten, breedband, telecom etc. NutSelect behoort sinds 2017 tot de Connecthing Group. Wij zijn de grootste onafhankelijke distributeur en werken nauw samen met vrijwel alle bekende energieleveranciers maar ook vele nieuwe toetreders en aanbieders van andere producten. NutSelect is jouw verbinding naar de energieleverancier en andere aanbieders. Wil je je productenpakket voor jouw klanten zo compleet mogelijk maken? NutSelect maakt het makkelijk. NutSelect biedt je alle tools om deze producten te verkopen en de extra service te kunnen verlenen.  Ben je geïnteresseerd om een partnerschap met ons aan te gaan? Kijk dan op www.nutselect.nl.

Name: Mega Nederland
Company description: Zich onderscheiden van de 56 andere leveranciers op de Nederlandse energiemarkt. Dát is wat Mega Nederland wil doen.   Sinds februari 2022 kunnen Nederlandse consumenten kiezen voor de goedkopere en groene energie van Mega Nederland. Mega is reeds in België en Frankrijk actief als energieleverancier en meer dan 750.000 klanten profiteren daar al van onze lage tarieven voor stroom en gas.    Hoe we ons precies willen onderscheiden van de rest? Door dezelfde energie, gewoon voordeliger aan te bieden. Om dat te kunnen doen, houden we onze overheadkosten zo laag mogelijk. Onze administratie, IT, marketing en sourcing wordt bijvoorbeeld helemaal geregeld vanuit ons hoofdkantoor in België.   Vanuit ons kantoor in Rotterdam helpen onze lokale medewerkers onze klanten verder met elk aspect van hun energiecontract. Bovendien heeft ons team jarenlange ervaring, zo vermijden we onnodige kosten en kunnen we een vlotte service garanderen.   Daarnaast…  - doen we niet aan kleine letters. We vinden het belangrijk dat ons aanbod voor iedereen duidelijk is.  - vinden we de tijd van onze klanten kostbaar. Daarom sturen we geen ingewikkelde nota’s.   - houden we van het milieu en bieden we groene stroom aan. Op jouw jaarnota lees je vervolgens waar jouw stroom precies vandaan komt.   - zijn we bereikbaar via chat en webform.

Name: Energy Circle
HQ Location: Netherlands, Flevoland, Almere Stad, 3-d Versterkerstraat, 1322 an
Company description: De grootverbruiker van energie staat er in de complexe energiemarkt niet alleen voor. Energy Circle biedt u als eindgebruiker of decentrale elektriciteitsproducent de zekerheid dat u de juiste keuzes kunt maken om kostenefficiënt en maatschappelijk verantwoord te opereren. Door veel kennis, kunde en jarenlange ervaring op het gehele energieveld voor u te mobiliseren, zorgen de zeer deskundige adviseurs van Energy Circle ervoor dat u sterk staat in een complexe wereld. Energy Circle werkt alleen voor de klant en is volstrekt onafhankelijk van energieleveranciers en/of andere marktpartijen. Bij de inkoop van energie, meetdiensten etc. bemiddelen wij niet, maar zijn een verlengstuk van de klant, zodat de klant over alle benodigde expertise beschikt of kan beschikken. Energy Circle kan diensten leveren die de gehele cirkel van inkoop, controle, besparing en duurzaam (o.b.v. de Demming cycle) bedienen en heeft met name kennis van energiedistributie via particuliere netten (Gesloten Distributie Systemen en Directe Lijnen).

Name: Vivid Edge
Company description: At Vivid Edge, we're passionate about helping our customers save precious time and funds while cutting carbon.  We ensure you have the right experts getting you the right solutions to your commercial energy needs with no upfront costs.  Customer can save anywhere from 15-80% in energy consumption.  We bring a team of experts to design the right solution for your needs.  Then we manage the upgrade of your energy using infrastructure such as heating, cooling, lighting and control systems with our capital. You pay a monthly service fee that is is lower than your original energy bills for a set period of time.  And just like that... we're one step closer to Net Zero.  For large energy efficiency upgrades in Europe and beyond, call us today to see how we can help you make it happen +353 1 716 3760

Name: Meliora
Company description: The first solution that provides a transparent way to compensate for carbon emissions by connecting emitters directly with renewable energy providers and negative emission projects.

Name: Biog GmbH
Company description: BioG is an international technical provider for biogas plants specialized in flexible feeding systems, processing systems and intelligent conveyor techniques. We want to make sure that biogas will also be a very important energy supplier in the future, which can make energy out of waste material. BioG has become a specialist for recycling and reuse of waste material from the harvesting to the contribution of the fermentation process.

Name: Lietuvos Duju Tiekimas UAB
Company description: Natural gas supplier for households and business, providing reliable energy services, being professional and responsible partner, taking care of every client's needs.

Name: Ensorce
HQ Location: Romania, Cluj, Cluj-napoca, 78/3 Dr. Louis Pasteur, 400335
Company description: Ensorce Ltd. is an independent consultancy company specialized in energy sourcing. We offer support to our partners in selecting the right electricity and natural gas suppliers. Our goal is to find the adequate suppliers on the competitive energy market according to the specific needs of the client, the main criteria being the most favorable price but also the adjacent services. We also offer assistance for medium sized and large companies in rationalizing and facilitating the tendering process and optimizing costs. With the experience gathered on the Central and Eastern European markets, in 2013 our company has decided to offer its services to consumers present on the Romanian energy market, contributing thus to the success of their activities. By making use of our internal and external (experts in the field, consultants, IT solutions) resources we can ensure the know-how, technical knowledge and experience necessary to successfully conclude the tendering processes.  Our experts and consultants dispose of key competences in the field, both in the public as well as the business environment, being able to ensure the necessary support in order to undertake strategic (Sourcing) as well as operational (Procurement) acquisition procedures.  Our mission is to provide our clients with the necessary experience, knowledge and market information in order to be able to substantially reduce the costs related to energy procurement.

Name: WoonEnergie
Company description: WoonEnergie is de enige energieleverancier in Nederland die er speciaal is voor woningcorporaties én hun huurders. We zijn doelbewust opgericht door een breed collectief van woningcorporaties: onze kennis van deze wereld combineren wij effectief met onze expertise binnen de energiebranche.

Name: Enduce
Company description: Enduce has engineered the shower floor drain of the future, the Enduce E1, which recycles heat from used shower water with exceptional efficiency and resource savings. By recycling up to 75% of the energy, the Enduce E1 not only lowers electricity bills but also enhances the energy performance of buildings and significantly reduces their climate footprint over the product's lifecycle. The design emphasizes durability, resource-effectiveness, and cost-efficiency, featuring no electronics or moving parts and complying with stringent water safety standards. Our mission is to set a new industry standard.

Name: Ernst Buscher GmbH & Co. KG
Company description: Als Energieversorger  und Mineralölhändler betreut die Ernst Buscher GmbH & Co. KG seit über 80 Jahren Kunden in Nordrhein-Westfalen. Unser Familienbetrieb liefert TÜV-zertifizierte Heizöle, alternative Kraftstoffe und Schmierstoffe. Darüber hinaus sind wir ein regionaler Stromanbieter mit günstigen und fairen Strom-Tarifen. Ebenso bieten wir als Energieversorger günstiges Erdgas, das Sie wie gewohnt durch Ihre bestehenden Leitungen erhalten.

Name: Marigliano Energia
HQ Location: Italy, Campania, Marigliano, 9 Corso Vittorio Emanuele Iii, 80034
Company description: ME è il primo fornitore di energia elettrica e gas naturale di Marigliano, con esperienza pluriennale nella vendita. I punti di forza di Marigliano Energia sono l’utilizzo di energia green, proveniente da fonti rinnovabili e la trasparenza in bolletta.

Name: Korn GmbH
Company description: For over forty years, we have been developing, producing and distributing chemical products for the food and beverage industry, the service sector, industrial enterprises, and energy suppliers. Our philosophy is: as natural as possible with only as many chemicals as necessary.

Name: Voicecom Emmen B.V.
Company description: Voicecom Emmen is actief in de telemarketing, Face2Face en Door2Door verkoop . Wij helpen consumenten te besparen op de energiekosten en zijn in samenwerking met 9 A-energieleveranciers in Nederland. Onze werkzaamheden worden uitgevoerd op de volgende manieren: * Telemarketing, * Face 2 Face, * Door 2 Door.

Name: Lerta
Company description: Lerta is a dynamic company specializing in energy management solutions, focusing on enhancing energy efficiency and flexibility within the energy market. The company's mission is to empower clients to optimize their energy consumption and contribute to a sustainable future through innovative technologies and services. Lerta serves a diverse clientele, including energy providers, industrial enterprises, and commercial businesses, helping them navigate the complexities of energy balancing and demand response. By partnering with key stakeholders in the energy sector, Lerta aims to facilitate the transition towards a more resilient and efficient energy system. The company is committed to delivering tailored solutions that meet the unique needs of its clients while promoting environmental sustainability.

Name: Qualento
Company description: At Qualento, we bring solid expertise and pragmatic solutions to help businesses tackle their most pressing data challenges. What We Do We work with customers who need to run data-driven projects or enhance their teams to deliver results in: 🔹 Streamlining and optimizing data pipelines through advanced engineering. 🔹 Building scalable and efficient data architectures to support growth. 🔹 Delivering actionable insights with intuitive dashboards and analytics. 🔹 Ensuring seamless operations for data, machine learning, and generative AI systems. Who We’ve Worked With We are trusted by a diverse range of clients, including: 🔹 Leading Energy Distributor in Belgium 🔹 Global Insurance Brokerage Firm 🔹 Leading Media Group in Belgium 🔹 Top-Tier Energy Provider in Greece 🔹 Automotive Industry in Belgium 🔹 Big-4 Consulting Firms 🔹 Call Center and Communication Solutions Provider in Greece Why Qualento? We solve complex data challenges with solutions that deliver measurable business impact. Combining technical expertise with a collaborative approach, we turn data into lasting value.

Name: Gridio
Company description: Gridio helps EV drivers save up to 50% on charging costs by automatically charging when electricity is cheapest and greenest — working with any charger, energy supplier, or major car brand. We’re Europe’s #1 officially connected smart charging platform, trusted by major electric car brands and thousands of drivers across the continent. For businesses, Gridio provides energy flexibility and smart charging solutions that support utilities, OEMs, and energy companies in building cleaner, more resilient grids. 📲 For consumers: Download Gridio from the App Store or Google Play. 🤝 For partners: Let’s collaborate to build a smarter, cleaner energy future.

Name: Moventia PL
Company description: Moventia PL is a dynamic company specializing in innovative solutions for the industrial sector, with a strong emphasis on enhancing operational efficiency and sustainability. The company's mission is to empower businesses through advanced technologies, positioning itself as a leader in providing cutting-edge products and services that meet the evolving needs of its clients. Moventia PL collaborates with a diverse range of partners and clients, including manufacturing firms and energy providers, to implement effective strategies for energy efficiency and decarbonization. By leveraging its expertise, the company is dedicated to supporting its clients in navigating the challenges of modern industrial operations while promoting a sustainable future. In addition to its industrial focus, Moventia PL also operates as a digital marketing agency, specializing in Performance Marketing, SEO, Content Marketing, and web analytics. The mission in this domain is to deliver comprehensive solutions that help clients increase revenue and scale their businesses in the digital age. The company works with a variety of clients, including e-commerce businesses and online brands, and collaborates with industry partners, which has led to recognition in prestigious competitions such as the Google Premier Partner Awards and the European Search Awards. Moventia PL's vision is rooted in continuous development and innovation, making it a pioneer in the industry, ready to challenge the status quo and set new trends. Through its dual focus on industrial solutions and digital marketing, Moventia PL is committed to driving growth and sustainability for its clients across various sectors.

Name: NR Gy
HQ Location: Portugal, Braga, Braga, 31 Praça Camilo Castelo Branco, 4700-209
Company description: A NR-Gy nasceu com o propósito de oferecer as melhores soluções de mercado, ao nível das energias solares, de modo a reduzir as faturas de eletricidade e a contribuir para um FUTURO melhor, um MUNDO VERDE! Somos agentes exclusivos D2D da EDP.

Name: 4INCH For Intelligent Change! Et Sa Solution Snugr
HQ Location: Belgium, Wallonia, Braine-l'alleud, 481 Chaussée De Tubize
Company description: 4INCH sa/nv is a belgian company developping a Snugr, a heating management and optimization solution: https://www.snugr.be Snugr is revolutionizing the way we manage heating in public and private buildings. With heating accounting for 30% of operational costs in schools, offices, and public buildings, the need for an efficient, cost-effective solution is paramount. Snugr offers a seamless integration of hardware and software that empowers facility managers and building owners to take control of their heating systems, reducing energy bills by up to 40% and significantly lowering their carbon footprint. Snugr's Core Features are * Room-by-Room Control: Snugr's battery-free thermostatic valves and other easy-to-install products like aerotherm, boiler, and underfloor heating controllers allow for precise temperature control in each room. * User-Friendly Interface: Our intuitive software interface simplifies heating management, making it accessible even for those without technical expertise. * Smart Algorithms: The system employs optimization algorithms that analyze past heating patterns, outdoor temperature, and room thermal inertia to determine optimal heating schedules. * Nearly Work-Free Installation: Snugr's products require minimal installation work, making the transition smooth and cost-effective. 4INCH was finalist of NEST'up 2012 (a Techstar style accelerator in Belgium) and is a member of the WSL, a Walloon incubator for engineering sciences. In late 2020, Snugr was awarded the Solar Impulse Efficient Solution label, by a panel of experts, for contributing to a greener planet in an sustainable and profitable way.

Name: Indepenergy
Company description: Indepenergy is een onafhankelijke Energie Adviseur voor particulieren en het Midden- en Kleinbedrijf.  Indepenergy werkt met vrijwel alle grote energieleveranciers op de Nederlandse markt. Hierdoor vinden wij altijd een energieleverancier op maat voor u, of het nu voor u thuis is of in uw bedrijf. Indien gewenst kunnen wij ook een Energie Scan maken van uw huis of bedrijf. Interesse? Neemt u dan geheel vrijblijvend contact met ons op voor een afspraak! Indepenergy.... Besparen is nog nooit zo eenvoudig geweest!

Name: HelioCaminus
Company description: HelioCaminus develops effective and sustainable energy solutions that reduce homeowner electricity bills. HelioCaminus is currently developing a next generation thermal solar collector for homes and business. Our company is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

Name: FalckStaete
Company description: FalckStaete is a independent company that delivers IT, administrative and financial services for sustainable energy providers. For its customers market access services are available to come to fair market prices for energy. Through its services FalckStaete enables sustainable energy providers to focus on their core business, green energy!

Name: Zonneboiler Magazijn
Company description: Zonneboiler Magazijn De terugverdientijd van zonneboilers was lange tijd niet interessant aangezien de overheden de subsidies nagenoeg alleen maar richten op zonnepanelen (elektriciteit) en de zonneboiler systemen duur zijn in aanschaf. De rendementen zijn echter per vierkante meter erg hoog. Tevens bent u met een zonneboiler niet afhankelijk van uw energieleverancier. U gebruikt immers uw opgewekte energie voor uw eigen huishouden. Door gebruik te maken van diverse Europese leveranciers en goede inkoop afspraken te maken, zijn wij in staat complete doe het zelf pakketten samen te stellen die (ook zonder subsidie) zeer interessant zijn. De materialen zijn van hoge kwaliteit en hebben gelijke, zo niet hogere rendementen als de dure systemen van de concurrent. Zonneboiler Magazijn is een handelsnaam van Statice Helden B.V. Wij verhandelen enkel de materialen. De installatie kan door u zelf of door uw installateur worden uitgevoerd aan de hand van duidelijk instructie materiaal. Doordat wij geen winkelpand en duur personeel hebben, kunnen wij de producten tegen scherpe prijzen aanbieden.

Name: GCTPlus Eficiencia Energètica
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Manresa, 13 Passeig Pere Iii, 08242
Company description: Consultoría energética dedicada a empresas y particulares.  GCTPlus está enfocada en la mejora contínua de la eficiencia energética de las empresas, mediante: - Realización de auditorias energéticas. - Estudio de proyectos fotovoltaicos para el autoconsumo. - Ánálisis, control y gestión de sistemas energéticos integrales mediante softwares de submetering i analizadores, para poder gestionar el consumo de las empresas - Mejora de la contratación de las facturas de electricidad y gas, mediante estudios individuales, compras agrupadas de energía y licitaciones.

Name: AHORRACORP
HQ Location: Spain, Madrid, Madrid, 25 C. Del Marqués De Zafra, 28028
Company description: En un mercado cada vez más cambiante, la energía eléctrica y del gas son dos de los recursos más importantes para el desarrollo de cualquier empresa. En muchos casos, los precios de la energía son demasiado altos, lo que puede afectar negativamente la economía tanto del pequeño consumidor como grandes empresas. Nuestra empresa tiene como objetivo mediar entre los proveedores de energía y el consumidor, para que este último pueda obtener precios más competitivos y ahorrar en el precio del suministro energético.

Name: Solar Path
Company description: Solar Path is committed to providing eco-friendly and cost-effective solutions that enable our customers to transition to clean and renewable energy. With a highly skilled and experienced team, we install and maintain custom solar panels tailored to the specific needs of each client. Whether you're looking to reduce your carbon footprint, save on energy bills, or contribute to a more sustainable future, Solar Path is here to guide you at every step of your transition to solar energy. Contact us today to start your journey towards a cleaner and more sustainable energy future.🌿

Name: Eviny Germany
Company description: Eviny as leading energy supplier and provider of fast charging infrastructure in Norway is coming to Germany now: We are building a far-reaching, reliable charging network and thereby actively drive sustainable mobility.  To expand our network of charging infrastructure, we are seeking for attractive locations and strong partners. Would you like to enhance the value of your location by offering charging infrastructure to your customers? Join us in shaping the future of mobility! Contact us (sites@eviny.de) today to learn more about becoming a site partner of Eviny.

Name: Grineko
Company description: Firma Grineko to pośrednik instalacji fotowoltaicznych. Na co dzień pomagamy rodzinom, przedsiębiorcom oraz rolnikom zamieniać wysokie rachunki za prąd na samodzielną produkcję energii elektrycznej. Pomagamy również w uzyskaniu dotacji. W Grineko współpracujemy z najlepszymi i sprawdzonymi firmami, wykonującymi instalacje fotowoltaiczne. Szukamy i dobieramy tylko takie rozwiązania, które są najkorzystniejsze z punktu widzenia naszych klientów: rodzin, przedsiębiorców i firm, którzy mają dość rosnących rachunków za prąd.

Name: GETICA 95 COM SRL
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, 2 Calea Șerban Vodă U-center
Company description: Getica 95 is one of the largest suppliers of electricity in Romania. Since its establishment in 1995, the company has experienced various fields of activity, developing its knowledge about the business environment and its needs, until 2010 when it was licensed in electricity supply. Name: Powercrumbs
Company description: Wij zijn Powercrumbs. Als enige in de markt vangen wij reststromen van biogas op die anders verloren gaan. Deze restjes vormen samen een onuitputtelijke bron van duurzame energie, geschikt voor elke energievraag. Onze oplossing? De Powerbox. Deze slimme container levert schone energie waar het nodig is. De Powerbox wordt eenvoudig gekoppeld aan het aanwezige aggregaat op locatie, bijvoorbeeld in gebieden met netcongestie of zonder aansluiting op het elektriciteitsnet. Binnen no-time beschik je over de duurzaamste energie in de markt. Alles is online gekoppeld, zodat je altijd inzicht hebt in je energievoorraad en optimaal gebruik maakt van beschikbare bronnen. Onze Powerbox is verkrijgbaar in verschillende formaten (10- of 20-voets containers) en flexibel inzetbaar. Wie wij helpen met verduurzamen? •	Bouwbedrijven •	Infra- en civiele techniek •	Producenten van bouwmaterialen •	Overheden en waterschappen •	Mobiele energieleveranciers Het resultaat? Geen verspilling van biogas. Een schoner product. En een concrete stap naar een duurzame toekomst. Wil je ontdekken hoe wij jouw organisatie kunnen verduurzamen én bijdragen aan een schonere wereld? Volg ons en neem contact met ons op!

Name: ENERGIKA SRL

Company description: Massimizziamo l’efficienza, ottimizziamo i costi, riduciamo l’impatto Dal 1997 aiutiamo le aziende a gestire l’energia in modo più efficiente, riducendo costi e sprechi con ingegneria e consulenza indipendente. Oggi facciamo parte di Tecno Group, Sustaintech Corporation che sviluppa soluzioni per la sostenibilità economica, ambientale e sociale delle imprese. Le nostre radici affondano a Rimini, dove ha sede il nostro quartier generale, ma operiamo anche in Spagna con un distaccamento dedicato, per essere sempre più vicini alle aziende che vogliono ottimizzare la gestione dell’energia. I valori che ci distinguono: • Indipendenza – Non siamo legati a fornitori di energia o tecnologie, garantendo sempre la soluzione più vantaggiosa per te. • Trasparenza – Rendiamo comprensibili i tecnicismi del settore, aiutandoti a prendere decisioni consapevoli. • Sostenibilità – Da oltre 25 anni promuoviamo un uso razionale dell’energia, riducendo l’impatto ambientale delle imprese. • Persone al centro – Costruiamo relazioni di fiducia con clienti e collaboratori, con un approccio autentico e concreto. Vuoi ridurre i costi e migliorare l’efficienza della tua azienda? Contattaci per scoprire come possiamo aiutarti a trasformare l’energia in un vantaggio competitivo.

Company description: Altijd al een eigen energielabel willen hebben? Een energielabel dat vertrouwen, expertise en daadkracht uitstraalt en dat alles onder jouw naam en jouw logo? Als energieleverancier doen wij het net wat anders dan anders. Uiteraard leveren wij gas en stroom en vanzelfsprekend zijn we gespecialiseerd in duurzaamheid en energiebesparing. Maar wat ons écht bijzonder maakt, is dat jij onze diensten eenvoudig aanbiedt onder je eigen naam of merk. Onder deze zogenaamde 'white-label constructie' wordt alles door ons geregeld: van facturatie tot klantenservice. Daarmee bied je jouw omgeving net dat beetje extra, versterk je de klantrelatie én genereer je extra inkomsten voor je bedrijf/organisatie.

Name: ThermoSmart
Company description: Uit persoonlijke frustratie ontstaan. Slimme Wi-Fi thermostaat. Mooi Nederlands design. Makkelijk te bedienen. Moeiteloos aanpassen met de iPhone, iPad of Andoid app altijd en overal. Geschikt voor aan/uit en Open Therm CV-ketels. Geen abonnementskosten. ThermoSmart is ontwikkeld door een jonge, Nederlandse start-up uit onvrede met het huidige aanbod aan nodeloos gecompliceerde thermostaten. ThermoSmart is begonnen met een schone lei en heeft een geheel nieuw thermostaatconcept ontwikkeld met als belangrijkste kenmerken: 1)    eenvoudig in gebruik 2)    altijd en overal te bedienen 3)    helpt besparen 4)    onafhankelijk van energie- en ketelleveranciers. Marktonderzoek 75% van de Nederlandse huishoudens verwarmt  het huis terwijl niemand thuis is. De belangrijkste reden is een onbegrijpelijke thermostaat. Denk bijvoorbeeld aan het programmeren op een klein LCD schermpje met veel onduidelijke knoppen. Bovendien blijkt uit onderzoek dat meer dan 50% van de Nederlanders hun thermostaat op afstand wil kunnen bedienen. Crowd funding 2013 Eind 2013 is ThermoSmart succesvol gecrowdfund en bovendien geëindigd in de top 5 van best gefunde projecten in 2013. Mede daardoor is ThermoSmart is onafhankelijk van energieleveranciers en ketelproducenten. Toekomstvisie ThermoSmart is dé thermostaat van nu en van de toekomst. Duurzaam en nooit klaar met leren. Het creëert een online platform dat gebruikservaringen en data om het gemak van de mens te dienen. Daarnaast kunnen er in de toekomst allerlei diensten worden toegevoegd, zoals het aansturen van de CV-ketel op basis van de locatie van de gebruiker en zelflerend vermogen met weersVOORspelling. De gebruiker is met ThermoSmart verzekerd van de slimste en meest gebruiksvriendelijke thermostaat die er is. Twitter       : twitter.com/Thermosmart_nl Facebook : facebook.com/iThermosmart.nl

Name: EnergieControle
Company description: EnergieControle en GrootzakelijkEnergie optimaliseren energiekosten voor grootzakelijke klanten. Dus is niet een van de vele online energieprijs check of onderdeel van een energieleverancier. Het is een neutrale offline inkooporganisatie en biedt u, plus andere grootzakelijke bedrijven, scherpere energietarieven door middel van schaalvoordeel en expertise van de markt.  Op de websites, www.energiecontrole.nl en www.grootzakelijkenergie, kunt u informatie vinden om uw energiekosten te verlagen. Wij werken op basis van `No cure, No pay´. U kunt daarom gratis uw contactgegevens achterlaten, dan neemt 1 van de energie consultants contact met u op voor een bedrijfscan. De energieconsultant kan doormiddel van een telefonisch gesprek genoeg informatie verschaffen om met uw gegevens een scherper energietarief op te vragen. U kunt vervolgens dit tarief zelf beoordelen en/of accepteren. Er komen verder geen extra kosten bovenop dit tarief, er zit namelijk tevens een kleine marge in voor GrootzakelijkEnergie. Echter is het uiteindelijke tarief voor stroom of gas ten alle tijd lager dan dat u individueel een tarief opvraagd. EnergieControle checkt vervolgens maandelijks en jaarlijks uw nota's...  Vrijblijvend, gratis en transparant! en..... niet geschoten is altijd mis!

We are looking forward to offering the best to you.

Name: Community Power Ireland
HQ Location: Ireland, Eastern Region, Nenagh, Friars Court, kn59
Company description: Community Power is Ireland’s first community owned electricity supplier. It is a partnership of community energy organisations around Ireland working to create a sustainable energy future for their local areas.  The communities are working on saving energy, retrofits, microgeneration and developing plans for renewable energy generation.  The group grew out of Templederry, which is Ireland's first and only community owned wind farm. It is a partnership of community energy groups from Tipperary, Limerick, Galway, Mayo and Dublin and is now working to support more renewable energy projects across Ireland, and will buy electricity from small suppliers.  Last November Community Power was granted a licence to become a large utility supplier.  This is a game changer for community-owned energy generation in Ireland.  Until then Community Power had been buying and selling power between a handful of small renewable generators and a few customers.  Community Power can now take on thousands of customers and can compete on a national footing across the whole of Ireland buying and selling community owned power to and from the people of Ireland. Householders, businesses, farmers, schools etc. throughout Ireland are all being urged to switch suppliers which will in turn enable Community Power to assist other communities develop their own projects. In a market that has been closed to community and citizens for years, this means the door is now firmly open for citizens and communities to benefit from generating their own power. The company wants Ireland to run on clean renewable power, developed for people, owned by people. They recognize Ireland’s energy system is in crisis, with over 90% reliance on climate polluting fossil fuels and they are working to change that. Community Power wants the many benefits of generating renewable power to be shared by the people and communities of Ireland, and they want people to be able to afford to power their homes.

Name: Enermarket GmbH
Company description: Als neutraler B2B-Marktplatz für Strom und Gas bietet enermarket kleinen und mittelständischen Unternehmen die Möglichkeit, Angebote verschiedener Versorger direkt zu vergleichen, und erleichtert somit die Suche nach dem passenden Energieanbieter. Dabei führt das Portal enermarket, umfangreiche Informationen zu einzelnen Anbietern auf und gibt eine transparente Leistungsübersicht. Ohne vorherige Registrierung und zusätzliche Kosten können Interessenten so verschiedene Angebote direkt gegenüberstellen und den Vertrag mit wenigen Klicks abschließen. Energieversorger profitieren über enermarket von einem zusätzlichen Online-Vertriebskanal und einer deutlich erhöhten Reichweite ihres Angebots. enermarket unterstützt damit die Digitalisierung im Energiemarkt. Impressum: https://www.enermarket.de/de/impressum Unsere Datenschutzvereinbarung ist hier zu finden: https://www.enermarket.de/privacy_policy

Name: INFITECH Ingenieria SL
Company description: Ofrecemos una solución integral que va más allá de la simple monitorización. Proporciona a los usuarios y operadores de redes energéticas una herramienta potente para gestionar eficientemente la generación, consumo y almacenamiento de energía renovable, al tiempo que simplifica la operación y ofrece servicios post-venta valiosos para los proveedores de energía y empresas instaladoras. ¿CÓMO LO HACEMOS? Name: Succedo Unternehmensberatung GmbH

Company description: Zu unseren Kunden zählen bundesweit sowohl energieintensive Letztverbraucher aus Industrie, Handel und Gewerbe, als auch Energieanbieter, Hersteller sowie die öffentliche Hand (bspw. Energieagenturen der Bundesländer). Unsere Mandanten profitieren dabei nicht nur von der jahrelangen Erfahrung unseres Teams. Zusätzlich zu unserer (energie-)wirtschaftlichen Kompetenz bringen wir ein ganzes Lösungsnetzwerk an Partnern mit, die wir fallbezogen zum Vorteil unserer Auftraggeber einsetzen. Name: WISE Nederland
Company description: WISE (World Information Service on Energy) WISE is een milieuorganisatie die campagne voert tegen kernenergie en vóór schone energie. De oproep om over te stappen naar een groene en kernenergievrije energieleverancier staat al vele jaren centraal in de langlopende WISE campagne Groene stroom? Ja Graag! Om mensen daarbij goed te kunnen adviseren doet WISE regelmatig onderzoek naar verschillende aspecten van de energiemarkt.  WISE is an environmental ngo based in Amsterdam / The Netherlands. The mission of WISE is a world without Nuclear Power. It is possible to create a reliable, affordable and sustainable energy-future without nuclear power.

Name: NederlandReview
Company description: Waarom NederlandReview? Ervaringen, reviews, meningen, beoordelingen en reviews voor (en door!) consumenten Wil jij weten hoe consumenten over een bedrijf in Nederland denken? Bekijk dan bij NederlandReview meningen van echte mensen die al ervaringen met deze bedrijven hebben. Zo ga je voorbereid een verzekering, telefoonabonnement, energiecontract of andere aankoop aan! Waarom is NederlandReview opgericht? Wij hebben zelf aardig wat slechte ervaringen (maar gelukkig ook goede) achter de rug als consument. Als wij een slechte ervaring hadden met een bedrijf, kwamen we er achter dat we dit tegen vrienden of familie vertelden, om ze te behoeden voor een eigen misstap. Maar deze bedrijven konden nog altijd gewoon precies dezelfde praktijken verrichten buiten onze vriendenkring om. Er was geen platform om heel Nederland te vertellen dat ze er vooral niet moesten kopen. Maar andersom gold natuurlijk hetzelfde. Wij zijn wel eens ontzettend goed geholpen na een storing bij onze energieleverancier, of hebben toch een flinke korting gekregen toen bleek dat de garantie van onze wasmachine net was verlopen (domme pech!). Ook in dat geval wilden wij heel Nederland vertellen wat voor goede service wij hadden ontvangen. Daarom hebben we NederlandReview opgericht. Want we wilden ergens terecht kunnen met onze positieve en negatieve ervaringen. Wat eerst alleen in een kleine kring bekend was, kan zo heel Nederland bereiken. Bedrijven die hun klanten goed helpen, worden beloond met positieve reviews, geschreven door diezelfde tevreden klanten; klanten die melding willen maken van een bedrijf dat juist in negatieve zin is opgevallen, hebben nu een platform waar hun mening ertoe doet. Heb je zelf ervaringen met één of meerdere bedrijven? Laat een review achter en help mee om anderen te laten weten hoe goed of slecht dit bedrijf is wat betreft bestelgemak, service, prijs en levering! 100% onafhankelijk en objectief NederlandReview

Name: Truman Data Ltd.
Company description: Truman Data has built the Energy Coop Platform, a cloud-based, AI-driven Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) designed to unlock energy flexibility in buildings. The platform acts as a virtual power plant serving two main customers: 1) Real estate portfolio owners: cities, municipalities, pension funds, BlackRock, and others, can access demand response markets to sell energy flexibility, reduce consumption, and datafy assets without vendor lock-in. 2) Energy companies use the platform for sector coupling, offering automated flexibility services to their end customers in the built environment. A key component is ForeCoop, our IoT bridge (soon on www.truman.cloud), which connects energy assets directly to the cloud. It can be used standalone or integrated with the Energy Coop Platform to enable seamless real-time market participation. ForeCoop is technically advanced, competitively priced, and endorsed by one of Finland’s largest energy companies. Both the platform and ForeCoop operate fully automatically, powered by high-frequency trading bots developed with VTT. These bots perform real-time price bidding, balancing the grid and creating fair market value for buyers and sellers. With renewable energy growth comes volatility, making flexibility crucial for grid stability. Europe’s flexible energy market could reach EUR 90–120 billion by 2035, with buildings as a key source of flexibility. Currently, most building owners lack access to this market and cannot monetize their energy assets. Truman Data builds the Cloud Computing Energy Coop PaaS to enable cities, REITs, housing companies, and energy providers to trade flexible energy, delivering significant economic and climate benefits at scale.

Name: Seniorenvoordeelpas.nl
