Name: Energestic
Company description: Consultoría especializada en servicios de representación en el sector eléctrico. -. Realizamos las funciones de una central de compras fomentando la competencia entre los diferentes proveedores de electricidad. -. Favorecemos la competitividad de nuestros asociados por la vía de la reducción del coste generado por la factura eléctrica. -. Atendemos y estudiamos las ofertas del mercado seleccionando la más competitiva para nuestros asociados. -. Realizamos los trámites administrativos necesarios para los cambios de proveedor o cualquier cambio en el contrato (titular, CC, dirección de correspondencia, potencia contratada...) -. Damos servicios de gestión energética tales como: Validación de la facturación, seguimiento de consumo eléctrico, auditoría energética etc.

Name: SolarAide
Company description: Platform that helps households to understand solar energy impact on the electricity bills and acquire solar instalattion easy, fast and hassle-free by connecting them with reliable installers. At the same time, SolarAide aims to facilitate energy usage data exchange and connect solar owners into digital network. Digital network will enable SolarAide to offer solar owners data backed post-instalattion services as well as give market access to the third parties to provide services such as demand response or P2P electricity trading. The company currently operates in Lithuania and Poland.

Name: Konsument GmbH
Company description: Konsument ist ein Verbraucherportal mit dem Sie bares Geld sammeln können. Als Mitglied bei Konsument legen Sie ein Profil an und beantworten Fragen zu Ihrer Person und Ihren Konsumgewohnheiten. Partnerunternehmen von Konsument machen Ihnen dann unverbindliche Angebote, z. B. wie Sie mit einem neuen Handyvertrag oder einem neuen Stromanbieter sparen können. Sie entscheiden vollkommen unabhängig, ob Sie ein Angebot annehmen möchten, oder nicht. Je vollständiger Ihr Profil bei Konsument ist, um so besser passen die Angebote zu Ihnen. Unser Motto: Nur Bares ist Wahres! Für einen Vertragsabschluss zahlen die Partnerunternehmen eine Provision. Konsument teilt diese Provision mit Ihnen - in barer Münze. Die Summe wird auf Ihrem Konsument-Konto gutgeschrieben und mit einen Klick ausbezahlt. Geld gibt es übrigens auch, wenn Sie keinen Vertrag mit einem Partner abschließen. Auch Ihre Zeit vergütet Konsument in barer Münze, zum Beispiel dann, wenn Sie an einer Umfrage teilnehmen oder mit einem Konsument-Partner über ein bestimmtes Angebot sprechen.

Name: JSC Energijos Kodas
Company description: Independent electricity supplier. Our mission - to create the most competitive and most favorable conditions for customers to buy electricity. Vision - become the leader of independent electricity retail providers in Lithuania, the company which provides the most competitive services in the market; and to be trustworthy partner for a long-term collaboration. So that to implement our mission and vision, we try to reach the aim of a long-term partnership, based on trust, experience and responsibility.

Name: TXP - Trading Made Simple
Company description: TXP was born from the values we share: innovation, simplicity and professionalism. We have brought together for this project an in-depth knowledge of both existing platforms and the local natural gas market, as well as experience in building high-performance software and cybersecurity. Our mission is to provide natural gas suppliers and traders in Romania with a platform to help them focus on what is important: natural gas trading.  TXP means trading made simple!

Name: INNIO Group
Company description: INNIO Group is a leading energy solutions provider headquartered in Jenbach, Austria, specializing in the development and manufacturing of high-efficiency gas engines and power generation systems. With its renowned product brands, Jenbacher and Waukesha, INNIO is dedicated to empowering industries and communities to harness sustainable energy. The company's mission is to facilitate the energy transition by delivering innovative, low-carbon technologies that enhance energy efficiency and reduce greenhouse gas emissions. INNIO envisions a carbon-neutral future, aiming for climate neutrality at its Jenbach site by 2040. The company serves a diverse clientele across critical infrastructure sectors, including healthcare, agriculture, and data centers, and operates globally with a strong presence in over 100 countries. INNIO's innovative solutions are designed to support the evolving energy landscape, integrating both traditional and renewable energy sources, including hydrogen. The company collaborates closely with various stakeholders, including local energy suppliers and industry bodies, to develop sustainable energy solutions that meet the needs of its customers. INNIO is committed to sustainability, as evidenced by its recognition in environmental, social, and governance (ESG) performance, including a Platinum medal from EcoVadis, placing it in the top 1% of businesses. The company actively engages with its workforce and local communities, prioritizing diversity, inclusion, and employee well-being. Through its AI-powered myPlant digital platform, INNIO provides clients with advanced tools for optimizing performance and reducing emissions. With a focus on decarbonization, decentralization, and digitalization, INNIO aims to deliver reliable and economical power solutions ranging from 200 kW to 10 MW. The company is dedicated to promoting a circular economy and ensuring that its operations adhere to high ESG standards. By investing in research and development, INNIO continuously innovates to meet the evolving needs of its diverse customer base, fostering a culture of collaboration and social engagement.

Name: Adaptive City Mobility
Company description: ACM is developing an innovative platform for urban electric mobility with its network partners. For this purpose, the company developed the most efficient city fleet vehicle available on the market. ACM's team of experienced experts enables the deployment of the ACM CITY ONE in an ecosystem of vehicle users, fleet operators, service providers, energy suppliers, insurers and advertising partners to create affordable and sustainable mobility and logistics solutions worldwide. - - - - Contact: info@acm.city Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/ACM_mobility YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/AdaptiveCityMobility - - - - Privacy policy: https://www.acm.city/privacy-policy Legal notice: https://www.acm.city/legal-notice - - - -

Name: ENSEK Benelux
Company description: In an exciting new development, NrgFin has been acquired by UK-based, SaaS company, ENSEK, and is now ENSEK Benelux. Click here to read more: https://ensek.com/blog/ensek-expands-europe-acquisition-nrgfin ENSEK Benelux provides a 100% cloud-native SaaS platform that powers energy supply businesses across the globe. We want to simplify the energy industry by providing a solution that allows energy suppliers to focus on what matters - Their customers. With ever evolving consumer expectations, greater levels of competition, and increasing regulatory pressure, the pace of change and the need to continuously adapt is unprecedented for energy retailers. Combined, this creates two main challenges that energy suppliers face: 1)	Significantly reducing cost to serve  2)	To deliver an excellent customer service Using our API-driven platform and combined services, customer-centric, digital-first energy suppliers can hold their entire customer lifecycle in one place. The highly automated solution works to reduce operational and business pressures, enabling energy suppliers to focus on the value-add areas that drive success. We understand that a successful solution means happy customers and increased margins. The ENSEK Benelux solution can help energy suppliers: -	Simplify day-to-day operational processes and cut complexity, reducing cost to serve by 15% -	Increase customer service ratings by 20% and employee satisfaction by 50% using a data-fueled platform -	Communicate seamlessly with customers, partners and colleagues using API-rich software.

Name: Hosted Energie Consulting
Company description: Als klant van Hosted Energie Consulting hoeft u zich geen zorgen meer te maken over de inkoop, meetdienst, contractvoorwaarden, factuurcontrole of het facturatieproces van uw energie. Wij nemen u alles uit handen en onderhouden het contact met de energieleverancier.

Name: Costa Energy Brokers
HQ Location: Spain, Andalusia, Benalmádena, Local 16/17 Paseo Del Generalife, 29631
Company description: Costa Energy Brokers is a free, independent price comparison service that helps consumers compare electricity prices and switch energy supplier to save money. The market for electricity in Spain is regulated, but the prices are not regulated. When the energy market was opened up to competition, Spanish consumers have been able to switch energy suppliers to find a cheaper electricity deal.  Costa Energy Consultants have commercial arrangements in place with some suppliers for energy. We charge suppliers a fee when we switch customers to them, which means we can provide consumers with a FREE service.

Name: Host Kitchen Brands
HQ Location: Portugal, Lisbon, Lisbon, 69 3c Av. Da Liberdade, 1250-140
Company description: Dear restaurant owners, listen up. Your restaurant, kitchen appliances, energy bills and staff is already paid for and we can help you generate more return on these sunk costs. We provide revenue from virtual brands so you can focus on preparing food while pulling in more money from our delivery-only brands that just work!

Name: BESSEB
HQ Location: Italy, Umbria, Perugia, 63b Via Pietro Soriano, 06132
Company description: The project lives and develops in a community of families and small businesses that position themselves in the energy market for the consumption of electricity and gas between energy suppliers and end consumers with a single association brand (brand "t.r.i."). Personal and collective events are included in a highly technological, easy and intuitive energy portal, based on the "BlockChain", where all the necessary tools are found to create, share, index and monetize content for one's own benefit in order to break down and / or eliminate the cost of your energy consumption. The difference with respect to participation in a sector purchasing group lies in the driving force of this project that grows daily by navigating at low or high tide with a rudder guided by a physical structure of specialized technicians who promote permanent and continuous cruising. in the sea of energy. Those who decide to join it, at no cost, have their "Energy Smartphone" in their pockets, where they can limit themselves to simply consulting their consolidated interests, or actively seek to improve their energy efficiency objectives with the continuous guidance of a structure of people and services available to them

Name: E-Werke Haniel Haimhausen GmbH & Co. KG
Company description: Die E-Werke Haniel Haimhausen sind ein mittelständisches Energieversorgungsunternehmen mit zehn Mitarbeitern. Unser Unternehmenssitz befindet sich in Haimhausen, nördlich von München. Bereits seit 1893 gewinnen wir hier aus Wasserkraft Strom. Und zwar nicht irgendwelchen Strom, sondern 100% Ökostrom. Heute beliefern wir ca. 2.600 Haushalte und Unternehmen in Haimhausen, Unterschleißheim und anderen Gemeinden in Bayern. Die E-Werke Haniel sind ein unabhängiger Stromanbieter. Wir sind stolz auf unsere Tradition und trotzdem zukunftsorientiert. Wir nutzen moderne Technik und übernehmen Verantwortung für unsere Natur.

Name: Etruenergy
Company description: Etruenergy è un'azienda che si occupa di consulenza in ambito energetico e di fornitura di Energia elettrica e Gas naturale principalmente a PMI e gruppi industriali. Queste le nostre principali aree di intervento: - Analisi delle fatture dei fornitori per verificare la correttezza dei costi imputati. - Studio della migliore tipologia di offerta per ottimizzare i costi di approvvigionamento di energia e gas. - Assistenza fiscale ai sensi del D.P.R. 633/72 (agevolazione IVA) e Testo Unico  delle Accise (D.Lgs 26 ottobre 1995 per le agevolazioni sull'imposta regionale del Gas naturale). - Studio di fattibilità e di ottimizzazione risorse ed impianti in un'ottica di efficientamento energetico. - Ottenimento di Titoli di Efficienza Energetica attraverso EsCo azienda partner. - Assistenza legale nelle controversie con i fornitori di energia elettrica e gas. - Dialogo continuo con il Distributore per immediata risoluzione di problematiche. - Supporto tecnico, commerciale e amministrativo riguardo alle modifiche contrattuali e nuovi allacci. Scegli EtruEnergy per avere: - Referente unico e dedicato sempre disponibile. - Monitoraggio costante del mercato energetico e periodico aggiornamento delle tariffe applicate. - Possibilità anche per le piccole aziende di accedere a prezzi solitamente riservati ai grossi gruppi industriali. - Risparmio certificato, protocollato e garantito, con analisi a fine anno della riduzione dei costi ottenuta. - Gratuità nell'utilizzo dei servizi evoluti dedicati e disponibili sul portale Internet (con gestione tramite User ID e password) di particolare utilità ai fini del controllo consumi, gestione dell'impianto e visibilità fatture con possibilità di archiviazione delle stesse in formato elettronico. EtruEnergy è dal 2013 business partner e Top Agency di Axpo Italia SpA.

Name: Smobi Photovoltaik
Company description: Erleben Sie die Freiheit, Ihren eigenen Strom zu erzeugen. Mit Smobi-Photovoltaik machen Sie eine Investition in eine nachhaltige Zukunft und werden zum selbstbewussten Energieanbieter. Verabschieden Sie sich von schwankenden Strompreisen und genießen Sie die Vorteile einer unabhängigen Energieversorgung. Smobi Photovoltaik - Ihre Zukunft beginnt jetzt.

Name: ELI Ecosystem
Company description: The Eli Project is an innovative startup based on the blockchain solutions.  We are an energy provider with its own ecosystem and energy management system for sustainable living. The idea of the project is to create a self-sufficient and independent community that will not depend on the external economic situation, thereby giving people freedom and the right to choose. We strive to make decentralized green energy available to absolutely everyone, thereby increasing our planet's chances for a sustainable future.

Name: Trevion
Company description: Trevion is een Vlaamse en groene elektriciteits- en aardgasleverancier die zijn klanten exclusief bedient met in Vlaanderen geproduceerde hernieuwbare elektriciteit. Het verzekert een zorgeloze overstap met zekerheid tot continue levering.   Als dochterbedrijf van Trevi Milieuadvies en Technologie heeft Trevion een eigen productiecapaciteit ontwikkeld die grotendeels afkomstig is van zijn biomassacentrales (82%). Het gaat om vergistingstanks met een beperkte capaciteit die werken op basis van plantaardig afval (vooral afval van diepvriesgroenten maar ook maïs en gier). Het bedrijf heeft ook windmolenparken die 15% produceren van de stroom die het aan zijn klanten levert, 3% is afkomstig uit fotovoltaïsche installaties.  Hierdoor moet Trevion geen groene stroomcertificaten aankopen en investeert het rechtstreeks in de productie van hernieuwbare energie. Trevion begon als energieleverancier voor particulieren en ondernemingen in Vlaanderen maar heeft ondertussen ook aardgas onder zijn vleugel genomen. Deze eerlijke energie wordt aan scherpe prijzen verkocht met een gegarandeerde hoge service en verregaande flexibiliteit. Trevion levert elektriciteit en gas. Het koopt geen stroom aan, maar houdt wel de mogelijkheid open om dat te doen indien het nodig zou zijn om te voldoen aan de vraag.

Name: Morvedre Eficiencia
Company description: Somos un referente en el sector de las #instalacionesenergéticas, ayudando a nuestros clientes a incrementar el #ahorro en sus facturas de #energía.

Name: BLV Energy Solutions
Company description: Somos una asesoría especializada en el sector energético. Ofrecemos estudios personalizados para reducir el precio de tus facturas de electricidad y gas.  Nos ocupamos de asesorarte y orientarte para encontrar el plan de ahorro que más se adapte a tus necesidades, así como también, realizamos todos los trámites por ti sin coste ni compromiso alguno. Confía en nosotros y te daremos las mejores condiciones en tus facturas de energía.  Además, en BLV Energy Solutions ofrecemos cualquier tipo de instalación eléctrica y más servicios que podrás ver detallados en nuestra página web, siempre apostando por las energías renovables y la sostenibilidad.   https://enerteams.com/

Name: Save&Trade
Company description: Save&Trade è una ESCO iscritta al registro delle start up innovative.  Il nostro obiettivo è offrire un nuovo approccio alle tematiche di gestione e risparmio dell'energia, basato sull'azione congiunta dell'efficientamento degli impianti e dell'ottimizzazione delle condizioni di approvvigionamento, garantendo risultati di gran lunga migliori a quanto ottenibile con singole azioni indipendenti. La totale indipendenza di Save&Trade da produttori di sistemi di efficienza e/o fornitori di energia e lo stretto legame del suo compenso con i risparmi ottenuti, sono garanzia per il cliente dell'adozione delle soluzioni più adatte alle sue esigenze, senza alcun conflitto di interesse. I nostri servizi si rivolgono ad un’ampia gamma di realtà aziendali, spaziando da lavori di audit ed efficientamento energetico totalmente remunerati dai risparmi ottenuti a operazioni di acquisto mirato dell’energia alle migliori condizioni offerte dal mercato, senza trascurare servizi di consulenza sui contratti di fornitura e attività nella borsa elettrica.

Name: Energia È Srl
Company description: Energia è Srl - Fornitore di Energia Elettrica e Gas. Con sede a Cittanova (RC), Energia è si impone sul territorio quale Società che si occupa principalmente di acquistare e rivendere Energia Elettrica e Gas Naturale studiando così le migliori soluzioni da destinare ai suoi Clienti.  L’Azienda opera nel Mercato Libero, abbracciando sia il residenziale che il business, garantendo così una fornitura sicura a prezzi convenienti. Energia è Srl è specializzata inoltre in materia di  Green Economy, sponsorizzando a prezzi altamente competitivi progetti di energia rinnovabile (Fotovoltaico, Solare Termico, Solare Termodinamico, etc.), ricercando e sviluppando soluzioni e servizi per le famiglie e le aziende nel settore energetico. Energia è Srl si impegna quindi a valorizzare le proprie competenze mettendole a servizio della Sua community, proponendo condizioni di risparmio condiviso che permettano di utilizzare l'Energia e il Gas in modo più consapevole e sostenibile, a tutela l'ambiente, a tutela di ogni Suo Cliente.  Energia è... Accanto a te nelle scelte che contano! Seguici sui Social Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/energiaesrl/

Name: Switch Expert BV
Company description: Switch Expert is de organisatie achter de energievergelijkings website www.energieleveranciers.nl Energieleveranciers.nl vergelijkt de producten van alle Nederlandse energieleveranciers en biedt een overzicht aan reviews en beoordelingen van deze leveranciers.

Name: Qrid BV
Company description: Qrid is a method of payment that enables consumer to pay mobile through their own bank-app. In addition to webshops, other online organisations that are not part of the e-commerce market also offer mobile payments. Qrid is increasingly used to pay energy bills, make donations to charities, buy mobile credits, pay local taxes, traffic fines, etcâŚ

Name: VESQA
Company description: We´re VESQA. We help companies in taking charge of their own energy transition.  Procurement managers, facility managers, business owners: stop being the victim of constantly rising energy prices. Take charge and start saving money from the first month, while preparing your company for a more sustainable future. Get value from your assets instead of just paying the electricity bills. VESQA manages the process of installing on-site generation, storage and trading with years of experience. You don´t have budget for this year? We can finance the installation and let the savings pay for the installments. Technology has disrupted retail, banking, travel, housing, …  Next up: ENERGY. Contact us and we´ll tell you how.

Name: Vereniging Van Dynamische Energieleveranciers
Company description: De Vereniging van Dynamische Energieleveranciers (VvDE) is op 2 augustus, 2022 opgericht en vertegenwoordigd energieleveranciers die dynamische energiecontracten aanbieden in Nederland.  Dynamische energiecontracten zijn contracten, waarbij de prijs meebeweegt met de markt en vormen wat ons betreft de motor van de energietransitie. Dynamische energieprijzen zijn namelijk vaak goedkoper, geven de consument een prikkel om actief energie te besparen en zijn essentieel om ruimte te creëren op ons overbelaste stroomnet.

Name: Arq.Energies
Company description: Arq.Energies Group provides a professional architecture and energy efficiency design service to create buildings which maximise natural light and space and minimise operational costs.  By considering key cost-effective energy saving features at the design stage of a project, future re-designs and expensive energy bills are avoided from the outset.  We want to help our clients make informed decisions on important design-integrated, energy saving features such as windows, insulation, heating and lighting options.  Combining energy with architectural design can also significantly improve the enjoyment of interior space by utilising natural elements - air flow, light and warmth from the sun - instead of maintaining internal environments with energy intensive appliances. Our project portfolio includes new residential home construction, interior modelling or redesigns and building renovations.

Name: MTS Corporación
Company description: MTS CORPORACIÓN somos un grupo empresarial con sede central en el Parque Científico y Tecnológico de Castilla – La Mancha, ubicado en la ciudad de Albacete.  Compuestos por 10 empresas, abarcamos diferentes sectores dentro de la prestación de servicios, principalmente, en la zona de Castilla-La Mancha y Levante. En estos últimos años, hemos conseguido una tasa de empleabilidad por encima de la media, llegando a formar un equipo humano de más de 150 profesionales de los cuáles, las mujeres representan más del 60% de cargos de responsabilidad. Somos proveedores de energía solar, evitamos la emisión de millones de toneladas anuales de CO2 gracias a la instalación de más de 10.000 kW en el último año.  Hemos construido más de 300 inmuebles por las diferentes localidades de la zona, generando un importante desarrollo urbanístico con el que hacemos frente al problema de despoblación rural. También somos pioneros en la tockenización de inmuebles, con una innovadora fórmula que facilita el acceso a la vivienda a los más jóvenes. Con nuestro compromiso en la difusión y promoción del arte y la música en vivo, somos capaces de organizar más de 500 eventos musicales y culturales en la geografía nacional al año, formando parte de los festivales más punteros de la zona de Castilla-La Mancha. Todo esto, impulsado por la primera agencia de marketing y publicidad de influencia de toda Castilla La Mancha, que revoluciona la manera de entender la comunicación convencional. MTS Coorporación, trabajamos para ti

Name: Starke Energy
HQ Location: Spain, Catalonia, Barcelona, 118 Carrer De Casp, 08013
Company description: Energy systems can be much cleaner, cheaper and more flexible to operate if integrated locally. Connecting building owners, their tenants, network operators and energy providers can create added value for all. Beyond connecting supply, demand and energy trading, this requires local storage solutions to ensure energy is available when needed at the best possible price. Starke offers integrated technical and financial solutions that enable local smart energy networks through long-lasting storage. Starke Energy offers the integrated technical and financial solutions that enable local smart energy networks with our Urban Power Banks ©. Our Services: We take care of batteries.  The way batteries are used really affects their lifetime! Factors such as discharge rate or operational temperature are key and must be kept within safe boundaries. We implement an Artificial Intelligence to look after batteries and ensure they last as long as possible. We relieve local congestion.  With the increasing electrification, the consumption of electricity in residences and offices is increasing, and that can be an issue for the existing infrastructure! We use batteries to relieve such infrastructure, offering smart storage services at a local scale. We bring the batteries.  In order to offer storage as a service, we need the batteries! The cost of batteries is still high, making the investment a barrier for many organizations. We take care of that investment and share costs and benefits over time. We can also integrate existing installations into our network, or install and operate new batteries, so our clients don’t have to worry a bit in any case. Just plug and play.

Name: Ventusolar Global Capital GmbH
Company description: VENTUSOLAR GLOBAL CAPITAL GmbH, a sister company of the Canada based Ventusolar Inc.  with head office in Munich, Germany, is an investment advisor with a highly-experienced management team. The company provides for institutional clients access to Renewable Energies in the sectors of photovoltaic, wind power and hydro power with a focus on Canada but also the US and Europe as well as selected emerging markets like Argentina and Chile. The management team has strong experience and track record. Thanks to an over many years developed network within Canada, the US, Western Europe and Latin American Countries, VENTUSOLAR is able to identify and evaluate investment compatible renewable energy projects under development as well as operational assets with a focus on photovoltaic, wind power and hydro. VENTUSOLAR’s network includes local project developers, authorities and energy suppliers as well as international EPCs and manufacturers like of solar panels and wind turbines. Therefore, VENTUSOLAR is able to provide access to a sufficient number of investment grade and profitable assets and projects. VENTUSOLAR GLOBAL CAPITAL along with its partners has a high experience of both, energy and finance. Parts of the management team of VENTUSOLAR GLOBAL CAPITAL are also founding members of the Canadian based sister company VENTUSOLAR Inc. Therefore, the team along with its partners already looks back on a track record of more than one gigawatt of handled projects and assets in the field of Renewable Energies.

Name: Blue Cells Danmark ApS
Company description: An experienced Solar Energy Provider, Blue Cells offers a variety of solutions for photovoltaic modules. We provide systems, which combine optimum structural dimensioning, short mounting times, economic efficiency and maximum durability, all at attractive prices. One of the largest and most experienced solar company Blue Cells caters to the professional industry and the professional solar installers who want professional products. All our products come from the leading manufacturers. Blue Cells engineers and consultants have designed and installed some of Denmark’s largest installations. We have many years of experience in both Denmark and abroad. We can help with even the most difficult solar cell applications. In addition to supplying the best products from the world we can help with design and structural calculations. Blue Cells A/S is owned by the Danish investment company Blue Company Holding. Full solar energy service We’re your all-in-one solar energy provider. Our in-house team will take care of every part of your project including financing, custom engineering, solar panel installation and ongoing system monitoring. You’ll also get a dedicated Blue Cells Project Manager who will keep you up-to-date on your project status and answer any questions you may have.

Name: Avunet B.V.
Company description: We are a team of passionate people whose goal is to improve everyone's life by transforming the free energy of the sun in the form of water, wind and direct sunlight into heat and electricity in the most effective manner. We are always searching for the most sustainable and economic solution of your project as well as to the aesthetic appearance of the outcome. We build great solutions to lower your CO2 footprint and lower your electricity bills.

Name: ENERGIA AUREA
Company description: Energia Àurea focuses on providing cost saving solutions to SME, large industry, estates administrators,  public administrations and domestic clients in the following areas: 1) Management and support services (energy bill auditing, selection of optimal electricity and gas suppliers, change of titleholder, optimization of contractual power, registration/cancellation of supply contracts, technical documentation such as LV/MV installation certificates (White Bulletin), LV/MV installation Bulletin (Blue Bulletin), ECA approval. 2) Project and installation services (Energy Efficiency Assessment, Renewable Energy Solutions, Metering Equipment, Harmonic Filtering Equipment, Capacitor Bank, Lighting and LEDS) 3) Legal Services (Adequate billing auditing, claims to Energy Supplier, the Distribution Network Operator and the Energy Directorate of the Catalan Government and Users Organization) 4) Electrical Vehicle Assessment (Selection of optimal Electrical Vehicle model based on costumer needs, full  support on design and installation of charger, search of regional, national and European incentive schemes)

Name: Hot Solar
Company description: Hot Solar has a holistic approach to renewable energy at your home. We consult, design and install solar power systems and heating foil systems. We believe that our future lies in hybrid solutions of solar energy and heating foils. Due to the combination of those two systems, your home will become energy independent.  In our offer you will find one of the most reliable photovoltaic systems on the market, such as: Panasonic, LG, AXITEC, REC and JA Solar. All of those PV systems work in almost all conditions and their high durability (LG offers 25 years warranty) ensures peace of mind. Heating foils perfectly complement PV systems to an extend that makes energy bills fade into memory. Additionally, it’s a great solution for people who appreciate economy, comfort and aesthetics. In our offer you will find only the best heating foils on the market, including: CALEO, BVF and Hemstedt. Those heating foils are marked with efficiency and safety.  Hot Solar has a cross-disciplinary approach to understanding clients’ needs. We always put our clients’ benefits first. We want to provide complex, safe and environment friendly solar power energy and heating systems solutions for your home.

Name: Renbloc
Company description: RenBloc are set to disrupt the central core of the energy market. Renbloc is a comprehensive and transparent solution for tracing and verifying sources of energy. Suppliers and customers can easily keep track of when, where and how their energy is produced. We see a future where awareness in the energy market increases, and the power of consumer choice takes central stage in everyday life. We want to increase the transparency in the energy market by giving consumers the opportunity to freely choose the origin of their energy, bringing purchasing power the energy market RenBloc brings purchasing power the energy market. The conscious consumer will for the first time be able voice their energy opinion by directly and transparently choose the origin of their energy.  We see this free will as a major step in the development of global democracy.

Name: DEBIE
Company description: DEBIE spart Unternehmen Zeit und Kosten im Umgang mit Ihren Energieabrechnungen und Verträgen - digital, einfach und unmittelbar unter www.getdebie.de

Name: MULTILED.PL
HQ Location: Poland, Lesser Poland Voivodeship, Kraków, 4a Cegielniana, 30404
Company description: 💡 Multiled Solutions – światło, które sprzedaje. Profesjonalne oświetlenie LED dla sklepów i sieci handlowych. Od 2009 roku pomagamy właścicielom sklepów zwiększać zyski, tworząc przemyślane systemy oświetleniowe, które wpływają na zachowania klientów i optymalizują koszty prowadzenia biznesu. Co zyskujesz dzięki współpracy z Multiled? ✅ Większą sprzedaż – światło wpływa na decyzje zakupowe, buduje klimat i prowadzi klienta przez strefy sprzedażowe. ✅ Niższe rachunki za prąd – nowoczesne rozwiązania LED znacząco redukują zużycie energii. ✅ Wysoką jakość i estetykę – nasze produkty wyróżniają się wzornictwem i trwałością. ✅ Gotowe rozwiązania szyte na miarę – od projektu po montaż, z pełnym wsparciem technicznym. ✅ Zaufanie i doświadczenie – działamy nieprzerwanie od ponad 15 lat, obsługując sklepy w całej Polsce. Zaprojektujemy światło, które pracuje na Twój zysk. Z nami Twój sklep będzie wyglądał lepiej i sprzedawał więcej.

Name: AGEVE - Agenzia Veronese Per L'Energia
HQ Location: Italy, Veneto, Verona, 31 Corso Porta Nuova, 37122
Company description: energy agency with over twenty years of experience in renewable and energy efficiency.  Certified to perform energy audits for companies to improve their energy performance and reduce energy bills.  Industry experience in heat recovery systems (ORCs), co- and trigeneration plants, LED replacements and relamping schemes.  Over 15 years of experience in building integrated photovoltaic systems in particular with Unisolar flexible solar laminates. Offering O&M services and revamping on Unisolar and Solarintegrated PV systems. Active in the field of developing floating solar PV plants in Italy with industry leader Ciel et Terre.

Name: Powercare Italia
HQ Location: Italy, Basilicate, Matera, 62 Via La Martella, 75100
Company description: Powercare è un’agenzia di consulenza che dal 2015 si occupa di fornire a famiglie, imprese e amministratori di condominio le migliori soluzioni per gestire e risparmiare sulle utenze. Powercare è attenzione per il consumatore, ma anche per l’energia e per il Pianeta. Un consumatore più attento ed informato, farà un utilizzo più consapevole delle risorse energetiche e contribuirà alla riduzione dell’impatto sull’ambiente. La nostra consulenza gratuita si basa sull’ascolto delle esigenze e sull’analisi della bolletta, al fine di individuare nel mercato libero le forniture energetiche più adatte ad esigenze economiche e di consumo. Il team di professionisti lavora con competenza, trasparenza e chiarezza e opera in maniera del tutto imparziale nei confronti dei consumatori. Powercare infatti, si finanzia grazie agli accordi commerciali presi direttamente con i fornitori di energia e ai consumatori non richiede alcuna commissione aggiuntiva per la stipula di un contratto di energia. La nostra sede principale è situata a Matera e grazie ad un servizio di call center dedicato, i nostri professionisti rispondono giornalmente dall’Italia alle richieste di supporto provenienti da tutto il territorio nazionale.

Name: SenerGie.pro
HQ Location: Netherlands, South Holland, Voorschoten, 2 Herman Gortersingel, 2251zp
Company description: Slechts 25% van alle huishoudens in Nederland stapt jaarlijks over van Energieleverancier en bespaart hierdoor elk jaar veel geld. Dus 75% van alle huishoudens in Nederland vindt het overstappen lastig, onoverzichtelijk en verre van transparant.  4 jaar geleden begon ik als energieadviseur en zocht ik contact met een bewindvoerder in mijn woonplaats  om zijn cliënten van een scherper energiecontract te voorzien zodat er meer ruimte in het budget van deze cliënten beschikbaar kwam voor belangrijkere zaken.    Inmiddels werk ik samen met 14 bewindvoerders en verzorg ik elke 12 maanden de opzegging en zoek steeds weer naar de beste deal om over te stappen.   Dat doe ik onafhankelijk en helemaal kosteloos omdat ik van ALLE energieleveranciers een vaste vergoeding ontvang.  Ik moet het dus van volume hebben want 1 ding staat voor mij vast. HET KAN EN MOET GOEDKOPER! Ik werk alléén, Ik werk snel en efficiënt. Een aanvraag wordt binnen 24 uur van een scherp voorstel voorzien. Naast particuliere klanten ………wel of niet via een bewindvoerder,                                                                      heb ik óók een zakelijke portefeuille met horecabedrijven, een Autoschadebedrijf, een stomerijketen en een aantal winkels.  Mijn portefeuille puilt nog niet uit dus ben op zoek naar nieuwe klanten! Ik onderzoek dus graag welke kansen ik voor u in petto heb.

Name: FÖRSTER | Antike Kachelöfen
Company description: Familienbetrieb, 1903 gegründet. Spezialgeschäft für Antike Kachelöfen, die zwischen 100 und 400 Jahre alt sind. Jedes Stück ist einzigartig und ein Original aus der Zeit. Antike Kachelöfen sind wertvolle Energielieferanten, sie spenden Wärme und Atmosphäre, und sind eine nachhaltige Investition. Größte Sammlung Antiker Kachelöfen weltweit. Einzigartige Interior-Design Stücke, voll funktionstüchtig, um sie traditionell mit Holz, oder modern mit einem 2kW Elektromodul zu beheizen.  SAUBERE ENERGIE. EINIGARTIG. NACHHALTIG. EFFIZIENT. WUNDERSCHÖN. NIE WIEDER KALT.  Specialist for antique tiled stoves with the world's largest collection of Biedermeier, Art Nouveau and Round stoves made in Austria. All pieces are originals, valuable energy providers, they give warmth and atmosphere, and are a sustainable investment. Inimitable interior design pieces and fully functional for heating - either traditional wood burning or with a clean energy electric unit. World-wide delivery.  UNIQUE. SUSTAINABLE. EFFICIENT. BEAUTIFUL. INVESTMENT.  NEVER COLD AGAIN.

Name: BrainSTROM OG
Company description: We believe that everyone can contribute towards the clean energy transition regardless of their income.  Therefore, we support energy providers in developing new products that enable users to share energy easily among them. This includes drafting concepts, programming prototypes and testing them with users which guarantees a successful product launch. We continuously deepen our understanding of renewable energy communities as we participate in research projects.

Name: OHM Management Group
Company description: OHM Management Group speelt op het gebied van energietransitie service als al jaren mee. Wij hebben onze sporen verdiend bij het managen van het openmaken van de markt waarbij klanten de vrijheid kregen om een betere aanbod van een ander leverancier te kiezen. Heroriëntaties en reorganiseren van energieleveranciers, afsplitsing van netbeheerders. Het introduceren van nieuwe en aanpassen van bestaande organisaties, processen en ICT systemen om het goed functioneren in de nieuwe ontstane, en continue veranderende situatie mogelijk te maken. Wij kennen de energiewereld en de moeilijkheden om het vertrouwen te wekken bij klanten om te switchen. Wij weten wat het vraagt om samenwerking tussen oude en nieuwe spelers te creëren om nieuwe betrouwbare oplossingen te realiseren. Wij hebben de ervaring van het vallen en opstaan, proberen, falen en doorgaan, zoeken naar nieuwe wegen. Wij staan er dan ook voor om onze bijdrage te leveren aan de energietransitie als aanjager, realisator van om het even welk doel u daarin vervult wilt hebben. Arrogant, overtuigd van onszelf? Jazeker! We durven dit te bieden op basis van onze ervaring, onze eigen expertise bestaande uit de klassiekers advies, programmadefinitie en realisatie on target. Dit doen we door het verbinden van de mensen, de spelers nodig om het doel te halen, creativiteit in combinatie met strak management en het betrekken van experts uit ons netwerk van experts en professionals werkzaam in het veld van energie en duurzame ontwikkeling.

Name: Energram - The Energy Saving App
HQ Location: Czech Republic, South Moravian, Brno, 649/127 Purkynova, 61200
Company description: Join the Energram community and say bye to high energy bills.  Plan how and when to use electricity-using appliances by getting a customized daily Energy Saving Plan for your building with the Energram app. By following the daily Energy Saving Plan you will cut your electricity cost by 30% (according to the beta testers' reviews). Simply choose the appliances you'll be using today, and we will calculate the most affordable usage arrangement for you. Download the app and follow the Energy Saving Plan to start saving today: https://apps.apple.com/cz/app/energram/id6446977868 What's behind? The Energy Saving Plan is calculated based on the hourly electricity prices for the Spanish and Czech spot markets. Monitoring the spot prices and planning your consumption is super useful if you have a spot contract and consume according to the changing tariffs every hour. Our Vision: We believe that these days every building has to have its own Energy Saving Plan - the strategy towards wise consumption. Stay Tuned For More! We will soon introduce more features such as Energram.Saver that will assess your entire energy usage and generate smart saving recommendations or Energram.Trader that will automatically trade electricity for you to unlock a passive income.

Name: Stonebit Consulting
Company description: Stonebit Consulting is a small IT services company,  rooted on two IT systems experts (Mr Gabriel Neagoe and Mr Cristian Marinescu), with goals set on providing proffesional services focused on a small number of customers and delivering a complete package of infrastructure management services to each customer. Our services enable customers to get a complete image on their IT systems key elements, enhance their abilities to manage and run their applications and clinically asses and plan for further development. After successfull implementations we always provide post implementation support to help our customers take full controll over their systems. Based on our technical expertise we support our customers to select the meanigful and efficient technologies to improve the system efficiency by focusing on the important aspects and improve controll over the system performance parameters. Previously we worked in S&T Romania (branch of S&T AG Austria), a company focused on providing integrated IT solutions. Some of the most complex IT solutions projects we worked on were: customers management and billing for the electricity supplier in the region, citizens data management and passport issuing integrated IT system (and extension systems: online visa issuing system and Foreign citizens registration management and ID card issuing), integrated IT solution for the National House of Pensions, high-availabilty solution for the national inter-bank clearing authority.

In addition to legal consultancy services the lawyers of Engel & Feest have an extensive experience in court proceedings before German state courts and represent clients in international arbitration proceedings. Caspar Feest is member of the German Institution of Arbitration (Deutsche Institution für Schiedsgerichtsbarkeit e.V., DIS) and also available as an arbitrator.

Name: PeggyRain
Company description: PeggyRain® Clothesline with Instant Rain Protection. PeggyRain® makes outdoor clothes drying simple, practical, and accessible to all, irrespective of a home garden, apartment balcony, or any weather conditions! 🌧 By using PeggyRain instead of a tumble dryer you are helping to reduce your household carbon footprint whilst saving money on electricity bills. PeggyRain is Made in Ireland, with Manufacturing in Dublin and Wicklow and our Marketing team is based in Cork. With PeggyRain it is always a grand day for drying! There are few feelings more painful than sitting down for a nice cup of tea, after putting out all the washing in the back garden, just to see a plethora of rain drench every last piece of your clothing. You find yourself panicking, hastily rushing out trying to rescue anything you can, but it is too late. You stand there, soaking, just about ready to cry. Well wipe your tears because this is where PeggyRain comes in. Peggy Rain is a self-starting clothesline, with innovative technology that automatically releases an integral protective layer on a rainy day. A biodegradable cotton sensor releases a signal if it detects so much as a drop of rain. A waterproof cover is then quickly moved over the clothesline, protecting your clothes. So now next time you’ve set out the washing, and the rain starts pouring down, you can sit back with a smug grin on your face, knowing you were smart enough to choose PeggyRain.

Our team checks product prices daily to guarantee that the latest actions and discounts are properly shown in the comparison tool. Our team is available 24/7 to provide technical and commercial support. We have a wide range of products available: Energy: Whitelabeled just launched the new energy comparison tool. Internet: The internet comparison tool is Whitelabeled most popular comparison tool and for good reason. SIM-only: The SIM-only comparison tool is Whitelabeled latest tool and the best SIM-only comparison tool available on the market. Interested in our solutions? Contact us at info@whitelabeled.nl

Name: TintTech
Company description: We design, produce and service energy-efficient ePaper digital signage products with related software and accessories. Our ePaper displays have a minimalist design and are available in wired and wireless configuration. Furthermore, our displays consume less power during operation than TVs do when switched off, enabling you to slash your monthly energy bills and to support your sustainability and carbon neutrality ambitions. Our products are designed for permanently installed indoor signage solutions, e.g. multilingual exhibitions at museums, patient information in hospitals and information boards or schedules in offices and universities. However, system integrators are not limited to existing solutions, as the flexibility of the platform enables the creation of novel applications. Key features for wired ePaper displays: - 7.8″, 9.7″, 13.3″ & 32″ E Ink  - PoE (Power over Ethernet) - Batteryless - On-site CMS Key features for wireless ePaper displays: - 7.8″ & 13.3″ E Ink - IoT (Internet of Things) - Battery powered - Cloud CMS Our solution is trusted by respectable public institutions: - The University Hospital of Münster - The Johannes Gutenberg University of Mainz - The Estonian National Museum - The University of Tartu - The National Museum of Krakow

Name: ACL Sistemas De Ahorro Y Eficiencia Energética S.L.
HQ Location: Spain, Murcia, Puerto Lumbreras, 8 Avenida García Rubio, 30890
Company description: ACL Sistemas de Ahorro y Eficiencia Energética es una empresa de Ingeniería que ofrece servicios de Asesoría y Consultoría Energética, trabajamos como Consultores Energéticos externos e independientes, poniendo a su disposición todo nuestro conocimiento y experiencia acumulada en el sector energético, para que usted pueda tomar las decisiones más apropiadas. Este nuevo servicio de Asesoría y Consultoría Energética es equivalente al que le presta su Asesoría Laboral, Fiscal o Contable, pero en el ámbito Energético. Nuestro objetivo es conseguir que la energía deje de ser un problema y se convierta en una ventaja competitiva para su empresa. Nos encargamos de todo lo referente a la energía eléctrica de su empresa, realizando un estudio pormenorizado para lograr la optimización de los parámetros de su suministro eléctrico (potencia, tipo de tarifa, energía, reactiva, penalizaciones, etc.): -Control, supervisión y seguimiento mensual de su facturación eléctrica. -Asesoramiento, petición y supervisión de ofertas para la contratación del suministro de energía eléctrica. (incluyendo recepción y validación de ofertas de los comerciales de electricidad que reciba en su empresa). -Negociación de las ofertas para mejorar condiciones con las compañías suministradoras (su contrato será negociado junto a otros contratos de otras empresas, formando parte de un paquete de energía, lo que nos permite conseguirle mejores precios, incluso manteniendo la misma compañía eléctrica). -Además le incluimos el asesoramiento y resolución de cualquier duda o consulta que tenga su empresa a nivel energético (electricidad, gas, sistemas de ahorro, etc.). Para que usted tenga la certeza y la tranquilidad de que su suministro eléctrico está completamente optimizado. Póngase en contacto con nosotros o envíenos por e-mail las facturas de electricidad de un año completo (sin compromiso alguno), evaluaremos las posibilidades de ahorro y nos pondremos en contacto con usted.

Name: Rison Capital
Company description: At Rison, we invest in energy efficiency and small-scale energy production for real estate. Our financing helps both existing properties and new developments reach higher energy classifications, meet regulatory requirements, and cut costs from day one. We deploy capital into projects such as insulation, ventilation, heating, solar, and storage, raising property value, lowering energy bills, and improving banking terms. By aligning strong returns with sustainability, we deliver value for property owners, investors, and society, strengthening the clean-tech sector, the energy grid, and the national economy. Learn more about how we combine profitability and sustainability on our website.

Name: De Energiecompagnie
Company description: Het gevoel dat je energie wegstroomt krijgen we allemaal wel eens. Het is geen geheim dat dat wat bij een ander werkt, niet bij jou hoeft te werken. Daarom is het fijn dat De Energiecompagnie er is: een bundeling van krachten om samen met jou aan je energie te werken.  Wij zorgen er voor dat jij in staat bent om jouw persoonlijke energiepeil weer op orde te brengen. Dat doen we als team en als individueel. Dat kan in een losse sessie zijn, meerdere sessies of combinatie van sessies. Vooral dat laatste is onze kracht. Samen kijken we wat het best bij jou past. Als dat een combinatie van methodes is, zetten we die combinatie in. We richten ons op preventie, persoonlijke ontwikkeling, therapeutische behandeling en elke combinatie daar binnen. Zo kan jij aan jezelf werken om je gewoon lekkerder in je vel te voelen of om bijvoorbeeld terug te komen in het maatschappelijk leven. Je werkt hiermee ook aan je duurzame inzetbaarheid en daar is je werkgever weer blij mee. Om zelf weer energie op te doen, maakt Marije graag wandelingen. Tijdens het wandelen realiseerde zij zich dat ze vaak vanuit een andere rol meer kan doen voor de patiënten die zij met de ambulance naar het ziekenhuis vervoert dan in de rol van ambulance verpleegkundige. Ze is gaan praten met meerdere mensen om haar idee uit te werken: een groep specialisten bij elkaar die elk vanuit hun eigen expertise mensen kunnen helpen en gezamenlijk zo de krachten hierin te bundelen. Als snel werd het idee een concept en daarna realiteit. Wij zijn nu een team met verschillende disciplines die de krachten gebundeld hebben. En de naam? Vrij simpel: het draait om energie, jouw energiepeil, de energie die wij in jouw hulp stoppen, de energie die nodig is om het leven kleur te geven, de energie die jij in je eigen ontwikkeling, je eigen leven stopt. En compagnie vertelt dat we het samen doen; als energieleveranciers werken in een team. Een ander woord voor team is ook compagnie, en dat klinkt net wat lekkerder dan team.

Name: Elektriker ́n AB
Company description: Vi hjälper fastighetsägare med solcellsanläggningar, elbilsladdning, batterier & energilagring. Är du en fastighetsägare med mycket tak eller extra markyta? Då hjäper vi dig gärna med att skapa en solcellslösning som passar just dig och dina energibehov. Vi har hjälpt både lantbruk/jordbruk och industrier med hög elkonsumtion med solpanelslösningar som lett till att de har fått minskade elräkningar och sålt tillbaka den producerade elen som de inte har använt själva.

Name: SparkWave Energy

Our mission is to help clients transition to a future powered by Green Energy.

Macon combines technical and scientific experts around the world to provide the best teams and people to respond our clients needs. Our target is to reduce risk, to create competitive advantage, to reduce energy bills, to evaluate opportunities and to help build a sustainable future  Macon brings deep, functional expertise approach to work.

Name: GreenLink
Company description: With GreenLink, energy retailers will be able to offer their customers truly sustainable and individualized digital energy services. Customers of energy retailers using GreenLink will be able to select renewable sources based on location and type, trace the origin of their energy in real-time, and have access to automated sustainability tools. GreenLink brings value to energy providers by unleashing new revenue streams from value-added energy services, offering greater choice and transparency for their customers, and increasing customer acquisition and retention as a result of the heightened trust in their green energy services.

Name: Maxdevelopment BV
Company description: Maxdevelopment, Het #1 platform en verbindende schakel tussen (zakelijke) klanten en energieleveranciers.  Onze interne focus ligt op het win-win situaties creëren voor beide partijen. Onze energieke en doelgerichte ondernemers profileren zichzelf als commerciële ambassadeurs en onderscheiden zich door middel van drang om te ontwikkelen, doorzettingsvermogen, een mensgerichte benaderen en resultaatgerichtheid. Iedere dag weer, vanuit huis en ons kantoor voor een bovengemiddelde vergoeding!

Name: Sustainable Data Foundation
Company description: The Sustainable Data Foundation (based in Amersfoort, the Netherlands) is committed to making the IT infrastructure around data processing and data use as energy-efficient as possible. Our goal is to contribute to the (accelerated) sustainability of data by spreading knowledge and creating more awareness around the topic. A sustainable(er) handling of data brings many benefits:  - Reducing emissions of CO2 and other harmful emissions  - Preventing energy shortages and peak loads on the power grid  - Keeping energy bills affordable for companies and consumers  - Data centres with less impact on nature, the environment and the living environment

Name: Windlife Energy BV
Company description: A developmnt company specialized in large wind park in challenging locations. Currently  we are developing a 200 MW in  Russia, north of the pole circle.Our company also specializes in solutions for off-grid settlements and area's.  We compiment existing diesel generators in remote area's with our hybrid wind systems. Lastly, within our own country, we are a certified UPA company which makes industrial buildings net energy suppliers by implementing solar and wind energy efficient measures.

Name: Deepgrid
Company description: We provide, own and trade Energy Assets including Battery Energy Storage Facilities (BESS) and VBox™ loadbanks. Name: Green Now Sp. Z O.o.
Company description: Nasza firma jest pionierem i zaufanym liderem w dziedzinie odnawialnych źródeł energii, aktywnie działającym od siedmiu lat. Nasza historia jest ukoronowaniem zapału, innowacyjności i zaangażowania w transformację energetyczną na skalę globalną. Jako entuzjastyczni obrońcy zrównoważonego rozwoju, skupiamy się na dostarczaniu innowacyjnych i ekologicznych rozwiązań, które zmieniają oblicze przemysłu energetycznego. Nasza wizja to przyszłość, w której energia odnawialna staje się kluczowym filarem dostaw energetycznych. Jesteśmy przekonani, że oparcie naszej cywilizacji na odnawialnych źródłach energii jest kluczowe dla przeciwdziałania zmianom klimatycznym i ochrony naszej planety dla przyszłych pokoleń. Dlatego też od początku istnienia firmy skupiamy się na dostarczaniu najnowszych i najbardziej efektywnych technologii opartych na energii słonecznej, wiatrowej i innych odnawialnych źródłach. Dzięki naszym innowacyjnym projektom fotowoltaicznym i elektrowniom wiatrowym, przyczyniamy się do zwiększenia udziału energii odnawialnej w globalnym miksie energetycznym. Nasze działania nie tylko redukują emisję CO2, ale także promują niezależność energetyczną oraz obniżają rachunki za energię dla naszych klientów.

Name: IMB POWER | Doradztwo Energetyczne
Company description: IMB POWER to polska firma tworzona przez pasjonatów nowoczesnych technologii.  Bogate doświadczenie z branży energetycznej i odnawialnych źródeł energii pozwoliło stworzyć zespół, który wspiera przedsiębiorców oraz inwestorów. Na co dzień doradzamy firmom, jak obniżać koszty energii i podejmować trafne decyzje inwestycyjne.  Przeprowadzamy analizy, przygotowujemy raporty i wskazujemy rozwiązania, które realnie poprawiają efektywność energetyczną. Dzięki temu nasi klienci zyskują niższe rachunki, większą przewidywalność kosztów i pewność, że ich inwestycje w energię są bezpieczne i opłacalne.Współpracujemy z klientami, którzy chcą zmniejszyć swoje rachunki za energię elektryczną oraz mądrzej wydawać środki na inwestycje związane z efektywnością energetyczną.  Poprzez szczegółową analizę kosztów, zużycia energii oraz identyfikację obszarów wymagających poprawy, pomagamy znaleźć najbardziej opłacalne rozwiązania dostosowane do indywidualnych potrzeb firmy. Sprawdź nasze usługi: 1. Optymalizacja kosztów energii Analizujemy faktury i umowy, dobieramy właściwe taryfy, wdrażamy działania oszczędnościowe, które realnie obniżają rachunki za prąd. 2. Doradztwo energetyczne: Wsparcie strategiczne i inwestycyjne w zakresie odnawialnych źródeł energii, elektromobilności oraz inwestycji w efektywność energetyczną MŚP. 3. Budowa stacji ładowania: Projektujemy i wdrażamy infrastrukturę ładowania pojazdów elektrycznych, zapewniając szybki montaż, serwis i pełne wsparcie techniczne. Sprawdź, czy Twoja firma nie przepłaca za energię! Prześlij faktury z kilku ostatnich miesięcy, a w kilka dni otrzymasz informacje, czy Twoja firma przepłaca za energię.  Wstępna analiza jest całkowicie darmowa, bez zobowiązań i nie wiąże się z żadnym ryzykiem.

Name: SIM Energy
Company description: Energieleveranciers maken het niet eenvoudig voor bedrijven en of consumenten om hun jaarlijkse energieafrekening te controleren. Op internet zijn er verschillende websites waar je aan de hand van je postcode en verbruik de ‘beste’ deal kan sluiten, maar bij deze ‘beste’ deals zitten vaak meerdere addertjes onder het gras. SIM energy bekijkt welke energiemaatschappij het beste bij u past aan de hand van uw verbruik en wensen. Zonder ‘gedoe’ zorgt SIM energy dat u zorgeloos overstapt. Geld besparen is nog nooit zo eenvoudig geweest. Onze missie is om ondernemers en consumenten te ontzorgen door de energie-inkoop, factuurcontrole en alle verdere energiezaken uit handen te nemen.

Name: RAWLEMON SOLAR ARCHITECTURE

Company description: Rawlemon Solar Architecture is a power device maker like no other. From research to prototyping and marketing, we set the pace. We are a start-up clean tech company with a distribution network over 4 continents. Our first breakthrough, a ball lens design for optical tracking and diffuse light concentration, followed by patented MicroTrack dual-axis tracking system for building integration and Beta.ray, the first concentrated hybrid module that converts electricity and thermal energy. Rawlemon Solar Architecture is the culmination of 9 years of developing and building ultra-efficient solar devices and is currently fostering e-mobility. We continue to work in partnership with institutes, glass and module makers, project developers and energy providers to create the next generation of solar solutions with enhanced efficiencies. The innovation race is on.

Name: E.ON Flash

Company description: E.ON Flash este o viziune devenită realitate într-un start-up care, în mai puţin de 100 de zile  a devenit o nouă companie licenţiată pe piaţa concurenţială în furnizarea de energie electrică şi gaze naturale.  E.ON Flash schimbă modul în care până azi, energia, accesul, achiziţia şi întreaga relaţionare cu furnizorul acesteia au fost percepute. E.ON Flash livrează clienţilor săi prin produsele şi serviciile dezvoltate: rapiditate, simplitate, diversitate, transparenţă, fără a supune consumatorul la eforturi suplimentare, prin cel mai facil proces de schimbare a furnizorului din piaţă, cu minimul de documente necesare, fără costuri suplimentare. E.ON Flash este un nou furnizor de energie electrică, gaze naturale şi soluţii energetice din România. Suntem aici ca să îți oferim produse și servicii inovatoare printr-o experiență 100% online. Te întrebi ce putem aduce în domeniul energiei? Avem planuri mărețe, începând cu produsele personalizate în funcţie de comportamentul de consum al clienților, până la introducerea de surse alternative de energie. Acum, puterea de decizie și alegerea sunt la tine!  Facem parte din grupul E.ON, cu peste 30 milioane de clienți în lumea întreagă și avem acces la tehnologiile de ultimă oră din domeniul energiei și nu numai.

Name: EnergieIn B.V.

Name: TJK Energie Advies
Company description: TJK Energie Advies is door jarenlange ervaring in zowel de grootzakelijke als de MKB energiemarkt dé adviseur voor zakelijke Energie. Naast het geven van beste onafhankelijke advies voor de inkoop, ontzorgen wij u volledig van al uw energiezaken. Zo kunt u gewoon uw werk blijven doen, en hebt u uw energiezaken altijd op orde.   De Nederlandse energiemarkt wordt gedomineerd door een aantal grote en een aantal kleinere leveranciers. Zij bieden allemaal andere producten aan, waardoor het voor u als ondernemer haast onmogelijk wordt gemaakt appels met appels te kunnen vergelijken. Alle producten lijken op elkaar, maar onder aan de streep verschillen ze wel degelijk.    De kennis en ervaring van TJK Energie advies is opgedaan bij één van de grootste energieleveranciers van Nederland. Door onze kennis zijn wij perfect in staat de verschillende producten van de leveranciers te kunnen onderscheiden, en dit zeer overzichtelijk aan u te kunnen presenteren. Zo krijgt u van ons een overzichtelijk en transparant advies, wat precies bij de wensen van u als klant aansluit.    Voor onze grootverbruik klanten zorgen we voor een uitgebreid advies op basis van uw huidige situatie en uw wensen voor de toekomst. Zo krijgt u een advies wat precies op maat voor uw onderneming gemaakt is. Ook adviseren wij u in het kiezen van het juiste marktmoment. De grootzakelijke energiebeurzen zijn zo beweeglijk als de AEX, maar wij houden hem continu voor u in de gaten.   Voor onze kleinverbruik klanten kopen we collectief energie in. Uw volume wordt gecombineerd met tientallen andere verbruikers zoals u. Zo is er een flink prijsvoordeel te behalen. Omdat u bij ons uw contactpersoon heeft voor al uw energiezaken, hoeft u nooit meer in de wacht te staan bij de klantenservice van de grote energieleveranciers.

Name: The ECO Coin

This is a new way to track, measure and reward sustainability so that now you can do good and get paid.

Name: DAITABLE
Company description: At DAITABLE, we are transforming how businesses manage their energy and operations. Our AI-driven platform provides real-time monitoring, predictive analytics, and data-driven insights to help companies optimize efficiency, reduce costs, and drive innovation.  By simplifying data management, we help companies operate smarter and more efficiently, unlocking their full potential through AI-powered insights. With seamless integration into existing systems, we empower businesses to become more agile, sustainable, and future-ready.  Transparency, collaboration, and innovation are at the core of everything we do. We believe that by providing intelligent, data-driven solutions, businesses can make informed decisions that drive progress and sustainability.  Our technology is designed to work across industries, supporting enterprises, industrial facilities, commercial buildings, and energy providers in sectors such as manufacturing, hospitality, real estate, healthcare, and smart cities. Name: Heliatek
Company description: Heliatek is a pioneering company based in Dresden, Germany, specializing in organic photovoltaics (OPV) and the development of innovative solar films, particularly its flagship product, HeliaSol®. The company aims to transform buildings into clean energy generators by providing lightweight, flexible, and sustainable solar solutions that can be easily integrated into various surfaces without the need for traditional mounting systems. Heliatek's mission is to maximize the utilization of existing building surfaces while minimizing the carbon footprint of energy generation, achieving a CO2 amortization time of less than 100 days.  With a commitment to sustainability and innovation, Heliatek is positioned as a leader in the organic solar film industry, catering to clients looking for efficient and aesthetically pleasing energy solutions. The company collaborates with a diverse range of partners, including Siemens Energy, IGEPA Group, ENGIE, and Triflex, to deliver tailored solar solutions across various markets, including Europe, Asia, and Africa. Heliatek targets a diverse market, including construction firms, energy providers, and environmentally conscious developers, aiming to enhance energy efficiency and sustainability in urban environments.  By integrating sustainable energy solutions into building materials, Heliatek seeks to revolutionize the construction industry and contribute to a greener future. The innovative HeliaFilm® product allows structures to generate their own energy through solar power, making it an attractive option for modern architectural designs. Through its groundbreaking technology and strategic partnerships, Heliatek is committed to leading the charge towards a more sustainable energy landscape.

Name: SMARTWIN

De toegepaste materialen zijn geselecteerd op duurzaamheid en milieuvriendelijkheid. Smartwin heeft bewezen uitstekend aan alle hedendaagse eisen op het gebied van energieverlies, materiaalgebruik en esthetiek te voldoen.
